atk-s0203a0:3_0: 1. Evaṃ me sutanti devadahasuttaṃ. Tattha devadahaṃ nāmāti devā vuccanti rājāno,
atk-s0203a0:3_1: tattha ca sakyarājūnaṃ maṅgalapokkharaṇī ahosi pāsādikā ārakkhasampannā, sā devānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:3_2: dahattā “devadaha”nti paññāyittha. Tadupādāya sopi nigamo devadahantveva saṅkhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:3_3: gato. Bhagavā taṃ nigamaṃ nissāya lumbinivane viharati. Sabbaṃ taṃ pubbekatahetūti
atk-s0203a0:3_4: pubbe katakammapaccayā. Iminā kammavedanañca kiriyavedanañca paṭikkhipitvā ekaṃ vipākavedanameva
atk-s0203a0:3_5: sampaṭicchantīti dasseti. Evaṃ vādino, bhikkhave, nigaṇṭhāti iminā pubbe aniyametvā
atk-s0203a0:4_0: Ahuvamheva mayanti idaṃ bhagavā tesaṃ ajānanabhāvaṃ jānantova kevalaṃ kalisāsanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:4_1: āropetukāmo pucchati. Ye hi “mayaṃ ahuvamhā”tipi na jānanti, te kathaṃ kammassa katabhāvaṃ
atk-s0203a0:4_2: vā akatabhāvaṃ vā jānissanti. Uttaripucchāyapi eseva nayo.
atk-s0203a0:5: 2. Evaṃ santeti cūḷadukkhakkhandhe mahānigaṇṭhassa vacane sacce santeti attho, idha pana ettakassa ṭhānassa tumhākaṃ ajānanabhāve santeti attho. Na kallanti na yuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:6_0: 3. Gāḷhūpalepanenāti bahalūpalepanena, punappunaṃ visarañjitena, na pana khaliyā
atk-s0203a0:6_1: littena viya. Esaniyāti esanisalākāya antamaso nantakavaṭṭiyāpi. Eseyyāti gambhīraṃ
atk-s0203a0:6_2: vā uttānaṃ vāti vīmaṃseyya. Agadaṅgāranti jhāmaharītakassa vā āmalakassa vā cuṇṇaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:7_0: Evameva khoti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ, sallena viddhassa hi viddhakāle vedanāya
atk-s0203a0:7_1: pākaṭakālo viya imesaṃ “mayaṃ pubbe ahuvamhā vā no vā, pāpakammaṃ akaramhā vā no
atk-s0203a0:7_2: vā, evarūpaṃ vā pāpaṃ karamhā”ti jānanakālo siyā. Vaṇamukhassa parikantanādīsu catūsu
atk-s0203a0:7_3: kālesu vedanāya pākaṭakālo viya “ettakaṃ vā no dukkhaṃ nijjiṇṇaṃ, ettake vā nijjiṇṇe
atk-s0203a0:7_4: sabbameva dukkhaṃ nijjiṇṇaṃ bhavissati, suddhante patiṭṭhitā nāma bhavissāmā”ti jānanakālo
atk-s0203a0:7_5: siyā. Aparabhāge phāsubhāvajānanakālo viya diṭṭheva dhamme akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānāya
atk-s0203a0:7_6: kusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ upasampadāya jānanakālo siyā. Evamettha ekāya upamāya tayo atthā,
atk-s0203a0:8_0: 4. Ime pana tato ekampi na jānanti, virajjhitvā gate salle aviddhova “viddhosi mayā”ti
atk-s0203a0:8_2: viya kevalaṃ mahānigaṇṭhassa vacanappamāṇena sabbametaṃ saddahantā evaṃ sallopamāya
atk-s0203a0:8_3: bhagavatā niggahitā paccāharituṃ asakkontā yathā nāma dubbalo sunakho migaṃ uṭṭhāpetvā
atk-s0203a0:8_4: sāmikassa abhimukhaṃ karitvā attanā osakkati, evaṃ mahānigaṇṭhassa matthake vādaṃ
atk-s0203a0:9_0: 5. Atha ne bhagavā sācariyake niggaṇhanto pañca kho imetiādimāha. Tatrāyasmantānanti
atk-s0203a0:9_1: tesu pañcasu dhammesu āyasmantānaṃ. Kā atītaṃse satthari saddhāti atītaṃsavādimhi
atk-s0203a0:9_2: satthari kā saddhā. Yā atītavādaṃ saddahantānaṃ tumhākaṃ mahānigaṇṭhassa saddhā,
atk-s0203a0:9_3: sā katamā? Kiṃ bhūtatthā abhūtatthā, bhūtavipākā abhūtavipākāti pucchati. Sesapadesupi
atk-s0203a0:9_4: eseva nayo. Sahadhammikanti sahetukaṃ sakāraṇaṃ. Vādapaṭihāranti paccāgamanakavādaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:9_5: Ettāvatā tesaṃ “apanetha saddhaṃ, sabbadubbalā esā”ti saddhāchedakavādaṃ nāma dasseti.
atk-s0203a0:10: 6. Avijjā aññāṇāti avijjāya aññāṇena. Sammohāti sammohena. Vipaccethāti viparītato saddahatha, vipallāsaggāhaṃ vā gaṇhathāti attho.
atk-s0203a0:11_0: 7. Diṭṭhadhammavedanīyanti imasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākadāyakaṃ. Upakkamenāti payogena.
atk-s0203a0:11_1: Padhānenāti vīriyena. Samparāyavedanīyanti dutiye vā tatiye vā attabhāve vipākadāyakaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:11_3: Paripakkavedanīyanti paripakke nipphanne attabhāve vedanīyaṃ, diṭṭhadhammavedanīyassevetaṃ
atk-s0203a0:11_4: adhivacanaṃ. Aparipakkavedanīyanti aparipakke attabhāve vedanīyaṃ, samparāyavedanīyassevetaṃ
atk-s0203a0:11_5: adhivacanaṃ. Evaṃ santepi ayamettha viseso – yaṃ paṭhamavaye kataṃ paṭhamavaye vā
atk-s0203a0:11_6: majjhimavaye vā pacchimavaye vā vipākaṃ deti, majjhimavaye kataṃ majjhimavaye vā
atk-s0203a0:11_7: pacchimavaye vā vipākaṃ deti, pacchimavaye kataṃ tattheva vipākaṃ deti, taṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:11_8: nāma. Yaṃ pana sattadivasabbhantare vipākaṃ deti, taṃ paripakkavedanīyaṃ nāma. Taṃ
atk-s0203a0:12_0: Tatrimāni vatthūni – puṇṇo nāma kira duggatamanusso rājagahe sumanaseṭṭhiṃ nissāya
atk-s0203a0:12_1: vasati. Tamenaṃ ekadivasaṃ nagaramhi nakkhatte saṅghuṭṭhe seṭṭhi āha – “sace ajja
atk-s0203a0:12_2: kasissasi, dve ca goṇe naṅgalañca labhissasi. Kiṃ nakkhattaṃ kīḷissasi, kasissasī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:12_3: Kiṃ me nakkhattena, kasissāmīti? Tena hi ye goṇe icchasi, te gahetvā kasāhīti. So
atk-s0203a0:12_4: kasituṃ gato. Taṃ divasaṃ sāriputtatthero nirodhā vuṭṭhāya “kassa saṅgahaṃ karomī”ti?
atk-s0203a0:12_5: Āvajjanto puṇṇaṃ disvā pattacīvaraṃ ādāya tassa kasanaṭṭhānaṃ gato. Puṇṇo kasiṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0203a0:12_6: therassa dantakaṭṭhaṃ datvā mukhodakaṃ adāsi. Thero sarīraṃ paṭijaggitvā kammantassa
atk-s0203a0:12_7: avidūre nisīdi bhattābhihāraṃ olokento. Athassa bhariyaṃ bhattaṃ āharantiṃ disvā
atk-s0203a0:13_0: Sā sāmikassa āhaṭabhattaṃ therassa patte pakkhipitvā puna gantvā aññaṃ bhattaṃ sampādetvā
atk-s0203a0:13_1: divā agamāsi. Puṇṇo ekavāraṃ kasitvā nisīdi. Sāpi bhattaṃ gahetvā āgacchantī āha
atk-s0203a0:13_2: – “sāmi pātova te bhattaṃ āhariyittha, antarāmagge pana sāriputtattheraṃ disvā taṃ
atk-s0203a0:13_3: tassa datvā aññaṃ pacitvā āharantiyā me ussūro jāto, mā kujjhi sāmī”ti. Bhaddakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:13_4: te bhadde kataṃ, mayā therassa pātova dantakaṭṭhañca mukhodakañca dinnaṃ, amhākaṃyevānena
atk-s0203a0:13_5: piṇḍapātopi paribhutto, ajja therena katasamaṇadhammassa mayaṃ bhāgino jātāti cittaṃ
atk-s0203a0:13_6: pasādesi. Ekavāraṃ kasitaṭṭhānaṃ suvaṇṇameva ahosi. So bhuñjitvā kasitaṭṭhānaṃ olokento
atk-s0203a0:13_7: vijjotamānaṃ disvā uṭṭhāya yaṭṭhiyā paharitvā rattasuvaṇṇabhāvaṃ jānitvā “rañño akathetvā
atk-s0203a0:13_8: paribhuñjituṃ na sakkā”ti gantvā rañño ārocesi. Rājā taṃ sabbaṃ sakaṭehi āharāpetvā
atk-s0203a0:13_9: rājaṅgaṇe rāsiṃ kāretvā “kassimasmiṃ nagare ettakaṃ suvaṇṇaṃ atthī”ti pucchi. Kassaci
atk-s0203a0:13_10: natthīti ca vutte seṭṭhiṭṭhānamassa adāsi. So puṇṇaseṭṭhi nāma jāto.
atk-s0203a0:14_0: Aparampi vatthu – tasmiṃyeva rājagahe kāḷaveḷiyo nāma duggato atthi. Tassa bhariyā
atk-s0203a0:14_1: paṇṇambilayāguṃ paci. Mahākassapatthero nirodhā vuṭṭhāya “kassa saṅgahaṃ karomī”ti
atk-s0203a0:14_2: āvajjanto taṃ disvā gantvā gehadvāre aṭṭhāsi. Sā pattaṃ gahetvā sabbaṃ tattha pakkhipitvā
atk-s0203a0:14_3: therassa adāsi, thero vihāraṃ gantvā satthu upanāmesi. Satthā attano yāpanamattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:14_4: gaṇhi, sesaṃ pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ pahosi. Kāḷavaḷiyopi taṃ ṭhānaṃ patto cūḷakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:14_5: labhi. Mahākassapo satthāraṃ kāḷavaḷiyassa vipākaṃ pucchi. Satthā “ito sattame divase
atk-s0203a0:14_6: seṭṭhicchattaṃ labhissatī”ti āha. Kāḷavaḷiyo taṃ kathaṃ sutvā gantvā bhariyāya ārocesi.
atk-s0203a0:15_0: Tadā ca rājā nagaraṃ anusañcaranto bahinagare jīvasūle nisinnaṃ purisaṃ addasa. Puriso
atk-s0203a0:15_1: rājānaṃ disvā uccāsaddaṃ akāsi “tumhākaṃ me bhuñjanabhattaṃ pahiṇatha devā”ti. Rājā
atk-s0203a0:15_2: “pesessāmī”ti vatvā sāyamāsabhatte upanīte saritvā “imaṃ harituṃ samatthaṃ jānāthā”ti
atk-s0203a0:15_3: āha, nagare sahassabhaṇḍikaṃ cāresuṃ. Tatiyavāre kāḷavaḷiyassa bhariyā aggahesi.
atk-s0203a0:15_4: Atha naṃ rañño dassesuṃ, sā purisavesaṃ gahetvā pañcāvudhasannaddhā bhattapātiṃ gahetvā
atk-s0203a0:15_5: nagarā nikkhami. Bahinagare tāle adhivattho dīghatālo nāma yakkho taṃ rukkhamūlena
atk-s0203a0:15_6: gacchantiṃ disvā “tiṭṭha tiṭṭha bhakkhosi me”ti āha. Nāhaṃ tava bhakkho, rājadūto
atk-s0203a0:15_7: ahanti. Kattha gacchasīti. Jīvasūle nisinnassa purisassa santikanti. Mamapi ekaṃ
atk-s0203a0:15_8: sāsanaṃ harituṃ sakkhissasīti. Āma sakkhissāmīti. “Dīghatālassa bhariyā sumanadevarājadhītā
atk-s0203a0:15_9: kāḷī puttaṃ vijātā”ti āroceyyāsi. Imasmiṃ tālamūle satta nidhikumbhiyo atthi, tā
atk-s0203a0:15_10: tvaṃ gaṇheyyāsīti. Sā “dīghatālassa bhariyā sumanadevarājadhītā kāḷī puttaṃ vijātā”ti ugghosentī agamāsi.
atk-s0203a0:16_0: Sumanadevo yakkhasamāgame nisinno sutvā “eko manusso amhākaṃ piyapavattiṃ āharati,
atk-s0203a0:16_1: pakkosatha na”nti sāsanaṃ sutvā pasanno “imassa rukkhassa parimaṇḍalacchāyāya pharaṇaṭṭhāne
atk-s0203a0:16_2: nidhikumbhiyo tuyhaṃ dammī”ti āha. Jīvasūle nisinnapuriso bhattaṃ bhuñjitvā mukhapuñchanakāle
atk-s0203a0:16_3: itthiphassoti ñatvā cūḷāya ḍaṃsi, sā asinā attano cūḷaṃ chinditvā rañño santikaṃyeva
atk-s0203a0:16_4: gatā. Rājā bhattabhojitabhāvo kathaṃ jānitabboti? Cūḷasaññāyāti vatvā rañño ācikkhitvā
atk-s0203a0:16_5: taṃ dhanaṃ āharāpesi. Rājā aññassa ettakaṃ dhanaṃ nāma atthīti. Natthi devāti. Rājā
atk-s0203a0:16_6: tassā patiṃ tasmiṃ nagare dhanaseṭṭhiṃ akāsi. Mallikāyapi deviyā vatthu kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:17_0: Nandamāṇavako pana uppalavaṇṇāya theriyā vippaṭipajji, tassa mañcato uṭṭhāya nikkhamitvā
atk-s0203a0:17_1: gacchantassa mahāpathavī bhijjitvā okāsamadāsi, tattheva mahānarakaṃ paviṭṭho. Nandopi
atk-s0203a0:17_2: goghātako paṇṇāsa vassāni goghātakakammaṃ katvā ekadivasaṃ bhojanakāle maṃsaṃ alabhanto
atk-s0203a0:17_3: ekassa jīvamānakagoṇassa jivhaṃ chinditvā aṅgāresu pacāpetvā khādituṃ āraddho. Athassa
atk-s0203a0:17_4: jivhā mūle chijjitvā bhattapātiyaṃyeva patitā, so viravanto kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbatti.
atk-s0203a0:17_5: Nandopi yakkho aññena yakkhena saddhiṃ ākāsena gacchanto sāriputtattheraṃ navoropitehi
atk-s0203a0:17_6: kesehi rattibhāge abbhokāse nisinnaṃ disvā sīse paharitukāmo itarassa yakkhassa ārocetvā
atk-s0203a0:17_7: tena vāriyamānopi pahāraṃ datvā ḍayhāmi ḍayhāmīti viravanto tasmiṃyeva ṭhāne bhūmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:17_8: pavisitvā mahāniraye nibbattoti imāni akusalakamme vatthūni.
atk-s0203a0:18_0: Yaṃ pana antamaso maraṇasantikepi kataṃ kammaṃ bhavantare vipākaṃ deti, taṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0203a0:18_1: samparāyavedanīyaṃ nāma. Tattha yo aparihīnassa jhānassa vipāko nibbattissati, so
atk-s0203a0:18_2: idha nibbattitavipākoti vutto. Tassa mūlabhūtaṃ kammaṃ neva diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:18_3: na samparāyavedanīyanti, na vicāritaṃ, kiñcāpi na vicāritaṃ, samparāyavedanīyameva
atk-s0203a0:18_4: panetanti veditabbaṃ. Yo paṭhamamaggādīnaṃ bhavantare phalasamāpattivipāko, so idha
atk-s0203a0:18_5: nibbattitaguṇotveva vutto. Kiñcāpi evaṃ vutto, maggakammaṃ pana paripakkavedanīyanti
atk-s0203a0:18_6: veditabbaṃ. Maggacetanāyeva hi sabbalahuṃ phaladāyikā anantaraphalattāti.
atk-s0203a0:19_1: savipākaṃ kammaṃ. Avedanīyanti avipākaṃ kammaṃ. Evaṃ santeti imesaṃ diṭṭhadhammavedanīyādīnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:19_2: kammānaṃ upakkamena samparāyavedanīyādi bhāvakāraṇassa alābhe sati. Aphaloti nipphalo
atk-s0203a0:19_3: niratthakoti. Ettāvatā aniyyānikasāsane payogassa aphalataṃ dassetvā padhānacchedakavādo
atk-s0203a0:19_4: nāma dassitoti veditabbo. Sahadhammikā vādānuvādāti parehi vuttakāraṇena sakāraṇā
atk-s0203a0:19_5: hutvā nigaṇṭhānaṃ vādā ca anuvādā ca. Gārayhaṃ ṭhānaṃ āgacchantīti viññūhi garahitabbaṃ
atk-s0203a0:19_6: kāraṇaṃ āgacchanti. “Vādānuppattā gārayhaṭṭhānā”tipi pāṭho. Tassattho – parehi vuttena
atk-s0203a0:19_7: kāraṇena sakāraṇā nigaṇṭhānaṃ vādaṃ anuppattā taṃ vādaṃ sosentā milāpentā dukkaṭakammakārinotiādayo
atk-s0203a0:20: 9. Saṅgatibhāvahetūti niyatibhāvakāraṇā. Pāpasaṅgatikāti pāpaniyatino. Abhijātihetūti chaḷabhijātihetu.
atk-s0203a0:21_0: 10. Evaṃ nigaṇṭhānaṃ upakkamassa aphalataṃ dassetvā idāni niyyānikasāsane upakkamassa
atk-s0203a0:21_1: vīriyassa ca saphalataṃ dassetuṃ kathañca, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha anaddhabhūtanti
atk-s0203a0:21_2: anadhibhūtaṃ. Dukkhena anadhibhūto nāma manussattabhāvo vuccati, na taṃ addhabhāveti
atk-s0203a0:21_3: nābhibhavatīti attho. Tampi nānappakārāya dukkarakārikāya payojento dukkhena addhabhāveti
atk-s0203a0:21_4: nāma. Ye pana sāsane pabbajitvā āraññakā vā honti rukkhamūlikādayo vā, te dukkhena
atk-s0203a0:21_5: na addhabhāventi nāma. Niyyānikasāsanasmiñhi vīriyaṃ sammāvāyāmo nāma hoti.
atk-s0203a0:22_0: Thero panāha – yo issarakule nibbatto sattavassiko hutvā alaṅkatappaṭiyatto pituaṅke
atk-s0203a0:22_1: nisinno ghare bhattakiccaṃ katvā nisinnena bhikkhusaṅghena anumodanāya kariyamānāya
atk-s0203a0:22_2: tisso sampattiyo dassetvā saccesu pakāsitesu arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, mātāpitūhi vā “pabbajissasi
atk-s0203a0:22_3: tātā”ti vutto “āma pabbajissāmī”ti vatvā nhāpetvā alaṅkaritvā vihāraṃ nīto tacapañcakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:22_4: uggaṇhitvā nisinno kesesu ohāriyamānesu khuraggeyeva arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, navapabbajito
atk-s0203a0:22_5: vā pana manosilātelamakkhitena sīsena punadivase mātāpitūhi pesitaṃ kājabhattaṃ bhuñjitvā
atk-s0203a0:22_6: vihāre nisinnova arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ na dukkhena attānaṃ addhabhāveti nāma.
atk-s0203a0:22_7: Ayaṃ pana ukkaṭṭhasakkāro. Yo dāsikucchiyaṃ nibbatto antamaso rajatamuddikampi piḷandhitvā
atk-s0203a0:22_8: gorakapiyaṅgumattenāpi sarīraṃ vilimpetvā “pabbājetha na”nti nīto khuragge vā punadivase
atk-s0203a0:22_9: vā arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, ayampi na anaddhabhūtaṃ attānaṃ dukkhena addhabhāveti nāma.
atk-s0203a0:23_0: Dhammikaṃ sukhaṃ nāma saṅghato vā gaṇato vā uppannaṃ catupaccayasukhaṃ. Anadhimucchitoti
atk-s0203a0:23_1: taṇhāmucchanāya amucchito. Dhammikañhi sukhaṃ na pariccajāmīti na tattha gedho kātabbo.
atk-s0203a0:23_2: Saṅghato hi uppannaṃ salākabhattaṃ vā vassāvāsikaṃ vā “idamatthaṃ eta”nti paricchinditvā
atk-s0203a0:23_3: saṅghamajjhe bhikkhūnaṃ antare paribhuñjanto pattantare padumaṃ viya sīlasamādhivipassanāmaggaphalehi
atk-s0203a0:23_4: vaḍḍhati. Imassāti paccuppannānaṃ pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ mūlabhūtassa. Dukkhanidānassāti
atk-s0203a0:23_5: taṇhāya. Sā hi pañcakkhandhadukkhassa nidānaṃ. Saṅkhāraṃ padahatoti sampayogavīriyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:23_6: karontassa. Virāgo hotīti maggena virāgo hoti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “saṅkhārapadhānena
atk-s0203a0:23_7: me imassa dukkhanidānassa virāgo hotī”ti evaṃ pajānātīti iminā sukhāpaṭipadā khippābhiññā
atk-s0203a0:23_8: kathitā. Dutiyavārena tassa sampayogavīriyassa majjhattatākāro kathito. So yassa
atk-s0203a0:23_9: hi khvāssāti ettha ayaṃ saṅkhepattho – so puggalo yassa dukkhanidānassa saṅkhārapadhānena
atk-s0203a0:23_10: virāgo hoti, saṅkhāraṃ tattha padahati, maggapadhānena padahati. Yassa pana dukkhanidānassa
atk-s0203a0:23_11: ajjhupekkhato upekkhaṃ bhāventassa virāgo hoti, upekkhaṃ tattha bhāveti, maggabhāvanāya
atk-s0203a0:24_0: 11. Paṭibaddhacittoti chandarāgena baddhacitto. Tibbacchandoti bahalacchando. Tibbāpekkhoti
atk-s0203a0:24_1: bahalapatthano. Santiṭṭhantinti ekato tiṭṭhantiṃ. Sañjagghantinti mahāhasitaṃ hasamānaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:25_0: Evameva kho, bhikkhaveti ettha idaṃ opammavibhāvanaṃ – eko hi puriso ekissā itthiyā
atk-s0203a0:25_1: sāratto ghāsacchādanamālālaṅkārādīni datvā ghare vāseti. Sā taṃ aticaritvā aññaṃ
atk-s0203a0:25_2: sevati. So “nūna ahaṃ assā anurūpaṃ sakkāraṃ na karomī”ti sakkāraṃ vaḍḍhesi. Sā bhiyyosomattāya
atk-s0203a0:25_3: aticaratiyeva. So – “ayaṃ sakkariyamānāpi aticarateva, ghare me vasamānā anatthampi
atk-s0203a0:25_4: kareyya, nīharāmi na”nti parisamajjhe alaṃvacanīyaṃ katvā “mā puna gehaṃ pāvisī”ti
atk-s0203a0:25_5: vissajjesi. Sā kenaci upāyena tena saddhiṃ santhavaṃ kātuṃ asakkontī naṭanaccakādīhi
atk-s0203a0:25_6: saddhiṃ vicarati. Tassa purisassa taṃ disvā neva uppajjati domanassaṃ, somanassaṃ pana uppajjati.
atk-s0203a0:26_0: Tattha purisassa itthiyā sārattakālo viya imassa bhikkhuno attabhāve ālayo. Ghāsacchādanādīni
atk-s0203a0:26_1: datvā ghare vasāpanakālo viya attabhāvassa paṭijagganakālo. Tassā aticaraṇakālo viya
atk-s0203a0:26_2: jaggiyamānasseva attabhāvassa pittapakopādīnaṃ vasena sābādhatā. “Attano anurūpaṃ
atk-s0203a0:26_3: sakkāraṃ alabhantī aticaratī”ti sallakkhetvā sakkāravaḍḍhanaṃ viya “bhesajjaṃ alabhanto
atk-s0203a0:26_4: evaṃ hotī”ti sallakkhetvā bhesajjakaraṇakālo. Sakkāre vaḍḍhitepi puna aticaraṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:26_5: viya pittādīsu ekassa bhesajje kariyamāne sesānaṃ pakopavasena puna sābādhatā. Parisamajjhe
atk-s0203a0:26_6: alaṃvacanīyaṃ katvā gehā nikkaḍḍhanaṃ viya “idāni te nāhaṃ dāso na kammakaro, anamatagge
atk-s0203a0:26_7: saṃsāre taṃyeva upaṭṭhahanto vicariṃ, ko me tayā attho, chijja vā bhijja vā”ti tasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:26_8: anapekkhataṃ āpajjitvā vīriyaṃ thiraṃ katvā maggena kilesasamugghātanaṃ. Naṭanaccakādīhi
atk-s0203a0:26_9: naccamānaṃ vicarantiṃ disvā yathā tassa purisassa domanassaṃ na uppajjati, somanassameva
atk-s0203a0:26_10: uppajjati, evameva imassa bhikkhuno arahattaṃ pattassa pittapakopādīnaṃ vasena ābādhikaṃ
atk-s0203a0:26_11: attabhāvaṃ disvā domanassaṃ na uppajjati, “muccissāmi vata khandhaparihāradukkhato”ti
atk-s0203a0:26_12: somanassameva uppajjatīti. Ayaṃ pana upamā “paṭibaddhacittassa domanassaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0203a0:26_13: appaṭibaddhacittassa natthetanti ñatvā itthiyā chandarāgaṃ pajahati, evamayaṃ bhikkhu
atk-s0203a0:26_14: saṅkhāraṃ vā padahantassa upekkhaṃ vā bhāventassa dukkhanidānaṃ pahīyati, no aññathāti
atk-s0203a0:26_15: ñatvā tadubhayaṃ sampādento dukkhanidānaṃ pajahatī”ti etamatthaṃ vibhāvetuṃ āgatāti veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:27_0: 12. Yathā sukhaṃ kho me viharatoti yena sukhena viharituṃ icchāmi tena, me viharato.
atk-s0203a0:27_1: Padahatoti pesentassa. Ettha ca yassa sukhā paṭipadā asappāyā, sukhumacīvarāni dhārentassa
atk-s0203a0:27_2: pāsādike senāsane vasantassa cittaṃ vikkhipati, dukkhā paṭipadā sappāyā, chinnabhinnāni
atk-s0203a0:27_3: thūlacīvarāni dhārentassa susānarukkhamūlādīsu vasantassa cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:28_0: Evameva khoti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ, usukāro viya hi jātijarāmaraṇabhīto yogī
atk-s0203a0:28_1: daṭṭhabbo, vaṅkakuṭilajimhatejanaṃ viya vaṅkakuṭilajimhacittaṃ, dve alātā viya kāyikacetasikavīriyaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:28_2: tejanaṃ ujuṃ karontassa kañjikatelaṃ viya saddhā, namanadaṇḍako viya lokuttaramaggo,
atk-s0203a0:28_3: ussukārassa vaṅkakuṭilajimhatejanaṃ kañjikatelena sinehetvā alātesu tāpetvā namanadaṇḍakena
atk-s0203a0:28_4: ujukaraṇaṃ viya imassa bhikkhuno vaṅkakuṭilajimhacittaṃ saddhāya sinehetvā kāyikacetasikavīriyena
atk-s0203a0:28_5: tāpetvā lokuttaramaggena ujukaraṇaṃ, usukārasseva evaṃ ujukatena tejanena sapattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:28_6: vijjhitvā sampattianubhavanaṃ viya imassa yogino tathā ujukatena cittena kilesagaṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:28_9: ca paṭipattiyo kathitā, itaresaṃ dvinnaṃ na kathitā, tā kathetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0203a0:28_10: Imāsu vā dvīsu kathitāsu itarāpi kathitāva honti, āgamanīyapaṭipadā pana na kathitā,
atk-s0203a0:28_11: taṃ kathetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. Sahāgamanīyāpi vā paṭipadā kathitāva, adassitaṃ
atk-s0203a0:28_12: pana ekaṃ buddhuppādaṃ dassetvā ekassa kulaputtassa nikkhamanadesanaṃ arahattena
atk-s0203a0:28_13: vinivaṭṭessāmīti dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:32_0: 21. Evaṃ me sutanti pañcattayasuttaṃ. Tattha eketi ekacce. Samaṇabrāhmaṇāti paribbajupagatabhāvena
atk-s0203a0:32_1: samaṇā jātiyā brāhmaṇā, lokena vā samaṇāti ca brāhmaṇāti ca evaṃ sammatā. Aparantaṃ
atk-s0203a0:32_2: kappetvā vikappetvā gaṇhantīti aparantakappikā. Aparantakappo vā etesaṃ atthītipi
atk-s0203a0:32_3: aparantakappikā. Ettha ca antoti “sakkāyo kho, āvuso, eko anto”tiādīsu viya idha
atk-s0203a0:32_4: koṭṭhāso adhippeto. Kappoti taṇhādiṭṭhiyo. Vuttampi cetaṃ “kappoti uddānato dve kappā
atk-s0203a0:32_5: taṇhākappo ca diṭṭhikappo cā”ti. Tasmā taṇhādiṭṭhivasena anāgataṃ khandhakoṭṭhāsaṃ
atk-s0203a0:32_6: kappetvā ṭhitāti aparantakappikāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. Tesaṃ evaṃ aparantaṃ
atk-s0203a0:32_7: kappetvā ṭhitānaṃ punappunaṃ uppajjanavasena aparantameva anugatā diṭṭhīti aparantānudiṭṭhino.
atk-s0203a0:32_8: Te evaṃdiṭṭhino taṃ aparantaṃ ārabbha āgamma paṭicca aññampi janaṃ diṭṭhigatikaṃ
atk-s0203a0:32_9: karontā anekavihitāni adhivuttipadāni abhivadanti. Anekavihitānīti anekavidhāni.
atk-s0203a0:32_10: Adhivuttipadānīti adhivacanapadāni. Atha vā bhūtamatthaṃ adhibhavitvā yathāsabhāvato
atk-s0203a0:32_11: aggahetvā vattanato adhivuttiyoti diṭṭhiyo vuccanti, adhivuttīnaṃ padāni adhivuttipadāni,
atk-s0203a0:33_0: Saññīti saññāsamaṅgī. Arogoti nicco. Ittheketi itthaṃ eke, evameketi attho. Iminā
atk-s0203a0:33_1: soḷasa saññīvādā kathitā, asaññīti iminā aṭṭha asaññīvādā, nevasaññīnāsaññīti iminā
atk-s0203a0:33_2: aṭṭha nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā, sato vā pana sattassāti iminā satta ucchedavādā. Tattha
atk-s0203a0:33_3: satoti vijjamānassa. Ucchedanti upacchedaṃ. Vināsanti adassanaṃ. Vibhavanti bhavavigamaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:33_4: Sabbānetāni aññamaññavevacanāneva. Diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ vāti iminā pañca diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādā
atk-s0203a0:33_5: kathitā. Tattha diṭṭhadhammoti paccakkhadhammo vuccati, tattha tattha paṭiladdhaattabhāvassetaṃ
atk-s0203a0:33_6: adhivacanaṃ. Diṭṭhadhamme nibbānaṃ diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ, imasmiṃyeva attabhāve dukkhavūpasamanti
atk-s0203a0:33_7: attho. Santaṃ vāti saññītiādivasena tīhākārehi santaṃ. Tīṇi hontīti saññī attātiādīni
atk-s0203a0:33_8: santaattavasena ekaṃ, itarāni dveti evaṃ tīṇi.
atk-s0203a0:34_0: 22. Rūpiṃ vāti karajarūpena vā kasiṇarūpena vā rūpiṃ. Tattha lābhī kasiṇarūpaṃ attāti
atk-s0203a0:34_1: gaṇhāti, takkī ubhopi rūpāni gaṇhātiyeva. Arūpinti arūpasamāpattinimittaṃ vā, ṭhapetvā
atk-s0203a0:34_2: saññākkhandhaṃ sesaarūpadhamme vā attāti paññapentā lābhinopi takkikāpi evaṃ paññapenti.
atk-s0203a0:34_3: Tatiyadiṭṭhi pana missakagāhavasena pavattā, catutthā takkagāheneva. Dutiyacatukke
atk-s0203a0:34_4: paṭhamadiṭṭhi samāpannakavārena kathitā, dutiyadiṭṭhi asamāpannakavārena, tatiyadiṭṭhi
atk-s0203a0:34_5: suppamattena vā sarāvamattena vā kasiṇaparikammavasena, catutthadiṭṭhi vipulakasiṇavasena
atk-s0203a0:35_0: Etaṃ vā panekesaṃ upātivattatanti saññītipadena saṅkhepato vuttaṃ saññāsattakaṃ atikkantānanti
atk-s0203a0:35_1: attho. Apare aṭṭhakanti vadanti. Tadubhayaṃ parato āvibhavissati. Ayaṃ panettha saṅkhepattho
atk-s0203a0:35_2: – keci hi etā satta vā aṭṭha vā saññā samatikkamituṃ sakkonti, keci pana na sakkonti.
atk-s0203a0:35_3: Tattha ye sakkonti, teva gahitā. Tesaṃ pana ekesaṃ upātivattataṃ atikkamituṃ sakkontānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:35_4: yathāpi nāma gaṅgaṃ uttiṇṇesu manussesu eko dīghavāpiṃ gantvā tiṭṭheyya, eko tato
atk-s0203a0:35_5: paraṃ mahāgāmaṃ; evameva eke viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ appamāṇaṃ āneñjanti vatvā tiṭṭhanti,
atk-s0203a0:35_6: eke ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ. Tattha viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ tāva dassetuṃ viññāṇakasiṇameketi
atk-s0203a0:35_7: vuttaṃ. Parato “ākiñcaññāyatanameke”ti vakkhati. Tayidanti taṃ idaṃ diṭṭhigatañca
atk-s0203a0:35_8: diṭṭhipaccayañca diṭṭhārammaṇañca. Tathāgato abhijānātīti. Iminā paccayena idaṃ nāma
atk-s0203a0:36_0: Idāni tadeva vitthārento ye kho te bhontotiādimāha. Yā vā pana etāsaṃ saññānanti
atk-s0203a0:36_1: yā vā pana etāsaṃ “yadi rūpasaññāna”nti evaṃ vuttasaññānaṃ. Parisuddhāti nirupakkilesā.
atk-s0203a0:36_2: Paramāti uttamā. Aggāti seṭṭhā. Anuttariyā akkhāyatīti asadisā kathīyati. Yadi rūpasaññānanti
atk-s0203a0:36_3: iminā catasso rūpāvacarasaññā kathitā. Yadi arūpasaññānanti iminā ākāsānañcāyatanaviññāṇañcāyatanasaññā.
atk-s0203a0:36_4: Itarehi pana dvīhi padehi samāpannakavāro ca asamāpannakavāro ca kathitoti evametā
atk-s0203a0:36_5: koṭṭhāsato aṭṭha, atthato pana satta saññā honti. Samāpannakavāro hi purimāhi chahisaṅgahitoyeva.
atk-s0203a0:36_6: Tayidaṃ saṅkhatanti taṃ idaṃ sabbampi saññāgataṃ saddhiṃ diṭṭhigatena saṅkhataṃ paccayehi
atk-s0203a0:36_7: samāgantvā kataṃ. Oḷārikanti saṅkhatattāva oḷārikaṃ. Atthi kho pana saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhoti
atk-s0203a0:36_8: etesaṃ pana saṅkhatanti vuttānaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ nirodhasaṅkhātaṃ nibbānaṃ nāma atthi.
atk-s0203a0:36_9: Atthetanti iti viditvāti taṃ kho pana nibbānaṃ “atthi eta”nti evaṃ jānitvā. Tassa
atk-s0203a0:36_10: nissaraṇadassāvīti tassa saṅkhatassa nissaraṇadassī nibbānadassī. Tathāgato tadupātivattoti
atk-s0203a0:37_0: 23. Tatrāti tesu aṭṭhasu asaññīvādesu. Rūpiṃ vātiādīni saññīvāde vuttanayeneva veditabbāni.
atk-s0203a0:37_1: Ayañca yasmā asaññīvādo, tasmā idha dutiyacatukkaṃ na vuttaṃ. Paṭikkosantīti paṭibāhanti
atk-s0203a0:37_2: paṭisedhenti. Saññā rogotiādīsu ābādhaṭṭhena rogo, sadosaṭṭhena gaṇḍo, anupaviṭṭhaṭṭhena
atk-s0203a0:37_3: sallaṃ. Āgatiṃ vā gatiṃ vātiādīsu paṭisandhivasena āgatiṃ, cutivasena gatiṃ, cavanavasena
atk-s0203a0:37_4: cutiṃ, upapajjanavasena upapattiṃ, punappunaṃ uppajjitvā aparāparaṃ vaḍḍhanavasena
atk-s0203a0:37_5: vuḍḍhiṃ virūḷhiṃ vepullaṃ. Kāmañca catuvokārabhave rūpaṃ vināpi viññāṇassa pavatti
atk-s0203a0:37_6: atthi, sese pana tayo khandhe vinā natthi. Ayaṃ pana pañho pañcavokārabhavavasena
atk-s0203a0:37_7: kathito. Pañcavokāre hi ettake khandhe vinā viññāṇassa pavatti nāma natthi. Vitaṇḍavādī
atk-s0203a0:37_8: panettha “aññatra rūpātiādivacanato arūpabhavepi rūpaṃ, asaññābhave ca viññāṇaṃ atthi,
atk-s0203a0:37_9: tathā nirodhasamāpannassā”ti vadati. So vattabbo – byañjanacchāyāya ce atthaṃ paṭibāhasi,
atk-s0203a0:37_10: āgatiṃ vātiādivacanato taṃ viññāṇaṃ pakkhidvipadacatuppadā viya uppatitvāpi gacchati,
atk-s0203a0:37_11: padasāpi gacchati, govisāṇavalliādīni viya ca vaḍḍhatīti āpajjati. Ye ca bhagavatā
atk-s0203a0:37_12: anekasatesu suttesu tayo bhavā vuttā, te arūpabhavassa abhāvā dveva āpajjanti. Tasmā
atk-s0203a0:37_13: mā evaṃ avaca, yathā vuttamatthaṃ dhārehīti.
atk-s0203a0:38_0: 24. Tatrāti aṭṭhasu nevasaññīnāsaññīvādesu bhummaṃ. Idhāpi rūpiṃ vātiādīni vuttanayeneva
atk-s0203a0:38_1: veditabbāni. Asaññā sammohoti nissaññabhāvo nāmesa sammohaṭṭhānaṃ. Yo hi kiñci na
atk-s0203a0:38_2: jānāti, taṃ asaññī esoti vadanti. Diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbasaṅkhāramattenāti diṭṭhaviññātabbamattena
atk-s0203a0:38_3: sutaviññātabbamattena mutaviññātabbamattena. Ettha ca vijānātīti viññātabbaṃ, diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbamattena
atk-s0203a0:38_4: pañcadvārikasaññāpavattimattenāti ayañhi ettha attho. Saṅkhāramattenāti oḷārikasaṅkhārapavattimattenāti
atk-s0203a0:38_5: attho. Etassa āyatanassāti etassa nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa. Upasampadanti paṭilābhaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:38_6: Byasanaṃ hetanti vināso hesa, vuṭṭhānaṃ hetanti attho. Pañcadvārikasaññāpavattañhi
atk-s0203a0:38_7: oḷārikasaṅkhārapavattaṃ vā appavattaṃ katvā taṃ samāpajjitabbaṃ. Tassa pana pavattena
atk-s0203a0:38_8: tato vuṭṭhānaṃ hotīti dasseti. Saṅkhārasamāpattipattabbamakkhāyatīti oḷārikasaṅkhārapavattiyā
atk-s0203a0:38_9: pattabbanti na akkhāyati. Saṅkhārāvasesasamāpattipattabbanti saṅkhārānaṃyeva avasesā
atk-s0203a0:38_10: bhāvanāvasena sabbasukhumabhāvaṃ pattā saṅkhārā, tesaṃ pavattiyā etaṃ pattabbanti
atk-s0203a0:38_11: attho. Evarūpesu hi saṅkhāresu pavattesu etaṃ pattabbaṃ nāma hoti. Tayidanti taṃ
atk-s0203a0:38_12: idaṃ etaṃ sukhumampi samānaṃ saṅkhataṃ saṅkhatattā ca oḷārikaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:39_0: 25. Tatrāti sattasu ucchedavādesu bhummaṃ. Uddhaṃ saranti uddhaṃ vuccati anāgatasaṃsāravādo,
atk-s0203a0:39_1: anāgataṃ saṃsāravādaṃ sarantīti attho. Āsattiṃyeva abhivadanti lagganakaṃyeva vadanti.
atk-s0203a0:39_2: “Āsatta”ntipi pāṭho, taṇhaṃyeva vadantīti attho. Iti pecca bhavissāmāti evaṃ pecca
atk-s0203a0:39_3: bhavissāma. Khattiyā bhavissāma, brāhmaṇā bhavissāmāti evamettha nayo netabbo. Vāṇijūpamā
atk-s0203a0:39_4: maññeti vāṇijūpamā viya vāṇijapaṭibhāgā vāṇijasadisā mayhaṃ upaṭṭhahanti. Sakkāyabhayāti
atk-s0203a0:39_5: sakkāyassa bhayā. Te hi yatheva “cattāro kho, mahārāja, abhayassa bhāyanti. Katame
atk-s0203a0:39_6: cattāro? Gaṇḍuppādo kho, mahārāja, bhayā pathaviṃ na khādati ‘mā pathavī khiyī’ti,
atk-s0203a0:39_7: konto kho, mahārāja, ekapādena tiṭṭhati ‘mā pathavī osīdī’ti, kikī kho, mahārāja,
atk-s0203a0:39_8: uttānā seti ‘mā ambhā undriyī’ti, brāhmaṇadhammiko kho, mahārāja, brahmacariyaṃ na
atk-s0203a0:39_9: carati ‘mā loko ucchijjī’ti ime cattāro abhayassa bhāyanti, evaṃ sakkāyassa bhāyanti”.
atk-s0203a0:39_10: Sakkāyaparijegucchāti tameva tebhūmakasaṅkhātaṃ sakkāyaṃ parijigucchamānā. Sā gaddulabaddhoti
atk-s0203a0:39_11: daṇḍake rajjuṃ pavesetvā baddhasunakho. Evamevimeti ettha daḷhatthambho viya khīlo
atk-s0203a0:39_12: viya ca tebhūmakadhammasaṅkhāto sakkāyo daṭṭhabbo, sā viya diṭṭhigatiko, daṇḍako
atk-s0203a0:39_13: viya diṭṭhi, rajju viya taṇhā, gaddulena bandhitvā thambhe vā khīle vā upanibaddhasunakhassa
atk-s0203a0:39_14: attano dhammatāya chinditvā gantuṃ asamatthassa anuparidhāvanaṃ viya diṭṭhigatikassa
atk-s0203a0:39_15: diṭṭhidaṇḍake pavesitāya taṇhārajjuyā bandhitvā sakkāye upanibaddhassa anuparidhāvanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:40_0: 26. Imāneva pañcāyatanānīti imāneva pañca kāraṇāni. Iti mātikaṃ ṭhapentenapi pañceva
atk-s0203a0:40_1: ṭhapitāni, nigamentenapi pañceva nigamitāni, bhājentena pana cattāri bhājitāni. Diṭṭhadhammanibbānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:40_2: kuhiṃ paviṭṭhanti. Ekattanānattavasena dvīsu padesu paviṭṭhanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:41_0: 27. Evañca catucattālīsa aparantakappike dassetvā idāni aṭṭhārasa pubbantakappike
atk-s0203a0:41_1: dassetuṃ santi, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha atītakoṭṭhāsasaṅkhātaṃ pubbantaṃ kappetvā
atk-s0203a0:41_2: vikappetvā gaṇhantīti pubbantakappikā. Pubbantakappo vā etesaṃ atthīti pubbantakappikā.
atk-s0203a0:41_3: Evaṃ sesampi pubbe vuttappakāraṃ vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Sassato attā ca loko cāti
atk-s0203a0:41_4: rūpādīsu aññataraṃ attāti ca lokoti ca gahetvā sassato amaro nicco dhuvoti abhivadanti.
atk-s0203a0:41_5: Yathāha “rūpaṃ attā ceva loko ca sassato cāti attānañca lokañca paññapentī”ti vitthāro.
atk-s0203a0:41_6: Asassatādīsupi eseva nayo. Ettha ca paṭhamavādena cattāro sassatavādā vuttā, dutiyavādena satta ucchedavādā.
atk-s0203a0:42_0: Nanu cete heṭṭhā āgatā, idha kasmā puna gahitāti. Heṭṭhā tattha tattha mato tattha
atk-s0203a0:42_1: tattheva ucchijjatīti dassanatthaṃ āgatā. Idha pana pubbenivāsalābhī diṭṭhigatiko
atk-s0203a0:42_2: atītaṃ passati, na anāgataṃ, tassa evaṃ hoti “pubbantato āgato attā idheva ucchijjati,
atk-s0203a0:42_3: ito paraṃ na gacchatī”ti imassatthassa dassanatthaṃ gahitā. Tatiyavādena cattāro
atk-s0203a0:42_4: ekaccasassatavādā vuttā, catutthavādena cattāro amarāvikkhepikā vuttā. Antavāti sapariyanto
atk-s0203a0:42_5: paricchinno parivaṭumo. Avaḍḍhitakasiṇassa taṃ kasiṇaṃ attāti ca lokoti ca gahetvā
atk-s0203a0:42_6: evaṃ hoti. Dutiyavādo vaḍḍhitakasiṇassa vasena vutto, tatiyavādo tiriyaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0203a0:42_7: uddhamadho avaḍḍhitakasiṇassa, catutthavādo takkivasena vutto. Anantaracatukkaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva.
atk-s0203a0:43_0: Ekantasukhīti nirantarasukhī. Ayaṃ diṭṭhi lābhījātissaratakkīnaṃ vasena uppajjati.
atk-s0203a0:43_1: Lābhino hi pubbenivāsañāṇena khattiyādikule ekantasukhameva attano jātiṃ anussarantassa
atk-s0203a0:43_2: evaṃ diṭṭhi uppajjati. Tathā jātissarassa paccuppannaṃ sukhamanubhavato atītāsu sattasu
atk-s0203a0:43_3: jātīsu tādisameva attabhāvaṃ anussarantassa. Takkissa pana idha sukhasamaṅgino “atītepāhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:44_0: Ekantadukkhīti ayaṃ diṭṭhi lābhino nuppajjati. So hi ekanteneva idha jhānasukhena
atk-s0203a0:44_1: sukhī hoti. Idha dukkhena phuṭṭhassa pana jātissarassa takkisseva ca sā uppajjati.
atk-s0203a0:44_2: Tatiyā idha vokiṇṇasukhadukkhānaṃ sabbesampi tesaṃ uppajjati, tathā catutthā diṭṭhi.
atk-s0203a0:44_3: Lābhino hi idāni catutthajjhānavasena adukkhamasukhassa, pubbe catutthajjhānikameva
atk-s0203a0:44_4: brahmalokaṃ anussarantassa. Jātissarassāpi paccuppanne majjhattassa, anussarantassāpi
atk-s0203a0:44_5: majjhattabhūtaṭṭhānameva anussarantassa, takkinopi paccuppanne majjhattassa, atītepi
atk-s0203a0:44_6: evaṃ bhavissatīti takkeneva gaṇhantassa esā diṭṭhi uppajjati. Ettāvatā cattāro sassatavādā,
atk-s0203a0:44_7: cattāro ekaccasassatikā, cattāro antānantikā, cattāro amarāvikkhepikā, dve adhicca-samuppannikāti
atk-s0203a0:45_0: 28. Idāni diṭṭhuddhāraṃ uddharanto tatra, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha paccattaṃyeva
atk-s0203a0:45_1: ñāṇanti paccakkhañāṇaṃ. Parisuddhanti nirupakkilesaṃ. Pariyodātanti pabhassaraṃ.
atk-s0203a0:45_2: Sabbapadehi vipassanāñāṇaṃyeva kathitaṃ. Saddhādayo hi pañca dhammā bāhirasamayasmimpi
atk-s0203a0:45_3: honti, vipassanāñāṇaṃ sāsanasmiṃyeva. Tattha ñāṇabhāgamattameva pariyodapentīti mayamidaṃ
atk-s0203a0:45_4: jānāmāti evaṃ tattha ñāṇakoṭṭhāsaṃ otārentiyeva. Upādānamakkhāyatīti na taṃ ñāṇaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:45_5: micchādassanaṃ nāmetaṃ, tasmā tadapi tesaṃ bhavantānaṃ diṭṭhupādānaṃ akkhāyatīti
atk-s0203a0:45_6: attho. Athāpi taṃ jānanamattalakkhaṇattā ñāṇabhāgamattameva, tathāpi tassa dassanassa
atk-s0203a0:45_7: anupātivattanato upādānapaccayato ca upādānameva. Tadupātivattoti taṃ diṭṭhiṃ atikkanto.
atk-s0203a0:45_8: Ettāvatā cattāro sassatavādā, cattāro ekaccasassatikā, cattāro antānantikā, cattāro
atk-s0203a0:45_9: amarāvikkhepikā, dve adhiccasamuppannikā, soḷasa saññīvādā, aṭṭha asaññīvādā, aṭṭha
atk-s0203a0:45_10: nevasaññīnāsaññīvādā, satta ucchedavādā, pañca diṭṭhadhammanibbānavādāti brahmajāle
atk-s0203a0:45_11: āgatā dvāsaṭṭhipi diṭṭhiyo kathitā honti. Brahmajāle pana kathite idaṃ suttaṃ akathitameva
atk-s0203a0:45_12: hoti. Kasmā? Idha tato atirekāya sakkāyadiṭṭhiyā āgatattā. Imasmiṃ pana kathite brahmajālaṃ kathitameva hoti.
atk-s0203a0:46_0: 30. Idāni imā dvāsaṭṭhi diṭṭhiyo uppajjamānā sakkāyadiṭṭhipamukheneva uppajjantīti
atk-s0203a0:46_1: dassetuṃ idha, bhikkhave, ekaccotiādimāha. Tattha paṭinissaggāti pariccāgena. Kāmasaṃyojanānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:46_2: anadhiṭṭhānāti pañcakāmaguṇataṇhānaṃ nissaṭṭhattā. Pavivekaṃ pītinti sappītikajjhānadvayapītiṃ.
atk-s0203a0:46_3: Nirujjhatīti jhānanirodhena nirujjhati. Samāpattito pana vuṭṭhitassa niruddhā nāma
atk-s0203a0:46_4: hoti. Yatheva hi “adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya nirodhā uppajjati nirāmisaṃ sukhaṃ, nirāmisasukhassa
atk-s0203a0:46_5: nirodhā uppajjati adukkhamasukhā vedanā”ti ettha na ayamattho hoti – catutthajjhānanirodhā
atk-s0203a0:46_6: tatiyajjhānaṃ upasampajja viharatīti. Ayaṃ panettha attho – catutthajjhānā vuṭṭhāya
atk-s0203a0:46_7: tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjati, tatiyajjhānā vuṭṭhāya catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpajjatīti,
atk-s0203a0:47_0: Pavivekā pītīti sā eva jhānadvayapīti. Yaṃ chāyā jahatīti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ chāyā jahati.
atk-s0203a0:47_1: Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? Yasmiṃ ṭhāne chāyā atthi, tasmiṃ ātapo natthi. Yasmiṃ ātapo atthi,
atk-s0203a0:50_0: 33. Anupādānohamasmīti niggahaṇo ahamasmi. Nibbānasappāyanti nibbānassa sappāyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:50_1: upakārabhūtaṃ. Nanu ca maggadassanaṃ nāma sabbattha nikantiyā sukkhāpitāya uppajjati,
atk-s0203a0:50_2: kathametaṃ nibbānassa upakārapaṭipadā nāma jātanti, sabbattha anupādiyanavasena aggaṇhanavasena
atk-s0203a0:50_3: upakārapaṭipadā nāma jātaṃ. Abhivadatīti abhimānena upavadati. Pubbantānudiṭṭhinti
atk-s0203a0:50_5: Upādānamakkhāyatīti ahamasmīti gahaṇassa sakkāyadiṭṭhipariyāpannattā diṭṭhupādānaṃ akkhāyati.
atk-s0203a0:51_0: Santivarapadanti vūpasantakilesattā santaṃ uttamapadaṃ. Channaṃ phassāyatanānanti
atk-s0203a0:51_1: bhagavatā “yattha cakkhu ca nirujjhati rūpasaññā ca nirujjhati so āyatano veditabbo”ti
atk-s0203a0:51_2: ettha dvinnaṃ āyatanānaṃ paṭikkhepena nibbānaṃ dassitaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:52: “Yattha āpo ca pathavī, tejo vāyo na gādhati;
atk-s0203a0:53: Ato sarā nivattanti, ettha vaṭṭaṃ na vattati;
atk-s0203a0:56: “Kattha āpo ca pathavī, tejo vāyo na gādhati;
atk-s0203a0:57: Kattha dīghañca rassañca, aṇuṃ thūlaṃ subhāsubhaṃ;
atk-s0203a0:61_0: Ettha saṅkhārapaṭikkhepena nibbānaṃ dassitaṃ. Imasmiṃ pana sutte chaāyatanapaṭikkhepena
atk-s0203a0:61_1: dassitaṃ. Aññattha ca anupādāvimokkhoti nibbānameva dassitaṃ, idha pana arahattaphalasamāpatti.
atk-s0203a0:65_0: 34. Evaṃ me sutanti kintisuttaṃ. Tattha pisinārāyanti evaṃnāmake maṇḍalapadese. Baliharaṇeti
atk-s0203a0:65_1: tasmiṃ vanasaṇḍe bhūtānaṃ baliṃ āharanti, tasmā so baliharaṇanti vutto. Cīvarahetūti
atk-s0203a0:65_2: cīvarakāraṇā, cīvaraṃ paccāsīsamānoti attho. Itibhavābhavahetūti evaṃ imaṃ desanāmayaṃ
atk-s0203a0:65_3: puññakiriyavatthuṃ nissāya tasmiṃ tasmiṃ bhave sukhaṃ vedissāmīti dhammaṃ desetīti
atk-s0203a0:66_1: kathitā. Tatthāti tesu sattatiṃsāya dhammesu. Siyaṃsūti bhaveyyuṃ. Abhidhammeti visiṭṭhe
atk-s0203a0:66_2: dhamme, imesu sattatiṃsabodhipakkhiyadhammesūti attho. Tatra ceti idampi bodhipakkhiyadhammesveva
atk-s0203a0:66_3: bhummaṃ. Atthato ceva nānaṃ byañjanato cāti ettha “kāyova satipaṭṭhānaṃ vedanāva
atk-s0203a0:66_4: satipaṭṭhāna”nti vutte atthato nānaṃ hoti, “satipaṭṭhānā”ti vutte pana byañjanato
atk-s0203a0:66_5: nānaṃ nāma hoti. Tadamināpīti taṃ tumhe imināpi kāraṇena jānāthāti atthañca byañjanañca
atk-s0203a0:66_6: samānetvā athassa ca aññathā gahitabhāvo byañjanassa ca micchā ropitabhāvo dassetabbo.
atk-s0203a0:66_7: Yo dhammo yo vinayoti ettha atthañca byañjanañca viññāpanakāraṇameva dhammo ca vinayo ca.
atk-s0203a0:67_0: 37. Atthato hi kho sametīti satiyeva satipaṭṭhānanti gahitā. Byañjanato nānanti kevalaṃ
atk-s0203a0:67_1: byañjanameva satipaṭṭhānoti vā satipaṭṭhānāti vā micchā ropetha. Appamattakaṃ khoti
atk-s0203a0:67_2: suttantaṃ patvā byañjanaṃ appamattakaṃ nāma hoti. Parittamattaṃ dhanitaṃ katvā ropitepi
atk-s0203a0:68_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – vijayārāmavihāravāsī kireko khīṇāsavatthero dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:68_1: suttaṃ āharitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento – “samuddho samuddhoti, bhikkhave, assutavā
atk-s0203a0:68_2: puthujjano bhāsatī”ti dhanitaṃ katvā āha. Eko bhikkhu “samuddho nāma, bhante”ti āha.
atk-s0203a0:68_3: Āvuso, samuddhoti vuttepi samuddoti vuttepi mayaṃ loṇasāgarameva jānāma, tumhe pana
atk-s0203a0:68_4: no atthagavesakā, byañjanagavesakā, gacchatha mahāvihāre paguṇabyañjanānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:68_5: santike byañjanaṃ sodhāpethāti kammaṭṭhānaṃ akathetvāva uṭṭhāpesi. So aparabhāge
atk-s0203a0:68_6: mahāvihāre bheriṃ paharāpetvā bhikkhusaṅghassa catūsu maggesu pañhaṃ kathetvāva parinibbuto.
atk-s0203a0:68_7: Evaṃ suttantaṃ patvā byañjanaṃ appamattakaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0203a0:69_0: Vinayaṃ pana patvā no appamattakaṃ. Sāmaṇerapabbajjāpi hi ubhatosuddhito vaṭṭati,
atk-s0203a0:69_1: upasampadādikammānipi sithilādīnaṃ dhanitādikaraṇamatteneva kuppanti. Idha pana suttantabyañjanaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:70: 38. Atha catutthavāre vivādo kasmā? Saññāya vivādo. “Ahaṃ satimeva satipaṭṭhānaṃ vadāmi, ayaṃ ‘kāyo satipaṭṭhāna’nti vadatī”ti hi nesaṃ saññā hoti. Byañjanepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0203a0:71_0: 39. Na codanāya taritabbanti na codanatthāya vegāyitabbaṃ. Ekacco hi puggalo “nalāṭe
atk-s0203a0:71_1: te sāsapamattā piḷakā”ti vutto “mayhaṃ nalāṭe sāsapamattaṃ piḷakaṃ passasi, attano
atk-s0203a0:71_2: nalāṭe tālapakkamattaṃ mahāgaṇḍaṃ na passasī”ti vadati. Tasmā puggalo upaparikkhitabbo.
atk-s0203a0:71_3: Adaḷhadiṭṭhīti anādānadiṭṭhī suṃsumāraṃ hadaye pakkhipanto viya daḷhaṃ na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0203a0:72_0: Upaghātoti caṇḍabhāvena vaṇaghaṭṭitassa viya dukkhuppatti. Suppaṭinissaggīti “kiṃ
atk-s0203a0:72_1: nāma ahaṃ āpanno, kadā āpanno”ti vā “tvaṃ āpanno, tava upajjhāyo āpanno”ti vā ekaṃ
atk-s0203a0:72_2: dve vāre vatvāpi “asukaṃ nāma asukadivase nāma, bhante, āpannattha, saṇikaṃ anussarathā”ti
atk-s0203a0:72_3: saritvā tāvadeva vissajjeti. Vihesāti bahuṃ atthañca kāraṇañca āharantassa kāyacittakilamatho.
atk-s0203a0:72_4: Sakkomīti evarūpo hi puggalo okāsaṃ kāretvā “āpattiṃ āpannattha, bhante”ti vutto
atk-s0203a0:72_5: “kadā kismiṃ vatthusmi”nti vatvā “asukadivase asukasmiṃ vatthusmi”nti vutte “na sarāmi,
atk-s0203a0:72_6: āvuso”ti vadati, tato “saṇikaṃ, bhante, sarathā”ti bahuṃ vatvā sārito saritvā vissajjeti.
atk-s0203a0:72_7: Tenāha “sakkomī”ti. Iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:73_0: Upekkhā nātimaññitabbāti upekkhā na atikkamitabbā, kattabbā janetabbāti attho. Yo
atk-s0203a0:73_1: hi evarūpaṃ puggalaṃ ṭhitakaṃyeva passāvaṃ karontaṃ disvāpi “nanu, āvuso, nisīditabba”nti
atk-s0203a0:74_0: 40. Vacīsaṃhāroti vacanasañcāro. Imehi kathitaṃ amūsaṃ antaraṃ paveseyya, tumhe imehi
atk-s0203a0:74_1: idañcidañca vuttāti amūhi kathitaṃ imesaṃ antaraṃ paveseyyāti attho. Diṭṭhipaḷāsotiādīhi
atk-s0203a0:74_2: cittassa anārādhaniyabhāvo kathito. Taṃ jānamāno samāno garaheyyāti taṃ satthā jānamāno
atk-s0203a0:74_3: samāno nindeyya amheti. Etaṃ panāvuso, dhammanti etaṃ kalahabhaṇḍanadhammaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:75_0: Tañceti taṃ saññattikārakaṃ bhikkhuṃ. Evaṃ byākareyyāti mayā ete suddhante patiṭṭhāpitāti
atk-s0203a0:75_1: avatvā yena kāraṇena saññatti katā, tadeva dassento evaṃ byākareyya. Tāhaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:75_2: sutvāti ettha dhammoti sāraṇīyadhammo adhippeto. Na ceva attānantiādīsu “brahmalokappamāṇo
atk-s0203a0:75_3: hesa aggi uṭṭhāsi, ko etamaññatra mayā nibbāpetuṃ samattho”ti hi vadanto attānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:75_4: ukkaṃseti nāma. “Ettakā janā vicaranti, okāso laddhuṃ na sakkā, ekopi ettakamattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:75_5: nibbāpetuṃ samattho nāma natthī”ti vadamāno paraṃ vambheti nāma. Tadubhayampesa na
atk-s0203a0:75_6: karoti. Dhammo panettha sammāsambuddhassa byākaraṇaṃ, tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saññattikaraṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:75_7: anudhammo, tadeva byākaroti nāma. Na ca koci sahadhammikoti añño cassa koci sahetuko
atk-s0203a0:75_8: parehi vutto vādo vā anuvādo vā garahitabbabhāvaṃ āgacchanto nāma natthi. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:79_0: 41. Evaṃ me sutanti sāmagāmasuttaṃ. Tattha sāmagāmeti sāmākānaṃ ussannattā evaṃladdhanāme
atk-s0203a0:79_1: gāme. Adhunā kālaṅkatoti sampati kālaṃ kato. Dvedhikajātāti dvejjhajātā dvebhāgajātā.
atk-s0203a0:79_2: Bhaṇḍanādīsu bhaṇḍanaṃ pubbabhāgakalaho, taṃ daṇḍādānādivasena paṇṇattivītikkamavasena
atk-s0203a0:79_3: ca vaddhitaṃ kalaho, “na tvaṃ imaṃ dhammavinayaṃ ājānāsī”tiādikaṃ viruddhavacanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:79_4: vivādo. Vitudantāti vitujjantā. Sahitaṃ meti mama vacanaṃ atthasaṃhitaṃ. Adhiciṇṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:79_5: te viparāvattanti yaṃ tava adhiciṇṇaṃ cirakālasevanavasena paguṇaṃ, taṃ mama vādaṃ
atk-s0203a0:79_6: āgamma nivattaṃ. Āropito te vādoti tuyhaṃ upari mayā doso āropito. Cara vādappamokkhāyāti
atk-s0203a0:79_7: bhattapuṭaṃ ādāya taṃ taṃ upasaṅkamitvā vādappamokkhatthāya uttari pariyesamāno cara.
atk-s0203a0:79_8: Nibbeṭhehi vāti atha mayā āropitavādato attānaṃ mocehi. Sace pahosīti sace sakkosi.
atk-s0203a0:80_0: Nāṭaputtiyesūti nāṭaputtassa antevāsikesu. Nibbinnarūpāti ukkaṇṭhitasabhāvā, abhivādanādīni
atk-s0203a0:80_1: na karonti. Virattarūpāti vigatapemā. Paṭivānarūpāti tesaṃ nipaccakiriyato nivattasabhāvā.
atk-s0203a0:80_2: Yathā tanti yathā ca durakkhātādisabhāve dhammavinaye nibbinnavirattapaṭivānarūpehi
atk-s0203a0:80_3: bhavitabbaṃ, tatheva jātāti attho. Durakkhāteti dukkathite. Duppavediteti duviññāpite.
atk-s0203a0:80_4: Anupasamasaṃvattaniketi rāgādīnaṃ upasamaṃ kātuṃ asamattho. Bhinnathūpeti bhinnapatiṭṭhe.
atk-s0203a0:80_5: Ettha hi nāṭaputtova nesaṃ patiṭṭhena thūpo, so pana bhinno mato. Tena vuttaṃ “bhinnathūpe”ti.
atk-s0203a0:81_0: Nanu cāyaṃ nāṭaputto nāḷandavāsiko, so kasmā pāvāyaṃ kālaṃkatoti. So kira upālinā
atk-s0203a0:81_1: gahapatinā paṭividdhasaccena dasahi gāthāhi bhāsite buddhaguṇe sutvā uṇhaṃ lohitaṃ
atk-s0203a0:81_2: chaḍḍesi. Atha naṃ aphāsukaṃ gahetvā pāvaṃ agamaṃsu, so tattha kālamakāsi. Kālaṃ
atk-s0203a0:81_3: kurumāno ca “mama laddhi aniyyānikā sārarahitā, mayaṃ tāva naṭṭhā, avasesajano mā
atk-s0203a0:81_4: apāyapūrako ahosi. Sace panāhaṃ ‘mama sāsanaṃ aniyyānika’nti vakkhāmi, na saddahissanti.
atk-s0203a0:81_5: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ dvepi jane na ekanīhārena uggaṇhāpeyyaṃ, te mamaccayena aññamaññaṃ vivadissanti.
atk-s0203a0:81_6: Satthā taṃ vivādaṃ paṭicca ekaṃ dhammakathaṃ kathessati, tato te sāsanassa mahantabhāvaṃ jātissantī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:82_0: Atha naṃ eko antevāsiko upasaṅkamitvā āha “bhante, tumhe dubbalā, mayhaṃ imasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:82_1: dhamme sāraṃ ācikkhatha ācariyappamāṇa”nti. Āvuso, tvaṃ mamaccayena sassatanti gaṇheyyāsīti.
atk-s0203a0:82_2: Aparopi taṃ upasaṅkami, taṃ ucchedaṃ gaṇhāpesi. Evaṃ dvepi jane ekaladdhike akatvā
atk-s0203a0:82_3: bahū nānānīhārena uggaṇhāpetvā kālamakāsi. Te tassa sarīrakiccaṃ katvā sannipatitvā
atk-s0203a0:82_4: aññamaññaṃ pucchiṃsu “kassāvuso, ācariyo sāramācikkhī”ti? Eko uṭṭhahitvā mayhanti
atk-s0203a0:82_5: āha. Kiṃ ācikkhīti? Sassatanti. Aparo taṃ paṭibāhitvā mayhaṃ sāraṃ ācikkhīti āha.
atk-s0203a0:82_6: Evaṃ sabbe “mayhaṃ sāraṃ ācikkhi, ahaṃ jeṭṭhako”ti aññamaññaṃ vivādaṃ vaḍḍhetvā akkose
atk-s0203a0:82_7: ceva paribhāse ca hatthapādapahārādīni ca pavattetvā ekamaggena dve agacchantā nānādisāsu
atk-s0203a0:83_0: Bhagavato pana dharamānakālepi bhikkhusaṅghe vivādo na uppajji. Satthā hi tesaṃ vivādakāraṇe
atk-s0203a0:83_1: uppannamatteyeva sayaṃ vā gantvā te vā bhikkhū pakkosāpetvā khanti mettā paṭisaṅkhā
atk-s0203a0:83_2: avihiṃsā sāraṇīyadhammesu ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ kathetvā vivādaṃ vūpasameti. Evaṃ dharamānopi
atk-s0203a0:83_3: saṅghassa patiṭṭhāva ahosi. Parinibbāyamānopi avivādakāraṇaṃ katvāva parinibbāyi.
atk-s0203a0:83_4: Bhagavatā hi sutte desitā cattāro mahāpadesā yāvajjadivasā bhikkhūnaṃ patiṭṭhā ca
atk-s0203a0:83_5: avassayo ca. Tathā khandhake desitā cattāro mahāpadesā sutte vuttāni cattāri pañhabyākaraṇāni
atk-s0203a0:83_6: ca. Tenevāha – “yo vo mayā, ānanda, dhammo ca vinayo ca desito paññatto, so vo mamaccayena satthā”ti.
atk-s0203a0:84_0: 42. Atha kho cundo samaṇuddesoti ayaṃ thero dhammasenāpatissa kaniṭṭhabhātiko. Taṃ
atk-s0203a0:84_1: bhikkhū anupasampannakāle cundo samaṇuddesoti samudācaritvā therakālepi tatheva samudācariṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:84_2: Tena vuttaṃ “cundo samaṇuddeso”ti. Upasaṅkamīti kasmā upasaṅkami? Nāṭaputte kira
atk-s0203a0:84_3: kālaṃkate jambudīpe manussā tattha tattha kathaṃ pavattayiṃsu – “nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto
atk-s0203a0:84_4: eko satthāti paññāyittha, tassa kālakiriyāya sāvakānaṃ evarūpo vivādo jāto, samaṇo
atk-s0203a0:84_5: pana gotamo jambudīpe cando viya sūriyo viya ca pākaṭoyeva, kīdiso nu kho samaṇe
atk-s0203a0:84_6: gotame parinibbute sāvakānaṃ vivādo bhavissatī”ti. Thero taṃ kathaṃ sutvā cintesi
atk-s0203a0:84_7: – “imaṃ kathaṃ gahetvā dasabalassa ārocessāmi, satthā ca etaṃ atthuppattiṃ katvā
atk-s0203a0:84_8: ekaṃ desanaṃ kathessatī”ti. So nikkhamitvā yena sāmagāmo, yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami.
atk-s0203a0:84_9: Ujumeva bhagavato santikaṃ agantvā yenassa upajjhāyo āyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkamīti
atk-s0203a0:84_10: attho. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “upajjhāyo me mahāpañño, so imaṃ sāsanaṃ satthu ārocessati,
atk-s0203a0:84_11: atha satthā tadanurūpaṃ dhammaṃ desessatī”ti. Kathāpābhatanti kathāmūlaṃ, mūlañhi
atk-s0203a0:87_0: Dassanāyāti dassanatthāya. Kiṃ paniminā bhagavā na diṭṭhapubboti? No na diṭṭhapubbo,
atk-s0203a0:87_1: ayañhi āyasmā divā nava vāre rattiṃ nava vāreti ekāhaṃ aṭṭhārasa vāre upaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0203a0:87_2: gacchati. Divasassa pana satakkhattuṃ vā sahassakkhattuṃ vā gantukāmo samānopi na
atk-s0203a0:87_3: akāraṇā gacchati, ekaṃ pañhuddhāraṃ gahetvāva gacchati. So taṃdivasaṃ tena gantukāmo evamāha.
atk-s0203a0:88_0: Ahitāya dukkhāya devamanussānanti ekasmiṃ vihāre saṅghamajjhe uppanno vivādo kathaṃ
atk-s0203a0:88_1: devamanussānaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattati? Kosambakakkhandhake viya hi dvīsu bhikkhūsu
atk-s0203a0:88_2: vivādaṃ āpannesu tasmiṃ vihāre tesaṃ antevāsikā vivadanti, tesaṃ ovādaṃ gaṇhanto
atk-s0203a0:88_3: bhikkhunisaṅgho vivadati, tato tesaṃ upaṭṭhākā vivadanti, atha manussānaṃ ārakkhadevatā
atk-s0203a0:88_4: dve koṭṭhāsā honti. Tattha dhammavādīnaṃ ārakkhadevatā dhammavādiniyo honti, adhammavādīnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:88_5: adhammavādiniyo honti. Tato tāsaṃ ārakkhadevatānaṃ mittā bhummadevatā bhijjanti.
atk-s0203a0:88_6: Evaṃ paramparāya yāva brahmalokā ṭhapetvā ariyasāvake sabbe devamanussā dve koṭṭhāsā
atk-s0203a0:88_7: honti. Dhammavādīhi pana adhammavādinova bahutarā honti, tato yaṃ bahūhi gahitaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:88_8: taṃ gaṇhanti. Dhammaṃ vissajjetvā bahutarāva adhammaṃ gaṇhanti. Te adhammaṃ pūretvā
atk-s0203a0:88_9: viharantā apāye nibbattanti. Evaṃ ekasmiṃ vihāre saṅghamajjhe uppanno vivādo bahūnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:89_0: 43. Abhiññā desitāti mahābodhimūle nisinnena paccakkhaṃ katvā paveditā. Patissayamānarūpā
atk-s0203a0:89_1: viharantīti upanissāya viharanti. Bhagavato accayenāti etarahi bhagavantaṃ jeṭṭhakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:89_2: katvā sagāravā viharanti, tumhākaṃ, bhante, uggatejatāya durāsadatāya vivādaṃ janetuṃ
atk-s0203a0:89_3: na sakkonti, bhagavato pana accayena vivādaṃ janeyyunti vadati. Yattha pana taṃ vivādaṃ
atk-s0203a0:89_4: janeyyuṃ, taṃ dassento ajjhājīve vā adhipātimokkhe vāti āha. Tattha ajjhājīveti ājīvahetu
atk-s0203a0:89_5: ājīvakāraṇā – “bhikkhu uttarimanussadhammaṃ ullapati āpatti pārājikassā”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0203a0:89_6: parivāre paññattāni cha sikkhāpadāni, tāni ṭhapetvā sesāni sabbasikkhāpadāni adhipātimokkhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:89_7: nāma. Appamattako so ānandāti ajjhājīvaṃ adhipātimokkhañca ārabbha uppannavivādo
atk-s0203a0:89_8: nāma yasmā parassa kathāyapi attano dhammatāyapi sallakkhetvā suppajaho hoti, tasmā
atk-s0203a0:90_0: Tatrāyaṃ nayo – idhekacco “na sakkā uttarimanussadhammaṃ anullapantena kiñci laddhu”ntiādīni
atk-s0203a0:90_1: cintetvā ājīvahetu uttarimanussadhammaṃ vā ullapati sañcarittaṃ vā āpajjati, yo te
atk-s0203a0:90_2: vihāre vasati, so bhikkhu arahātiādinā nayena sāmantajappanaṃ vā karoti, agilāno
atk-s0203a0:90_3: vā attano atthāya paṇītabhojanāni viññāpetvā bhuñjati, bhikkhunī vā pana tāni viññāpetvā
atk-s0203a0:90_4: pāṭidesanīyaṃ āpajjati, yo koci dukkaṭavatthukaṃ yaṃkiñci sūpodanaviññattimeva vā
atk-s0203a0:90_5: karoti, aññataraṃ vā pana paṇṇattivītikkamaṃ karonto viharati, tamenaṃ sabrahmacārī
atk-s0203a0:90_6: evaṃ sañjānanti – “kiṃ imassa iminā lābhena laddhena, yo sāsane pabbajitvā micchājīvena
atk-s0203a0:90_7: jīvikaṃ kappeti, paṇṇattivītikkamaṃ karotī”ti. Attano dhammatāyapissa evaṃ hoti –
atk-s0203a0:90_8: “kissa mayhaṃ iminā lābhena, yvāhaṃ evaṃ svākkhāte dhammavinaye pabbajitvā micchājīvena
atk-s0203a0:90_9: jīvikaṃ kappemi, paṇṇattivītikkamaṃ karomī”ti sallakkhetvā tato oramati. Evaṃ parassa
atk-s0203a0:90_10: kathāyapi attano dhammatāyapi sallakkhetvā suppajaho hoti. Tena bhagavā “appamattako”ti āha.
atk-s0203a0:91_0: Magge vā hi, ānanda, paṭipadāya vāti lokuttaramaggaṃ patvā vivādo nāma sabbaso vūpasammati,
atk-s0203a0:91_1: natthi adhigatamaggānaṃ vivādo. Pubbabhāgamaggaṃ pana pubbabhāgapaṭipadañca sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:92_0: Tatrāyaṃ nayo – evaṃ bhikkhuṃ manussā lokuttaradhamme sambhāventi. So saddhivihārikādayo
atk-s0203a0:92_1: āgantvā vanditvā ṭhite pucchati “kiṃ āgatatthā”ti. Manasikātabbakammaṭṭhānaṃ pucchituṃ,
atk-s0203a0:92_2: bhanteti. Nisīdatha, khaṇeneva arahattaṃ pāpetuṃ samatthakammaṭṭhānakathaṃ ācikkhissāmīti
atk-s0203a0:92_3: vatvā vadati – “idha bhikkhu attano vasanaṭṭhānaṃ pavisitvā nisinno mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:92_4: manasi karoti, tassa taṃ manasikaroto obhāso uppajjati. Ayaṃ paṭhamamaggo nāma. So
atk-s0203a0:92_5: dutiyaṃ obhāsañāṇaṃ nibbatteti, dutiyamaggo adhigato hoti, evaṃ tatiyañca catutthañca.
atk-s0203a0:92_6: Ettāvatā maggappatto ceva phalappatto ca hotī”ti. Atha te bhikkhū “akhīṇāsavo nāma
atk-s0203a0:92_7: evaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetuṃ na sakkoti, addhāyaṃ khīṇāsavo”ti niṭṭhaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0203a0:93_0: So aparena samayena kālaṃ karoti. Samantā bhikkhācāragāmehi manussā āgantvā pucchanti
atk-s0203a0:93_1: “kenaci, bhante, thero pañhaṃ pucchito”ti. Upāsakā pubbeva therena pañho kathito
atk-s0203a0:93_2: amhākanti. Te pupphamaṇḍapaṃ pupphakūṭāgāraṃ sajjetvā suvaṇṇena akkhipidhānamukhapidhānādiṃ
atk-s0203a0:93_3: karitvā gandhamālādīhi pūjetvā sattāhaṃ sādhukīḷikaṃ kīḷetvā jhāpetvā aṭṭhīni ādāya
atk-s0203a0:93_4: cetiyaṃ karonti. Aññe āgantukā vihāraṃ āgantvā pāde dhovitvā “mahātheraṃ passissāma,
atk-s0203a0:93_5: kahaṃ, āvuso, mahāthero”ti pucchanti. Parinibbuto, bhanteti. Dukkaraṃ, āvuso, therena
atk-s0203a0:93_6: kataṃ maggaphalāni nibbattentena, pañhaṃ pucchittha, āvusoti. Bhikkhūnaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:93_7: kathento iminā niyāmena kathesi, bhanteti. Na eso, āvuso, maggo, vipassanupakkileso
atk-s0203a0:93_8: nāmesa, na tumhe jānittha, puthujjano, āvuso, theroti. Te kalahaṃ karontā uṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0203a0:93_9: “sakalavihāre bhikkhū ca bhikkhācāragāmesu manussā ca na jānanti, tumheyeva jānātha.
atk-s0203a0:93_10: Kataramaggena tumhe āgatā, kiṃ vo vihāradvāre cetiyaṃ na diṭṭha”nti. Evaṃvādīnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:93_11: pana bhikkhūnaṃ sataṃ vā, hotu sahassaṃ vā, yāva taṃ laddhiṃ nappajahanti, saggopi maggopi vāritoyeva.
atk-s0203a0:94_0: Aparopi tādisova kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathento evaṃ katheti – citteneva tīsu uddhanesu tīṇi
atk-s0203a0:94_1: kapallāni āropetvā heṭṭhā aggiṃ katvā citteneva attano dvattiṃsākāraṃ uppāṭetvā kapallesu
atk-s0203a0:94_2: pakkhipitvā citteneva daṇḍakena parivattetvā parivattetvā bhajjitabbaṃ, yā jhāyamāne
atk-s0203a0:94_3: chārikā hoti, sā mukhavātena palāsetabbā. Ettakena dhūtapāpo nāmesa samaṇo hoti.
atk-s0203a0:95_0: Aparo evaṃ katheti – citteneva mahācāṭiṃ ṭhapetvā matthuṃ yojetvā citteneva attano
atk-s0203a0:95_1: dvattiṃsākāraṃ uppāṭetvā tattha pakkhipitvā matthuṃ otāretvā manthitabbaṃ. Mathiyamānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:95_2: vilīyati, vilīne upari pheṇo uggacchati. So pheṇo paribhuñjitabbo. Ettāvatā vo amataṃ
atk-s0203a0:95_3: paribhuttaṃ nāma bhavissati. Ito paraṃ “atha te bhikkhū”tiādi sabbaṃ purimanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:96_0: 44. Idāni yo evaṃ vivādo uppajjeyya, tassa mūlaṃ dassento chayimānītiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0203a0:96_1: agāravoti gāravavirahito. Appatissoti appatissayo anīcavutti. Ettha pana yo bhikkhu
atk-s0203a0:96_2: satthari dharamāne tīsu kālesu upaṭṭhānaṃ na yāti, satthari anupāhane caṅkamante
atk-s0203a0:96_3: saupāhano caṅkamati, nīce caṅkame caṅkamante ucce caṅkame caṅkamati, heṭṭhā vasante
atk-s0203a0:96_4: upari vasati, satthu dassanaṭṭhāne ubho aṃse pārupati, chattaṃ dhāreti, upāhanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:96_5: dhāreti, nhānatitthe uccāraṃ vā passāvaṃ vā karoti, parinibbute vā pana cetiyaṃ vandituṃ
atk-s0203a0:96_6: na gacchati, cetiyassa paññāyanaṭṭhāne satthudassanaṭṭhāne vuttaṃ sabbaṃ karoti,
atk-s0203a0:96_7: aññehi ca bhikkhūhi “kasmā evaṃ karosi, na idaṃ vaṭṭati, sammāsabuddhassa nāma lajjituṃ
atk-s0203a0:96_8: vaṭṭatī”ti vutte “tūṇhī hoti, kiṃ buddho buddhoti vadasī”ti bhaṇati, ayaṃ satthari agāravo nāma.
atk-s0203a0:97_0: Yo pana dhammassavane saṅghuṭṭhe sakkaccaṃ na gacchati, sakkaccaṃ dhammaṃ na suṇāti,
atk-s0203a0:97_1: niddāyati vā sallapento vā nisīdati, sakkaccaṃ na gaṇhāti na dhāreti, “kiṃ dhamme
atk-s0203a0:97_2: agāravaṃ karosī”ti vutte “tuṇhī hoti, dhammo dhammoti vadasi, kiṃ dhammo nāmā”ti
atk-s0203a0:98_0: Yo pana therena bhikkhunā anajjhiṭṭho dhammaṃ deseti, nisīdati pañhaṃ katheti, vuḍḍhe
atk-s0203a0:98_1: bhikkhū ghaṭṭento gacchati, tiṭṭhati nisīdati, dussapallatthikaṃ vā hatthapallatthikaṃ
atk-s0203a0:98_2: vā karoti, saṅghamajjhe ubho aṃse pārupati, chattupāhanaṃ dhāreti, “bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0203a0:98_3: lajjituṃ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttepi “tuṇhī hoti, saṅgho saṅghoti vadasi, kiṃ saṅgho, migasaṅgho
atk-s0203a0:98_4: ajasaṅgho”tiādīni vadati, ayaṃ saṅghe agāravo nāma. Ekabhikkhusmimpi hi agārave kate
atk-s0203a0:98_5: saṅghe katoyeva hoti. Tisso sikkhā pana aparipūrayamānova sikkhāya na paripūrakārī nāma.
atk-s0203a0:99: Ajjhattaṃ vāti attani vā attano parisāya vā. Bāhiddhāti parasmiṃ vā parassa parisāya vā.
atk-s0203a0:100_0: 46. Idāni ayaṃ cha ṭhānāni nissāya uppannavivādo vaḍḍhanto yāni adhikaraṇāni pāpuṇāti,
atk-s0203a0:100_1: tāni dassetuṃ cattārimānītiādimāha. Tattha vūpasamanatthāya pavattamānehi samathehi
atk-s0203a0:100_2: adhikātabbānīti adhikaraṇāni. Vivādova adhikaraṇaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ. Itaresupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0203a0:101_0: Idāni imānipi cattāri adhikaraṇāni patvā upari vaḍḍhento so vivādo yehi samathehi
atk-s0203a0:101_1: vūpasammati, tesaṃ dassanatthaṃ satta kho panimetiādimāha. Tattha adhikaraṇāni samenti
atk-s0203a0:101_2: vūpasamentīti adhikaraṇasamathā. Uppannuppannānanti uppannānaṃ uppannānaṃ. Adhikaraṇānanti
atk-s0203a0:101_3: etesaṃ vivādādhikaraṇādīnaṃ catunnaṃ. Samathāya vūpasamāyāti samanatthañceva vūpasamanatthañca.
atk-s0203a0:101_4: Sammukhāvinayo dātabbo…pe… tiṇavatthārakoti ime satta samathā dātabbā.
atk-s0203a0:102_0: Tatrāyaṃ vinicchayakathā – adhikaraṇesu tāva dhammoti vā adhammoti vāti aṭṭhārasahi
atk-s0203a0:102_1: vatthūhi vivadantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yo vivādo, idaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ nāma. Sīlavipattiyā
atk-s0203a0:102_2: vā ācāradiṭṭhiājīvavipattiyā vā anuvadantānaṃ yo anuvādo upavadanā ceva codanā ca,
atk-s0203a0:102_3: idaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ nāma. Mātikāyaṃ āgatā pañca vibhaṅge dveti satta āpattikkhandhā
atk-s0203a0:102_4: āpattādhikaraṇaṃ nāma. Yaṃ saṅghassa apalokanādīnaṃ catunnaṃ kammānaṃ karaṇaṃ, idaṃ
atk-s0203a0:103_0: Tattha vivādādhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya
atk-s0203a0:103_1: ca. Sammukhāvinayeneva sammamānaṃ yasmiṃ vihāre uppannaṃ, tasmiṃyeva vā, aññattha
atk-s0203a0:103_2: vūpasametuṃ gacchantānaṃ antarāmagge vā, yattha gantvā saṅghassa niyyātitaṃ, tattha
atk-s0203a0:103_3: saṅghena vā gaṇena vā vūpasametuṃ asakkonte tattheva ubbāhikāya sammatapuggalehi
atk-s0203a0:103_4: vā vinicchitaṃ sammati. Evaṃ sammamāne pana tasmiṃ yā saṅghasammukhatā dhammasammukhatā,
atk-s0203a0:104_0: Tattha ca kārakasaṅghassa sāmaggivasena sammukhībhāvo saṅghasammukhatā. Sametabbassa
atk-s0203a0:104_1: vatthuno bhūtatā dhammasammukhatā. Yathā taṃ sametabbaṃ, tatheva samanaṃ vinayasammukhatā.
atk-s0203a0:104_2: Yo ca vivadati, yena ca vivadati, tesaṃ ubhinnaṃ attapaccatthikānaṃ sammukhībhāvo
atk-s0203a0:104_3: puggalasammukhatā. Ubbāhikāya vūpasame panettha saṅghasammukhatā parihāyati. Evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:105_0: Sace panevampi na sammati, atha naṃ ubbāhikāya sammatā bhikkhū “na mayaṃ sakkoma
atk-s0203a0:105_1: vūpasametu”nti saṅghasseva niyyātenti. Tato saṅgho pañcaṅgasamannāgataṃ bhikkhuṃ
atk-s0203a0:105_2: salākaggāhakaṃ sammannitvā tena guḷhakavivaṭakasakaṇṇajappakesu tīsu salākaggāhesu
atk-s0203a0:105_3: aññataravasena salākaṃ gāhetvā sannipatitaparisāya dhammavādīnaṃ yebhuyyatāya yathā
atk-s0203a0:105_4: te dhammavādino vadanti, evaṃ vūpasantaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya
atk-s0203a0:105_5: ca vūpasantaṃ hoti. Tattha sammukhāvinayo vuttanayo eva. Yaṃ pana yebhuyyasikāya
atk-s0203a0:105_6: kammassa karaṇaṃ, ayaṃ yebhuyyasikā nāma. Evaṃ vivādādhikaraṇaṃ dvīhi samathehi sammati.
atk-s0203a0:106_0: Anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catūhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca sativinayena ca amūḷhavinayena
atk-s0203a0:106_1: ca tassapāpiyasikāya ca. Sammukhāvinayeneva sammamānaṃ yo ca anuvadati, yañca anuvadati,
atk-s0203a0:106_2: tesaṃ vacanaṃ sutvā, sace kāci āpatti natthi, ubho khamāpetvā, sace atthi, ayaṃ nāmettha
atk-s0203a0:106_3: āpattīti evaṃ vinicchitaṃ vūpasammati. Tattha sammukhāvinayalakkhaṇaṃ vuttanayameva.
atk-s0203a0:107_0: Yadā pana khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno amūlikāya sīlavipattiyā anuddhaṃsitassa sativinayaṃ
atk-s0203a0:107_1: yācamānassa saṅgho ñatticatutthena kammena sativinayaṃ deti, tadā sammukhāvinayena
atk-s0203a0:107_2: ca sativinayena ca vūpasantaṃ hoti. Dinne pana sativinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci anuvādo na ruhati.
atk-s0203a0:108_0: Yadā ummattako bhikkhu ummādavasena kate assāmaṇake ajjhācāre “saratāyasmā evarūpiṃ
atk-s0203a0:108_1: āpatti”nti bhikkhūhi vuccamāno – “ummattakena me, āvuso, etaṃ kataṃ, nāhaṃ taṃ sarāmī”ti
atk-s0203a0:108_2: bhaṇantopi bhikkhūhi codiyamānova puna acodanatthāya amūḷhavinayaṃ yācati, saṅgho
atk-s0203a0:108_3: cassa ñatticatutthena kammena amūḷhavinayaṃ deti, tadā sammukhāvinayena ca amūḷhavinayena
atk-s0203a0:108_4: ca vūpasantaṃ hoti. Dinne pana amūḷhavinaye puna tasmiṃ puggale kassaci tappaccayā anuvādo na ruhati.
atk-s0203a0:109_0: Yadā pana pārājikena vā pārājikasāmantena vā codiyamānassa aññenāññaṃ paṭicarato
atk-s0203a0:109_1: pāpussannatāya pāpiyassa puggalassa – “sacāyaṃ acchinnamūlo bhavissati, sammā vattitvā
atk-s0203a0:109_2: osāraṇaṃ labhissati, sace chinnamūlo, ayamevassa nāsanā bhavissatī”ti maññamāno saṅgho
atk-s0203a0:109_3: ñatticatutthena kammena tassapāpiyasikaṃ karoti, tadā sammukhāvinayena ca tassa pāpiyasikāya
atk-s0203a0:109_4: ca vūpasantaṃ hoti. Evaṃ anuvādādhikaraṇaṃ catūhi samathehi sammati.
atk-s0203a0:110_0: Āpattādhikaraṇaṃ tīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca
atk-s0203a0:110_1: tiṇavatthārakena ca. Tassa sammukhāvinayeneva vūpasamo natthi. Yadā pana ekassa vā
atk-s0203a0:110_2: bhikkhuno santike saṅghagaṇamajjhesu vā bhikkhu lahukaṃ āpattiṃ deseti, tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:110_3: sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca vūpasammati. Tattha sammukhāvinayo tāva
atk-s0203a0:110_4: yo ca deseti, yassa ca deseti, tesaṃ sammukhatā. Sesaṃ vuttanayameva. Puggalassa
atk-s0203a0:110_5: ca gaṇassa ca desanākāle saṅghasammukhatā parihāyati. Yaṃ panettha “ahaṃ, bhante,
atk-s0203a0:110_6: itthannāmaṃ āpattiṃ apanno”ti ca, āma “passāmī”ti ca paṭiññātāya “āyatiṃ saṃvareyyāsī”ti
atk-s0203a0:110_7: karaṇaṃ, taṃ paṭiññātakaraṇaṃ nāma. Saṅghādisese parivāsādiyācanā paṭiññā, parivāsādīnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:111_0: Dvepakkhajātā pana bhaṇḍanakārakā bhikkhū bahuṃ assāmaṇakaṃ ajjhācāraṃ caritvā puna
atk-s0203a0:111_1: lajjidhamme uppanne “sace mayaṃ imāhi āpattīhi aññamaññaṃ kāressāma, siyāpi taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:111_2: kakkhaḷattāya saṃvatteyyā”ti aññamaññaṃ āpattiyā kārāpane dosaṃ disvā yadā tiṇavatthārakakammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:111_3: karonti, tadā āpattādhikaraṇaṃ sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca sammati. Tatra
atk-s0203a0:111_4: hi yattakā hatthapāsupagatā “na me taṃ khamatī”ti evaṃ diṭṭhāvikammaṃ akatvā “dukkaṭaṃ
atk-s0203a0:111_5: kammaṃ puna kātabbaṃ kamma”nti na ukkoṭenti, niddampi okkantā honti, sabbesampi ṭhapetvā
atk-s0203a0:111_6: thullavajjañca gihipaṭisaṃyuttañca sabbāpattiyo vuṭṭhahanti. Evaṃ āpattādhikaraṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:111_7: tīhi samathehi sammati. Kiccādhikaraṇaṃ ekena samathena sammati sammukhāvinayeneva.
atk-s0203a0:112_0: Imāni cattāri adhikaraṇāni yathānurūpaṃ imehi sattahi samathehi sammanti. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0203a0:112_1: “uppannuppannānaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ samathāya vūpasamāya sammukhāvinayo dātabbo…pe… tiṇavatthārako”ti.
atk-s0203a0:112_2: Ayamettha vinicchayanayo, vitthāro pana samathakkhandhake āgatoyeva. Vinicchayopissa
atk-s0203a0:113_0: 47. Yo panāyaṃ imasmiṃ sutte “idhānanda, bhikkhū vivadantī”tiādiko vitthāro vutto,
atk-s0203a0:113_1: so etena nayena saṅkhepatova vuttoti veditabbo. Tattha dhammotiādīsu suttantapariyāyena
atk-s0203a0:113_2: tāva dasa kusalakammapathā dhammo, akusalakammapathā adhammo. Tathā “cattāro satipaṭṭhānā”ti
atk-s0203a0:113_3: heṭṭhā āgatā sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā, tayo satipaṭṭhānā tayo sammappadhānā
atk-s0203a0:113_4: tayo iddhipādā cha indriyāni cha balāni aṭṭha bojjhaṅgā navaṅgiko maggo cāti, cattāro
atk-s0203a0:113_5: upādānā pañca nīvaraṇānītiādayo saṅkaliṭṭhadhammā cāti ayaṃ adhammo.
atk-s0203a0:114_0: Tattha yaṃkiñci ekaṃ adhammakoṭṭhāsaṃ gahetvā “imaṃ adhammaṃ dhammoti karissāma,
atk-s0203a0:114_1: evaṃ amhākaṃ ācariyakulaṃ niyyānikaṃ bhavissati, mayañca loke pākaṭā bhavissāmā”ti
atk-s0203a0:114_2: taṃ adhammaṃ “dhammo aya”nti kathentā dhammoti vivadanti. Tattheva dhammakoṭṭhāsesu
atk-s0203a0:114_3: ekaṃ gahetvā “adhammo aya”nti kathentā adhammoti vivadanti.
atk-s0203a0:115_0: Vinayapariyāyena pana bhūtena vatthunā codetvā sāretvā yathāpaṭiññāya kātabbakammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:115_1: dhammo nāma, abhūtena pana vatthunā acodetvā asāretvā apaṭiññāya katabbakammaṃ adhammo
atk-s0203a0:115_2: nāma. Tesupi adhammaṃ “dhammo aya”nti kathentā dhammoti vivadanti, “adhammo aya”nti
atk-s0203a0:116_0: Suttantapariyāyena pana rāgavinayo dosavinayo mohavinayo saṃvaro pahānaṃ paṭisaṅkhāti
atk-s0203a0:116_1: ayaṃ vinayo nāma, rāgādīnaṃ avinayo asaṃvaro appahānaṃ appaṭisaṅkhāti ayaṃ avinayo
atk-s0203a0:116_2: nāma. Vinayapariyāyena vatthusampatti ñattisampatti anusāvanasampatti sīmasampati
atk-s0203a0:116_3: parisasampattīti ayaṃ vinayo nāma, vatthuvipatti…pe… parisavipattīti ayaṃ avinayo
atk-s0203a0:116_4: nāma. Tesupi yaṃkiñci avinayaṃ “vinayo aya”nti kathentā vinayoti vivadanti, vinayaṃ
atk-s0203a0:117_0: Dhammanetti samanumajjitabbāti dhammarajju anumajjitabbā ñāṇena ghaṃsitabbā upaparikkhitabbā.
atk-s0203a0:117_1: Sā panesā dhammanetti “iti kho vaccha ime dasa dhammā akusalā dasa dhammā kusalā”ti
atk-s0203a0:117_2: evaṃ mahāvacchagottasutte āgatāti vuttā. Sā eva vā hotu, yo vā idha dhammoti ca vinayo
atk-s0203a0:117_3: ca vutto. Yathā tattha sametīti yathā tāya dhammanettiyā sameti, “dhammo dhammova
atk-s0203a0:117_4: hoti, adhammo adhammova, vinayo vinayova hoti, avinayo avinayova”. Tathā tanti evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:117_5: taṃ adhikaraṇaṃ vūpasametabbaṃ. Ekaccānaṃ adhikaraṇānanti idha vivādādhikaraṇameva
atk-s0203a0:117_6: dassitaṃ, sammukhāvinayo pana na kismiñci adhikaraṇe na labbhati.
atk-s0203a0:118_0: 48. Taṃ panetaṃ yasmā dvīhi samathehi sammati sammukhāvinayena ca yebhuyyasikāya
atk-s0203a0:118_1: ca, tasmā heṭṭhā mātikāya ṭhapitānukkamena idāni sativinayassa vāre pattepi taṃ avatvā
atk-s0203a0:118_2: vivādādhikaraṇayeva tāva dutiyasamathaṃ dassento kathañcānanda, yebhuyyasikātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:118_3: Tattha bahutarāti antamaso dvīhi tīhipi atirekatarā. Sesamettha heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:119_0: 49. Idāni heṭṭhā avitthāritaṃ sativinayaṃ ādiṃ katvā vitthāritāvasesasamathe paṭipāṭiyā
atk-s0203a0:119_1: vitthāretuṃ kathañcānanda, sativinayotiādimāha. Tattha pārājikasāmantena vāti dve
atk-s0203a0:119_2: sāmantāni khandhasāmantañca āpattisāmantañca. Tattha pārājikāpattikkhandho saṅghādisesāpattikkhandho
atk-s0203a0:119_4: pacchimakhandhaṃ khandhasāmantaṃ nāma hoti. Paṭhamapārājikassa pana pubbabhāge dukkaṭaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:119_5: sesānaṃ thullaccayanti idaṃ āpattisāmantaṃ nāma. Tattha khandhasāmante pārājikasāmantaṃ
atk-s0203a0:119_6: garukāpatti nāma hoti. Saratāyasmāti saratu āyasmā. Ekaccānaṃ adhikaraṇānanti idha
atk-s0203a0:120_0: 50. Bhāsitaparikkantanti vācāya bhāsitaṃ kāyena ca parikkantaṃ, parakkamitvā katanti
atk-s0203a0:120_1: attho. Ekaccānanti idhāpi anuvādādhikaraṇameva adhippetaṃ. Paṭiññātakaraṇe “ekaccāna”nti
atk-s0203a0:121_0: 52. Davāti sahasā. Ravāti aññaṃ bhaṇitukāmena aññaṃ vuttaṃ. Evaṃ kho, ānanda, tassapāpiyasikā
atk-s0203a0:121_1: hotīti tassapuggalassa pāpussannatā pāpiyasikā hoti. Iminā kammassa vatthu dassitaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:121_2: Evarūpassa hi puggalassa kammaṃ kāttabbaṃ. Kammena hi adhikaraṇassa vūpasamo hoti,
atk-s0203a0:121_3: na puggalassa pāpussannatāya. Idhāpi ca anuvādādhikaraṇameva adhikaraṇanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:122_0: 53. Kathañcānanda, tiṇavatthārakoti ettha idaṃ kammaṃ tiṇavatthārakasadisattā tiṇavatthārakoti
atk-s0203a0:122_1: vuttaṃ. Yathā hi gūthaṃ vā muttaṃ vā ghaṭṭiyamānaṃ duggandhatāya bādhati, tiṇehi
atk-s0203a0:122_2: avattharitvā suppaṭicchāditassa panassa so gandho na bādhati, evameva yaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:122_3: mūlānumūlaṃ gantvā vūpasamiyamānaṃ kakkhaḷattāya vāḷattāya bhedāya saṃvattati, taṃ
atk-s0203a0:122_4: iminā kammena vūpasantaṃ gūthaṃ viya tiṇavatthārakena paṭicchannaṃ vūpasantaṃ hotīti
atk-s0203a0:122_5: idaṃ kammaṃ tiṇavatthārakasadisattā tiṇavatthārakoti vuttaṃ. Tassa idhānanda, bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:122_6: bhaṇḍanajātānantiādivacanena ākāramattameva dassitaṃ, khandhake āgatāyeva panettha
atk-s0203a0:122_7: kammavācā pamāṇaṃ. Ṭhapetvā thullavajjaṃ ṭhapetvā gihipaṭisaṃyuttanti. Ettha pana
atk-s0203a0:122_8: thullavajjanti thūllavajjaṃ pārājikañceva saṅghādisesañca. Gihipaṭisaṃyuttanti gihīnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:122_9: hīnena khuṃsanavambhanadhammikapaṭissavesu āpannā āpatti. Adhikaraṇānanti idha āpattādhikaraṇameva
atk-s0203a0:122_10: veditabbaṃ. Kiccādhikaraṇassa pana vasena idha na kiñci vuttaṃ. Kiñcāpi na vuttaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:123_0: 54. Chayime, ānanda, dhammā sāraṇīyāti heṭṭhā kalahavasena suttaṃ āraddhaṃ, upari
atk-s0203a0:123_1: sāraṇīyadhammā āgatā. Iti yathānusandhināva desanā gatā hoti. Heṭṭhā kosambiyasutte
atk-s0203a0:123_2: pana sotāpattimaggasammādiṭṭhi kathitā, imasmiṃ sutte sotāpattiphalasammādiṭṭhi vuttāti
atk-s0203a0:123_3: veditabbā. Aṇunti appasāvajjaṃ. Thūlanti mahāsāvajjaṃ. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:127_0: 55. Evaṃ me sutanti sunakkhattasuttaṃ. Tattha aññāti arahattaṃ. Byākatāti khīṇā jātītiādīhi
atk-s0203a0:127_1: catūhi padehi kathitā. Adhimānenāti appatte pattasaññino, anadhigate adhigatasaññino
atk-s0203a0:128_0: 56. Evañcettha sunakkhatta tathāgatassa hotīti sunakkhatta ettha etesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:128_1: pañhabyākaraṇe – “idaṃ ṭhānaṃ etesaṃ avibhūtaṃ andhakāraṃ, tenime anadhigate adhigatasaññino,
atk-s0203a0:128_2: handa nesaṃ visodhetvā pākaṭaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desemī”ti, evañca tathāgatassa hoti.
atk-s0203a0:128_3: Atha ca panidhekacce…pe… tassapi hoti aññathattanti bhagavā paṭipannakānaṃ dhammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:128_4: deseti. Yattha pana icchācāre ṭhitā ekacce moghapurisā honti, tatra bhagavā passati
atk-s0203a0:128_5: – “ime imaṃ pañhaṃ uggahetvā ajānitvāva jānantā viya appatte pattasaññino hutvā gāmanigamādīsu
atk-s0203a0:128_6: visevamānā vicarissanti, taṃ nesaṃ bhavissati dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāyā”ti evamassāyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:128_7: icchācāre ṭhitānaṃ kāraṇā paṭipannakānampi atthāya “dhammaṃ desissāmī”ti uppannassa
atk-s0203a0:128_8: cittassa aññathābhāvo hoti. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:129_1: tanninno taggaruko tappabbhāro. Tappatirūpīti kāmaguṇasabhāgā. Āneñjapaṭisaṃyuttāyāti
atk-s0203a0:129_2: āneñjasamāpattipaṭisaṃyuttāya. Saṃseyyāti katheyya. Āneñjasaṃyojanena hi kho visaṃyuttoti
atk-s0203a0:129_3: āneñjasamāpattisaṃyojanena visaṃsaṭṭho. Lokāmisādhimuttoti evarūpo hi lūkhacīvaradharo
atk-s0203a0:129_4: mattikāpattaṃ ādāya attano sadisehi katipayehi saddhiṃ paccantajanapadaṃ gacchati,
atk-s0203a0:129_5: gāmaṃ piṇḍāya paviṭṭhakāle manussā disvā “mahāpaṃsukulikā āgatā”ti yāgubhattādīni
atk-s0203a0:129_6: sampādetvā sakkaccaṃ dānaṃ denti, bhattakicce niṭṭhite anumodanaṃ sutvā – “svepi,
atk-s0203a0:129_7: bhante, idheva piṇḍāya pavisathā”ti vadanti. Alaṃ upāsakā, ajjāpi vo bahūnaṃ dinnanti.
atk-s0203a0:129_8: Tena hi, bhante, antovassaṃ idha vaseyyāthāti adhivāsetvā vihāramaggaṃ pucchitvā
atk-s0203a0:129_9: vihāraṃ gacchanti. Tattha senāsanaṃ gahetvā pattacīvaraṃ paṭisāmenti. Sāyaṃ eko āvāsiko
atk-s0203a0:129_10: te bhikkhū pucchati “kattha piṇḍāya caritthā”ti? Asukagāmeti. Bhikkhāsampannāti?
atk-s0203a0:129_11: Āma evarūpā nāma manussānaṃ saddhā hoti. “Ajjeva nu kho ete edisā, niccampi edisā”ti?
atk-s0203a0:129_12: Saddhā te manussā niccampi edisā, te nissāyeva ayaṃ vihāro vaḍḍhatīti. Tato te paṃsukulikā
atk-s0203a0:129_13: punappunaṃ tesaṃ vaṇṇaṃ kathenti, divasāvasesaṃ kathetvā rattimpi kathenti. Ettāvatā
atk-s0203a0:129_14: icchācāre ṭhitassa sīsaṃ nikkhantaṃ hoti udaraṃ phālitaṃ. Evaṃ lokāmisādhimutto veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:130_0: 59. Idāni āneñjasamāpattilābhiṃ adhimānikaṃ dassento ṭhānaṃ kho panetantiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:130_1: Āneñjādhimuttassāti kilesasiñcanavirahitāsu heṭṭhimāsu chasu samāpattīsu adhimuttassa
atk-s0203a0:130_2: tanninnassa taggaruno tappabbhārassa. Se pavutteti taṃ pavuttaṃ. Cha samāpattilābhino
atk-s0203a0:130_3: hi adhimānikassa pañcakāmaguṇāmisabandhanā patitapaṇḍupalāso viya upaṭṭhāti. Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:131_0: 60. Idāni ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti lābhino adhimānikassa nighaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:131_1: kho panātiādimāha. Tattha dvedhā bhinnāti majjhe bhinnā. Appaṭisandhikāti khuddakā
atk-s0203a0:131_2: muṭṭhipāsāṇamattā jatunā vā silesena vā allīyāpetvā paṭisandhātuṃ sakkā. Mahantaṃ
atk-s0203a0:131_3: pana kuṭāgārappamāṇaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Se bhinneti taṃ bhinnaṃ. Upari samāpattilābhino
atk-s0203a0:131_4: hi heṭṭhāsamāpatti dvedhābhinnā selā viya hoti, taṃ samāpajjissāmīti cittaṃ na uppajjati. Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:132_0: 61. Idāni nevasaññānāsaññāyatanalābhino adhimānikassa ca nighaṃsaṃ dassento ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:132_1: kho panātiādimāha. Tattha se vanteti taṃ vantaṃ. Aṭṭhasamāpattilābhino hi heṭṭhāsamāpattiyo
atk-s0203a0:132_2: vantasadisā hutvā upaṭṭhahanti, puna samāpajjissāmīti cittaṃ na uppajjati. Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:133_0: 62. Idāni khīṇāsavassa nighaṃsaṃ dassento ṭhānaṃ kho panātiādimāha. Tattha se ucchinnamūleti
atk-s0203a0:133_1: so ucchinnamūlo. Upari samāpattilābhino hi heṭṭhāsamāpatti mūlacchinnatālo viya upaṭṭhāti,
atk-s0203a0:133_2: taṃ samāpajjissāmīti cittaṃ na uppajjati. Tenetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:134_0: 63. Ṭhānaṃ kho panāti pāṭiyekko anusandhi. Heṭṭhā hi samāpattilābhino adhimānikassapi
atk-s0203a0:134_1: khīṇāsavassapi nighaṃso kathito, sukkhavipassakassa pana adhimānikassapi khīṇāsavassapi
atk-s0203a0:134_2: na kathito. Tesaṃ dvinnampi nighaṃsaṃ dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. Taṃ pana paṭikkhittaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:134_3: Samāpattilābhino hi adhimānikassa nighaṃse kathite sukkhavipassakassapi adhimānikassa
atk-s0203a0:134_4: kathitova hoti, samāpattilābhino ca khīṇāsavassa kathite sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavassa
atk-s0203a0:134_5: kathitova hoti. Etesaṃ pana dvinnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ sappāyāsappāyaṃ kathetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0203a0:135_0: Tattha siyā – puthujjanassa tāva ārammaṇaṃ asappāyaṃ hotu, khīṇāsavassa kathaṃ asappāyanti.
atk-s0203a0:135_1: Yadaggena puthujjanassa asappāyaṃ, tadaggena khīṇāsavassāpi asappāyameva. Visaṃ nāma
atk-s0203a0:135_2: jānitvā khāditampi ajānitvā khāditampi visameva. Na hi khīṇāsavenapi “ahaṃ khīṇāsavo”ti
atk-s0203a0:135_3: asaṃvutena bhavitabbaṃ. Khīṇāsavenapi yuttapayutteneva bhavituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0203a0:136_0: 64. Tattha samaṇenāti buddhasamaṇena. Chandarāgabyāpādenāti so avijjāsaṅkhāto visadoso
atk-s0203a0:136_1: chandarāgena ca byāpādena ca ruppati kuppati. Asappāyānīti avaḍḍhikarāni ārammaṇāni.
atk-s0203a0:136_2: Anuddhaṃseyyāti soseyya milāpeyya. Saupādisesanti sagahaṇasesaṃ, upāditabbaṃ gaṇhitabbaṃ
atk-s0203a0:136_3: idha upādīti vuttaṃ. Analañca te antarāyāyāti jīvitantarāyaṃ te kātuṃ asamatthaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:136_4: Rajosūkanti rajo ca vīhisukādi ca sūkaṃ. Asu ca visadosoti so ca visadoso. Tadubhayenāti
atk-s0203a0:136_5: yā sā asappāyakiriyā ca yo visadoso ca, tena ubhayena. Puthuttanti mahantabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:137_0: Evameva khoti ettha saupādānasalluddhāro viya appahīno avijjāvisadoso daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0203a0:137_1: asappāyakiriyāya ṭhitabhāvo viya chasu dvāresu asaṃvutakālo, tadubhayena vaṇe puthuttaṃ
atk-s0203a0:137_2: gate maraṇaṃ viya sikkhaṃ paccakkhāya hīnāyāvattanaṃ, maraṇamattaṃ dukkhaṃ viya aññatarāya
atk-s0203a0:137_3: garukāya saṃkiliṭṭhāya āpattiyā āpajjanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Sukkapakkhepi imināva nayena
atk-s0203a0:138: 65. Satiyāyetaṃ adhivacananti ettha sati paññāgatikā. Lokikāya paññāya lokikā hoti, lokuttarāya lokuttarā. Ariyāyetaṃ paññāyāti parisuddhāya vipassanāpaññāya.
atk-s0203a0:139_0: Idāni khīṇāsavassa balaṃ dassento so vatātiādimāha. Tattha saṃvutakārīti pihitakārī.
atk-s0203a0:139_1: Iti viditvā nirupadhīti evaṃ jānitvā kilesupadhipahānā nirupadhi hoti, nirupādānoti
atk-s0203a0:139_2: attho. Upadhisaṅkhaye vimuttoti upadhīnaṃ saṅkhayabhūte nibbāne ārammaṇato vimutto.
atk-s0203a0:139_3: Upadhisminti kāmupadhismiṃ. Kāyaṃ upasaṃharissatīti kāyaṃ allīyāpessati. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0203a0:139_4: hoti – taṇhakkhaye nibbāne ārammaṇato vimutto khīṇāsavo pañca kāmaguṇe sevituṃ, kāyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:139_5: vā upasaṃharissati cittaṃ vā uppādessatīti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:143_0: 66. Evaṃ me sutanti āneñjasappāyasuttaṃ. Tattha aniccāti hutvā abhāvaṭṭhena aniccā.
atk-s0203a0:143_2: rittā, na pana natthīti gahetabbā. Na hi tucchamuṭṭhīti vutte muṭṭhi nāma natthīti
atk-s0203a0:143_3: vuttaṃ hoti. Yassa pana abbhantare kiñci natthi, so vuccati tuccho. Musāti nāsanakā.
atk-s0203a0:143_4: Mosadhammāti nassanasabhāvā, khettaṃ viya vatthu viya hiraññasuvaṇṇaṃ viya ca na
atk-s0203a0:143_5: paññāyittha, katipāheneva supinake diṭṭhā viya nassanti na paññāyanti. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0203a0:143_6: “mosadhammā”ti, māyākatametanti yathā māyāya udakaṃ maṇīti katvā dassitaṃ, badaripaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:143_7: kahāpaṇoti katvā dassitaṃ, aññaṃ vā pana evarūpaṃ dassanūpacāre ṭhitasseva tathā
atk-s0203a0:143_8: paññāyati, upacārātikkamato paṭṭhāya pākatikameva paññāyati. Evaṃ kāmāpi ittarapaccupaṭṭhānaṭṭhena
atk-s0203a0:143_9: “māyākata”nti vuttā. Yathā ca māyākāro udakādīni maṇiādīnaṃ vasena dassento vañceti,
atk-s0203a0:143_10: evaṃ kāmāpi aniccādīni niccādisabhāvaṃ dassentā vañcentīti vañcanakaṭṭhenapi “māyākata”nti
atk-s0203a0:143_11: vuttā. Bālalāpananti mayhaṃ putto, mayhaṃ dhītā, mayhaṃ hiraññaṃ mayhaṃ suvaṇṇanti
atk-s0203a0:143_12: evaṃ bālānaṃ lāpanato bālalāpanaṃ. Diṭṭhadhammikā kāmāti mānusakā pañca kāmaguṇā.
atk-s0203a0:143_13: Samparāyikāti te ṭhapetvā avasesā. Diṭṭhadhammikā. Kāmasaññāti mānusake kāme ārabbha
atk-s0203a0:143_14: uppannasaññā. Ubhayametaṃ māradheyyanti ete kāmā ca kāmasaññā ca ubhayampi māradheyyaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:143_15: Yehi ubhayametaṃ gahitaṃ, tesañhi upari māro vasaṃ vatteti. Taṃ sandhāya “ubhayametaṃ
atk-s0203a0:144_0: Mārassesa visayotiādīsupi yathā coḷassa visayo coḷavisayo, paṇḍassa visayo paṇḍavisayo,
atk-s0203a0:144_1: saṃvarānaṃ visayo saṃvaravisayoti pavattanaṭṭhānaṃ visayoti vuccati, evaṃ yehi ete
atk-s0203a0:144_2: kāmā gahitā, tesaṃ upari māro vasaṃ vatteti. Taṃ sandhāya mārassesa visayoti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:144_3: Pañca pana kāmaguṇe nivāpabījaṃ viya vippakiranto māro gacchati. Yehi pana te gahitā,
atk-s0203a0:144_4: tesaṃ upari māro vasaṃ vatteti. Taṃ sandhāya mārassesa nivāpoti vuttaṃ. Yathā ca
atk-s0203a0:144_5: yattha hatthiādayo vasaṃ vattenti, so hatthigocaro assagocaro ajagocaroti vuccati,
atk-s0203a0:144_6: evaṃ yehi ete kāmā gahitā, tesu māro vasaṃ vatteti. Taṃ sandhāya mārassesa gocaroti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:145_0: Etthāti etesu kāmesu. Mānasāti cittasambhūtā. Tattha siyā – duvidhe tāva kāme ārabbha
atk-s0203a0:145_1: abhijjhānalakkhaṇā abhijjhā, karaṇuttariyalakkhaṇo sārambho ca uppajjatu, byāpādo
atk-s0203a0:145_2: kathaṃ uppajjatīti? Mamāyite vatthusmiṃ acchinnepi socanti, acchijjantepi socanti,
atk-s0203a0:145_3: acchinnasaṅkinopi socanti, yo evarūpo cittassa āghātoti evaṃ uppajjati. Teva ariyasāvakassāti
atk-s0203a0:145_4: te ariyasāvakassa. Vakāro āgamasandhimattaṃ hoti. Idha manusikkhatoti imasmiṃ sāsane
atk-s0203a0:145_5: sikkhantassa te tayopi kilesā antarāyakarā honti. Abhibhuyya lokanti kāmalokaṃ abhibhavitvā.
atk-s0203a0:145_6: Adhiṭṭhāya manasāti jhānārammaṇacittena adhiṭṭhahitvā. Aparittanti kāmāvacaracittaṃ
atk-s0203a0:145_7: parittaṃ nāma, tassa paṭikkhepena mahaggataṃ aparittaṃ nāma. Pamāṇantipi kāmāvacarameva,
atk-s0203a0:145_8: rūpāvacaraṃ arūpāvacaraṃ appamāṇaṃ. Subhāvitanti pana etaṃ kāmāvacarādīnaṃ nāmaṃ
atk-s0203a0:145_9: na hoti, lokuttarassevetaṃ nāmaṃ. Tasmā etassa vasena aparittaṃ appamāṇaṃ subhāvitanti
atk-s0203a0:146_0: Tabbahulavihārinoti kāmapaṭibāhanena tameva paṭipadaṃ bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa.
atk-s0203a0:146_1: Āyatane cittaṃ pasīdatīti kāraṇe cittaṃ pasīdati. Kiṃ panettha kāraṇaṃ? Arahattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:146_2: vā, arahattassa vipassanaṃ vā, catutthajjhānaṃ vā, catutthajjhānassa upacāraṃ vā.
atk-s0203a0:146_3: Sampasāde satīti ettha duvidho sampasādo adhimokkhasampasādo ca paṭilābhasampasādo
atk-s0203a0:146_4: ca. Arahattassa hi vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā viharato mahābhūtādīsu upaṭṭhahantesu yenime
atk-s0203a0:146_5: nīhārena mahābhūtā upaṭṭhahanti, upādārūpā upaṭṭhahanti nāmarūpā upaṭṭhahanti, paccayā
atk-s0203a0:146_6: sabbathā upaṭṭhahanti, lakkhaṇārammaṇā vipassanā upaṭṭhahati, ajjeva arahattaṃ gaṇhissāmīti
atk-s0203a0:146_7: appaṭiladdheyeva āsā santiṭṭhati, adhimokkhaṃ paṭilabhati. Tatiyajjhānaṃ vā pādakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:146_8: katvā catutthajjhānatthāya kasiṇaparikammaṃ karontassa nīvaraṇavikkhambhanādīni samanupassato
atk-s0203a0:146_9: yenime nīhārena nīvaraṇā vikkhambhanti, kilesā sannisīdanti, sati santiṭṭhati, saṅkhāragataṃ
atk-s0203a0:146_10: vā vibhūtaṃ pākaṭaṃ hutvā dibbacakkhukassa paraloko viya upaṭṭhāti, cittuppādo lepapiṇḍe
atk-s0203a0:146_11: laggamāno viya upacārena samādhiyati, ajjeva catutthajjhānaṃ nibbattessāmīti apaṭiladdheyeva
atk-s0203a0:146_12: āsā santiṭṭhati, adhimokkhaṃ paṭilabhati. Ayaṃ adhimokkhasampasādo nāma. Tasmiṃ sampasāde
atk-s0203a0:146_13: sati. Yo pana arahattaṃ vā paṭilabhati catutthajjhānaṃ vā, tassa cittaṃ vippasannaṃ
atk-s0203a0:146_14: hotiyeva. Idha pana “āyatane cittaṃ pasīdatī”ti vacanato arahattavipassanāya ceva
atk-s0203a0:146_15: catutthajjhānūpacārassa ca paṭilābho paṭilābhasampasādoti veditabbo. Vipassanā hi
atk-s0203a0:147_0: Etarahi vā āneñjaṃ samāpajjati. Paññāya vā adhimuccatīti ettha etarahi vā paññāya
atk-s0203a0:147_1: adhimuccati, āneñjaṃ vā samāpajjatīti evaṃ padaparivattanaṃ katvā attho veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:147_2: Idañhi vuttaṃ hoti – tasmiṃ sampasāde sati etarahi vā paññāya adhimuccati, arahattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:147_3: sacchikarotīti attho. Taṃ anabhisambhuṇanto āneñjaṃ vā samāpajjati, atha vā paññāya
atk-s0203a0:147_4: vā adhimuccatīti arahattamaggaṃ bhāveti, taṃ anabhisambhuṇanto āneñjaṃ vā samāpajjati.
atk-s0203a0:147_5: Arahattamaggaṃ bhāvetuṃ asakkonto etarahi catusaccaṃ vā sacchikaroti. Taṃ anabhisambhuṇanto
atk-s0203a0:148_0: Tatrāyaṃ nayo – idha bhikkhu tatiyajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā catutthajjhānassa kasiṇaparikammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:148_1: karoti. Tassa nīvaraṇā vikkhambhanti, sati santiṭṭhati, upacārena cittaṃ samādhiyati.
atk-s0203a0:148_2: So rūpārūpaṃ parigaṇhāti, paccayaṃ pariggaṇhāti, lakkhaṇārammaṇikaṃ vipassanaṃ vavatthapeti,
atk-s0203a0:148_3: tassa evaṃ hoti – “upacārena me jhānaṃ visesabhāgiyaṃ bhaveyya, tiṭṭhatu visesabhāgiyatā,
