atk-s0203a0:148_4: nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ naṃ karissāmī”ti vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ sacchikaroti. Ettakenassa
atk-s0203a0:148_5: kiccaṃ kataṃ nāma hoti. Arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ asakkonto pana tato osakkitamānaso
atk-s0203a0:148_6: antarā na tiṭṭhati, catutthajjhānaṃ samāpajjatiyeva. Yathā kiṃ? Yathā puriso “vanamahiṃsaṃ
atk-s0203a0:148_7: ghātessāmī”ti sattiṃ gahetvā anubandhanto sace taṃ ghāteti, sakalagāmavāsino tosessati,
atk-s0203a0:148_8: asakkonto pana antarāmagge sasagodhādayo khuddakamige ghātetvā kājaṃ pūretvā etiyeva.
atk-s0203a0:149_0: Tattha purisassa sattiṃ gahetvā vanamahiṃsānubandhanaṃ viya imassa bhikkhuno tatiyajjhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:149_1: pādakaṃ katvā catutthajjhānassa parikammakaraṇaṃ, vanamahiṃsaghātanaṃ viya – “nīvaraṇavikkhambhanādīni
atk-s0203a0:149_2: samanupassato visesabhāgiyaṃ bhaveyya, tiṭṭhatu visesabhāgiyatā, nibbedhabhāgiyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:149_3: naṃ karissāmī”ti vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattassa sacchikaraṇaṃ, mahiṃsaṃ ghātetuṃ
atk-s0203a0:149_4: asakkontassa antarāmagge sasagodhādayo khuddakamige ghātetvā kājaṃ pūretvā gamanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:149_5: viya arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ asakkontassa, tato osakkitvā catutthajjhānasamāpajjanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:150_0: Idāni arahattaṃ sacchikātuṃ asakkontassa nibbattaṭṭhānaṃ dassento kāyassa bhedātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:150_1: Tattha yanti yena kāraṇena taṃ saṃvattanikaṃ viññāṇaṃ assa āneñjūpagaṃ, taṃ kāraṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:150_2: vijjatīti attho. Ettha ca taṃsaṃvattanikanti tassa bhikkhuno saṃvattanikaṃ. Yena
atk-s0203a0:150_3: vipākaviññāṇena so bhikkhu saṃvattati nibbattati, taṃ viññāṇaṃ. Āneñjūpaganti kusalāneñjasabhāvūpagataṃ
atk-s0203a0:150_4: assa, tādisameva bhaveyyāti attho. Keci kusalaviññāṇaṃ vadanti. Yaṃ tassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0203a0:150_5: saṃvattanikaṃ upapattihetubhūtaṃ kusalaviññāṇaṃ āneñjūpagataṃ assa, vipākakālepi
atk-s0203a0:150_6: tannāmakameva assāti attho. So panāyamattho – “puññaṃ ce saṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti,
atk-s0203a0:150_7: puññūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ. Apuññaṃ ce saṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkhāroti, apuññupagaṃ hoti viññāṇaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:150_8: Āneñjaṃ ce saṅkhāraṃ abhisaṅkharoti, āneñjūpagaṃ hoti viññāṇa”nti iminā nayena veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:150_9: Āneñjasappāyāti āneñjassa catutthajjhānassa sappāyā. Na kevalañca sā āneñjasseva,
atk-s0203a0:150_10: upari arahattassāpi sappāyāva upakārabhūtāyevāti veditabbā. Iti imasmiṃ paṭhamakaāneñje
atk-s0203a0:151_0: 67. Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti catutthajjhānaṃ patvā evaṃ paṭisañcikkhati. Ayañhi bhikkhu
atk-s0203a0:151_1: heṭṭhimena bhikkhunā paññavantataro tassa ca bhikkhuno attano cāti dvinnampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:151_2: ekato katvā sammasati. Tabbahulavihārinoti rūpapaṭibāhanena tameva paṭipadaṃ bahulaṃ
atk-s0203a0:151_3: katvā viharantassa. Āneñjaṃ samāpajjatīti ākāsānañcāyatānāneñjaṃ samāpajjati. Sesaṃ
atk-s0203a0:151_4: purimasadisameva. Yathā ca idha, evaṃ sabbattha visesamattameva pana vakkhāma. Iti
atk-s0203a0:151_5: imasmiṃ dutiyaāneñje vipassanāvasena osakkanā kathitā, “yaṃkiñci rūpa”nti evaṃ vipassanāmaggaṃ
atk-s0203a0:152_0: Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ patvā evaṃ paṭisañcikkhati. Ayañhi heṭṭhā
atk-s0203a0:152_1: dvīhi bhikkhūhi paññavantataro tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ attano cāti tiṇṇampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:152_2: ekato katvā sammasati. Ubhayametaṃ aniccanti ettha aṭṭha ekekakoṭṭhāsā diṭṭhadhammikasamparāyikavasena
atk-s0203a0:152_3: pana saṅkhipitvā ubhayanti vuttaṃ. Nālaṃ abhinanditunti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena abhinandituṃ
atk-s0203a0:152_4: na yuttaṃ. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Tabbahulavihārinoti kāmapaṭibāhanena ca rūpapaṭibāhanena
atk-s0203a0:152_5: ca tameva paṭipadaṃ bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa. Āneñjaṃ samāpajjatīti viññāṇañcāyatanāneñjaṃ
atk-s0203a0:152_6: samāpajjati. Imasmiṃ tatiyaāneñje vipassanāvasena osakkanā kathitā.
atk-s0203a0:153_0: 68. Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ patvā evaṃ paṭisañcikkhati. Ayañhi heṭṭhā
atk-s0203a0:153_1: tīhi bhikkhūhi paññavantataro tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ attano cāti catunnampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:153_2: ekato katvā sammasati. Yatthetā aparisesā nirujjhantīti yaṃ ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ patvā
atk-s0203a0:153_3: etā heṭṭhā vuttā sabbasaññā nirujjhanti. Etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇītanti etaṃ aṅgasantatāya
atk-s0203a0:153_4: ārammaṇasantatāya ca santaṃ, atappakaṭṭhena paṇītaṃ. Tabbahulavihārinoti tāsaṃ saññānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:153_5: paṭibāhanena tameva paṭipadaṃ bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa. Imasmiṃ paṭhamākiñcaññāyatane
atk-s0203a0:154_0: Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti viññāṇañcāyatanameva patvā evaṃ paṭisañcikkhati. Ayañhi heṭṭhā
atk-s0203a0:154_1: catūhi bhikkhūhi paññavantataro tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ attano cāti pañcannampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:154_2: ekato katvā sammasati. Attena vā attaniyena vāti ahaṃ mamāti gahetabbena suññaṃ tucchaṃ
atk-s0203a0:154_3: rittaṃ. Evamettha dvikoṭikā suññatā dassitā. Tabbahulavihārinoti heṭṭhā vuttapaṭipadañca
atk-s0203a0:154_4: imañca suññatapaṭipadaṃ bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa. Imasmiṃ dutiyākiñcaññāyatane
atk-s0203a0:155_0: 70. Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti viññāṇañcāyatanameva patvā evaṃ paṭisañcikkhati. Ayañhi
atk-s0203a0:155_1: heṭṭhā pañcahi bhikkhūhi paññavantataro tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ attano cāti channampi
atk-s0203a0:155_2: kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasati. Nāhaṃ kvacani kassaci kiñcanatasmiṃ, na ca mama
atk-s0203a0:155_3: kvacani kismiñci kiñcanaṃ natthīti ettha pana catukoṭikā suññatā kathitā. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0203a0:155_4: Ayañhi nāhaṃ kvacanīti kvaci attānaṃ na passati, kassaci kiñcanatasminti attano attānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:155_5: kassaci parassa kiñcanabhāve upanetabbaṃ na passati, attano bhātiṭṭhāne bhātaraṃ
atk-s0203a0:155_6: sahāyaṭṭhāne sahāyaṃ parikkhāraṭṭhāne vā parikkhāraṃ maññitvā upagantvā upanetabbaṃ
atk-s0203a0:155_7: na passatīti attho. Na ca mama kvacanīti ettha mama – saddaṃ tāva ṭhapetvā na ca
atk-s0203a0:155_8: kvacani parassa ca attānaṃ kvaci na passatīti ayamattho. Idāni mama – saddaṃ āharitvā
atk-s0203a0:155_9: mama kismiñci kiñcanaṃ natthīti so parassa attā mama kismiñci kiñcanabhāve atthīti
atk-s0203a0:155_10: na passati. Attano bhātiṭṭhāne bhātaraṃ sahāyaṭṭhāne sahāyaṃ parikkhāraṭṭhāne vā
atk-s0203a0:155_11: parikkhāranti kismiñci ṭhāne parassa attānaṃ iminā kiñcanabhāvena upanetabbaṃ na
atk-s0203a0:155_12: passatīti attho. Evamayaṃ yasmā neva katthaci attānaṃ passati, na taṃ parassa kiñcanabhāve
atk-s0203a0:155_13: upanetabbaṃ passati, na parassa attānaṃ passati, na parassa attānaṃ attano kiñcanabhāve
atk-s0203a0:155_14: upanetabbaṃ passati, tasmā ayaṃ suññatā catukoṭikāti veditabbā. Tabbahulavihārinoti
atk-s0203a0:155_15: heṭṭhā vuttappaṭipadaṃ imaṃ catukoṭisuññatañca bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:156_0: Iti paṭisañcikkhatīti ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ patvā evaṃ paṭisañcikkhati. Ayañhi heṭṭhā
atk-s0203a0:156_1: chahi bhikkhūhi paññavantataro tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ attano cāti sattannampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:156_2: ekato katvā sammasati. Yatthetā aparisesā nirujjhantīti yaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:156_3: patvā ettha etā heṭṭhā vuttā sabbasaññā nirujjhanti. Tabbahulavihārinoti tāsaṃ saññānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:156_4: paṭibāhanena tameva paṭipadaṃ bahulaṃ katvā viharantassa. Imasmiṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatane
atk-s0203a0:157_0: 71. No cassa no ca me siyāti sace mayhaṃ pubbe pañcavidhaṃ kammavaṭṭaṃ na āyūhitaṃ
atk-s0203a0:157_1: assa, yaṃ me idaṃ etarahi evaṃ pañcavidhaṃ vipākavaṭṭaṃ etaṃ me na siyā nappavatteyyāti
atk-s0203a0:157_2: attho. Na bhavissatīti sace etarahi pañcavidhaṃ kammavaṭṭaṃ āyūhitaṃ na bhavissati.
atk-s0203a0:157_3: Na me bhavissatīti tasmiṃ asati anāgate me pañcavidhaṃ vipākavaṭṭaṃ na bhavissati.
atk-s0203a0:157_4: Yadatthi yaṃ bhūtaṃ taṃ pajahāmīti yaṃ atthi yaṃ bhūtaṃ etarahi khandhapañcakaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:157_5: taṃ pajahāmi. Evaṃ upekkhaṃ paṭilabhatīti so bhikkhu evaṃ vipassanupekkhaṃ labhatīti attho.
atk-s0203a0:158_0: Parinibbāyeyya nu kho so, bhante, bhikkhu na vā parinibbāyeyyāti kiṃ pucchāmīti pucchati,
atk-s0203a0:158_1: tatiyajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa arahattampi osakkanāpi paṭipadāpi paṭisandhipi
atk-s0203a0:158_2: kathitā, tathā catutthajjhānādīni pādakāni katvā ṭhitānaṃ, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:158_3: pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa na kiñci kathitaṃ, taṃ pucchāmīti pucchati. Apetthāti api
atk-s0203a0:158_4: ettha. So taṃ upekkhaṃ abhinandatīti so taṃ vipassanupekkhaṃ taṇhādiṭṭhiabhinandanāhi
atk-s0203a0:158_5: abhinandati. Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Tannissitaṃ hoti viññāṇanti viññāṇaṃ vipassanānissitaṃ
atk-s0203a0:158_6: hoti. Tadupādānanti yaṃ nikantiviññāṇaṃ, taṃ tassa upādānaṃ nāma gahaṇaṃ nāma hoti.
atk-s0203a0:158_7: Saupādānoti sagahaṇo. Na parinibbāyatīti vipassanāya sālayo bhikkhu mama sāsane na
atk-s0203a0:158_8: parinibbāyati. Yo pana vihārapariveṇaupaṭṭhākādīsu sālayo, tasmiṃ vattabbameva natthīti
atk-s0203a0:158_9: dasseti. Kahaṃ panāti? Kattha pana? Upādiyamāno upādiyatīti paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhamāno
atk-s0203a0:158_10: gaṇhāti. Upādānaseṭṭhaṃ kira so, bhanteti, bhante, so kira bhikkhu gahetabbaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:158_11: seṭṭhaṃ uttamaṃ bhavaṃ upādiyati, seṭṭhabhave paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhātīti attho. Iminā
atk-s0203a0:158_12: tassa bhikkhuno paṭisandhi kathitā. Idānissa arahattaṃ kathetuṃ idhānandātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:159_0: 73. Nissāya nissāyāti taṃ taṃ samāpattiṃ nissāya. Oghassa nittharaṇā akkhātāti oghataraṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:159_1: kathitaṃ, tatiyajjhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitabhikkhuno oghanittharaṇā kathitā…pe… nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:159_2: pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitabhikkhuno oghanittharaṇā kathitāti vadati.
atk-s0203a0:160_0: Katamo pana, bhante, ariyo vimokkhoti idha kiṃ pucchati? Samāpattiṃ tāva padaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:160_1: katvā vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā arahattaṃ gaṇhanto bhikkhu nāvaṃ vā uḷumpādīni vā nissāya
atk-s0203a0:160_2: mahoghaṃ taritvā pāraṃ gacchanto viya na kilamati. Sukkhavipassako pana pakiṇṇakasaṅkhāre
atk-s0203a0:160_3: sammasitvā arahattaṃ gaṇhanto bāhubalena sotaṃ chinditvā pāraṃ gacchanto viya kilamati.
atk-s0203a0:160_4: Iti imassa sukkhavipassakassa arahattaṃ pucchāmīti pucchati. Ariyasāvakoti sukkhavipassako
atk-s0203a0:160_5: ariyasāvako. Ayañhi heṭṭhā aṭṭhahi bhikkhūhi paññavantataro tesañca bhikkhūnaṃ attano
atk-s0203a0:160_6: cāti navannampi kammaṭṭhānaṃ ekato katvā sammasati. Esa sakkāyo yāvatā sakkāyoti
atk-s0203a0:160_7: yattako tebhūmakavaṭṭasaṅkhāto sakkāyo nāma atthi, sabbopi so esa sakkāyo, na ito
atk-s0203a0:161_0: Etaṃ amataṃ yadidaṃ anupādā cittassa vimokkhoti yo panesa cittassa anupādāvimokkho
atk-s0203a0:161_1: nāma, etaṃ amataṃ etaṃ santaṃ etaṃ paṇītanti paṭisañcikkhati. Aññattha ca “anupādā
atk-s0203a0:161_2: cittassa vimokkho”ti nibbānaṃ vuccati. Imasmiṃ pana sutte sukkhavipassakassa arahattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:162_0: Kevalaṃ pana imasmiṃ sutte sattasu ṭhānesu osakkanā kathitā, aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu paṭisandhi,
atk-s0203a0:162_1: navasu ṭhānesu arahattaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ. Kathaṃ? Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ tāva pādakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:162_2: katvā ṭhitassa bhikkhuno osakkanā kathitā, paṭisandhi kathitā, arahattaṃ kathitaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:162_3: tathā catutthajjhānaṃ, tathā ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ. Viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ pana padaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:162_4: katvā ṭhitānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ osakkanā kathitā, paṭisandhi kathitā, arahattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:162_5: kathitaṃ. Tathā ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa bhikkhuno. Nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:162_6: pādakaṃ katvā ṭhitassa pana osakkanā natthi, paṭisandhi pana arahattañca kathitaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:162_7: Sukkhavipassakassa arahattameva kathitanti. Evaṃ sattasu ṭhānesu osakkanā kathitā,
atk-s0203a0:162_8: aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu paṭisandhi, navasu ṭhānesu arahattaṃ kathitanti veditabbaṃ. Imañca
atk-s0203a0:162_9: pana sattasu ṭhānesu osakkanaṃ aṭṭhasu paṭisandhiṃ navasu arahattaṃ samodhānetvā
atk-s0203a0:162_10: kathentena imaṃ āneñjasappāyasuttaṃ sukathitaṃ nāma hotīti.
atk-s0203a0:166_0: 74. Evaṃ me sutanti gaṇakamoggallānasuttaṃ. Tattha yāva pacchimasopānakaḷevarāti
atk-s0203a0:166_1: yāva paṭhamasopānaphalakā ekadivaseneva sattabhūmiko pāsādo na sakkā kātuṃ, vatthuṃ
atk-s0203a0:166_2: sodhetvā thambhussāpanato paṭṭhāya pana yāva cittakammakaraṇā anupubbakiriyā cettha
atk-s0203a0:166_3: paññāyatīti dasseti. Yadidaṃ ajjheneti tayopi vedā na sakkā ekadivaseneva adhīyituṃ,
atk-s0203a0:166_4: etesaṃ ajjhenepi pana anupubbakiriyāva paññāyatīti dasseti. Issattheti āvudhavijjāyapi
atk-s0203a0:166_5: ekadivaseneva vālavedhi nāma na sakkā kātuṃ, ṭhānasampādanamuṭṭhikaraṇādīhi pana
atk-s0203a0:166_6: etthāpi anupubbakiriyā paññāyatīti dasseti. Saṅkhāneti gaṇanāya. Tattha anupubbakiriyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:167_0: 75. Seyyathāpi brāhmaṇāti idha bhagavā yasmā bāhirasamaye yathā yathā sippaṃ uggaṇhanti,
atk-s0203a0:167_1: tathā tathā kerāṭikā honti, tasmā attano sāsanaṃ bāhirasamayena anupametvā bhadraassājānīyena
atk-s0203a0:167_2: upamento seyyathāpītiādimāha. Bhadro hi assājānīyo yasmiṃ kāraṇe damito hoti, taṃ
atk-s0203a0:167_3: jīvitahetupi nātikkamati. Evameva sāsane sammāpaṭipanno kulaputto sīlavelaṃ nātikkamati.
atk-s0203a0:168_0: 76. Satisampajaññāya cāti satisampajaññāhi samaṅgibhāvatthāya. Dve hi khīṇāsavā satatavihārī
atk-s0203a0:168_1: ca nosatatavihārī ca. Tattha satatavihārī yaṃkiñci kammaṃ katvāpi phalasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0203a0:168_2: samāpajjituṃ sakkoti, no satatavihārī pana appamattakepi kicce kiccappasuto hutvā
atk-s0203a0:169_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – eko kira khīṇāsavatthero khīṇāsavasāmaṇeraṃ gahetvā araññavāsaṃ
atk-s0203a0:169_1: gato, tattha mahātherassa senāsanaṃ pattaṃ, sāmaṇerassa na pāpuṇāti, taṃ vitakkento
atk-s0203a0:169_2: thero ekadivasampi phalasamāpattiṃ appetuṃ nāsakkhi. Sāmaṇero pana temāsaṃ phalasamāpattiratiyā
atk-s0203a0:169_3: vītināmetvā “sappāyo, bhante, araññavāso jāto”ti theraṃ pucchi. Thero “na jāto, āvuso”ti
atk-s0203a0:169_4: āha. Iti yo evarūpo khīṇāsavo, so ime dhamme ādito paṭṭhāya āvajjitvāva samāpajjituṃ
atk-s0203a0:170: 78. Yeme, bho gotamāti tathāgate kira kathayanteva brāhmaṇassa “ime puggalā na ārādhenti, ime ārādhentī”ti nayo udapādi, taṃ dassento evaṃ vattumāraddho.
atk-s0203a0:171: Paramajjadhammesūti ajjadhammā nāma chasatthāradhammā, tesu gotamavādova, paramo uttamoti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:175_0: 79. Evaṃ me sutanti gopakamoggallānasuttaṃ. Tattha aciraparinibbute bhagavatīti bhagavati
atk-s0203a0:175_1: aciraparinibbute, dhātubhājanīyaṃ katvā dhammasaṅgītiṃ kātuṃ rājagahaṃ āgatakāle.
atk-s0203a0:175_2: Rañño pajjotassa āsaṅkamānoti caṇḍapajjoto nāmesa rājā bimbisāramahārājassa sahāyo
atk-s0203a0:175_3: ahosi, jīvakaṃ pesetvā bhesajjakāritakālato paṭṭhāya pana daḷhamittova jāto, so “ajātasattunā
atk-s0203a0:175_4: devadattassa vacanaṃ gahetvā pitā ghātito”ti sutvā “mama piyamittaṃ ghātetvā esa
atk-s0203a0:175_5: rajjaṃ karissāmīti maññati, mayhaṃ sahāyassa sahāyānaṃ atthikabhāvaṃ jānāpessāmī”ti
atk-s0203a0:175_6: parisati vācaṃ abhāsi. Taṃ sutvā tassa āsaṅkā uppannā. Tena vuttaṃ “rañño pajjotassa
atk-s0203a0:176_0: Upasaṅkamīti mayaṃ dhammavinayasaṅgītiṃ kāressāmāti vicarāma, ayañca mahesakkho rājavallabho
atk-s0203a0:176_1: saṅgahe kate veḷuvanassa ārakkhaṃ kareyyāti maññamāno upasaṅkami. Tehi dhammehīti
atk-s0203a0:176_2: tehi sabbaññutaññāṇadhammehi. Sabbena sabbanti sabbākārena sabbaṃ. Sabbathā sabbanti
atk-s0203a0:176_3: sabbakoṭṭhāsehi sabbaṃ. Kiṃ pucchāmīti pucchati? Cha hi satthāro paṭhamataraṃ appaññātakulehi
atk-s0203a0:176_4: nikkhamitvā pabbajitā, te tathāgate dharamāneyeva kālaṃkatā, sāvakāpi nesaṃ appaññātakuleheva
atk-s0203a0:176_5: pabbajitā. Te tesaṃ accayena mahāvivādaṃ akaṃsu. Samaṇo pana gotamo mahākulā pabbajito,
atk-s0203a0:176_6: tassa accayena sāvakānaṃ mahāvivādo bhavissatīti ayaṃ kathā sakalajambudīpaṃ pattharamānā
atk-s0203a0:176_7: udapādi. Sammāsambuddhe ca dharante bhikkhūnaṃ vivādo nāhosi. Yopi ahosi, sopi tattheva
atk-s0203a0:176_9: apavāhituṃ samatthassa vātassa purato purāṇapaṇṇaṃ kiṃ ṭhassati, dasa pāramiyo pūretvā
atk-s0203a0:176_10: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ pattassa satthu alajjamāno maccurājā kassa lajjissatī”ti mahāsaṃvegaṃ
atk-s0203a0:176_11: janetvā bhiyyosomattāya bhikkhū samaggā jātā ativiya upasantupasantā, kiṃ nu kho
atk-s0203a0:176_12: etanti idaṃ pucchāmīti pucchati. Anusaññāyamānoti anusañjāyamāno, katākataṃ janantoti
atk-s0203a0:177_0: 80. Atthi nu khoti ayampi heṭṭhimapucchameva pucchati. Appaṭisaraṇeti appaṭisaraṇe
atk-s0203a0:177_1: dhammavinaye. Ko hetu sāmaggiyāti tumhākaṃ samaggabhāvassa ko hetu ko paccayo. Dhammappaṭisaraṇāti
atk-s0203a0:177_2: dhammo amhākaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ, dhammo avassayoti dīpeti.
atk-s0203a0:178_0: 81. Pavattatīti paguṇaṃ hutvā āgacchati. Āpatti hoti vītikkamoti ubhayametaṃ buddhassa
atk-s0203a0:178_1: āṇātikkamanameva. Yathādhammaṃ yathānusiṭṭhaṃ kāremāti yathā dhammo ca anusiṭṭhi
atk-s0203a0:179: Na kira no bhavanto kārenti dhammo no kāretīti padadvayepi no kāro nipātamattaṃ. Evaṃ sante na kira bhavanto kārenti, dhammova kāretīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0203a0:180_0: 83. Tagghāti ekaṃse nipāto. Kahaṃ pana bhavaṃ ānandoti kiṃ therassa veḷuvane vasanabhāvaṃ
atk-s0203a0:180_1: na jānātīti? Jānāti. Veḷuvanassa pana anena ārakkhā dinnā, tasmā attānaṃ ukkaṃsāpetukāmo
atk-s0203a0:180_2: pucchati. Kasmā pana tena tattha ārakkhā dinnā? So kira ekadivasaṃ mahākaccāyanattheraṃ
atk-s0203a0:180_3: gijjhakūṭā otarantaṃ disvā – “makkaṭo viya eso”ti āha. Bhagavā taṃ kathaṃ sutvā –
atk-s0203a0:180_4: “sace khamāpeti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce khamāpeti, imasmiṃ veḷuvane gonaṅgalamakkaṭo
atk-s0203a0:180_5: bhavissatī”ti āha. So taṃ kathaṃ sutvā – “samaṇassa gotamassa kathāya dvedhābhāvo
atk-s0203a0:180_6: nāma natthi, pacchā me makkaṭabhūtakāle gocaraṭṭhānaṃ bhavissatī”ti veḷuvane nānāvidhe
atk-s0203a0:180_7: rukkhe ropetvā ārakkhaṃ adāsi. Aparabhāge kālaṃ katvā makkaṭo hutvā nibbatti. “Vassakārā”ti
atk-s0203a0:180_8: vutte āgantvā samīpe aṭṭhāsi. Tagghāti sabbavāresu ekaṃsavacaneyeva nipāto. Taggha,
atk-s0203a0:180_9: bho ānandāti evaṃ therena parisamajjhe attano ukkaṃsitabhāvaṃ ñatvā ahampi theraṃ
atk-s0203a0:181_0: 84. Na ca kho, brāhmaṇāti thero kira cintesi “sammāsambuddhena vaṇṇitajjhānampi atthi,
atk-s0203a0:181_1: avaṇṇitajjhānampi atthi, ayaṃ pana brāhmaṇo sabbameva vaṇṇetīti pañhaṃ visaṃvādeti,
atk-s0203a0:181_2: na kho pana sakkā imassa mukhaṃ ulloketuṃ na piṇḍapātaṃ rakkhituṃ, pañhaṃ ujuṃ katvā
atk-s0203a0:181_3: kathessāmī”ti idaṃ vattuṃ āraddhaṃ. Antaraṃ karitvāti abbhantaraṃ karitvā. Evarūpaṃ
atk-s0203a0:181_4: kho, brāhmaṇa, so bhagavā jhānaṃ vaṇṇesīti idha sabbasaṅgāhakajjhānaṃ nāma kathitaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:182_0: Yaṃ no mayanti ayaṃ kira brāhmaṇo vassakārabrāhmaṇaṃ usūyati, tena pucchitapañhassa
atk-s0203a0:182_1: akathanaṃ paccāsīsamāno kathitabhāvaṃ ñatvā “vassakārena pucchitaṃ pañhaṃ punappunaṃ
atk-s0203a0:182_2: tassa nāmaṃ gaṇhanto vitthāretvā kathesi, mayā pucchitapañhaṃ pana yaṭṭhikoṭiyā uppīḷento
atk-s0203a0:182_3: viya ekadesameva kathesī”ti anattamano ahosi, tasmā evamāha. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:186_0: 85. Evaṃ me sutanti mahāpuṇṇamasuttaṃ. Tattha tadahūti tasmiṃ ahu, tasmiṃ divaseti
atk-s0203a0:186_1: attho. Upavasanti etthāti uposatho. Upavasantīti sīlena vā anasanena vā upetā hutvā
atk-s0203a0:186_2: vasantīti attho. Ayaṃ panettha atthuddhāro – “āyāma, āvuso, kappina, uposathaṃ gamissāmā”tiādīsu
atk-s0203a0:186_3: hi pātimokkhuddeso uposatho. “Aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato kho visākhe uposatho upavuttho”tiādīsu
atk-s0203a0:186_4: sīlaṃ. “Suddhassa ve sadā phaggu, suddhassuposatho sadā”tiādīsu upavāso. “Uposatho
atk-s0203a0:186_5: nāma nāgarājā”tiādīsu paññatti. “Na, bhikkhave, tadahuposathe sabhikkhukā āvāsā”tiādīsu
atk-s0203a0:186_6: upavasitabbadivaso. Idhāpi soyeva adhippeto. So panesa aṭṭhamīcātuddasīpannarasībhedena
atk-s0203a0:186_7: tividho. Tasmā sesadvayanivāraṇatthaṃ pannaraseti vuttaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “upavasanti
atk-s0203a0:186_8: etthāti uposatho”ti. Māsapuṇṇatāya puṇṇā saṃpuṇṇāti puṇṇā. Mā-iti cando vuccati,
atk-s0203a0:186_9: so ettha puṇṇoti puṇṇamā. Evaṃ puṇṇāya puṇṇamāyāti imasmiṃ padadvaye attho veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:187_0: Desanti kāraṇaṃ. Tena hi tvaṃ bhikkhu sake āsane nisīditvā pucchāti kasmā bhagavā
atk-s0203a0:187_1: ṭhitassa akathetvā nisīdāpesīti. Ayaṃ kira bhikkhu saṭṭhimattānaṃ padhāniyabhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:187_2: saṅghatthero saṭṭhi bhikkhū gahetvā araññe vasati, te tassa santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:187_3: gahetvā ghaṭenti vāyamanti. Mahābhūtāni pariggaṇhanti upādārūpāni, nāmarūpapaccayalakkhaṇārammaṇikavipassanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:187_4: pariggaṇhanti. Atha ne ācariyupaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā vanditvā nisinne thero mahābhūtapariggahādīni
atk-s0203a0:187_5: pucchati. Te sabbaṃ kathenti, maggaphalapañhaṃ pucchitā pana kathetuṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0203a0:187_6: Atha thero cintesi – “mama santike etesaṃ ovādassa parihāni natthi, ime ca āraddhavīriyā
atk-s0203a0:187_7: viharanti. Kukkuṭassa pānīyapivanakālamattampi nesaṃ pamādakiriyā natthi. Evaṃ santepi
atk-s0203a0:187_8: maggaphalāni nibbattetuṃ na sakkonti. Ahaṃ imesaṃ ajjhāsayaṃ na jānāmi, buddhaveneyyā
atk-s0203a0:187_9: ete bhavissanti, gahetvā ne satthu santikaṃ gacchāmi, atha nesaṃ satthā cariyavasena
atk-s0203a0:187_10: dhammaṃ desessatī”ti, te bhikkhū gahetvā satthu santikaṃ āgato.
atk-s0203a0:188: Satthāpi sāyanhasamaye ānandattherena upanītaṃ udakaṃ ādāya sarīraṃ utuṃ gaṇhāpetvā migāramātupāsādapariveṇe paññattavarabuddhāsane nisīdi, bhikkhusaṅghopi naṃ parivāretvā nisīdi.
atk-s0203a0:189_0: Tasmiṃ samaye sūriyo atthaṅgameti, cando uggacchati, majjhaṭṭhāne ca bhagavā nisinno.
atk-s0203a0:189_1: Candassa pabhā natthi, sūriyassa pabhā natthi, candimasūriyānaṃ pabhaṃ makkhetvā
atk-s0203a0:189_2: chabbaṇṇā yamakabuddharasmiyo vijjotamānā puñjā puñjā hutvā disāvidisāsu dhāvantīti
atk-s0203a0:189_3: sabbaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayena vitthāretabbaṃ. Vaṇṇabhūmi nāmesā, dhammakathikassevettha
atk-s0203a0:189_4: thāmo pamāṇaṃ, yattakaṃ sakkoti, tattakaṃ kathetabbaṃ. Dukkathitanti na vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:189_5: Evaṃ sannisinnāya parisāya thero uṭṭhahitvā satthāraṃ pañhassa okāsaṃ kāresi. Tato
atk-s0203a0:189_6: bhagavā – “sace imasmiṃ ṭhitake pucchante ‘ācariyo no uṭṭhito’ti sesabhikkhū uṭṭhahissanti,
atk-s0203a0:189_7: evaṃ tathāgate agāravo kato bhavissati. Atha nisinnāva pucchissanti, ācariye agāravo
atk-s0203a0:189_8: kato bhavissati, ekaggā hutvā dhammadesanaṃ paṭicchituṃ na sakkuṇissanti. Ācariye
atk-s0203a0:189_9: pana nisinne tepi nisīdissanti. Tato ekaggā dhammadesanaṃ paṭicchituṃ sakkuṇissantī”ti
atk-s0203a0:189_10: iminā kāraṇena bhagavā ṭhitassa akathetvā nisīdāpetīti.
atk-s0203a0:190_0: Ime nu kho, bhanteti vimatipucchā viya kathitā. Thero pana pañcakkhandhānaṃ udayabbayaṃ
atk-s0203a0:190_1: pariggaṇhitvā arahattaṃ patto mahākhīṇāsavo, natthi etassa vimati. Jānantenapi pana
atk-s0203a0:190_2: ajānantena viya hutvā pucchituṃ vaṭṭati. Sace hi jānanto viya pucchati, “jānāti aya”nti
atk-s0203a0:190_3: tassa tassa vissajjento ekadesameva katheti. Ajānantena viya pucchite pana kathento
atk-s0203a0:190_4: ito ca etto ca kāraṇaṃ āharitvā pākaṭaṃ katvā katheti. Koci pana ajānantopi jānanto
atk-s0203a0:190_5: viya pucchati. Thero evarūpaṃ vacanaṃ kiṃ karissati, jānantoyeva pana ajānanto viya
atk-s0203a0:191_0: Chandamūlakāti taṇhāmūlakā. Evaṃrūpo siyanti sace odāto hotukāmo, haritālavaṇṇo vā
atk-s0203a0:191_1: manosilāvaṇṇo vā siyanti pattheti. Sace kāḷo hotukāmo, nīluppalavaṇṇo vā añjanavaṇṇo
atk-s0203a0:191_2: vā atasīpupphavaṇṇo vā siyanti pattheti. Evaṃvedanoti kusalavedano vā sukhavedano
atk-s0203a0:191_3: vā siyanti pattheti. Saññādīsupi eseva nayo. Yasmā pana atīte patthanā nāma natthi,
atk-s0203a0:191_4: patthentenāpi ca na sakkā taṃ laddhuṃ, paccuppannepi na hoti, na hi odāto kāḷabhāvaṃ
atk-s0203a0:191_5: patthetvā paccuppanne kāḷo hoti, na kāḷo vā odāto, dīgho vā rasso, rasso vā dīgho,
atk-s0203a0:191_6: dānaṃ pana datvā sīlaṃ vā samādiyitvā “anāgate khattiyo vā homi brāhmaṇo vā”ti patthentassa
atk-s0203a0:192: Khandhādhivacananti khandhānaṃ khandhapaṇṇatti kittakena hotīti pucchati.
atk-s0203a0:193_0: Mahābhūtā hetūti “tayo kusalahetū”tiādīsu hi hetuhetu vutto. Avijjā puññābhisaṅkhārādīnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:193_1: sādhāraṇattā sādhāraṇahetu. Kusalākusalaṃ attano attano vipākadāne uttamahetu. Idha
atk-s0203a0:193_2: paccayahetu adhippeto. Tattha pathavīdhātu mahābhūtaṃ itaresaṃ tiṇṇaṃ bhūtānaṃ upādārūpassa
atk-s0203a0:193_3: ca paññāpanāya dassanatthāya hetu ceva paccayo ca. Evaṃ sesesupi yojanā veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:194_0: Phassoti “phuṭṭho, bhikkhave, vedeti, phuṭṭho sañjānāti, phuṭṭho cetetī”ti vacanato
atk-s0203a0:194_1: phasso tiṇṇaṃ khandhānaṃ paññāpanāya hetu ceva paccayo ca. Viññāṇakkhandhassāti ettha
atk-s0203a0:194_2: paṭisandhiviññāṇena tāva saddhiṃ gabbhaseyyakānaṃ uparimaparicchedena samatiṃsa rūpāni
atk-s0203a0:194_3: sampayuttā ca tayo khandhā uppajjanti, taṃ nāmarūpaṃ paṭisandhiviññāṇassa paññāpanāya
atk-s0203a0:194_4: hetu ceva paccayo ca. Cakkhudvāre cakkhupasādo ceva rūpārammaṇañca rūpaṃ, sampayuttā
atk-s0203a0:194_5: tayo khandhā nāmaṃ. Taṃ nāmarūpaṃ cakkhuviññāṇassa paññāpanāya hetu ceva paccayo
atk-s0203a0:195: 87. Kathaṃ pana, bhanteti idaṃ kittakena nu khoti vaṭṭaṃ pucchanto evamāha. Sakkāyadiṭṭhi na hotīti idaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ pucchanto evamāha.
atk-s0203a0:196_0: 88. Ayaṃ rūpe assādoti iminā pariññāpaṭivedho ceva dukkhasaccañca kathitaṃ. Ayaṃ
atk-s0203a0:196_1: rūpe ādīnavoti iminā pahānapaṭivedho ceva samudayasaccañca. Idaṃ rūpe nissaraṇanti
atk-s0203a0:196_2: iminā sacchikiriyāpaṭivedho ceva nirodhasaccañca. Ye imesu tīsu ṭhānesu sammādiṭṭhiādayo
atk-s0203a0:196_3: dhammā, ayaṃ bhāvanāpaṭivedho maggasaccaṃ. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0203a0:197_0: 89. Bahiddhāti parassa saviññāṇake kāye. Sabbanimittesūti iminā pana anindriyabaddhampi
atk-s0203a0:197_1: saṅgaṇhāti. “Saviññāṇake kāye”ti vacanena vā attano ca parassa ca kāyo gahitova,
atk-s0203a0:198_0: 90. Anattakatānīti anattani ṭhatvā katāni. Kamattānaṃ phusissantīti katarasmiṃ attani
atk-s0203a0:198_1: ṭhatvā vipākaṃ dassentīti sassatadassanaṃ okkamanto evamāha. Taṇhādhipateyyenāti
atk-s0203a0:198_2: taṇhājeṭṭhakena. Tatra tatrāti tesu tesu dhammesu. Saṭṭhimattānanti ime bhikkhū pakatikammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:198_3: jahitvā aññaṃ navakammaṭṭhānaṃ sammasantā pallaṅkaṃ abhinditvā tasmiṃyeva āsane arahattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:202_0: 91. Evaṃ me sutanti cūḷapuṇṇamasuttaṃ. Tattha tuṇhībhūtaṃ tuṇhībhūtanti yaṃ yaṃ disaṃ
atk-s0203a0:202_1: anuviloketi, tattha tattha tuṇhībhūtameva. Anuviloketvāti pañcapasādapaṭimaṇḍitāni
atk-s0203a0:202_2: akkhīni ummīletvā tato tato viloketvā antamaso hatthakukkuccapādakukkuccānampi abhāvaṃ
atk-s0203a0:202_3: disvā. Asappurisoti pāpapuriso. No hetaṃ, bhanteti yasmā andho andhaṃ viya so taṃ
atk-s0203a0:202_4: jānituṃ na sakkoti, tasmā evamāhaṃsu. Eteneva nayena ito paresupi vāresu attho veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:202_7: mantetā. Asappurisavācoti asappurisavācaṃ bhāsitā. Asappurisakammantoti asappurisakammānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:202_8: kattā. Asappurisadiṭṭhīti asappurisadiṭṭhiyā samannāgato. Asappurisadānanti asappurisehi
atk-s0203a0:202_9: dātabbaṃ dānaṃ. Tyāssa mittāti te assa mittā. Attabyābādhāyapi cetetīti pāṇaṃ hanissāmi,
atk-s0203a0:202_10: adinnaṃ ādiyissāmi, micchā carissāmi, dasa akusalakammapathe samādāya vattissāmīti
atk-s0203a0:202_11: evaṃ attano dukkhatthāya cinteti. Parabyābādhāyāti yathā asuko asukaṃ pāṇaṃ hanti,
atk-s0203a0:202_12: asukassa santakaṃ adinnaṃ ādiyati, dasa akusalakammapathe samādāya vattati, evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:202_13: naṃ āṇāpessāmīti evaṃ parassa dukkhatthāya cinteti. Ubhayabyābādhāyāti ahaṃ asukañca
atk-s0203a0:202_14: asukañca gahetvā dasa akusalakammapathe samādāya vattissāmīti evaṃ ubhayadukkhatthāya cintetīti.
atk-s0203a0:203_0: Attabyābādhāyapi mantetītiādīsu ahaṃ dasa akusalakammapathe samādāya vattissāmīti
atk-s0203a0:203_1: mantento attabyābādhāya manteti nāma. Asukaṃ dasa akusalakammapathe samādapessāmīti
atk-s0203a0:203_2: mantento parabyābādhāya manteti nāma. Aññena saddhiṃ – “mayaṃ ubhopi ekato hutvā
atk-s0203a0:203_3: dasa akusalakammapathe samādāya vattissāmā”ti mantento ubhayabyābādhāya manteti nāma.
atk-s0203a0:204_0: Asakkaccaṃ dānaṃ detīti deyyadhammampi puggalampi na sakkaroti. Deyyadhammaṃ na sakkaroti
atk-s0203a0:204_1: nāma uttaṇḍulādidosasamannāgataṃ āhāraṃ deti, na pasannaṃ karoti. Puggalaṃ na sakkaroti
atk-s0203a0:204_2: nāma nisīdanaṭṭhānaṃ asammajjitvā yattha vā tattha vā nisīdāpetvā yaṃ vā taṃ vā ādhārakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:204_3: ṭhapetvā dānaṃ deti. Asahatthāti attano hatthena, na deti, dāsakammakārādīhi dāpeti.
atk-s0203a0:204_4: Acittikatvāti heṭṭhā vuttanayena deyyadhammepi puggalepi na cittīkāraṃ katvā deti.
atk-s0203a0:204_5: Apaviddhanti chaḍḍetukāmo hutvā vammike uragaṃ pakkhipanto viya deti. Anāgamanadiṭṭhikoti
atk-s0203a0:205_0: Tattha upapajjatīti na dānaṃ datvā niraye upapajjati. Yaṃ pana tena pāpaladdhikāya
atk-s0203a0:205_1: micchādassanaṃ gahitaṃ, tāya micchādiṭṭhiyā niraye upapajjati. Sukkapakkho vuttapaṭipakkhanayena
atk-s0203a0:205_2: veditabbo. Devamahattatāti chakāmāvacaradevā. Manussamahattatāti tiṇṇaṃ kulānaṃ sampatti.
atk-s0203a0:205_3: Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānameva. Idaṃ pana suttaṃ suddhavaṭṭavaseneva kathitanti.
atk-s0203a0:210_0: 93. Evaṃ me sutanti anupadasuttaṃ. Tattha etadavocāti etaṃ “paṇḍito”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0203a0:210_1: dhammasenāpatisāriputtattherassa guṇakathaṃ avoca. Kasmā? Avasesattheresu hi mahāmoggallānattherassa
atk-s0203a0:210_2: iddhimāti guṇo pākaṭo, mahākassapassa dhutavādoti, anuruddhattherassa dibbacakkhukoti,
atk-s0203a0:210_3: upālittherassa vinayadharoti, revatattherassa jhāyī jhānābhiratoti, ānandattherassa
atk-s0203a0:210_4: bahussutoti. Evaṃ tesaṃ tesaṃ therānaṃ te te guṇā pākaṭā, sāriputtattherassa pana
atk-s0203a0:210_5: apākaṭā. Kasmā? Paññavato hi guṇā na sakkā akathitā jānituṃ. Iti bhagavā “sāriputtassa
atk-s0203a0:210_6: guṇe kathessāmī”ti sabhāgaparisāya sannipātaṃ āgamesi. Visabhāgapuggalānañhi santike
atk-s0203a0:210_7: vaṇṇaṃ kathetuṃ na vaṭṭati, te vaṇṇe kathiyamāne avaṇṇameva kathenti. Imasmiṃ pana
atk-s0203a0:210_8: divase therassa sabhāgaparisā sannipati, tassā sannipatitabhāvaṃ disvā satthā vaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:211: Tattha paṇḍitoti dhātukusalatā āyatanakusalatā paṭiccasamuppādakusalatā ṭhānāṭṭhānakusalatāti imehi catūhi kāraṇehi paṇḍito. Mahāpaññotiādīsu mahāpaññādīhi samannāgatoti attho.
atk-s0203a0:212_0: Tatridaṃ mahāpaññādīnaṃ nānattaṃ – tattha katamā mahāpaññā? Mahante sīlakkhandhe
atk-s0203a0:212_1: pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā, mahante samādhikkhandhe, paññākkhandhe, vimuttikkhandhe,
atk-s0203a0:212_2: vimuttiñāṇadassanakkhandhe pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā, mahantāni ṭhānāṭṭhānāni, mahantā
atk-s0203a0:212_3: vihārasamāpattiyo, mahantāni ariyasaccāni, mahante satipaṭṭhāne, sammappadhāne, iddhipāde,
atk-s0203a0:212_4: mahantāni indriyāni, balāni, bojjhaṅgāni, mahante ariyamagge, mahantāni sāmaññaphalāni,
atk-s0203a0:212_5: mahantā abhiññāyo, mahantaṃ paramatthaṃ nibbānaṃ pariggaṇhātīti mahāpaññā.
atk-s0203a0:213_0: Katamā puthupaññā, puthu nānākhandhesu ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā. Puthu nānādhātūsu,
atk-s0203a0:213_1: puthu nānāāyatanesu, puthu nānāatthesu, puthu nānāpaṭiccasamuppādesu, puthu nānāsuññatamanupalabbhesu,
atk-s0203a0:213_2: puthu nānāatthesu, dhammesu, niruttīsu, paṭibhānesu, puthu nānāsīlakkhandhesu, puthu
atk-s0203a0:213_4: puthu nānāvihārasamāpattīsu, puthu nānāariyasaccesu, puthu nānāsatipaṭṭhānesu, sammappadhānesu,
atk-s0203a0:213_5: iddhipādesu, indriyesu, balesu, bojjhaṅgesu, puthu nānāariyamaggesu, sāmaññaphalesu,
atk-s0203a0:213_6: abhiññāsu, puthu nānājanasādhāraṇe dhamme samatikkamma paramatthe nibbāne ñāṇaṃ pavattatīti puthupaññā.
atk-s0203a0:214_0: Katamā hāsapaññā, idhekacco hāsabahulo vedabahulo tuṭṭhibahulo pāmojjabahulo sīlaṃ
atk-s0203a0:214_1: paripūreti, indriyasaṃvaraṃ paripūreti, bhojane mattaññutaṃ, jāgariyānuyogaṃ, sīlakkhandhaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:214_3: hāsapaññā. Hāsabahulo pāmojjabahulo ṭhānāṭṭhānaṃ paṭivijjhati, hāsabahulo vihārasamāpattiyo
atk-s0203a0:214_4: paripūretīti hāsapaññā, hāsabahulo ariyasaccāni paṭivijjhati. Satipaṭṭhāne, sammappadhāne,
atk-s0203a0:214_5: iddhipāde, indriyāni, balāni, bojjhaṅgāni, ariyamaggaṃ bhāvetīti hāsapaññā, hāsabahulo
atk-s0203a0:214_6: sāmaññaphalāni sacchikaroti, abhiññāyo paṭivijjhatīti hāsapaññā, hāsabahulo vedatuṭṭhipāmojjabahulo
atk-s0203a0:215_0: Katamā javanapaññā, yaṃkiñci rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ…pe… yaṃ dūre santike vā,
atk-s0203a0:215_1: sabbaṃ rūpaṃ aniccato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. Dukkhato khippaṃ… anattato khippaṃ
atk-s0203a0:215_2: javatīti javanapaññā. Yā kāci vedanā…pe… yaṃkiñci viññāṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ…pe…
atk-s0203a0:215_3: sabbaṃ viññāṇaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā. Cakkhu…pe…
atk-s0203a0:215_4: jarāmaraṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccato dukkhato anattato khippaṃ javatīti javanapaññā.
atk-s0203a0:215_5: Rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena, dukkhaṃ bhayaṭṭhena, anattā asārakaṭṭhenāti
atk-s0203a0:215_6: tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā rūpanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti
atk-s0203a0:215_7: javanapaññā. Vedanā, saññā, saṅkhārā, viññāṇaṃ, cakkhu…pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ
atk-s0203a0:215_8: aniccaṃ khayaṭṭhena…pe… vibhūtaṃ katvā jarāmaraṇanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ javatīti
atk-s0203a0:215_9: javanapaññā. Rūpaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ…pe… viññāṇaṃ. Cakkhu…pe… jarāmaraṇaṃ atītānāgatapaccuppannaṃ
atk-s0203a0:215_10: aniccaṃ saṅkhataṃ paṭiccasamuppannaṃ khayadhammaṃ vayadhammaṃ virāgadhammaṃ nirodhadhammanti
atk-s0203a0:215_11: tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṃ katvā jarāmaraṇanirodhe nibbāne khippaṃ
atk-s0203a0:216_0: Katamā tikkhapaññā, khippaṃ kilese chindatīti tikkhapaññā. Uppannaṃ kāmavitakkaṃ
atk-s0203a0:216_1: nādhivāseti, uppannaṃ byāpādavitakkaṃ, uppannaṃ vihiṃsāvitakkaṃ, uppannuppanne pāpake
atk-s0203a0:216_2: akusale dhamme, uppannaṃ rāgaṃ, dosaṃ, mohaṃ, kodhaṃ, upanāhaṃ, makkhaṃ, paḷāsaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:216_3: issaṃ, macchariyaṃ, māyaṃ, sāṭheyyaṃ, thambhaṃ, sārambhaṃ, mānaṃ, atimānaṃ, madaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:216_4: pamādaṃ, sabbe kilese, sabbe duccarite, sabbe abhisaṅkhāre, sabbe bhavagāmikamme
atk-s0203a0:216_5: nādhivāseti pajahati vinodeti byantīkaroti anabhāvaṃ gametīti tikkhapaññā. Ekasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:216_6: āsane cattāro ariyamaggā, cattāri sāmaññaphalāni, catasso paṭisambhidāyo, cha ca
atk-s0203a0:216_7: abhiññāyo adhigatā honti sacchikatā passitā paññāyāti tikkhapaññā.
atk-s0203a0:217_0: Katamā nibbedhikapaññā, idhekacco sabbasaṅkhāresu ubbegabahulo hoti uttāsabahulo
atk-s0203a0:217_1: ukkaṇṭhanabahulo aratibahulo anabhiratibahulo bahimukho na ramati sabbasaṅkhāresu,
atk-s0203a0:217_2: anibbiddhapubbaṃ appadālitapubbaṃ lobhakkhandhaṃ nibbijjhati padāletīti nibbedhikapaññā.
atk-s0203a0:217_3: Anibbiddhapubbaṃ appadālitapubbaṃ dosakkhandhaṃ, mohakkhandhaṃ, kodhaṃ, upanāhaṃ…pe…
atk-s0203a0:218_0: Anupadadhammavipassananti samāpattivasena vā jhānaṅgavasena vā anupaṭipāṭiyā dhammavipassanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:218_1: vipassati, evaṃ vipassanto addhamāsena arahattaṃ patto. Mahāmoggallānatthero pana
atk-s0203a0:218_2: sattahi divasehi. Evaṃ santepi sāriputtatthero mahāpaññavantataro. Mahāmoggallānatthero
atk-s0203a0:218_3: hi sāvakānaṃ sammasanacāraṃ yaṭṭhikoṭiyā uppīḷento viya ekadesameva sammasanto satta
atk-s0203a0:218_4: divase vāyamitvā arahattaṃ patto. Sāriputtatthero ṭhapetvā buddhānaṃ paccekabuddhānañca
atk-s0203a0:218_5: sammasanacāraṃ sāvakānaṃ sammasanacāraṃ nippadesaṃ sammasi. Evaṃ sammasanto addhamāsaṃ
atk-s0203a0:218_6: vāyami. Arahattañca kira patvā aññāsi – “ṭhapetvā buddhe ca paccekabuddhe ca añño
atk-s0203a0:218_7: sāvako nāma paññāya mayā pattabbaṃ pattuṃ samattho nāma na bhavissatī”ti. Yathā hi
atk-s0203a0:218_8: puriso veḷuyaṭṭhiṃ gaṇhissāmīti mahājaṭaṃ veḷuṃ disvā jaṭaṃ chindantassa papañco
atk-s0203a0:218_9: bhavissatīti antarena hatthaṃ pavesetvā sampattameva yaṭṭhiṃ mūle ca agge ca chinditvā
atk-s0203a0:218_10: ādāya pakkameyya, so kiñcāpi paṭhamataraṃ gacchati, yaṭṭhiṃ pana sāraṃ vā ujuṃ vā
atk-s0203a0:218_11: na labhati. Aparo ca tathārūpameva veṇuṃ disvā “sace sampattaṃ yaṭṭhiṃ gaṇhissāmi,
atk-s0203a0:218_12: sāraṃ vā ujuṃ vā na labhissāmī”ti kacchaṃ bandhitvā mahantena satthena veṇujaṭaṃ
atk-s0203a0:218_13: chinditvā sārā ceva ujū ca yaṭṭhiyo uccinitvā ādāya pakkameyya. Ayaṃ kiñcāpi pacchā
atk-s0203a0:218_14: gacchati, yaṭṭhiyo pana sārā ceva ujū ca labhati. Evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ imesaṃ
atk-s0203a0:219_0: Evaṃ pana addhamāsaṃ vāyamitvā dhammasenāpati sāriputtatthero sūkarakhataleṇadvāre
atk-s0203a0:219_2: bījayamāno ṭhito desanānusārena ñāṇaṃ pesetvā pabbajitadivasato pannarasame divase
atk-s0203a0:219_3: sāvakapāramiñāṇassa matthakaṃ patvā sattasaṭṭhi ñāṇāni paṭivijjhitvā soḷasavidhaṃ paññaṃ anuppatto.
atk-s0203a0:220_0: Tatridaṃ, bhikkhave, sāriputtassa anupadadhammavipassanāyāti yā anupadadhammavipassanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:220_1: vipassatīti anupadadhammavipassanā vuttā, tatra anupadadhammavipassanāya sāriputtassa
atk-s0203a0:220_2: idaṃ hoti. Idāni vattabbaṃ taṃ taṃ vipassanākoṭṭhāsaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:221_0: 94. Paṭhame jhāneti ye paṭhame jhāne antosamāpattiyaṃ dhammā. Tyāssāti te assa. Anupadavavatthitā
atk-s0203a0:221_1: hontīti anupaṭipāṭiyā vavatthitā paricchinnā ñātā viditā honti. Kathaṃ? Thero hi
atk-s0203a0:221_2: te dhamme olokento abhiniropanalakkhaṇo vitakko vattatīti jānāti. Tathā anumajjanalakkhaṇo
atk-s0203a0:221_3: vicāro, pharaṇalakkhaṇā pīti, sātalakkhaṇaṃ sukhaṃ, avikkhepalakkhaṇā cittekaggatā,
atk-s0203a0:221_4: phusanalakkhaṇo phasso vedayitalakkhaṇā vedanā, sañjānanalakkhaṇā saññā, cetayitalakkhaṇā
atk-s0203a0:221_5: cetanā, vijānanalakkhaṇaṃ viññāṇaṃ, kattukamyatālakkhaṇo chando, adhimokkhalakkhaṇo
atk-s0203a0:221_6: adhimokkho, paggāhalakkhaṇaṃ vīriyaṃ upaṭṭhānalakkhaṇā sati, majjhattalakkhaṇā upekkhā,
atk-s0203a0:221_7: anunayamanasikāralakkhaṇo manasikāro vattatīti jānāti. Evaṃ jānaṃ abhiniropanaṭṭhena
atk-s0203a0:221_8: vitakkaṃ sabhāvato vavatthapeti…pe… anunayamanasikāraṇaṭṭhena manasikāraṃ sabhāvabhāvato
atk-s0203a0:221_9: vavatthapeti. Tena vuttaṃ “tyāssa dhammā anupadavavatthitā hontī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:222_0: Viditā uppajjantīti uppajjamānā viditā pākaṭāva hutvā uppajjanti. Viditā upaṭṭhahantīti
atk-s0203a0:222_1: tiṭṭhamānāpi viditā pākaṭāva hutvā tiṭṭhanti. Viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchantīti nirujjhamānāpi
atk-s0203a0:222_2: viditā pākaṭāva hutvā nirujjhanti. Ettha pana taṃñāṇatā ceva ñāṇabahutā ca mocetabbā.
atk-s0203a0:222_3: Yathā hi teneva aṅgulaggena taṃ aṅgulaggaṃ na sakkā phusituṃ, evameva teneva cittena
atk-s0203a0:222_4: tassa cittassa uppādo vā ṭhiti vā bhaṅgo vā na sakkā jānitunti. Evaṃ tāva taṃñāṇatā
atk-s0203a0:222_5: mocetabbā. Yadi pana dve cittāni ekato uppajjeyyuṃ, ekena cittena ekassa uppādo vā
atk-s0203a0:222_6: ṭhiti vā bhaṅgo vā sakkā bhaveyya jānituṃ. Dve pana phassā vā vedanā vā saññā vā
atk-s0203a0:222_7: cetanā vā cittāni vā ekato uppajjanakāni nāma natthi, ekekameva uppajjati. Evaṃ ñāṇabahutā
atk-s0203a0:222_8: mocetabbā. Evaṃ sante kathaṃ? Mahātherassa antosamāpattiyaṃ soḷasa dhammā viditā
atk-s0203a0:222_9: pākaṭā hontīti. Vatthārammaṇānaṃ pariggahitatāya. Therena hi vatthu ceva ārammaṇañca
atk-s0203a0:222_10: pariggahitaṃ, tenassa tesaṃ dhammānaṃ uppādaṃ āvajjantassa uppādo pākaṭo hoti, ṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:222_11: āvajjantassa ṭhānaṃ pākaṭaṃ hoti, bhedaṃ āvajjantassa bhedo pākaṭo hoti. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0203a0:222_12: “viditā uppajjanti viditā upaṭṭhahanti viditā abbhatthaṃ gacchantī”ti. Ahutvā sambhontīti
atk-s0203a0:222_13: iminā udayaṃ passati. Hutvā paṭiventīti iminā vayaṃ passati.
atk-s0203a0:223_0: Anupāyoti rāgavasena anupagamano hutvā. Anapāyoti paṭighavasena anapagato. Anissitoti
atk-s0203a0:223_1: taṇhādiṭṭhinissayehi anissito. Appaṭibaddhoti chandarāgena abaddho. Vippamuttoti
atk-s0203a0:223_2: kāmarāgato vippamutto. Visaṃyuttoti catūhi yogehi sabbakilesehi vā visaṃyutto. Vimariyādīkatenāti
atk-s0203a0:224_0: Tattha dve mariyādā kilesamariyādā ca ārammaṇamariyādā ca. Sace hissa antosamāpattiyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:224_1: pavatte soḷasa dhamme ārabbha rāgādayo uppajjeyyuṃ, kilesamariyādā tena katā bhaveyya,
atk-s0203a0:224_2: tesu panassa ekopi na uppannoti kilesamariyādā natthi. Sace panassa antosamāpattiyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:224_3: pavatte soḷasa dhamme āvajjantassa ekacce āpāthaṃ nāgaccheyyuṃ. Evamassa ārammaṇamariyādā
atk-s0203a0:224_4: bhaveyyuṃ. Te panassa soḷasa dhamme āvajjantassa āpāthaṃ anāgatadhammo nāma natthīti
atk-s0203a0:225_0: Aparāpi dve mariyādā vikkhambhanamariyādā ca samucchedamariyādā ca. Tāsu samucchedamariyādā
atk-s0203a0:225_1: upari āgamissati, imasmiṃ pana ṭhāne vikkhambhanamariyādā adhippetā. Tassa vikkhambhitapaccanīkattā
atk-s0203a0:226_0: Uttari nissaraṇanti ito uttari nissaraṇaṃ. Aññesu ca suttesu “uttari nissaraṇa”nti
atk-s0203a0:226_1: nibbānaṃ vuttaṃ, idha pana anantaro viseso adhippetoti veditabbo. Tabbahulīkārāti
atk-s0203a0:226_2: tassa pajānanassa bahulīkaraṇena. Atthitvevassa hotīti tassa therassa atthītiyeva
atk-s0203a0:226_3: daḷhataraṃ hoti. Iminā nayena sesavāresupi attho veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:227: Dutiyavāre pana sampasādanaṭṭhena sampasādo. Sabhāvato vavatthapeti.
atk-s0203a0:228_0: Catutthavāre upekkhāti sukhaṭṭhāne vedanupekkhāva. Passaddhattā cetaso anābhogoti
atk-s0203a0:228_1: yo so “yadeva tattha sukha”nti cetaso ābhogo, etenetaṃ oḷārikamakkhāyatīti evaṃ passaddhattā
atk-s0203a0:228_2: cetaso anābhogo vutto, tassa abhāvāti attho. Satipārisuddhīti parisuddhāsatiyeva.
atk-s0203a0:229_0: 95. Sato vuṭṭhahatīti satiyā samannāgato ñāṇena sampajāno hutvā vuṭṭhāti. Te dhamme
atk-s0203a0:229_2: hoti, na sāvakānaṃ, tasmā ettha kalāpavipassanaṃ dassento evamāha.
atk-s0203a0:230_0: Paññāya cassa disvā āsavā parikkhīṇā hontīti maggapaññāya cattāri saccāni disvā cattāro
atk-s0203a0:230_1: āsavā khīṇā honti. Sāriputtattherassa samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ āharitvā arahattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:230_2: pattavāropi atthi, nirodhasamāpattisamāpannavāropi. Arahattaṃ pattavāro idha gahito,
atk-s0203a0:230_3: nirodhaṃ pana ciṇṇavasitāya aparāparaṃ samāpajjissatīti vadanti.
atk-s0203a0:231_0: Tatthassa yasmiṃ kāle nirodhasamāpatti sīsaṃ hoti, nirodhassa vāro āgacchati, phalasamāpatti
atk-s0203a0:231_1: gūḷhā hoti. Yasmiṃ kāle phalasamāpatti sīsaṃ hoti, phalasamāpattiyā vāro āgacchati,
atk-s0203a0:231_2: nirodhasamāpatti gūḷhā hoti. Jambudīpavāsino therā pana vadanti “sāriputtatthero
atk-s0203a0:231_3: samathavipassanaṃ yuganaddhaṃ āharitvā anāgāmiphalaṃ sacchikatvā nirodhaṃ samāpajji,
atk-s0203a0:231_4: nirodhā vuṭṭhāya arahattaṃ patto”ti. Te dhammeti antosamāpattiyaṃ pavatte tisamuṭṭhānikarūpadhamme,
atk-s0203a0:231_5: heṭṭhā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyaṃ pavattadhamme vā. Tepi hi imasmiṃ vāre
atk-s0203a0:231_6: vipassitabbadhammāva, tasmā te vā vipassatīti dassetuṃ idaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:232_0: 97. Vasippatoti ciṇṇavasitaṃ patto. Pāramippattoti nipphattiṃ patto. Orasotiādīsu
atk-s0203a0:232_1: thero bhagavato ure nibbattasaddaṃ sutvā jātoti oraso, mukhena pabhāvitaṃ saddaṃ
atk-s0203a0:232_2: sutvā jātoti mukhato jāto, dhammena pana jātattā nimmitattā dhammajo dhammanimmito,
atk-s0203a0:232_3: dhammadāyassa ādiyanato dhammadāyādo, āmisadāyassa anādiyanato no āmisadāyādoti veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:236_0: 98. Evaṃ me sutanti chabbisodhanasuttaṃ. Tattha khīṇā jātītiādīsu ekenāpi padena
atk-s0203a0:236_1: aññā byākatāva hoti, dvīhipi. Idha pana catūhi padehi aññabyākaraṇaṃ āgataṃ. Diṭṭhe
atk-s0203a0:236_2: diṭṭhavāditātiādīsu yāya cetanāya diṭṭhe diṭṭhaṃ meti vadati, sā diṭṭhe diṭṭhavāditā
atk-s0203a0:236_3: nāma. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Ayamanudhammoti ayaṃ sabhāvo. Abhinanditabbanti na
atk-s0203a0:236_4: kevalaṃ abhinanditabbaṃ, parinibbutassa panassa sabbopi khīṇāsavassa sakkāro kātabbo.
atk-s0203a0:236_5: Uttariṃ pañhoti sace panassa veyyākaraṇena asantuṭṭhā hotha, uttarimpi ayaṃ pañho
atk-s0203a0:236_6: pucchitabboti dasseti. Ito paresupi tīsu vāresu ayameva nayo.
atk-s0203a0:237_0: 99. Abalanti dubbalaṃ. Virāgunanti vigacchanasabhāvaṃ. Anassāsikanti assāsavirahitaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:237_1: Upāyūpādānāti taṇhādiṭṭhīnametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Taṇhādiṭṭhiyo hi tebhūmakadhamme upentīti
atk-s0203a0:237_2: upāyā, upādiyantīti upādānā. Cetaso adiṭṭhānābhinivesānusayātipi tāsaṃyeva nāmaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:237_3: Cittañhi taṇhādiṭṭhīhi sakkāyadhammesu tiṭṭhati adhitiṭṭhatīti taṇhādiṭṭhiyo cetaso
atk-s0203a0:237_4: adhiṭṭhānā, tāhi taṃ abhinivisatīti abhinivesā, tāhiyeva taṃ anusetīti anusayāti
atk-s0203a0:237_5: vuccanti. Khayā virāgātiādīsu khayena virāgenāti attho. Sabbāni cetāni aññamaññavevacanāneva.
atk-s0203a0:238_0: 100. Pathavīdhātūti patiṭṭhānadhātu. Āpodhātūti ābandhanadhātu. Tejodhātūti paripācanadhātu.
atk-s0203a0:238_1: Vāyodhātūti vitthambhanadhātu. Ākāsadhātūti asamphuṭṭhadhātu. Viññāṇadhātūti vijānanadhātu.
atk-s0203a0:238_2: Na anattato upagacchinti ahaṃ attāti attakoṭṭhāsena na upagamiṃ. Na ca pathavīdhātunissitanti
atk-s0203a0:238_3: pathavīdhātunissitā sesadhātuyo ca upādārūpañca arūpakkhandhā ca. Tepi hi nissitavatthurūpānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:238_4: pathavīdhātunissitattā ekena pariyāyena pathavīdhātunissitāva. Tasmā “na ca pathavīdhātunissita”nti
atk-s0203a0:238_5: vadanto sesarūpārūpadhammepi attato na upagacchinti vadati. Ākāsadhātunissitapade
atk-s0203a0:238_6: pana avinibbhogavasena sabbampi bhūtupādārūpaṃ ākāsadhātunissitaṃ nāma, tathā taṃnissitarūpavatthukā
atk-s0203a0:238_7: arūpakkhandhā. Evaṃ idhāpi rūpārūpaṃ gahitameva hoti. Viññāṇadhātunissitapade pana
atk-s0203a0:238_8: sahajātā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānarūpañca viññāṇadhātunissitanti rūpārūpaṃ gahitameva hoti.
atk-s0203a0:239_0: 101. Rūpe cakkhuviññāṇe cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbesu dhammesūti ettha yaṃ atīte cakkhudvārassa
atk-s0203a0:239_1: āpāthaṃ āgantvā niruddhaṃ, yañca anāgate āpāthaṃ āgantvā nirujjhissati, yampi etarahi
atk-s0203a0:239_2: āgantvā niruddhaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ rūpaṃ nāma. Yaṃ pana atītepi āpāthaṃ anāgantvā niruddhaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:239_3: anāgatepi anāgantvā nirujjhissati, etarahipi anāgantvā niruddhaṃ, taṃ cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbadhammesu
atk-s0203a0:239_4: saṅgahitanti vutte tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero āha – “imasmiṃ ṭhāne dvidhā karotha, upari
atk-s0203a0:239_5: chandovāre kinti karissatha, nayidaṃ labbhatī”ti. Tasmā tīsu kālesu āpāthaṃ āgataṃ
atk-s0203a0:239_6: vā anāgataṃ vā sabbampi taṃ rūpameva, cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttā pana tayo khandhā cakkhuviññāṇaviññātabbadhammāti
atk-s0203a0:239_7: veditabbā. Ayañhettha attho “cakkhuviññāṇena saddhiṃ viññātabbesu dhammesū”ti. Chandoti
atk-s0203a0:239_8: taṇhāchando. Rāgoti sveva rajjanavasena rāgo. Nandīti sveva abhinandanavasena nandī.
atk-s0203a0:239_9: Taṇhāti sveva taṇhāyanavasena taṇhā. Sesadvāresupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0203a0:240_0: 102. Ahaṅkāramamaṅkāramānānusayāti ettha ahaṅkāro māno, mamaṅkāro taṇhā, sveva mānānusayo.
atk-s0203a0:240_1: Āsavānaṃ khayañāṇāyāti idaṃ pubbenivāsaṃ dibbacakkhuñca avatvā kasmā vuttaṃ? Bhikkhū
atk-s0203a0:240_2: lokiyadhammaṃ na pucchanti, lokuttarameva pucchanti, tasmā pucchitapañhaṃyeva kathento
atk-s0203a0:240_3: evamāha. Ekavissajjitasuttaṃ nāmetaṃ, chabbisodhanantipissa nāmaṃ. Ettha hi cattāro
atk-s0203a0:240_4: vohārā pañca khandhā cha dhātuyo cha ajjhattikabāhirāni āyatanāni attano saviññāṇakakāyo
atk-s0203a0:240_5: paresaṃ saviññāṇakakāyoti ime cha koṭṭhāsā visuddhā, tasmā “chabbisodhaniya”nti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:240_6: Parasamuddavāsittherā pana attano ca parassa ca viññāṇakakāyaṃ ekameva katvā catūhi
atk-s0203a0:241_0: Ime pana cha koṭṭhāsā “kiṃ te adhigataṃ, kinti te adhigataṃ, kadā te adhigataṃ, kattha
atk-s0203a0:241_1: te adhigataṃ, katame te kilesā pahīnā, katamesaṃ tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhī”ti evaṃ vinayaniddesapariyāyena sodhetabbā.
atk-s0203a0:242_0: Ettha hi kiṃ te adhigatanti adhigamapucchā, jhānavimokkhādīsu sotāpattimaggādīsu
atk-s0203a0:242_1: vā kiṃ tayā adhigataṃ. Kinti te adhigatanti upāyapucchā. Ayañhi etthādhippāyo – kiṃ
atk-s0203a0:242_2: tayā aniccalakkhaṇaṃ dhuraṃ katvā adhigataṃ, dukkhānattalakkhaṇesu aññataraṃ vā,
atk-s0203a0:242_3: kiṃ vā samādhivasena abhinivisitvā, udāhu vipassanāvasena, tathā kiṃ rūpe abhinivisitvā,
atk-s0203a0:242_4: udāhu arūpe, kiṃ vā ajjhattaṃ abhinivisitvā, udāhu bahiddhāti. Kadā te adhigatanti
atk-s0203a0:242_5: kālapucchā, pubbaṇhamajjhanhikādīsu katarasmiṃ kāleti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:243_0: Kattha te adhigatanti okāsapucchā, kismiṃ okāse, kiṃ rattiṭṭhāne divāṭṭhāne rukkhamūle
atk-s0203a0:243_1: maṇḍape katarasmiṃ vā vihāreti vuttaṃ hoti. Katame te kilesā pahīnāti pahīnakilese
atk-s0203a0:243_2: pucchati, kataramaggavajjhā tava kilesā pahīnāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:244: Katamesaṃ tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhīti paṭiladdhadhammapucchā, paṭhamamaggādīsu katamesaṃ tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:245_0: Tasmā idāni cepi koci bhikkhu uttarimanussadhammādhigamaṃ byākareyya, na so ettāvatāva
atk-s0203a0:245_1: sakkātabbo. Imesu pana chasu ṭhānesu sodhanatthaṃ vattabbo “kiṃ te adhigataṃ, kiṃ
atk-s0203a0:245_2: jhānaṃ udāhu vimokkhādīsu aññatara”nti? Yo hi yena adhigato dhammo, so tassa pākaṭo
atk-s0203a0:245_3: hoti. Sace “idaṃ nāma me adhigata”nti vadati, tato “kinti te adhigata”nti pucchitabbo.
atk-s0203a0:245_4: Aniccalakkhaṇādīsu kiṃ dhuraṃ katvā, aṭṭhatiṃsāya vā ārammaṇesu rūpārūpaajjhattabahiddhādibhedesu
atk-s0203a0:245_5: vā dhammesu kena mukhena abhinivisitvāti? Yo hi yassābhiniveso, so tassa pākaṭo hoti.
atk-s0203a0:246_0: Sace pana “ayaṃ nāma me abhiniveso, evaṃ mayā adhigata”nti vadati, tato “kadā te
atk-s0203a0:246_1: adhigata”nti pucchitabbo, “kiṃ pubbaṇhe, udāhu majjhanhikādīsu aññatarasmiṃ kāle”ti?
atk-s0203a0:246_2: Sabbesañhi attanā adhigatakālo pākaṭo hoti. Sace “amukasmiṃ nāma me kāle adhigata”nti
atk-s0203a0:246_3: vadati, tato “kattha te adhigata”nti pucchitabbo, “kiṃ divāṭṭhāne, udāhu rattiṭṭhānādīsu
atk-s0203a0:246_4: aññatarasmiṃ okāse”ti? Sabbesañhi attanā adhigatokāso pākaṭo hoti. Sace “amukasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:246_5: nāma me okāse adhigata”nti vadati, tato “katame te kilesā pahīnā”ti pucchitabbo,
atk-s0203a0:246_6: “kiṃ paṭhamamaggavajjhā, udāhu dutiyādimaggavajjhā”ti? Sabbesañhi attanā adhigatamaggena
atk-s0203a0:247_0: Sace “ime nāma me kilesā pahīnā”ti vadati, tato “katamesaṃ tvaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhī”ti
atk-s0203a0:247_1: pucchitabbo, “kiṃ sotāpattimaggassa, udāhu sakadāgāmimaggādīsu aññatarassā”ti? Sabbesañhi
atk-s0203a0:247_2: attanā adhigatadhammo pākaṭo hoti. Sace “imesaṃ nāmāhaṃ dhammānaṃ lābhī”ti vadati,
atk-s0203a0:247_3: ettāvatāpissa vacanaṃ na saddhātabbaṃ. Bahussutā hi uggahaparipucchākusalā bhikkhū
atk-s0203a0:247_4: imāni cha ṭhānāni sodhetuṃ sakkonti. Imassa bhikkhuno āgamanapaṭipadā sodhetabbā,
atk-s0203a0:247_5: yadi āgamanapaṭipadā na sujjhati, “imāya paṭipadāya lokuttaradhammā nāma na labbhantī”ti apanetabbo.
atk-s0203a0:248_0: Yadi panassa āgamanapaṭipadā sujjhati, “dīgharattaṃ tīsu sikkhāsu appamatto jāgariyamanuyutto
atk-s0203a0:248_1: catūsu paccayesu alaggo ākāse pāṇisamena cetasā viharatī”ti paññāyati, tassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0203a0:248_2: byākaraṇaṃ paṭipadāya saddhiṃ saṃsandati sameti. “Seyyathāpi nāma gaṅgodakaṃ yamunodakena
atk-s0203a0:248_3: saddhiṃ saṃsandati sameti, evameva supaññattā tena bhagavatā sāvakānaṃ nibbānagāminī
atk-s0203a0:248_4: paṭipadā saṃsandati sameti nibbānañca paṭipadā cā”ti vuttasadisaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:249_0: Apica kho ettakenāpi sakkāro na kātabbo. Kasmā? Ekaccassa hi puthujjanassāpi sato
atk-s0203a0:249_1: khīṇāsavapaṭipattisadisā paṭipadā hoti. Tasmā so bhikkhu tehi tehi upāyehi uttāsetabbo.
atk-s0203a0:249_2: Khīṇāsavassa nāma asaniyāpi matthake patamānāya bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso
atk-s0203a0:249_3: vā na hoti, puthujjanassa appamattakenāpi hoti.
atk-s0203a0:250_0: Tatrimāni vatthūni – dīghabhāṇakaabhayatthero kira ekaṃ piṇḍapātikaṃ pariggahetuṃ
atk-s0203a0:250_1: asakkonto daharassa saññaṃ adāsi. So taṃ nhāyamānaṃ kalyāṇīnadīmukhadvāre nimujjitvā
atk-s0203a0:250_2: pāde aggahesi. Piṇḍapātiko kumbhīloti saññāya mahāsaddamakāsi, tadā naṃ puthujjanoti
atk-s0203a0:250_3: sañjāniṃsu. Candamukhatissarājakāle pana mahāvihāre saṅghatthero khīṇāsavo dubbalacakkhuko
atk-s0203a0:250_4: vihāreyeva acchi. Rājā theraṃ pariggaṇhissāmīti bhikkhūsu bhikkhācāraṃ gatesu appasaddo
atk-s0203a0:250_5: upasaṅkamitvā sappo viya pāde aggahesi. Thero silāthambho viya niccalo hutvā ko etthāti
atk-s0203a0:250_6: āha? Ahaṃ, bhante, tissoti. Sugandhaṃ vāyasi no tissāti? Evaṃ khīṇāsavassa bhayaṃ nāma natthīti.
atk-s0203a0:251_0: Ekacco pana puthujjanopi atisūro hoti nibbhayo. So rañjanīyena ārammaṇena pariggaṇhitabbo.
atk-s0203a0:251_1: Vasabharājāpi hi ekaṃ theraṃ pariggaṇhamāno ghare nisīdāpetvā tassa santike badarasāḷavaṃ
atk-s0203a0:251_2: maddamāno nisīdi. Mahātherassa kheḷo cali, tato therassa puthujjanabhāvo āvibhūto.
atk-s0203a0:251_3: Khīṇāsavassa hi rasataṇhā nāma suppahīnā, dibbesupi rasesu nikanti nāma na hoti.
atk-s0203a0:251_4: Tasmā imehi upāyehi pariggahetvā sacassa bhayaṃ vā chambhitattaṃ vā lomahaṃso vā
atk-s0203a0:251_5: rasataṇhā vā uppajjati, na tvaṃ arahāti apanetabbo. Sace pana abhīrū acchambhī anutrāsī
atk-s0203a0:251_6: hutvā sīho viya nisīdati, dibbārammaṇepi nikantiṃ na janeti. Ayaṃ bhikkhu sampannaveyyākaraṇo
atk-s0203a0:255_0: 105. Evaṃ me sutanti sappurisadhammasuttaṃ. Tattha sappurisadhammanti sappurisānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:255_1: dhammaṃ. Asappurisadhammanti pāpapurisānaṃ dhammaṃ. Evaṃ mātikaṃ ṭhapetvāpi puna
atk-s0203a0:255_2: yathā nāma maggakusalo puriso vāmaṃ muñcitvā dakkhiṇaṃ gaṇhāti. Paṭhamaṃ muñcitabbaṃ
atk-s0203a0:255_3: katheti, evaṃ pahātabbaṃ dhammaṃ paṭhamaṃ desento katamo ca, bhikkhave, asappurisadhammotiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:255_4: Tattha uccākulāti khattiyakulā vā brāhmaṇakulā vā. Etadeva hi kuladvayaṃ “uccākula”nti
atk-s0203a0:255_5: vuccati. So tattha pujjoti so bhikkhu tesu bhikkhūsu pūjāraho. Antaraṃ karitvāti abbhantaraṃ katvā.
atk-s0203a0:256_0: Mahākulāti khattiyakulā vā brāhmaṇakulā vā vessakulā vā. Idameva hi kulattayaṃ “mahākula”nti
atk-s0203a0:256_1: vuccati. Mahābhogakulāti mahantehi bhogehi samannāgatā kulā. Uḷārabhogakulāti uḷārehi
atk-s0203a0:256_2: paṇītehi bhogehi sampannakulā. Imasmiṃ padadvaye cattāripi kulāni labbhanti. Yattha
atk-s0203a0:256_3: katthaci kule jāto hi puññabalehi mahābhogopi uḷārabhogopi hotiyeva.
atk-s0203a0:257: 106. Yasassīti parivārasampanno. Appaññātāti rattiṃ khittasarā viya saṅghamajjhādīsu na paññāyanti. Appesakkhāti appaparivārā.
atk-s0203a0:258_0: 107. Āraññikoti samādinnaāraññikadhutaṅgo. Sesadhutaṅgesupi eseva nayo. Imasmiñca
atk-s0203a0:258_1: sutte pāḷiyaṃ naveva dhutaṅgāni āgatāni, vitthārena panetāni terasa honti. Tesu yaṃ
atk-s0203a0:258_2: vattabbaṃ, taṃ sabbaṃ sabbākārena visuddhimagge dhutaṅganiddese vuttameva.
atk-s0203a0:259: 108. Atammayatāti tammayatā vuccati taṇhā, nittaṇhāti attho. Atammayataññeva antaraṃ karitvāti nittaṇhataṃyeva kāraṇaṃ katvā abbhantaraṃ vā katvā, citte uppādetvāti attho.
atk-s0203a0:260_0: Nirodhavāre yasmā anāgāmikhīṇāsavāva taṃ samāpattiṃ samāpajjanti, puthujjanassa sā
atk-s0203a0:260_1: natthi, tasmā asappurisavāro parihīno. Na kañci maññatīti kañci puggalaṃ tīhi maññanāhi
atk-s0203a0:260_2: na maññati. Na kuhiñci maññatīti kismiñci okāse na maññati. Na kenaci maññatīti kenaci
atk-s0203a0:260_3: vatthunāpi taṃ puggalaṃ na maññati. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:264_0: 109. Evaṃ me sutanti sevitabbāsevitabbasuttaṃ. Tattha tañca aññamaññaṃ kāyasamācāranti
atk-s0203a0:264_1: aññaṃ sevitabbaṃ kāyasamācāraṃ, aññaṃ asevitabbaṃ vadāmi, sevitabbameva kenaci pariyāyena
atk-s0203a0:264_2: asevitabbanti, asevitabbaṃ vā sevitabbanti ca na vadāmīti attho. Vacīsamācārādīsu
atk-s0203a0:264_3: eseva nayo. Iti bhagavā sattahi padehi mātikaṃ ṭhapetvā vitthārato avibhajitvāva
atk-s0203a0:265: 113. Manosamācāre micchādiṭṭhisammādiṭṭhiyo diṭṭhipaṭilābhavasena visuṃ aṅgaṃ hutvā ṭhitāti na gahitā.
atk-s0203a0:267: 115. Saññāpaṭilābhavāre abhijjhāsahagatāya saññāyātiādīni kāmasaññādīnaṃ dassanatthaṃ vuttāni.
atk-s0203a0:268_1: Ettha ca sabyābajjhattabhāvā nāma cattāro honti. Puthujjanopi hi yo tenattabhāvena
atk-s0203a0:268_2: bhavaṃ pariniṭṭhāpetuṃ na sakkoti, tassa paṭisandhito paṭṭhāya akusalā dhammā vaḍḍhanti,
atk-s0203a0:268_3: kusalā dhammā ca parihāyanti, sadukkhameva attabhāvaṃ abhinibbatteti nāma. Tathā
atk-s0203a0:268_4: sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmino. Puthujjanādayo tāva hontu, anāgāmī kathaṃ sabyābajjhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:268_5: attabhāvaṃ abhinibbatteti, kathañcassa akusalā dhammā abhivaḍḍhanti, kusalā dhammā
atk-s0203a0:268_6: parihāyantīti. Anāgāmīpi hi suddhāvāse nibbatto uyyānavimānakapparukkhe oloketvā
atk-s0203a0:268_7: “aho sukhaṃ aho sukha”nti udānaṃ udāneti, anāgāmino bhavalobho bhavataṇhā appahīnāva
atk-s0203a0:268_8: honti, tassa appahīnataṇhatāya akusalā vaḍḍhanti nāma, kusalā parihāyanti nāma, sadukkhameva
atk-s0203a0:269_0: Abyābajjhanti adukkhaṃ. Ayampi catunnaṃ janānaṃ vasena veditabbo. Yo hi puthujjanopi
atk-s0203a0:269_1: tenattabhāvena bhavaṃ pariniṭṭhāpetuṃ sakkoti, puna paṭisandhiṃ na gaṇhāti, tassa
atk-s0203a0:269_2: paṭisandhiggahaṇato paṭṭhāya akusalā parihāyanti, kusalāyeva vaḍḍhanti, adukkhameva
atk-s0203a0:269_3: attabhāvaṃ nibbatteti, pariniṭṭhitabhavoyeva nāma hoti. Tathā sotāpannasakadāgāmianāgāmino.
atk-s0203a0:269_4: Sotāpannādayo tāva hontu, puthujjano kathaṃ abyābajjhaattabhāvaṃ nibbatteti, kathañcassa
atk-s0203a0:269_5: akusalaparihāniādīni hontīti. Puthujjanopi pacchimabhaviko tenattabhāvena bhavaṃ
atk-s0203a0:269_6: pariniṭṭhāpetuṃ samattho hoti. Tassa aṅgulimālassa viya ekenūnapāṇasahassaṃ ghātentassāpi
atk-s0203a0:269_7: attabhāvo abyābajjhoyeva nāma, bhavaṃ pariniṭṭhāpetiyeva nāma. Akusalameva hāyati,
atk-s0203a0:270_0: 119. Cakkhuviññeyyantiādīsu yasmā ekaccassa tasmiṃyeva rūpe rāgādayo uppajjanti,
atk-s0203a0:270_1: abhinandati assādeti, abhinandanto assādento anayabyasanaṃ pāpuṇāti, ekaccassa nuppajjanti,
atk-s0203a0:270_2: nibbindati virajjati, nibbindanto virajjanto nibbutiṃ pāpuṇāti, tasmā “tañca aññamañña”nti
atk-s0203a0:271_0: Evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājāneyyunti ettha ke bhagavato imassa bhāsitassa atthaṃ ājānanti,
atk-s0203a0:271_1: ke na ājānantīti? Ye tāva imassa suttassa pāḷiñca aṭṭhakathañca uggaṇhitvā takkarā
atk-s0203a0:271_2: na honti, yathāvuttaṃ anulomapaṭipadaṃ na paṭipajjanti, te na ājānanti nāma. Ye pana
atk-s0203a0:271_3: takkarā honti, yathāvuttaṃ anulomapaṭipadaṃ paṭipajjanti, te ājānanti nāma. Evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:271_4: santepi sapaṭisandhikānaṃ tāva dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya hotu, appaṭisandhikānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:271_5: kathaṃ hotīti. Appaṭisandhikā anupādānā viya jātavedā parinibbāyanti, kappasatasahassānampi
atk-s0203a0:271_6: accayena tesaṃ puna dukkhaṃ nāma natthi. Iti ekaṃsena tesaṃyeva dīgharattaṃ hitāya
atk-s0203a0:275_0: 124. Evaṃ me sutanti bahudhātukasuttaṃ. Tattha bhayānītiādīsu bhayanti cittutrāso.
atk-s0203a0:275_1: Upaddavoti anekaggatākāro. Upasaggoti upasaṭṭhākāro tattha tattha lagganākāro. Tesaṃ
atk-s0203a0:275_2: evaṃ nānattaṃ veditabbaṃ – pabbatādivisamanissitā corā janapadavāsīnaṃ pesenti “mayaṃ
atk-s0203a0:275_3: asukadivase nāma tumhākaṃ gāmaṃ paharissāmā”ti. Taṃ pavattiṃ sutakālato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0203a0:275_4: bhayaṃ santāsaṃ āpajjanti. Ayaṃ cittutrāso nāma. “Idha no corā kupitā anatthampi
atk-s0203a0:275_5: āvaheyyu”nti hatthasāraṃ gahetvā dvipadacatuppadehi saddhiṃ araññaṃ pavisitvā tattha
atk-s0203a0:275_6: tattha bhūmiyaṃ nipajjanti, ḍaṃsamakasādīhi khajjamānā gumbantarāni pavisanti, khāṇukaṇṭake
atk-s0203a0:275_7: maddanti. Tesaṃ evaṃ vicarantānaṃ vikkhittabhāvo anekaggatākāro nāma. Tato coresu
atk-s0203a0:275_8: yathāvutte divase anāgacchantesu “tucchakasāsanaṃ taṃ bhavissati, gāmaṃ pavisissāmā”ti
atk-s0203a0:275_9: saparikkhārā gāmaṃ pavisanti, atha tesaṃ paviṭṭhabhāvaṃ ñatvā gāmaṃ parivāretvā dvāre
atk-s0203a0:275_10: aggiṃ datvā manusse ghātetvā corā sabbaṃ vibhavaṃ vilumpetvā gacchanti. Tesu ghātitāvasesā
atk-s0203a0:275_11: aggiṃ nibbāpetvā koṭṭhacchāyabhitticchāyādīsu tattha tattha laggitvā nisīdanti naṭṭhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:276_0: Naḷāgārāti naḷehi paricchannā agārā, sesasambhārā panettha rukkhamayā honti. Tiṇāgārepi
atk-s0203a0:276_1: eseva nayo. Bālato uppajjantīti bālameva nissāya uppajjanti. Bālo hi apaṇḍitapuriso
atk-s0203a0:276_2: rajjaṃ vā uparajjaṃ vā aññaṃ vā pana mahantaṃ ṭhānaṃ patthento katipaye attanā sadise
atk-s0203a0:276_3: vidhavāputte mahādhutte gahetvā “etha ahaṃ tumhe issare karissāmī”ti pabbatagahanādīni
atk-s0203a0:276_4: nissāya antante gāme paharanto dāmarikabhāvaṃ jānāpetvā anupubbena nigamepi janapadepi
atk-s0203a0:276_5: paharati, manussā gehāni chaḍḍetvā khemantaṭṭhānaṃ patthayamānā pakkamanti, te nissāya
atk-s0203a0:276_6: vasantā bhikkhūpi bhikkhuniyopi attano attano vasanaṭṭhānāni pahāya pakkamanti. Gatagataṭṭhāne
atk-s0203a0:276_7: bhikkhāpi senāsanampi dullabhaṃ hoti. Evaṃ catunnaṃ parisānaṃ bhayaṃ āgatameva hoti.
atk-s0203a0:276_8: Pabbajitesupi dve bālā bhikkhū aññamaññaṃ vivādaṃ paṭṭhapetvā codanaṃ ārabhanti.
atk-s0203a0:276_9: Iti kosambivāsikānaṃ viya mahākalaho uppajjati, catunnaṃ parisānaṃ bhayaṃ āgatameva
atk-s0203a0:276_10: hotīti evaṃ yāni kānici bhayāni uppajjanti, sabbāni tāni bālato uppajjantīti veditabbāni.
atk-s0203a0:277_0: Etadavocāti bhagavatā dhammadesanā matthakaṃ apāpetvāva niṭṭhāpitā. Yaṃnūnāhaṃ dasabalaṃ
atk-s0203a0:277_1: pucchitvā sabbaññutaññāṇenevassa desanāya pāripūriṃ kareyyanti cintetvā etaṃ “kittāvatā
atk-s0203a0:278_0: 125. Aṭṭhārasasu dhātūsu aḍḍhekādasadhātuyo rūpapariggaho, aḍḍhaṭṭhamakadhātuyo arūpapariggahoti
atk-s0203a0:278_1: rūpārūpapariggahova kathito. Sabbāpi khandhavasena pañcakkhandhā honti. Pañcapi khandhā
atk-s0203a0:278_2: dukkhasaccaṃ, tesaṃ samuṭṭhāpikā taṇhā samudayasaccaṃ, ubhinnaṃ appavatti nirodhasaccaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:278_3: nirodhapajānanā paṭipadā maggasaccaṃ. Iti catusaccakammaṭṭhānaṃ ekassa bhikkhuno
atk-s0203a0:278_4: niggamanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā kathitaṃ hoti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato panetā
atk-s0203a0:278_5: dhātuyo visuddhimagge kathitāva. Jānāti passatīti saha vipassanāya maggo vutto.
atk-s0203a0:279_0: Pathavīdhātuādayo saviññāṇakakāyaṃ suññato nissattato dassetuṃ vuttā. Tāpi purimāhi
atk-s0203a0:279_1: aṭṭhārasahi dhātūhi pūretabbā. Pūrentena viññāṇadhātuto nīharitvā pūretabbā. Viññāṇadhātu
atk-s0203a0:279_2: hesā cakkhuviññāṇādivasena chabbidhā hoti. Tattha cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā pariggahitāya
atk-s0203a0:279_3: tassā vatthu cakkhudhātu, ārammaṇaṃ rūpadhātūti dve dhātuyo pariggahitāva honti.
atk-s0203a0:279_4: Esa nayo sabbattha. Manoviññāṇadhātuyā pana pariggahitāya tassā purimapacchimavasena
atk-s0203a0:279_5: manodhātu, ārammaṇavasena dhammadhātūti dve dhātuyo pariggahitāva honti. Iti imāsu
atk-s0203a0:279_6: aṭṭhārasasu dhātūsu aḍḍhekādasadhātuyo rūpapariggahoti purimanayeneva idampi ekassa
atk-s0203a0:279_7: bhikkhuno niggamanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā kathitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:280_0: Sukhadhātūtiādīsu sukhañca taṃ nissattasuññataṭṭhena dhātu cāti sukhadhātu. Esa nayo
atk-s0203a0:280_1: sabbattha. Ettha ca purimā catasso dhātuyo sappaṭipakkhavasena gahitā, pacchimā dve
atk-s0203a0:280_2: sarikkhakavasena. Avibhūtabhāvena hi upekkhādhātu avijjādhātuyā sarikkhā. Ettha ca
atk-s0203a0:280_3: sukhadukkhadhātūsu pariggahitāsu kāyaviññāṇadhātu pariggahitāva hoti, sesāsu pariggahitāsu
atk-s0203a0:280_4: manoviññāṇadhātu pariggahitāva hoti. Imāpi cha dhātuyo heṭṭhā aṭṭhārasahiyeva pūretabbā.
atk-s0203a0:280_5: Pūrentena upekkhādhātuto nīharitvā pūretabbā. Iti imāsu aṭṭhārasasu dhātūsu aḍḍhekādasadhātuyo
atk-s0203a0:280_6: rūpapariggahoti purimanayeneva idampi ekassa bhikkhuno niggamanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā kathitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:281_0: Kāmadhātuādīnaṃ dvedhāvitakke kāmavitakkādīsu vuttanayeneva attho veditabbo. Abhidhammepi
atk-s0203a0:281_1: “tattha katamā kāmadhātu, kāmapaṭisaṃyutto takko vitakko”tiādinā nayeneva etāsaṃ
atk-s0203a0:281_2: vitthāro āgatoyeva. Imāpi cha dhātuyo heṭṭhā aṭṭhārasahiyeva pūretabbā. Pūrentena
atk-s0203a0:281_3: kāmadhātuto nīharitvā pūretabbā. Iti imāsu aṭṭhārasasu dhātūsu aḍḍhekādasadhātuyo
atk-s0203a0:281_4: rūpapariggahoti purimanayeneva idampi ekassa bhikkhuno niggamanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā kathitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:282_0: Kāmadhātuādīsu pañca kāmāvacarakkhandhā kāmadhātu nāma, pañca rūpāvacarakkhandhā
atk-s0203a0:282_1: rūpadhātu nāma, cattāro arūpāvacarakkhandhā arūpadhātu nāma. Abhidhamme pana “tattha
atk-s0203a0:282_2: katamā kāmadhātu, heṭṭhato avīcinirayaṃ pariyantaṃ karitvā”tiādinā nayena etāsaṃ
atk-s0203a0:282_3: vitthāro āgatoyeva. Imāpi tisso dhātuyo heṭṭhā aṭṭhārasahiyeva pūretabbā. Pūrentena
atk-s0203a0:282_4: kāmadhātuto nīharitvā pūretabbā. Iti imāsu aṭṭhārasasu dhātūsu aḍḍhekādasadhātuyo
atk-s0203a0:282_5: rūpapariggahoti purimanayeneva idampi ekassa bhikkhuno niggamanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā kathitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:283_0: Saṅkhatāti paccayehi samāgantvā katā, pañcannaṃ khandhānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Na saṅkhatā
atk-s0203a0:283_1: asaṅkhatā. Nibbānassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Imāpi dve dhātuyo heṭṭhā aṭṭhārasahiyeva pūretabbā.
atk-s0203a0:283_2: Pūrentena saṅkhatadhātuto nīharitvā pūretabbā. Iti imāsu aṭṭhārasasu dhātūsu aḍḍhekādasadhātuyo
atk-s0203a0:283_3: rūpapariggahoti purimanayeneva idampi ekassa bhikkhuno niggamanaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā kathitaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:284: 126. Ajjhattikabāhirānīti ajjhattikāni ca bāhirāni ca. Ettha hi cakkhuādīni ajjhattikāni cha, rūpādīni bāhirāni cha. Idhāpi jānāti passatīti saha vipassanāya maggo kathito.
atk-s0203a0:286_0: 127. Aṭṭhānanti hetupaṭikkhepo. Anavakāsoti paccayapaṭikkhepo. Ubhayenāpi kāraṇameva
atk-s0203a0:286_1: paṭikkhipati. Kāraṇañhi tadāyattavuttitāya attano phalassa ṭhānanti ca avakāsoti
atk-s0203a0:286_2: ca vuccati. Yanti yena kāraṇena. Diṭṭhisampannoti maggadiṭṭhiyā sampanno sotāpanno
atk-s0203a0:286_3: ariyasāvako. Kañci saṅkhāranti catubhūmakesu saṅkhatasaṅkhāresu kañci ekasaṅkhārampi.
atk-s0203a0:286_4: Niccato upagaccheyyāti niccoti gaṇheyya. Netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti etaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthi
atk-s0203a0:286_5: na upalabbhati. Yaṃ puthujjanoti yena kāraṇena puthujjano. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatīti etaṃ
atk-s0203a0:286_6: kāraṇaṃ atthi. Sassatadiṭṭhiyā hi so tebhūmakesu saṅkhatasaṅkhāresu kañci saṅkhāraṃ
atk-s0203a0:286_7: niccato gaṇheyyāti attho. Catutthabhūmakasaṅkhārā pana tejussadattā divasaṃ santatto
atk-s0203a0:286_8: ayoguḷo viya makkhikānaṃ diṭṭhiyā vā aññesaṃ vā akusalānaṃ ārammaṇaṃ na honti. Iminā
atk-s0203a0:286_9: nayena kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhatotiādīsupi attho veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:287_0: Sukhato upagaccheyyāti “ekantasukhī attā hoti arogo paraṃ maraṇā”ti evaṃ attadiṭṭhivasena
atk-s0203a0:287_1: sukhato gāhaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Diṭṭhivippayuttacittena pana ariyasāvako pariḷāhābhibhūto
atk-s0203a0:287_2: pariḷāhavūpasamatthaṃ mattahatthiṃ parittāsito viya, cokkhabrāhmaṇo viya ca gūthaṃ
atk-s0203a0:287_3: kañci saṅkhāraṃ sukhato upagacchati. Attavāre kasiṇādipaṇṇattisaṅgahatthaṃ saṅkhāranti
atk-s0203a0:287_4: avatvā kañci dhammanti vuttaṃ. Idhāpi ariyasāvakassa catubhūmakavasena veditabbo,
atk-s0203a0:287_5: puthujjanassa tebhūmakavasena. Sabbavāresu ariyasāvakassāpi tebhūmakavaseneva paricchedo
atk-s0203a0:287_6: vaṭṭati. Yaṃ yañhi puthujjano gaṇhāti, tato tato ariyasāvako gāhaṃ viniveṭheti. Puthujjano
atk-s0203a0:287_7: hi yaṃ yaṃ niccaṃ sukhaṃ attāti gaṇhāti, taṃ taṃ ariyasāvako aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti
atk-s0203a0:288_0: 128. Mātarantiādīsu janikāva mātā, janako pitā, manussabhūtova khīṇāsavo arahāti
atk-s0203a0:288_1: adhippeto. Kiṃ pana ariyasāvako aññaṃ jīvitā voropeyyāti? Etampi aṭṭhānaṃ. Sacepi
atk-s0203a0:288_2: hi bhavantaragataṃ ariyasāvakaṃ attano ariyabhāvaṃ ajānantampi koci evaṃ vadeyya
atk-s0203a0:288_3: “imaṃ kunthakipillikaṃ jīvitā voropetvā sakalacakkavāḷagabbhe cakkavattirajjaṃ paṭipajjāhī”ti,
atk-s0203a0:288_4: neva so taṃ jīvitā voropeyya. Athāpi naṃ evaṃ vadeyya “sace imaṃ na ghātessasi, sīsaṃ
atk-s0203a0:288_5: te chindissāmā”ti. Sīsamevassa chindeyya, na ca so taṃ ghāteyya. Puthujjanabhāvassa
atk-s0203a0:288_6: pana mahāsāvajjabhāvadassanatthaṃ ariyasāvakassa ca baladīpanatthametaṃ vuttaṃ. Ayañhettha
atk-s0203a0:288_7: adhippāyo – sāvajjo puthujjanabhāvo, yatra hi nāma puthujjano mātughātādīnipi ānantariyāni
atk-s0203a0:288_8: karissati. Mahābalo ca ariyasāvako, yo etāni kammāni na karotīti.
atk-s0203a0:289_0: Duṭṭhacittoti vadhakacittena paduṭṭhacitto. Lohitaṃ uppādeyyāti jīvamānakasarīre
atk-s0203a0:289_1: khuddakamakkhikāya pivanamattampi lohitaṃ uppādeyya. Saṅghaṃ bhindeyyāti samānasaṃvāsakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:289_2: samānasīmāya ṭhitaṃ pañcahi kāraṇehi saṅghaṃ bhindeyya. Vuttañhetaṃ “pañcahupāli
atk-s0203a0:289_3: ākārehi saṅgho bhijjati. Kammena uddesena voharanto anussāvanena salākaggāhenā”ti.
atk-s0203a0:290_0: Tattha kammenāti apalokanādīsu catūsu kammesu aññatarena kammena. Uddesenāti pañcasu
atk-s0203a0:290_1: pātimokkhuddesesu aññatarena uddesena. Voharantoti kathayanto, tāhi tāhi uppattīhi
atk-s0203a0:290_2: adhammaṃ dhammotiādīni aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni dīpento. Anussāvanenāti nanu tumhe
atk-s0203a0:290_3: jānātha mayhaṃ uccākulā pabbajitabhāvaṃ bahussutabhāvañca, mādiso nāma uddhammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:290_4: ubbinayaṃ satthusāsanaṃ gāheyyāti cittampi uppādetuṃ tumhākaṃ yuttaṃ, kiṃ mayhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:290_5: avīci nīluppalavanaṃ viya sītalo, kiṃ ahaṃ apāyato na bhāyāmītiādinā nayena kaṇṇamūle
atk-s0203a0:290_6: vacībhedaṃ katvā anussāvanena. Salākaggāhenāti evaṃ anussāvetvā tesaṃ cittaṃ upatthambhetvā
atk-s0203a0:291_0: Ettha ca kammameva uddeso vā pamāṇaṃ, vohārānussāvanasalākaggāhā pana pubbabhāgā.
atk-s0203a0:291_1: Aṭṭhārasavatthudīpanavasena hi voharantena tattha rucijananatthaṃ anussāvetvā salākāya
atk-s0203a0:291_2: gāhitāyapi abhinnova hoti saṅgho. Yadā pana evaṃ cattāro vā atirekā vā salākaṃ gāhetvā
atk-s0203a0:291_3: āveṇikaṃ kammaṃ vā uddesaṃ vā karonti, tadā saṅgho bhinno nāma hoti. Evaṃ diṭṭhisampanno
atk-s0203a0:291_4: puggalo saṅghaṃ bhindeyyāti netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjati. Ettāvatā mātughātādīni pañca ānantariyakammāni
atk-s0203a0:291_5: dassitāni honti, yāni puthujjano karoti, na ariyasāvako, tesaṃ āvibhāvatthaṃ –
atk-s0203a0:294_0: Tattha kammato tāva – ettha hi manussabhūtasseva manussabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ
atk-s0203a0:294_1: vā api parivattaliṅgaṃ jīvitā voropentassa kammaṃ ānantariyaṃ hoti, tassa vipākaṃ
atk-s0203a0:294_2: paṭibāhissāmīti sakalacakkavāḷaṃ mahācetiyappamāṇehi kañcanathūpehi pūretvāpi sakalacakkavāḷaṃ
atk-s0203a0:294_3: pūretvā nisinnabhikkhusaṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvāpi buddhassa bhagavato saṅghāṭikaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:294_4: amuñcanto vicaritvāpi kāyassa bhedā nirayameva upapajjati. Yo pana sayaṃ manussabhūto
atk-s0203a0:294_5: tiracchānabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā, sayaṃ vā tiracchānabhūto manussabhūtaṃ, tiracchānoyeva
atk-s0203a0:294_6: vā tiracchānabhūtaṃ jīvitā voropeti, tassa kammaṃ ānantariyaṃ na hoti, bhāriyaṃ pana
atk-s0203a0:294_7: hoti, ānantariyaṃ āhacceva tiṭṭhati. Manussajātikānaṃ pana vasena ayaṃ pañho kathito.
atk-s0203a0:295_0: Tattha eḷakacatukkaṃ saṅgāmacatukkaṃ coracatukkañca kathetabbaṃ. Eḷakaṃ māremīti
atk-s0203a0:295_1: abhisandhināpi hi eḷakaṭṭhāne ṭhitaṃ manusso manussabhūtaṃ mātaraṃ vā pitaraṃ vā
atk-s0203a0:295_2: mārento ānantariyaṃ phusati. Eḷakābhisandhinā pana mātāpitāabhisandhinā vā eḷakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:295_3: mārento ānantariyaṃ na phusati. Mātāpitāabhisandhinā mātāpitaro mārento phusateva.
atk-s0203a0:295_4: Eseva nayo itarasmimpi catukkadvaye. Yathā ca mātāpitūsu, evaṃ arahantepi etāni catukkāni veditabbāni.
atk-s0203a0:296_0: Manussaarahantameva māretvā ānantariyaṃ phusati, na yakkhabhūtaṃ. Kammaṃ pana bhāriyaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:296_1: ānantariyasadisameva. Manussaarahantassa ca puthujjanakāleyeva satthappahāre vā vise
atk-s0203a0:296_2: vā dinnepi yadi so arahattaṃ patvā teneva marati, arahantaghāto hotiyeva. Yaṃ pana
atk-s0203a0:296_3: puthujjanakāle dinnaṃ dānaṃ arahattaṃ patvā paribhuñjati, puthujjanasseva dinnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:296_4: hoti. Sesaariyapuggale mārentassa ānantariyaṃ natthi. Kammaṃ pana bhāriyaṃ, ānantariyasadisameva.
atk-s0203a0:297_0: Lohituppāde tathāgatassa abhejjakāyatāya parūpakkamena cammacchedaṃ katvā lohitapaggharaṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:297_1: nāma natthi. Sarīrassa pana antoyeva ekasmiṃyeva ṭhāne lohitaṃ samosarati. Devadattena
atk-s0203a0:297_2: paviddhasilato bhijjitvā gatā sakalikāpi tathāgatassa pādantaṃ pahari, pharasunā
atk-s0203a0:297_3: pahaṭo viya pādo antolohitoyeva ahosi. Tathā karontassa ānantariyaṃ hoti. Jīvako
atk-s0203a0:297_4: pana tathāgatassa ruciyā satthakena cammaṃ chinditvā tamhā ṭhānā duṭṭhalohitaṃ nīharitvā
atk-s0203a0:298_0: Atha ye ca parinibbute tathāgate cetiyaṃ bhindanti, bodhiṃ chindanti dhātumhi upakkamanti,
atk-s0203a0:298_1: tesaṃ kiṃ hotīti? Bhāriyaṃ kammaṃ hoti ānantariyasadisaṃ. Sadhātukaṃ pana thūpaṃ
atk-s0203a0:298_2: vā paṭimaṃ vā bādhamānaṃ bodhisākhaṃ chindituṃ vaṭṭati. Sacepi tattha nilīnā sakuṇā
atk-s0203a0:298_3: cetiye vaccaṃ pātenti, chindituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Paribhogacetiyato hi sarīracetiyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:298_4: mahantataraṃ. Cetiyavatthuṃ bhinditvā gacchantaṃ bodhimūlampi chinditvā harituṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0203a0:298_5: Yā pana bodhisākhā bodhigharaṃ bādhati, taṃ geharakkhaṇatthaṃ chindituṃ na labhati,
atk-s0203a0:298_6: bodhiatthañhi gehaṃ, na gehatthāya bodhi. Āsanagharepi eseva nayo. Yasmiṃ pana āsanaghare
atk-s0203a0:298_7: dhātu nihitā hoti, tassa rakkhaṇatthāya bodhisākhaṃ chindituṃ vaṭṭati. Bodhijagganatthaṃ
atk-s0203a0:298_8: ojoharaṇasākhaṃ vā pūtiṭṭhānaṃ vā chindituṃ vaṭṭatiyeva, bhagavato sarīrapaṭijaggane viya puññampi hoti.
atk-s0203a0:299_0: Saṅghabhede sīmaṭṭhakasaṅghe asannipatite visuṃ parisaṃ gahetvā katavohārānussāvana-salākaggāhassa
atk-s0203a0:299_1: kammaṃ vā karontassa, uddesaṃ vā uddisantassa bhedo ca hoti ānantariyakammañca. Samaggasaññāya
atk-s0203a0:299_2: pana vaṭṭatīti kammaṃ karontassa bhedova hoti, na ānantariyakammaṃ, tathā navato
atk-s0203a0:299_3: ūnaparisāyaṃ. Sabbantimena paricchedena navannaṃ janānaṃ yo saṅghaṃ bhindati, tassa
atk-s0203a0:299_4: ānantariyakammaṃ hoti. Anuvattakānaṃ adhammavādīnaṃ mahāsāvajjakammaṃ. Dhammavādino pana anavajjā.
atk-s0203a0:300_0: Tattha navannameva saṅghabhede idaṃ suttaṃ – “ekato upāli cattāro honti, ekato cattāro,
atk-s0203a0:300_1: navamo anussāveti, salākaṃ gāheti ‘ayaṃ dhammo ayaṃ vinayo idaṃ satthusāsanaṃ, idaṃ
atk-s0203a0:300_2: gaṇhatha, imaṃ rocethā’ti, evaṃ kho, upāli, saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo ca.
atk-s0203a0:300_3: Navannaṃ vā, upāli, atirekanavannaṃ vā saṅgharāji ceva hoti saṅghabhedo cā”ti. Etesu
atk-s0203a0:300_4: pana pañcasu saṅghabhedo vacīkammaṃ, sesāni kāyakammānīti. Evaṃ kammato viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-s0203a0:301_0: Dvāratoti sabbāneva cetāni kāyadvāratopi vacīdvāratopi samuṭṭhahanti. Purimāni panettha
atk-s0203a0:301_1: cattāri āṇattikavijjāmayapayogavasena vacīdvārato samuṭṭhahitvāpi kāyadvārameva pūrenti,
atk-s0203a0:301_2: saṅghabhedo hatthamuddāya bhedaṃ karontassa kāyadvārato samuṭṭhahitvāpi vacīdvārameva
atk-s0203a0:302_0: Kappaṭṭhitiyatoti saṅghabhedoyeva cettha kappaṭṭhitiyo. Saṇṭhahante hi kappe kappavemajjhe
atk-s0203a0:302_1: vā saṅghabhedaṃ katvā kappavināseyeva muccati. Sacepi hi sveva kappo vinassissatīti
atk-s0203a0:302_2: ajja saṅghabhedaṃ karoti, sveva muccati, ekadivasameva niraye paccati. Evaṃ karaṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:302_3: pana natthi. Sesāni cattāri kammāni ānantariyāneva honti, na kappaṭṭhitiyānīti evamettha
atk-s0203a0:303_0: Pākatoti yena ca pañcape’tāni kammāni katāni honti, tassa saṅghabhedoyeva paṭisandhivasena
atk-s0203a0:303_1: vipaccati, sesāni “ahosikammaṃ, nāhosi kammavipāko”ti evamādīsu saṅkhyaṃ gacchanti.
atk-s0203a0:303_2: Saṅghassa bhedābhāve lohituppādo, tadabhāve arahantaghāto, tadabhāve ca sace pitā
atk-s0203a0:303_3: sīlavā hoti, mātā dussīlā, no vā tathā sīlavatī, pitughāto paṭisandhivasena vipaccati.
atk-s0203a0:303_4: Sace mātāpitughāto, dvīsupi sīlena vā dussīlena vā samānesu mātughātova paṭisandhivasena
atk-s0203a0:303_5: vipaccati. Mātā hi dukkarakārinī bahūpakārā ca puttānanti evamettha pākatopi viññātabbo vinicchayo.
atk-s0203a0:304_0: Sādhāraṇādīhīti purimāni cattāri sabbesampi gahaṭṭhapabbajitānaṃ sādhāraṇāni. Saṅghabhedo
atk-s0203a0:304_1: pana “na kho, upāli bhikkhunī, saṅghaṃ bhindati, na sikkhamānā, na sāmaṇero, na sāmaṇerī,
atk-s0203a0:304_2: na upāsako, na upāsikā saṅghaṃ bhindati, bhikkhu kho, upāli, pakatatto samānasaṃvāsako
atk-s0203a0:304_3: samānasīmāyaṃ ṭhito saṅghaṃ bhindatī”ti vacanato vuttappakārassa bhikkhunova hoti,
atk-s0203a0:304_4: na aññassa, tasmā asādhāraṇo. Ādisaddena sabbepi te dukkhavedanāsahagatā dosamohasampayuttā
atk-s0203a0:305: Aññaṃ satthāranti “ayaṃ me satthā satthukiccaṃ kātuṃ asamattho”ti bhavantarepi aññaṃ titthakaraṃ “ayaṃ me satthā”ti evaṃ gaṇheyya, netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatīti attho.
atk-s0203a0:306_0: 129. Ekissā lokadhātuyāti dasasahassilokadhātuyā. Tīṇi hi khettāni jātikhettaṃ āṇākhettaṃ
atk-s0203a0:306_1: visayakhettaṃ. Tattha jātikhettaṃ nāma dasasahassī lokadhātu. Sā hi tathāgatassa
atk-s0203a0:306_3: parinibbāne ca kampati. Koṭisatasahassacakkavāḷaṃ pana āṇākhettaṃ nāma. Āṭānāṭiyamoraparittadhajaggaparittaratanaparittādīnañhi
atk-s0203a0:306_4: ettha āṇā vattati. Visayakhettassa pana parimāṇaṃ natthi. Buddhānañhi “yāvatakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:306_5: ñāṇaṃ tāvatakaṃ neyyaṃ, yāvatakaṃ neyyaṃ tāvatakaṃ ñāṇaṃ, ñāṇapariyantikaṃ neyyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:306_6: neyyapariyantikaṃ ñāṇa”nti vacanato avisayo nāma natthi.
atk-s0203a0:307_0: Imesu pana tīsu khettesu ṭhapetvā imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ aññasmiṃ cakkavāḷe buddhā uppajjantīti
atk-s0203a0:307_1: suttaṃ natthi, na uppajjantīti pana atthi. Tīṇi piṭakāni vinayapiṭakaṃ suttantapiṭakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:307_2: abhidhammapiṭakaṃ, tisso saṅgītiyo mahākassapattherassa saṅgīti, yasattherassa saṅgīti,
atk-s0203a0:307_3: moggaliputtatissattherassa saṅgītīti. Imā tisso saṅgītiyo āruḷhe tepiṭake buddhavacane
atk-s0203a0:307_4: imaṃ cakkavāḷaṃ muñcitvā aññattha buddhā uppajjantīti suttaṃ natthi, na uppajjantīti pana atthi.
atk-s0203a0:308_0: Apubbaṃ acarimanti apure apacchā. Ekato na uppajjanti, pure vā pacchā vā uppajjantīti
atk-s0203a0:308_1: vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha hi bodhipallaṅke bodhiṃ appatvā na uṭṭhahissāmīti nisinnakālato
atk-s0203a0:308_2: paṭṭhāya yāva mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ, tāva pubbeti na veditabbaṃ. Bodhisattassa
atk-s0203a0:308_3: hi paṭisandhiggahaṇena dasasahassacakkavāḷakampaneneva khettapariggaho kato, aññassa
atk-s0203a0:308_4: buddhassa uppatti nivāritāva hoti. Parinibbānakālato paṭṭhāya yāva sāsapamattā dhātu
atk-s0203a0:308_5: tiṭṭhati, tāva pacchāti na veditabbaṃ. Dhātūsu hi ṭhitāsu buddhā ṭhitāva honti. Tasmā
atk-s0203a0:308_6: etthantare aññassa buddhassa uppatti nivāritāva hoti. Dhātuparinibbāne pana jāte
atk-s0203a0:309_0: Tīṇi hi antaradhānāni nāma pariyattiantaradhānaṃ, paṭivedhaantaradhānaṃ, paṭipattiantaradhānanti.
atk-s0203a0:309_1: Tattha pariyattīti tīṇi piṭakāni. Paṭivedhoti saccapaṭivedho. Paṭipattīti paṭipadā.
atk-s0203a0:309_2: Tattha paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi na hotipi. Ekasmiñhi kāle paṭivedhadharā
atk-s0203a0:309_3: bhikkhū bahū honti, eso bhikkhu puthujjanoti aṅguliṃ pasāretvā dassetabbo hoti. Imasmiṃyeva
atk-s0203a0:309_4: dīpe ekavāre puthujjanabhikkhu nāma nāhosi. Paṭipattipūrikāpi kadāci bahū honti kadāci
atk-s0203a0:309_5: appā. Iti paṭivedho ca paṭipatti ca hotipi na hotipi, sāsanaṭṭhitiyā pana pariyatti pamāṇaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:310_0: Paṇḍito hi tepiṭakaṃ sutvā dvepi pūreti. Yathā amhākaṃ bodhisatto āḷārassa santike
atk-s0203a0:310_1: pañcābhiññā satta ca samāpattiyo nibbattetvā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpattiyā parikammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:310_2: pucchi, so na jānāmīti āha. Tato udakassa santikaṃ gantvā adhigataṃ visesaṃ saṃsandetvā
atk-s0203a0:310_3: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanassa parikammaṃ pucchi, so ācikkhi, tassa vacanasamanantarameva
atk-s0203a0:310_4: mahāsatto taṃ sampādesi, evameva paññavā bhikkhu pariyattiṃ sutvā dvepi pūreti. Tasmā
atk-s0203a0:311_0: Yadā pana sā antaradhāyati, tadā paṭhamaṃ abhidhammapiṭakaṃ nassati. Tattha paṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:311_1: sabbapaṭhamaṃ antaradhāyati, anukkamena pacchā dhammasaṅgaho, tasmiṃ antarahite itaresu
atk-s0203a0:311_2: dvīsu piṭakesu ṭhitesu sāsanaṃ ṭhitameva hoti. Tattha suttantapiṭake antaradhāyamāne
atk-s0203a0:311_3: paṭhamaṃ aṅguttaranikāyo ekādasakato paṭṭhāya yāva ekakā antaradhāyati, tadanantaraṃ
atk-s0203a0:311_4: saṃyuttanikāyo cakkapeyyālato paṭṭhāya yāva oghataraṇā antaradhāyati, tadanantaraṃ
atk-s0203a0:311_5: majjhimanikāyo indriyabhāvanato paṭṭhāya yāva mūlapariyāyā antaradhāyati, tadanantaraṃ
atk-s0203a0:311_6: dīghanikāyo dasuttarato paṭṭhāya yāva brahmajālā antaradhāyati. Ekissāpi dvinnampi
atk-s0203a0:311_7: gāthānaṃ pucchā addhānaṃ gacchati, sāsanaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkoti sabhiyapucchā viya
atk-s0203a0:311_8: āḷavakapucchā viya ca. Etā kira kassapabuddhakālikā antarā sāsanaṃ dhāretuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:312_0: Dvīsu pana piṭakesu antarahitesupi vinayapiṭake ṭhite sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhati, parivārakhandhakesu
atk-s0203a0:312_1: antarahitesu ubhatovibhaṅge ṭhite ṭhitameva hoti. Ubhatovibhaṅge antarahite mātikāya
atk-s0203a0:312_2: ṭhitāyapi ṭhitameva hoti. Mātikāya antarahitāya pātimokkhapabbajjaupasampadāsu ṭhitāsu
