atk-s0203a0:312_3: sāsanaṃ tiṭṭhati. Liṅgamaddhānaṃ gacchati, setavatthasamaṇavaṃso pana kassapabuddhakālato
atk-s0203a0:312_4: paṭṭhāya sāsanaṃ dhāretuṃ nāsakkhi. Pacchimakassa pana saccapaṭivedhato pacchimakassa
atk-s0203a0:312_5: sīlabhedato ca paṭṭhāya sāsanaṃ osakkitaṃ nāma hoti. Tato paṭṭhāya aññassa buddhassa
atk-s0203a0:313_0: Tīṇi parinibbānāni nāma kilesaparinibbānaṃ khandhaparinibbānaṃ dhātuparinibbānanti.
atk-s0203a0:313_1: Tattha kilesaparinibbānaṃ bodhipallaṅke ahosi, khandhaparinibbānaṃ kusinārāyaṃ, dhātuparinibbānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:313_2: anāgate bhavissati. Sāsanassa kira osakkanakāle imasmiṃ tambapaṇṇidīpe dhātuyo sannipatitvā
atk-s0203a0:313_3: mahācetiyaṃ gamissanti, mahācetiyato nāgadīpe rājāyatanacetiyaṃ, tato mahābodhipallaṅkaṃ
atk-s0203a0:313_4: gamissanti, nāgabhavanatopi devalokatopi brahmalokatopi dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅkameva
atk-s0203a0:313_5: gamissanti. Sāsapamattāpi dhātu antarā na nassissati. Sabbā dhātuyo mahābodhipallaṅke
atk-s0203a0:313_6: rāsibhūtā suvaṇṇakkhandho viya ekagghanā hutvā chabbaṇṇarasmiyo vissajjessanti, tā
atk-s0203a0:314_0: Tato dasasahassacakkavāḷe devatā yo sannipatitvā “ajja satthā parinibbāyati, ajja
atk-s0203a0:314_1: sāsanaṃ osakkati, pacchimadassanaṃ dāni idaṃ amhāka”nti dasabalassa parinibbutadivasato
atk-s0203a0:314_2: mahantataraṃ kāruññaṃ karissanti. Ṭhapetvā anāgāmikhīṇāsave avasesā sakabhāvena saṇṭhātuṃ
atk-s0203a0:314_3: na sakkhissanti. Dhātūsu tejodhātu uṭṭhahitvā yāva brahmalokā uggacchissati, sāsapamattāyapi
atk-s0203a0:314_4: dhātuyā sati ekajālāva bhavissati, dhātūsu pariyādānaṃ gatāsu pacchijjissati. Evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:314_5: mahantaṃ ānubhāvaṃ dassetvā dhātūsu antarahitāsu sāsanaṃ antarahitaṃ nāma hoti. Yāva
atk-s0203a0:314_6: evaṃ na anantaradhāyati, tāva acarimaṃ nāma hoti. Evaṃ apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyunti
atk-s0203a0:315_0: Kasmā pana apubbaṃ acarimaṃ na uppajjantīti. Anacchariyattā. Buddhā hi acchariyamanussā.
atk-s0203a0:315_1: Yathāha – “ekapuggalo, bhikkhave, loke uppajjamāno uppajjati acchariyamanusso, katamo
atk-s0203a0:316_0: Yadi ca dve vā cattāro vā aṭṭha vā soḷasa vā ekato uppajjeyyuṃ, na acchariyā bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-s0203a0:316_1: Ekasmiñhi vihāre dvinnaṃ cetiyānampi lābhasakkāro uḷāro na hoti bhikkhūpi bahutāya
atk-s0203a0:316_2: na acchariyā jātā, evaṃ buddhāpi bhaveyyuṃ. Tasmā na uppajjanti.
atk-s0203a0:317_0: Desanāya ca visesābhāvato. Yañhi satipaṭṭhānādibhedaṃ dhammaṃ eko deseti, aññena
atk-s0203a0:317_1: uppajjitvāpi sova desetabbo siyā. Tato na acchariyo siyā, ekasmiṃ pana dhammaṃ desente
atk-s0203a0:318_0: Vivādābhāvato ca. Bahūsu ca buddhesu uppajjantesu bahūnaṃ ācariyānaṃ antevāsikā viya
atk-s0203a0:318_1: “amhākaṃ buddho pāsādiko, amhākaṃ buddho madhurassaro lābhī puññavā”ti vivadeyyuṃ,
atk-s0203a0:318_2: tasmāpi evaṃ na uppajjanti. Apicetaṃ kāraṇaṃ milindaraññā puṭṭhena nāgasenattherena
atk-s0203a0:319_0: “Tattha, bhante nāgasena, bhāsitampetaṃ bhagavatā ‘aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso,
atk-s0203a0:319_1: yaṃ ekissā lokadhātuyā dve arahanto sammāsambuddhā apubbaṃ acarimaṃ uppajjeyyuṃ,
atk-s0203a0:319_2: netaṃ ṭhānaṃ vijjatī’ti. Desentā ca, bhante nāgasena, sabbepi tathāgatā sattatiṃsa
atk-s0203a0:319_3: bodhipakkhiyadhamme desenti, kathayamānā ca cattāri ariyasaccāni kathenti, sikkhāpentā
atk-s0203a0:319_4: ca tīsu sikkhāsu sikkhāpenti, anusāsamānā ca appamādapaṭipattiyaṃ anusāsanti. Yadi,
atk-s0203a0:319_5: bhante nāgasena, sabbesampi tathāgatānaṃ ekā desanā ekā kathā ekā sikkhā ekā anusiṭṭhi,
atk-s0203a0:319_6: kena kāraṇena dve tathāgatā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti? Ekenapi tāva buddhuppādena ayaṃ
atk-s0203a0:319_7: loko obhāsajāto. Yadi dutiyo buddho bhaveyya, dvinnaṃ pabhāya ayaṃ loko bhiyyosomattāya
atk-s0203a0:319_8: obhāsajāto bhaveyya. Ovadamānā ca dve tathāgatā sukhaṃ ovadeyyuṃ, anusāsamānā ca
atk-s0203a0:319_9: sukhaṃ anusāseyyuṃ, tattha me kāraṇaṃ brūhi, yathāhaṃ nissaṃsayo bhaveyyanti.
atk-s0203a0:320_0: Ayaṃ mahārāja dasasahassī lokadhātu ekabuddhadhāraṇī, ekasseva tathāgatassa guṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:320_1: dhāreti, yadi dutiyo buddho uppajjeyya, nāyaṃ dasasahassī lokadhātu dhāreyya, caleyya
atk-s0203a0:320_2: kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya vikireyya vidhameyya viddhaṃseyya, na ṭhānamupagaccheyya.
atk-s0203a0:321_0: Yathā, mahārāja, nāvā ekapurisasandhāraṇī bhaveyya. Ekasmiṃ purise abhirūḷhe sā nāvā
atk-s0203a0:321_1: samupādikā bhaveyya. Atha dutiyo puriso āgaccheyya tādiso āyunā vaṇṇena vayena pamāṇena
atk-s0203a0:321_2: kisathūlena sabbaṅgapaccaṅgena, so taṃ nāvaṃ abhirūheyya. Apinu sā mahārāja, nāvā
atk-s0203a0:321_3: dvinnampi dhāreyyāti? Na hi, bhante, caleyya kampeyya nameyya onameyya vinameyya
atk-s0203a0:321_4: vikireyya vidhameyya viddhaṃseyya, na ṭhānamupagaccheyya, osīdeyya udaketi. Evameva
atk-s0203a0:321_5: kho, mahārāja, ayaṃ dasasahassī lokadhātu ekabuddhadhāraṇī, ekasseva tathāgatassa
atk-s0203a0:321_6: guṇaṃ dhāreti, yadi dutiyo buddho uppajjeyya, nāyaṃ dasasahassī lokadhātu dhāreyya,
atk-s0203a0:322_0: Yathā vā pana mahārāja puriso yāvadatthaṃ bhojanaṃ bhuñjeyya chādentaṃ yāvakaṇṭhamabhipūrayitvā,
atk-s0203a0:322_1: so dhāto pīṇito paripuṇṇo nirantaro tandikato anonamitadaṇḍajāto punadeva tattakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:322_2: bhojanaṃ bhuñjeyya, apinu kho, mahārāja, puriso sukhito bhaveyyāti? Na hi, bhante,
atk-s0203a0:322_3: sakiṃ bhuttova mareyyāti. Evameva kho, mahārāja, ayaṃ dasasahassī lokadhātu ekabuddhadhāraṇī
atk-s0203a0:323_0: Kiṃ nu kho, bhante nāgasena, atidhammabhārena pathavī calatīti? Idha, mahārāja, dve
atk-s0203a0:323_1: sakaṭā ratanaparipūritā bhaveyyuṃ yāva mukhasamā. Ekasmā sakaṭato ratanaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0203a0:323_2: ekasmiṃ sakaṭe ākireyyuṃ, apinu kho taṃ, mahārāja, sakaṭaṃ dvinnampi sakaṭānaṃ ratanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:323_3: dhāreyyāti? Na hi, bhante, nābhipi tassa phaleyya, arāpi tassa bhijjeyyuṃ, nemipi
atk-s0203a0:323_4: tassa opateyya, akkhopi tassa bhijjeyyāti. Kiṃ nu kho, mahārāja, atiratanabhārena
atk-s0203a0:323_5: sakaṭaṃ bhijjatīti? Āma, bhanteti. Evameva kho, mahārāja, atidhammabhārena pathavī calatīti.
atk-s0203a0:324_0: Apica mahārāja imaṃ kāraṇaṃ buddhabalaparidīpanāya osāritaṃ, aññampi tattha abhirūpaṃ
atk-s0203a0:324_1: kāraṇaṃ suṇohi, yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti. Yadi, mahārāja,
atk-s0203a0:324_2: dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe uppajjeyyuṃ, tesaṃ parisāya vivādo uppajjeyya – “tumhākaṃ
atk-s0203a0:324_3: buddho amhākaṃ buddho”ti ubhatopakkhajātā bhaveyyuṃ. Yathā, mahārāja, dvinnaṃ balavāmaccānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:324_4: parisāya vivādo uppajjeyya ‘tumhākaṃ amacco amhākaṃ amacco’ti ubhatopakkhajātā honti,
atk-s0203a0:324_5: evameva kho, mahārāja, yadi, dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe uppajjeyyuṃ, tesaṃ parisāya
atk-s0203a0:324_6: vivādo uppajjeyya ‘tumhākaṃ buddho amhākaṃ buddho’ti ubhatopakkhajātā bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-s0203a0:324_7: Idaṃ tāva, mahārāja, ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ, yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti.
atk-s0203a0:325_0: Aparampi, mahārāja, uttariṃ kāraṇaṃ suṇohi, yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe
atk-s0203a0:325_1: nuppajjanti. Yadi, mahārāja, dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe uppajjeyyuṃ, aggo buddhoti
atk-s0203a0:325_2: yaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ micchā bhaveyya. Jeṭṭho buddhoti yaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ micchā bhaveyya.
atk-s0203a0:325_3: Seṭṭho buddhoti, visiṭṭho buddhoti, uttamo buddhoti, pavaro buddhoti, asamo buddhoti,
atk-s0203a0:325_4: asamasamo buddhoti, appaṭisamo buddhoti, appaṭibhāgo buddhoti, appaṭipuggalo buddhoti
atk-s0203a0:325_5: yaṃ vacanaṃ, taṃ micchā bhaveyya. Idampi kho tvaṃ, mahārāja, kāraṇaṃ atthato sampaṭiccha,
atk-s0203a0:325_6: yena kāraṇena dve sammāsambuddhā ekakkhaṇe nuppajjanti.
atk-s0203a0:326_0: Apica kho mahārāja buddhānaṃ bhagavantānaṃ sabhāvapakati esā, yaṃ ekoyeva buddho
atk-s0203a0:326_1: loke uppajjati. Kasmā kāraṇā? Mahantatāya sabbaññubuddhaguṇānaṃ. Aññampi mahārāja
atk-s0203a0:326_2: yaṃ loke mahantaṃ, taṃ ekaṃyeva hoti. Pathavī, mahārāja, mahantī, sā ekāyeva. Sāgaro
atk-s0203a0:326_3: mahanto, so ekoyeva. Sineru girirājā mahanto, so ekoyeva. Ākāso mahanto, so ekoyeva.
atk-s0203a0:326_4: Sakko mahanto, so ekoyeva. Māro mahanto, so ekoyeva. Brahmā mahanto, so ekoyeva.
atk-s0203a0:326_5: Tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho mahanto, so ekoyeva lokasmiṃ. Yattha te uppajjanti,
atk-s0203a0:326_6: tattha aññassa okāso na hoti. Tasmā, mahārāja, tathāgato arahaṃ sammāsambuddho ekoyeva
atk-s0203a0:326_7: lokasmiṃ uppajjatīti. Sukathito, bhante nāgasena, pañho opammehi kāraṇehī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:327_0: Ekissā lokadhātuyāti ekasmiṃ cakkavāḷe. Heṭṭhā imināva padena dasacakkavāḷasahassāni
atk-s0203a0:327_1: gahitāni tānipi, ekacakkavāḷeneva paricchindituṃ vaṭṭanti. Buddhā hi uppajjamānā
atk-s0203a0:327_2: imasmiṃyeva cakkavāḷe uppajjanti, uppajjanaṭṭhāne pana vārite ito aññesu cakkavāḷesu
atk-s0203a0:328_0: Apubbaṃ acarimanti ettha cakkaratanapātubhāvato pubbe pubbaṃ, tasseva antaradhānato
atk-s0203a0:328_1: pacchā carimaṃ. Tattha dvidhā cakkaratanassa antaradhānaṃ hoti, cakkavattino kālaṃkiriyato
atk-s0203a0:328_2: vā pabbajjāya vā. Antaradhāyamānañca pana taṃ kālaṃkiriyato vā pabbajjato vā sattame
atk-s0203a0:328_3: divase antaradhāyati, tato paraṃ cakkavattino pātubhāvo avārito.
atk-s0203a0:329_0: Kasmā pana ekacakkavāḷe dve cakkavattino nuppajjantīti. Vivādupacchedato acchariyabhāvato
atk-s0203a0:329_1: cakkaratanassa mahānubhāvato ca. Dvīsu hi uppajjantesu “amhākaṃ rājā mahanto amhākaṃ
atk-s0203a0:329_2: rājā mahanto”ti vivādo uppajjeyya. Ekasmiṃ dīpe cakkavattīti ca ekasmiṃ dīpe cakkavattīti
atk-s0203a0:329_3: ca anacchariyā bhaveyyuṃ. Yo cāyaṃ cakkaratanassa dvisahassadīpaparivāresu catūsu
atk-s0203a0:329_4: mahādīpesu issariyānuppadānasamattho mahānubhāvo, so parihāyetha. Iti vivādupacchedato
atk-s0203a0:329_5: acchariyabhāvato cakkaratanassa mahānubhāvato ca na ekacakkavāḷe dve uppajjanti.
atk-s0203a0:330: 130. Yaṃ itthī assa arahaṃ sammāsambuddhoti ettha tiṭṭhatu tāva sabbaññuguṇe nibbattetvā lokuttāraṇasamattho buddhabhāvo, paṇidhānamattampi itthiyā na sampajjati.
atk-s0203a0:334_0: Imāni hi paṇidhānasampattikāraṇāni. Iti paṇidhānampi sampādetuṃ asamatthāya itthiyā
atk-s0203a0:334_1: kuto buddhabhāvoti “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso yaṃ itthī assa arahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti
atk-s0203a0:334_2: vuttaṃ. Sabbākāraparipūro ca puññussayo sabbākāraparipūrameva attabhāvaṃ nibbattetīti
atk-s0203a0:335_0: Yaṃ itthī rājā assa cakkavattītiādīsupi yasmā itthiyā kosohitavatthaguyhatādīnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:335_1: abhāvena lakkhaṇāni na paripūrenti, itthiratanābhāvena sattaratanasamaṅgitā na sampajjati,
atk-s0203a0:335_2: sabbamanussehi ca adhiko attabhāvo na hoti, tasmā “aṭṭhānametaṃ anavakāso yaṃ itthī
atk-s0203a0:335_3: rājā assa cakkavattī”ti vuttaṃ. Yasmā ca sakkattādīni tīṇi ṭhānāni uttamāni, itthiliṅgañca
atk-s0203a0:336_0: Nanu ca yathā itthiliṅgaṃ, evaṃ purisaliṅgampi brahmaloke natthi? Tasmā “yaṃ puriso
atk-s0203a0:336_1: brahmattaṃ kareyya, ṭhānametaṃ vijjatī”tipi na vattabbaṃ siyāti. No na vattabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:336_2: Kasmā? Idha purisassa tattha nibbattanato. Brahmattanti hi mahābrahmattaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:336_3: Itthī ca idha jhānaṃ bhāvetvā kālaṃ katvā brahmapārisajjānaṃ sahabyataṃ upapajjati,
atk-s0203a0:336_4: na mahābrahmānaṃ, puriso pana tattha na uppajjatīti na vattabbo. Samānepi cettha
atk-s0203a0:336_5: ubhayaliṅgābhāve purisasaṇṭhānāva brahmāno, na itthisaṇṭhānā, tasmā suvuttamevetaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:337_0: 131. Kāyaduccaritassātiādīsu yathā nimbabījakosātakībījādīni madhuraphalaṃ na nibbattenti,
atk-s0203a0:337_1: asātaṃ amadhurameva nibbattenti, evaṃ kāyaduccaritādīni madhuravipākaṃ na nibbattenti,
atk-s0203a0:337_2: amadhurameva vipākaṃ nibbattenti. Yathā ca ucchubījasālibījādīni madhuraṃ sādurasameva
atk-s0203a0:337_3: phalaṃ nibbattenti, na asātaṃ kaṭukaṃ, evaṃ kāyasucaritādīni madhurameva vipākaṃ
atk-s0203a0:341_0: Kāyaduccaritasamaṅgītiādīsu samaṅgīti pañcavidhā samaṅgitā āyūhanasamaṅgitā cetanāsamaṅgitā
atk-s0203a0:341_2: āyūhanasamaṅgitāti vuccati. Tathā cetanāsamaṅgitā. Yāva pana arahattaṃ na pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0203a0:341_3: tāva sabbepi sattā pubbe upacitaṃ vipākārahaṃ kammaṃ sandhāya “kammasamaṅgino”ti
atk-s0203a0:341_4: vuccanti, esā kammasamaṅgitā. Vipākasamaṅgitā vipākakkhaṇeyeva veditabbā. Yāva pana
atk-s0203a0:341_5: sattā arahattaṃ na pāpuṇanti, tāva nesaṃ tato tato cavitvā niraye tāva uppajjamānānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:341_6: aggijālalohakumbhiādīhi upaṭṭhānākārehi nirayo, gabbhaseyyakattaṃ āpajjamānānaṃ mātukucchi,
atk-s0203a0:341_7: devesu uppajjamānānaṃ kapparukkhavimānādīhi upaṭṭhānākārehi devalokoti evaṃ uppattinimittaṃ
atk-s0203a0:341_8: upaṭṭhāti, iti nesaṃ iminā uppattinimittaupaṭṭhānena aparimuttatā upaṭṭhānasamaṅgitā
atk-s0203a0:341_9: nāma. Sā calati sesā niccalā. Niraye hi upaṭṭhitepi devaloko upaṭṭhāti, devaloke
atk-s0203a0:341_10: upaṭṭhitepi nirayo upaṭṭhāti, manussaloke upaṭṭhitepi tiracchānayoni upaṭṭhāti, tiracchānayoniyā
atk-s0203a0:342_0: Tatridaṃ vatthu – soṇagiripāde kira acelavihāre soṇatthero nāma eko dhammakathiko,
atk-s0203a0:342_1: tassa pitā sunakhajīviko ahosi. Thero taṃ paṭibāhantopi saṃvare ṭhapetuṃ asakkonto
atk-s0203a0:342_2: “mā nassi jarako”ti mahallakakāle akāmakaṃ pabbājesi. Tassa gilānaseyyāya nipannassa
atk-s0203a0:342_3: nirayo upaṭṭhāti, soṇagiripādato mahantā mahantā sunakhā āgantvā khāditukāmā viya
atk-s0203a0:342_4: samparivāresuṃ. So mahābhayabhīto – “vārehi, tāta soṇa, vārehi, tāta soṇā”ti āha.
atk-s0203a0:342_5: Kiṃ mahātherāti. Na passasi tātāti taṃ pavattiṃ ācikkhi. Soṇatthero – “kathañhi nāma
atk-s0203a0:342_6: mādisassa pitā niraye nibbattissati, patiṭṭhā’ssa bhavissāmī”ti sāmaṇerehi nānāpupphāni
atk-s0203a0:342_7: āharāpetvā cetiyaṅgaṇabodhiyaṅgaṇesu talasantharaṇapūjaṃ āsanapūjañca kāretvā pitaraṃ
atk-s0203a0:342_8: mañcena cetiyaṅgaṇaṃ āharitvā mañce nisīdāpetvā – “ayaṃ mahāthera-pūjā tumhākaṃ atthāya
atk-s0203a0:342_9: katā ‘ayaṃ me bhagavā duggatapaṇṇākāro’ti vatvā bhagavantaṃ vanditvā cittaṃ pasādehī”ti
atk-s0203a0:342_10: āha. So mahāthero pūjaṃ disvā tathā karonto cittaṃ pasādesi, tāvadevassa devaloko
atk-s0203a0:342_12: ca parivāretvā ṭhitāni viya ahesuṃ. So “apetha apetha soṇā”ti āha. Kimidaṃ therāti?
atk-s0203a0:342_13: Etā te, tāta, mātaro āgacchantīti. Thero “saggo upaṭṭhito mahātherassā”ti cintesi.
atk-s0203a0:342_14: Evaṃ upaṭṭhānasamaṅgitā calatīti veditabbā. Etāsu samaṅgitāsu idha āyūhanacetanākammasamaṅgitāvasena
atk-s0203a0:343_0: 132. Evaṃ vutte āyasmā ānandoti “evaṃ bhagavatā imasmiṃ sutte vutte thero ādito paṭṭhāya
atk-s0203a0:343_1: sabbasuttaṃ samannāharitvā evaṃ sassirikaṃ katvā desitasuttassa nāma bhagavatā nāmaṃ
atk-s0203a0:343_2: na gahitaṃ. Handassa nāmaṃ gaṇhāpessāmī”ti cintetvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca.
atk-s0203a0:345_0: Ānanda, yasmā imasmiṃ dhammapariyāye “aṭṭhārasa kho imā, ānanda, dhātuyo, cha imā,
atk-s0203a0:345_1: ānanda, dhātuyo”ti evaṃ bahudhātuyo vibhattā, tasmā tiha tvaṃ imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:345_3: cattāro parivaṭṭā kathitā, tasmā catuparivaṭṭotipi naṃ dhārehi. Yasmā ca ādāsaṃ olokentassa
atk-s0203a0:345_4: mukhanimittaṃ viya imaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ olokentassa ete dhātuādayo atthā pākaṭā honti,
atk-s0203a0:345_5: tasmā dhammādāsotipi naṃ dhārehi. Yasmā ca yathā nāma parasenamaddanā yodhā saṅgāmatūriyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:345_6: paggahetvā parasenaṃ pavisitvā sapatte madditvā attano jayaṃ gaṇhanti, evameva kilesasenamaddanā
atk-s0203a0:345_7: yogino idha vuttavasena vipassanaṃ paggahetvā kilese madditvā attano arahattajayaṃ
atk-s0203a0:345_8: gaṇhanti, tasmā amatadundubhītipi naṃ dhārehi. Yasmā ca yathā saṅgāmayodhā pañcāvudhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:345_9: gahetvā parasenaṃ viddhaṃsetvā jayaṃ gaṇhanti, evaṃ yoginopi idha vuttaṃ vipassanāvudhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:345_10: gahetvā kilesasenaṃ viddhaṃsetvā arahattajayaṃ gaṇhanti. Tasmā anuttaro saṅgāmavijayotipi naṃ dhārehīti.
atk-s0203a0:349_0: 133. Evaṃ me sutanti isigilisuttaṃ. Tattha aññāva samaññā ahosīti isigilissa isigilīti
atk-s0203a0:349_1: samaññāya uppannakāle vebhāro na vebhāroti paññāyittha, aññāyevassa samaññā ahosi.
atk-s0203a0:349_2: Aññā paññattīti idaṃ purimapadasseva vevacanaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0203a0:350_0: Tadā kira bhagavā sāyanhasamaye samāpattito vuṭṭhāya gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā yasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:350_1: ṭhāne nisinnānaṃ pañca pabbatā paññāyanti, tattha bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto nisīditvā
atk-s0203a0:350_2: ime pañca pabbate paṭipāṭiyā ācikkhi. Tattha na bhagavato pabbatehi attho atthi,
atk-s0203a0:350_3: iti imesu pana pabbatesu paṭipāṭiyā kathiyamānesu isigilissa isigilibhāvo kathetabbo
atk-s0203a0:350_4: hoti. Tasmiṃ kathiyamāne padumavatiyā puttānaṃ pañcasatānaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ nāmāni
atk-s0203a0:350_5: ceva padumavatiyā ca patthanā kathetabbā bhavissatīti bhagavā imaṃ pañca pabbatapaṭipāṭiṃ ācikkhi.
atk-s0203a0:351_0: Pavisantā dissanti paviṭṭhā na dissantīti yathāphāsukaṭṭhāne piṇḍāya caritvā katabhattakiccā
atk-s0203a0:351_1: āgantvā cetiyagabbhe yamakamahādvāraṃ vivarantā viya taṃ pabbataṃ dvedhā katvā anto
atk-s0203a0:351_2: pavisitvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānāni māpetvā tattha vasiṃsu, tasmā evamāha. Ime isīti
atk-s0203a0:352_0: Kadā pana te tattha vasiṃsu? Atīte kira anuppanne tathāgate bārāṇasiṃ upanissāya
atk-s0203a0:352_1: ekasmiṃ gāmake ekā kuladhītā khettaṃ rakkhamānā ekassa paccekabuddhassa pañcahi lājāsatehi
atk-s0203a0:352_2: saddhiṃ ekaṃ padumapupphaṃ datvā pañca puttasatāni patthesi. Tasmiṃyeva ca khaṇe
atk-s0203a0:352_3: pañcasatā migaluddakā madhuramaṃsaṃ datvā “etissā puttā bhaveyyāmā”ti patthayiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:352_4: Sā yāvatāyukaṃ ṭhatvā devaloke nibbattā, tato cutā jātassare padumagabbhe nibbatti.
atk-s0203a0:352_5: Tameko tāpaso disvā paṭijaggi, tassā vicarantiyāva pāduddhāre pāduddhāre bhūmito
atk-s0203a0:352_6: padumāni uṭṭhahanti. Eko vanacarako disvā bārāṇasirañño ārocesi. Rājā naṃ āharāpetvā
atk-s0203a0:352_7: aggamahesiṃ akāsi, tassā gabbho saṇṭhāsi. Mahāpadumakumāro mātukucchiyaṃ vasi, sesā
atk-s0203a0:352_8: gabbhamalaṃ nissā nibbattā. Vayappattā uyyāne padumassare kīḷantā ekekasmiṃ padume
atk-s0203a0:352_9: nisīditvā khayavayaṃ paṭṭhapetvā paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ nibbattayiṃsu. Ayaṃ tesaṃ byākaraṇagāthā ahosi –
atk-s0203a0:355: Tasmiṃ kāle te tattha vasiṃsu, tadā cassa pabbatassa isigilīti samaññā udapādi.
atk-s0203a0:356_0: 135. Ye sattasārāti ariṭṭho upariṭṭho tagarasikhī yasassī sudassano piyadassī gandhāro
atk-s0203a0:356_1: piṇḍolo upāsabho nīto tatho sutavā bhāvitattoti terasannaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ nāmāni
atk-s0203a0:356_2: vatvā idāni tesañca aññesañca gāthābandhena nāmāni ācikkhanto ye sattasārātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:356_3: Tattha sattasārāti sattānaṃ sārabhūtā. Anīghāti niddukkhā. Nirāsāti nittaṇhā.
atk-s0203a0:357_0: Dve jālinoti cūḷajāli mahājālīti dve jālināmakā. Santacittoti idampi ekassa nāmameva.
atk-s0203a0:357_1: Passi jahi upadhidukkhamūlanti ettha passi nāma so paccekabuddho, dukkhassa pana
atk-s0203a0:357_2: mūlaṃ upadhiṃ jahīti ayamassa thuti. Aparājitotipi ekassa nāmameva.
atk-s0203a0:358_0: Satthā pavattā sarabhaṅgo lomahaṃso uccaṅgamāyoti ime pañca janā. Asito anāsavo manomayoti
atk-s0203a0:358_1: imepi tayo janā. Mānacchido ca bandhumāti bandhumā nāma eko, mānassa pana chinnattā
atk-s0203a0:359: Ketumbharāgo ca mātaṅgo ariyoti ime tayo janā. Athaccutoti atha accuto. Accutagāmabyāmaṅkoti ime dve janā. Khemābhirato ca soratoti ime dveyeva.
atk-s0203a0:360_0: Sayho anomanikkamoti sayho nāma so buddho, anomavīriyattā pana anomanikkamoti vutto.
atk-s0203a0:360_1: Ānando nando upanando dvādasāti cattāro ānandā, cattāro nandā cattāro upanandāti
atk-s0203a0:360_2: evaṃ dvādasa. Bhāradvājo antimadehadhārīti bhāradvājo nāma so buddho. Antimadehadhārīti thuti.
atk-s0203a0:361_0: Taṇhacchidoti sikharissāyaṃ thuti. Vītarāgoti maṅgalassa thuti. Usabhacchidā jāliniṃ
atk-s0203a0:361_1: dukkhamūlanti usabho nāma so buddho dukkhamūlabhūtaṃ jāliniṃ acchidāti attho. Santaṃ
atk-s0203a0:361_2: padaṃ ajjhagamopanītoti upanīto nāma so buddho santaṃ padaṃ ajjhagamā. Vītarāgotipi
atk-s0203a0:361_3: ekassa nāmameva. Suvimuttacittoti ayaṃ kaṇhassa thuti.
atk-s0203a0:362_0: Ete ca aññe cāti ete pāḷiyaṃ āgatā ca pāḷiyaṃ anāgatā aññe ca etesaṃ ekanāmakāyeva.
atk-s0203a0:362_1: Imesu hi pañcasu paccekabuddhasatesu dvepi tayopi dasapi dvādasapi ānandādayo viya
atk-s0203a0:362_2: ekanāmakā ahesuṃ. Iti pāḷiyaṃ āgatanāmeheva sabbesaṃ nāmāni vuttāni hontīti ito paraṃ
atk-s0203a0:362_3: visuṃ visuṃ avatvā “ete ca aññe cā”ti āha. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:366_0: 136. Evaṃ me sutanti mahācattārīsakasuttaṃ. Tattha ariyanti niddosaṃ lokuttaraṃ,
atk-s0203a0:366_1: niddosañhi “ariya”nti vuccati. Sammāsamādhinti maggasamādhiṃ. Saupanisanti sapaccayaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:367_0: Parikkhatāti parivāritā. Sammādiṭṭhi pubbaṅgamā hotīti dvidhā sammādiṭṭhi pubbaṅgamā
atk-s0203a0:367_1: hoti purecārikā vipassanāsammādiṭṭhi ca maggasammādiṭṭhi ca. Vipassanāsammādiṭṭhi
atk-s0203a0:367_2: tebhūmakasaṅkhāre aniccādivasena parivīmaṃsati; maggasammādiṭṭhi pana parivīmaṃsanapariyosāne
atk-s0203a0:367_3: bhūmiladdhaṃ vaṭṭaṃ samugghāṭayamānā vūpasamayamānā sītudakaghaṭasahassaṃ matthake
atk-s0203a0:367_4: āsiñcamānā viya uppajjati. Yathā hi khettaṃ kurumāno kassako paṭhamaṃ araññe rukkhe
atk-s0203a0:367_5: chindati, pacchā aggiṃ deti, so aggi paṭhamaṃ chinne rukkhe anavasese jhāpeti, evameva
atk-s0203a0:367_6: vipassanāsammādiṭṭhi paṭhamaṃ aniccādivasena saṅkhāre vīmaṃsati, maggasammādiṭṭhi
atk-s0203a0:367_7: tāya vīmaṃsanatthaṃ saṅkhāre puna appavattivasena samugghāṭayamānā uppajjati, sā
atk-s0203a0:368_0: Micchādiṭṭhīti pajānātīti micchādiṭṭhiṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti lakkhaṇapaṭivedhena
atk-s0203a0:368_1: ārammaṇato pajānāti, sammādiṭṭhiṃ kiccato asammohato pajānāti. Sāssa hoti sammādiṭṭhīti
atk-s0203a0:368_2: sā evaṃ pajānanā assa sammādiṭṭhi nāma hoti.
atk-s0203a0:369: Dvāyaṃ vadāmīti dvayaṃ vadāmi, duvidhakoṭṭhāsaṃ vadāmīti attho. Puññabhāgiyāti puññakoṭṭhāsabhūtā. Upadhivepakkāti upadhisaṅkhātassa vipākassa dāyikā.
atk-s0203a0:370_0: Paññā paññindriyantiādīsu vibhajitvā vibhajitvā amatadvāraṃ paññapeti dassetīti paññā.
atk-s0203a0:370_1: Tasmiṃ atthe indattaṃ karotīti paññindriyaṃ. Avijjāya na kampatīti paññābalaṃ. Bojjhaṅgappattā
atk-s0203a0:370_2: hutvā catusaccadhamme vicinātīti dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo. Maggasampattiyā pasaṭṭhā
atk-s0203a0:370_3: sobhanā diṭṭhīti sammādiṭṭhi. Ariyamaggassa aṅganti maggaṅgaṃ. Soti so bhikkhu. Pahānāyāti
atk-s0203a0:370_4: pajahanatthāya. Upasampadāyāti paṭilābhatthāya. Sammāvāyāmoti niyyāniko kusalavāyāmo.
atk-s0203a0:370_5: Satoti satiyā samannāgato hutvā. Anuparidhāvanti anuparivattantīti sahajātā ca purejātā
atk-s0203a0:370_6: ca hutvā parivārenti. Ettha hi sammāvāyāmo ca sammāsati ca lokuttarasammādiṭṭhiṃ
atk-s0203a0:370_7: sahajātā parivārenti rājānaṃ viya ekarathe ṭhitā asiggāhachattaggāhā. Vipassanāsammādiṭṭhi
atk-s0203a0:370_8: pana purejātā hutvā parivāreti rathassa purato pattikādayo viya. Dutiyapabbato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0203a0:370_9: pana sammāsaṅkappādīnaṃ tayopi sahajātaparivārāva hontīti veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:371_0: 137. Micchāsaṅkappoti pajānātīti micchāsaṅkappaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti lakkhaṇapaṭivedhena
atk-s0203a0:371_1: ārammaṇato pajānāti sammāsaṅkappaṃ kiccato asammohato pajānāti. Ito aparesu sammāvācādīsupi
atk-s0203a0:371_2: evameva yojanā veditabbā. Kāmasaṅkappādayo dvedhāvitakkasutte vuttāyeva.
atk-s0203a0:372_0: Takkotiādīsu takkanavasena takko. Sveva ca upasaggena padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vitakkoti vutto,
atk-s0203a0:372_1: sveva saṅkappanavasena saṅkappo. Ekaggo hutvā ārammaṇe appetīti appanā. Upasaggena
atk-s0203a0:372_2: pana padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā byappanāti vuttaṃ. Cetaso abhiniropanāti cittassa abhiniropanā.
atk-s0203a0:372_3: Vitakkasmiñhi sati vitakko ārammaṇe cittaṃ abhiniropeti vitakke pana asati attanoyeva
atk-s0203a0:372_4: dhammatāya cittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ abhiruhati jātisampanno abhiññātapuriso viya rājagehaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:372_5: Anabhiññātassa hi paṭihārena vā dovārikena vā attho hoti, abhiññātaṃ jātisampannaṃ
atk-s0203a0:372_6: sabbe rājarājamahāmattā jānantīti attanova dhammatāya nikkhamati ceva pavisati ca,
atk-s0203a0:372_7: evaṃsampadamidaṃ veditabbaṃ. Vācaṃ saṅkharotīti vacīsaṅkhāro. Ettha ca lokiyavitakko
atk-s0203a0:372_8: vācaṃ saṅkharoti, na lokuttaro. Kiñcāpi na saṅkharoti, vacīsaṅkhārotveva ca panassa
atk-s0203a0:372_9: nāmaṃ hoti. Sammāsaṅkappaṃ anuparidhāvantīti lokuttarasammāsaṅkappaṃ parivārenti.
atk-s0203a0:372_10: Ettha ca tayopi nekkhammasaṅkappādayo pubbabhāge nānācittesu labbhanti, maggakkhaṇe
atk-s0203a0:372_11: pana tiṇṇampi kāmasaṅkappādīnañca padacchedaṃ samugghātaṃ karonto maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamāno
atk-s0203a0:372_12: ekova sammāsaṅkappo uppajjitvā nekkhammasaṅkappādivasena tīṇi nāmāni labhati. Parato
atk-s0203a0:373_0: 138. Musāvādā veramaṇītiādīsu viratipi cetanāpi vaṭṭati. Āratītiādīsu vacīduccaritehi
atk-s0203a0:373_1: ārakā ramatīti ārati. Vinā tehi ramatīti virati. Tato tato paṭinivattāva hutvā tehi
atk-s0203a0:373_2: vinā ramatīti paṭivirati. Upasaggavasena vā padaṃ vaḍḍhitaṃ, sabbamidaṃ oramanabhāvasseva
atk-s0203a0:373_3: adhivacanaṃ. Veraṃ maṇati vināsetīti veramaṇi. Idampi oramanasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:374: 139. Pāṇātipātā veramaṇītiādīsupi cetanā viratīti ubhayampi vaṭṭatiyeva.
atk-s0203a0:375_0: 140. Kuhanātiādīsu tividhena kuhanavatthunā lokaṃ etāya kuhayanti vimhāpayantīti
atk-s0203a0:375_1: kuhanā. Lābhasakkāratthikā hutvā etāya lapantīti lapanā. Nimittaṃ sīlametesanti nemittikā,
atk-s0203a0:375_2: tesaṃ bhāvo nemittikatā. Nippeso sīlametesanti nippesikā, tesaṃ bhāvo nippesikatā.
atk-s0203a0:375_3: Lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanti magganti pariyesantīti lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanā, tesaṃ
atk-s0203a0:375_4: bhāvo lābhena lābhaṃ nijigīsanatā. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārena panetā kuhanādikā
atk-s0203a0:375_5: visuddhimagge sīlaniddeseyeva pāḷiñca aṭṭhakathañca āharitvā pakāsitā. Micchāājīvassa
atk-s0203a0:375_6: pahānāyāti ettha na kevalaṃ pāḷiyaṃ āgatova micchāājīvo, ājīvahetu pana pavattitā
atk-s0203a0:375_7: pāṇātipātādayo sattakammapathacetanāpi micchāājīvova. Tāsaṃyeva sattannaṃ cetanānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:375_8: padapacchedaṃ samugghātaṃ kurumānaṃ maggaṅgaṃ pūrayamānā uppannā virati sammāājīvo nāma.
atk-s0203a0:376_0: 141. Sammādiṭṭhissāti maggasammādiṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhitassa puggalassa. Sammāsaṅkappo pahotīti
atk-s0203a0:376_1: maggasammāsaṅkappo pahoti, phalasammādiṭṭhissapi phalasammāsaṅkappo pahotīti evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:376_2: sabbapadesu attho veditabbo. Sammāñāṇassa sammāvimuttīti ettha pana maggasammāsamādhimhi
atk-s0203a0:376_3: ṭhitassa maggapaccavekkhaṇaṃ sammāñāṇaṃ pahoti, phalasammāsamādhimhi ṭhitassa phalapaccavekkhaṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:376_4: sammāñāṇaṃ pahoti. Maggapaccavekkhaṇasammāñāṇe ca ṭhitassa maggasammāvimutti pahoti,
atk-s0203a0:376_5: phalapaccavekkhaṇasammāñāṇe ṭhitassa phalasammāvimutti pahotīti attho. Ettha ca ṭhapetvā
atk-s0203a0:376_6: aṭṭha phalaṅgāni sammāñāṇaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ katvā sammāvimuttiṃ phalaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭatīti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:377_0: 142. Sammādiṭṭhissa, bhikkhave, micchādiṭṭhi nijjiṇṇā hotītiādīsu avasesanikāyabhāṇakā
atk-s0203a0:377_1: phalaṃ kathitanti vadanti, majjhimabhāṇakā pana dasannaṃ nijjaravatthūnaṃ āgataṭṭhāne
atk-s0203a0:377_2: maggo kathitoti vadanti. Tattha dassanaṭṭhena sammādiṭṭhi veditabbā, viditakaraṇaṭṭhena
atk-s0203a0:378_0: Vīsati kusalapakkhāti sammādiṭṭhiādayo dasa, “sammādiṭṭhipaccayā ca aneke kusalā
atk-s0203a0:378_1: dhammā”tiādinā nayena vuttā dasāti evaṃ vīsati kusalapakkhā honti. Vīsati akusalapakkhāti
atk-s0203a0:378_2: “micchādiṭṭhi nijjiṇṇā hotī”tiādinā nayena vuttā micchādiṭṭhiādayo dasa, “ye ca micchādiṭṭhipaccayā
atk-s0203a0:378_3: aneke pāpakā”tiādinā vuttā dasa cāti evaṃ vīsati akusalapakkhā veditabbā. Mahācattārīsakoti
atk-s0203a0:379_0: Imasmiñca pana sutte pañca sammādiṭṭhiyo kathitā vipassanāsammādiṭṭhi kammassakatāsammādiṭṭhi
atk-s0203a0:379_2: micchādiṭṭhīti pajānātī”tiādinā nayena vuttā vipassanāsammādiṭṭhi nāma. “Atthi dinna”ntiādinā
atk-s0203a0:379_3: nayena vuttā kammassakatāsammādiṭṭhi nāma. “Sammādiṭṭhissa, bhikkhave, sammāsaṅkappo
atk-s0203a0:379_4: pahotī”ti ettha pana maggasammādiṭṭhi phalasammādiṭṭhīti dvepi kathitā. “Sammāñāṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:379_5: pahotī”ti. Ettha pana paccavekkhaṇāsammādiṭṭhi kathitāti veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:380_0: 143. Sammādiṭṭhiṃ ce bhavaṃ garahatīti micchādiṭṭhi nāmāyaṃ sobhanāti vadantopi sammādiṭṭhi
atk-s0203a0:380_1: nāmāyaṃ na sobhanāti vadantopi sammādiṭṭhiṃ garahati nāma. Okkalāti okkalajanapadavāsino.
atk-s0203a0:380_2: Vassabhaññāti vasso ca bhañño cāti dve janā. Ahetuvādāti natthi hetu natthi paccayo
atk-s0203a0:380_3: sattānaṃ visuddhiyāti evamādivādino. Akiriyavādāti karoto na karīyati pāpanti evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:380_4: kiriyapaṭikkhepavādino. Natthikavādāti natthi dinnantiādivādino. Te imesu tīsupi
atk-s0203a0:380_5: dassanesu okkantaniyāmā ahesuṃ. Kathaṃ panetesu niyāmo hotīti. Yo hi evarūpaṃ laddhiṃ
atk-s0203a0:380_6: gahetvā rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhāne nisinno sajjhāyati vīmaṃsati, tassa “natthi hetu natthi
atk-s0203a0:380_7: paccayo karoto na karīyati pāpaṃ, natthi dinnaṃ, kāyassa bhedā ucchijjatī”ti tasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:380_8: ārammaṇe micchāsati santiṭṭhati, cittaṃ ekaggaṃ hoti, javanāni javanti. Paṭhamajavane
atk-s0203a0:380_9: satekiccho hoti, tathā dutiyādīsu. Sattame buddhānampi atekiccho anivattī ariṭṭhakaṇḍakasadiso hoti.
atk-s0203a0:381_0: Tattha koci ekaṃ dassanaṃ okkamati, koci dve, koci tīṇipi, niyatamicchādiṭṭhikova
atk-s0203a0:381_1: hoti, patto saggamaggāvaraṇañceva mokkhamaggāvaraṇañca. Abhabbo tassa attabhāvassa
atk-s0203a0:381_2: anantaraṃ saggampi gantuṃ, pageva mokkhaṃ, vaṭṭakhāṇu nāmesa satto pathavīgopako,
atk-s0203a0:381_3: yebhuyyena evarūpassa bhavato vuṭṭhānaṃ natthi. Vassabhaññāpi edisā ahesuṃ. Nindābyārosaupārambhabhayāti
atk-s0203a0:381_4: attano nindābhayena ghaṭṭanabhayena upavādabhayena cāti attho. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:385_0: 144. Evaṃ me sutanti ānāpānassatisuttaṃ. Tattha aññehi cāti ṭhapetvā pāḷiyaṃ āgate
atk-s0203a0:385_1: dasa there aññehipi abhiññātehi bahūhi sāvakehi saddhiṃ. Tadā kira mahā bhikkhusaṅgho
atk-s0203a0:386_0: Ovadanti anusāsantīti āmisasaṅgahena dhammasaṅgahena cāti dvīhi saṅgahehi saṅgaṇhitvā
atk-s0203a0:386_1: kammaṭṭhānovādānusāsanīhi ovadanti ca anusāsanti ca. Te cāti cakāro āgamasandhimattaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:386_2: Uḷāraṃ pubbenāparaṃ visesaṃ jānantīti sīlaparipūraṇādito pubbavisesato uḷārataraṃ
atk-s0203a0:387_0: 145. Āraddhoti tuṭṭho. Appattassa pattiyāti appattassa arahattassa pāpuṇanatthaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:387_1: Sesapadadvayepi ayameva attho. Komudiṃ cātumāsininti pacchimakattikacātumāsapuṇṇamaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:387_2: Sā hi kumudānaṃ atthitāya komudī, catunnaṃ vassikānaṃ māsānaṃ pariyosānattā cātumāsinīti
atk-s0203a0:387_3: vuccati. Āgamessāmīti udikkhissāmi, ajja apavāretvā yāva sā āgacchati, tāva katthaci
atk-s0203a0:387_4: agantvā idheva vasissāmīti attho. Iti bhikkhūnaṃ pavāraṇasaṅgahaṃ anujānanto evamāha.
atk-s0203a0:388_0: Pavāraṇasaṅgaho nāma ñattidutiyena kammena diyyati kassa panesa diyyati, kassa na
atk-s0203a0:388_1: diyyatīti. Akārakassa tāva bālaputhujjanassa na diyyati, tathā āraddhavipassakassa
atk-s0203a0:388_2: ceva ariyasāvakassa ca. Yassa pana samatho vā taruṇo hoti vipassanā vā, tassa diyyati.
atk-s0203a0:388_3: Bhagavāpi tadā bhikkhūnaṃ cittācāraṃ parivīmaṃsanto samathavipassanānaṃ taruṇabhāvaṃ
atk-s0203a0:388_4: ñatvā – “mayi ajja pavārente disāsu vassaṃvuṭṭhā bhikkhū idha osarissanti. Tato ime
atk-s0203a0:388_5: bhikkhū vuḍḍhatarehi bhikkhūhi senāsane gahite visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ na sakkhissanti.
atk-s0203a0:388_6: Sacepi cārikaṃ pakkamissāmi, imesaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ dullabhameva bhavissati. Mayi pana
atk-s0203a0:388_7: apavārente bhikkhūpi imaṃ sāvatthiṃ na osarissanti, ahampi cārikaṃ na pakkamissāmi,
atk-s0203a0:388_8: evaṃ imesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ apalibuddhaṃ bhavissati. Te attano attano vasanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0203a0:388_9: phāsu viharantā samathavipassanā thāmajātā katvā visesaṃ nibbattetuṃ sakkhissantī”ti
atk-s0203a0:388_10: so taṃdivasaṃ apavāretvā kattikapuṇṇamāyaṃ pavāressāmīti bhikkhūnaṃ pavāraṇasaṅgahaṃ
atk-s0203a0:388_11: anujāni. Pavāraṇasaṅgahasmiñhi laddhe yassa nissayapaṭipannassa ācariyupajjhāyā pakkamanti,
atk-s0203a0:388_12: sopi “sace patirūpo nissayadāyako āgamissati, tassa santike nissayaṃ gaṇhissāmī”ti
atk-s0203a0:388_13: yāva gimhānaṃ pacchimamāsā vasituṃ labhati. Sacepi saṭṭhivassā bhikkhū āgacchanti,
atk-s0203a0:388_14: tassa senāsanaṃ gahetuṃ na labhanti. Ayañca pana pavāraṇasaṅgaho ekassa dinnopi sabbesaṃ dinnoyeva hoti.
atk-s0203a0:389_0: Sāvatthiṃ osarantīti bhagavatā pavāraṇasaṅgaho dinnoti sutasutaṭṭhāneyeva yathāsabhāvena
atk-s0203a0:389_1: ekaṃ māsaṃ vasitvā kattikapuṇṇamāya uposathaṃ katvā osarante sandhāya idaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:389_2: Pubbenāparanti idha taruṇasamathavipassanāsu kammaṃ katvā samathavipassanā thāmajātā
atk-s0203a0:389_3: akaṃsu, ayaṃ pubbe viseso nāma. Tato samāhitena cittena saṅkhāre sammasitvā keci
atk-s0203a0:389_4: sotāpattiphalaṃ…pe… keci arahattaṃ sacchikariṃsu. Ayaṃ aparo uḷāro viseso nāma.
atk-s0203a0:390_0: 146. Alanti yuttaṃ. Yojanagaṇanānīti ekaṃ yojanaṃ yojanameva, dasapi yojanāni yojanāneva,
atk-s0203a0:390_1: tato uddhaṃ yojanagaṇanānīti vuccanti. Idha pana yojanasatampi yojanasahassampi adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:390_2: Puṭosenāpīti puṭosaṃ vuccati pātheyyaṃ. taṃ pātheyyaṃ gahetvāpi upasaṅkamituṃ yuttamevāti
atk-s0203a0:390_3: attho. “Puṭaṃsenā”tipi pāṭho, tassattho – puṭo aṃse assāti puṭaṃso, tena puṭaṃsena,
atk-s0203a0:391_0: 147. Idāni evarūpehi caraṇehi samannāgatā ettha bhikkhū atthīti dassetuṃ santi, bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:391_1: Tattha catunnaṃ satipaṭṭhānānantiādīni tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ abhiniviṭṭhakammaṭṭhānadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0203a0:391_2: vuttāni. Tattha sattatiṃsa bodhipakkhiyadhammā lokiyalokuttarā kathitā. Tatra hi
atk-s0203a0:391_3: ye bhikkhū tasmiṃ khaṇe maggaṃ bhāventi, tesaṃ lokuttarā honti. Āraddhavipassakānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:391_4: lokiyā. Aniccasaññābhāvanānuyoganti ettha saññāsīsena vipassanā kathitā. Yasmā panettha
atk-s0203a0:391_5: ānāpānakammaṭṭhānavasena abhiniviṭṭhāva bahū bhikkhū, tasmā sesakammaṭṭhānāni saṅkhepena
atk-s0203a0:391_6: kathetvā ānāpānakammaṭṭhānaṃ vitthārena kathento ānāpānassati, bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:391_7: Idaṃ pana ānāpānakammaṭṭhānaṃ sabbākārena visuddhimagge vitthāritaṃ, tasmā tattha
atk-s0203a0:391_8: vuttanayenevassa pāḷittho ca bhāvanānayo ca veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:392_0: 149. Kāyaññataranti pathavīkāyādīsu catūsu kāyesu aññataraṃ vadāmi, vāyo kāyaṃ vadāmīti
atk-s0203a0:392_1: attho. Atha vā rūpāyatanaṃ…pe… kabaḷīkāro āhāroti pañcavīsati rūpakoṭṭhāsā rūpakāyo
atk-s0203a0:392_2: nāma. Tesu ānāpānaṃ phoṭṭhabbāyatane saṅgahitattā kāyaññataraṃ hoti, tasmāpi evamāha.
atk-s0203a0:392_3: Tasmātihāti yasmā catūsu kāyesu aññataraṃ vāyokāyaṃ, pañcavīsatirūpakoṭṭhāse vā rūpakāye
atk-s0203a0:392_4: aññataraṃ ānāpānaṃ anupassati, tasmā kāye kāyānupassīti attho. Evaṃ sabbattha attho
atk-s0203a0:392_5: veditabbo. Vedanāññataranti tīsu vedanāsu aññataraṃ, sukhavedanaṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:392_6: Sādhukaṃ manasikāranti pītipaṭisaṃveditādivasena uppannaṃ sundaramanasikāraṃ. Kiṃ
atk-s0203a0:392_7: pana manasikāro sukhavedanā hotīti. Na hoti, desanāsīsaṃ panetaṃ. Yatheva hi “aniccasaññābhāvanānuyogamanuyuttā”ti
atk-s0203a0:392_8: ettha saññānāmena paññā vuttā, evamidhāpi manasikāranāmena vedanā vuttāti veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:392_9: Etasmiṃ catukke paṭhamapade pītisīsena vedanā vuttā, dutiyapade sukhanti sarūpeneva
atk-s0203a0:392_10: vuttā. Cittasaṅkhārapadadvaye “saññā ca vedanā ca cetasikā, ete dhammā cittapaṭibaddhā
atk-s0203a0:392_11: cittasaṅkhārā”ti vacanato “vitakkavicāre ṭhapetvā sabbepi cittasampayuttakā dhammā
atk-s0203a0:392_12: cittasaṅkhāre saṅgahitā”ti vacanato cittasaṅkhāranāmena vedanā vuttā. Taṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0203a0:393_0: Evaṃ santepi yasmā esā vedanā ārammaṇaṃ na hoti, tasmā vedanānupassanā na yujjatīti.
atk-s0203a0:393_1: No na yujjati, satipaṭṭhānavaṇṇanāyampi hi “taṃtaṃsukhādīnaṃ vatthuṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā
atk-s0203a0:393_2: vedanāva vedayati, taṃ pana vedanāpavattiṃ upādāya ‘ahaṃ vedayāmī’ti vohāramattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:393_3: hotī”ti vuttaṃ. Apica pītipaṭisaṃvedītiādīnaṃ atthavaṇṇanāyametassa parihāro vuttoyeva.
atk-s0203a0:394_0: “Dvīhākārehi pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇato ca asammohato ca. Kathaṃ ārammaṇato
atk-s0203a0:394_1: pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti? Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjati, tassa samāpattikkhaṇe jhānapaṭilābhena
atk-s0203a0:394_2: ārammaṇato pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti ārammaṇassa paṭisaṃviditattā. Kathaṃ asammohato
atk-s0203a0:394_3: (pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti)? Sappītike dve jhāne samāpajjitvā vuṭṭhāya jhānasampayuttaṃ
atk-s0203a0:394_4: pītiṃ khayato vayato sammasati, tassa vipassanākkhaṇe lakkhaṇapaṭivedhā asammohato
atk-s0203a0:394_5: pīti paṭisaṃviditā hoti. Vuttampi cetaṃ paṭisambhidāyaṃ ‘dīghaṃ assāsavasena cittassa
atk-s0203a0:394_6: ekaggataṃ avikkhepaṃ pajānato sati upaṭṭhitā hoti, tāya satiyā, tena ñāṇena sā pīti
atk-s0203a0:394_7: paṭisaṃviditā hotī’ti. Eteneva nayena avasesapadānipi atthato veditabbānī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:395_0: Iti yatheva jhānapaṭilābhena ārammaṇato pītisukhacittasaṅkhārā paṭisaṃviditā honti,
atk-s0203a0:395_1: evaṃ imināpi jhānasampayuttena vedanāsaṅkhātamanasikārapaṭilābhena ārammaṇato vedanā
atk-s0203a0:395_2: paṭisaṃviditā hoti. Tasmā suvuttametaṃ hoti “vedanāsu vedanānupassī tasmiṃ samaye
atk-s0203a0:396_0: Nāhaṃ, bhikkhave, muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassāti ettha ayamadhippāyo – yasmā cittapaṭisaṃvedī
atk-s0203a0:396_1: assasissāmītiādinā nayena pavatto bhikkhu kiñcāpi assāsapassāsanimittaṃ ārammaṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:396_2: karoti, tassa pana cittassa ārammaṇe satiñca sampajaññañca upaṭṭhapetvā pavattanato
atk-s0203a0:396_3: citte cittānupassīyeva nāmesa hoti. Na hi muṭṭhassatissa asampajānassa ānāpānassatibhāvanā
atk-s0203a0:396_4: atthi. Tasmā ārammaṇato cittapaṭisaṃviditādivasena citte cittānupassī tasmiṃ samaye
atk-s0203a0:396_5: bhikkhu viharatīti. So yaṃ taṃ abhijjhādomanassānaṃ pahānaṃ, taṃ paññāya disvā sādhukaṃ
atk-s0203a0:396_6: ajjhupekkhitā hotīti ettha abhijjhāya kāmacchandanīvaraṇaṃ, domanassavasena byāpādanīvaraṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:396_7: dassitaṃ. Idañhi catukkaṃ vipassanāvaseneva vuttaṃ, dhammānupassanā ca nīvaraṇapabbādivasena
atk-s0203a0:396_8: chabbidhā hoti, tassā nīvaraṇapabbaṃ ādi, tassapi idaṃ nīvaraṇadvayaṃ ādi, iti dhammānupassanāya
atk-s0203a0:396_9: ādiṃ dassetuṃ “abhijjhādomanassāna”nti āha. Pahānanti aniccānupassanāya niccasaññaṃ
atk-s0203a0:396_10: pajahatīti evaṃ pahānakarañāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ. Taṃ paññāya disvāti taṃ aniccavirāganirodhapaṭinissaggāñāṇasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0203a0:396_11: pahānañāṇaṃ aparāya vipassanāpaññāya, tampi aparāyāti evaṃ vipassanāparamparaṃ dasseti.
atk-s0203a0:396_12: Ajjhupekkhitā hotīti yañca samathapaṭipannaṃ ajjhupekkhati, yañca ekato upaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:396_13: ajjhupekkhatīti dvidhā ajjhupekkhati nāma. Tattha sahajātānampi ajjhupekkhanā hoti
atk-s0203a0:396_14: ārammaṇassapi ajjhupekkhanā, idha ārammaṇaajjhupekkhanā adhippetā. Tasmātiha, bhikkhaveti
atk-s0203a0:396_15: yasmā aniccānupassī assasissāmītiādinā nayena pavatto na kevalaṃ nīvaraṇādidhamme,
atk-s0203a0:396_16: abhijjhādomanassasīsena pana vuttānaṃ dhammānaṃ pahānañāṇampi paññāya disvā ajjhupekkhitā
atk-s0203a0:396_17: hoti, tasmā “dhammesu dhammānupassī tasmiṃ samaye bhikkhu viharatī”ti veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:397_0: 150. Pavicinatīti aniccādivasena pavicinati. Itaraṃ padadvayaṃ etasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:397_2: cittampi passambhati. Samādhiyatīti sammā ṭhapiyati, appanāpattaṃ viya hoti. Ajjhupekkhitā
atk-s0203a0:398_0: Evaṃ cuddasavidhena kāyapariggāhakassa bhikkhuno tasmiṃ kāye sati satisambojjhaṅgo,
atk-s0203a0:398_1: satiyā sampayuttaṃ ñāṇaṃ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo, taṃsampayuttameva kāyikacetasikavīriyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:398_2: vīriyasambojjhaṅgo, pīti, passaddhi, cittekaggatā samādhisambojjhaṅgo, imesaṃ channaṃ
atk-s0203a0:398_4: Yatheva hi samappavattesu assesu sārathino “ayaṃ olīyatī”ti tudanaṃ vā, “ayaṃ atidhāvatī”ti
atk-s0203a0:398_5: ākaḍḍhanaṃ vā natthi, kevalaṃ evaṃ passamānassa ṭhitākārova hoti, evameva imesaṃ
atk-s0203a0:398_7: nāma hoti. Ettāvatā kiṃ kathitaṃ? Ekacittakkhaṇikā nānārasalakkhaṇā vipassanāsambojjhaṅgā nāma kathitā.
atk-s0203a0:399_0: 152. Vivekanissitantiādīni vuttatthāneva. Ettha pana ānāpānapariggāhikā sati lokiyā
atk-s0203a0:399_1: hoti, lokiyā ānāpānā lokiyasatipaṭṭhānaṃ paripūrenti, lokiyā satipaṭṭhānā lokuttarabojjhaṅge
atk-s0203a0:399_2: paripūrenti, lokuttarā bojjhaṅgā vijjāvimuttiphalanibbānaṃ paripūrenti. Iti lokiyassa
atk-s0203a0:399_3: āgataṭṭhāne lokiyaṃ kathitaṃ, lokuttarassa āgataṭṭhāne lokuttaraṃ kathitanti. Thero
atk-s0203a0:399_4: panāha “aññattha evaṃ hoti, imasmiṃ pana sutte lokuttaraṃ upari āgataṃ, lokiyā ānāpānā
atk-s0203a0:399_5: lokiyasatipaṭṭhāne paripūrenti, lokiyā satipaṭṭhānā lokiye bojjhaṅge paripūrenti,
atk-s0203a0:399_6: lokiyā bojjhaṅgā lokuttaraṃ vijjāvimuttiphalanibbānaṃ paripūrenti, vijjāvimuttipadena
atk-s0203a0:403_0: 153-4. Evaṃ me sutanti kāyagatāsatisuttaṃ. Tattha gehasitāti pañcakāmaguṇanissitā.
atk-s0203a0:403_1: Sarasaṅkappāti dhāvanasaṅkappā. Sarantīti hi sarā, dhāvantīti attho. Ajjhattamevāti
atk-s0203a0:403_2: gocarajjhattasmiṃyeva. Kāyagatāsatinti kāyapariggāhikampi kāyārammaṇampi satiṃ. Kāyapariggāhikanti
atk-s0203a0:403_3: vutte samatho kathito hoti, kāyārammaṇanti vutte vipassanā. Ubhayena samathavipassanā kathitā honti.
atk-s0203a0:404: Puna caparaṃ…pe… evampi, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kāyagatāsatiṃ bhāvetīti satipaṭṭhāne cuddasavidhena kāyānupassanā kathitā.
atk-s0203a0:405_0: 156. Antogadhāvāssāti tassa bhikkhuno bhāvanāya abbhantaragatāva honti. Vijjābhāgiyāti
atk-s0203a0:405_1: ettha sampayogavasena vijjaṃ bhajantīti vijjābhāgiyā. Vijjābhāge vijjākoṭṭhāse vattantītipi
atk-s0203a0:405_2: vijjābhāgiyā. Tattha vipassanāñāṇaṃ, manomayiddhi, cha abhiññāti aṭṭha vijjā. Purimena
atk-s0203a0:405_3: atthena tāhi sampayuttadhammāpi vijjābhāgiyā. Pacchimena atthena tāsu yā kāci ekā
atk-s0203a0:405_4: vijjā vijjā, sesā vijjābhāgiyāti evaṃ vijjāpi vijjāya sampayuttā dhammāpi vijjābhāgiyāteva
atk-s0203a0:405_5: veditabbā. Cetasā phuṭoti ettha duvidhaṃ pharaṇaṃ āpopharaṇañca, dibbacakkhupharaṇañca,
atk-s0203a0:405_6: tattha āpokasiṇaṃ samāpajjitvā āpena pharaṇaṃ āpopharaṇaṃ nāma. Evaṃ phuṭepi mahāsamudde
atk-s0203a0:405_7: sabbā samuddaṅgamā kunnadiyo antogadhāva honti, ālokaṃ pana vaḍḍhetvā dibbacakkhunā
atk-s0203a0:405_8: sakalasamuddassa dassanaṃ dibbacakkhupharaṇaṃ nāma. Evaṃ pharaṇepi mahāsamudde sabbā
atk-s0203a0:406: Otāranti vivaraṃ chiddaṃ. Ārammaṇanti kilesuppattipaccayaṃ. Labhetha otāranti labheyya pavesanaṃ, vinivijjhitvā yāva pariyosānā gaccheyyāti attho. Nikkhepananti nikkhipanaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:407: 157. Evaṃ abhāvitakāyagatāsatiṃ puggalaṃ allamattikapuñjādīhi upametvā idāni bhāvitakāyagatāsatiṃ sāraphalakādīhi upametuṃ seyyathāpītiādimāha. Tattha aggaḷaphalakanti kavāṭaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:408_0: 158. Kākapeyyoti mukhavaṭṭiyaṃ nisīditvā kākena gīvaṃ anāmetvāva pātabbo. Abhiññāsacchikaraṇīyassāti
atk-s0203a0:408_1: abhiññāya sacchikātabbassa. Sakkhibhabbataṃ pāpuṇātīti paccakkhabhāvaṃ pāpuṇāti.
atk-s0203a0:408_2: Sati sati āyataneti satisati kāraṇe. Kiṃ panettha kāraṇanti? Abhiññāva kāraṇaṃ. Āḷibandhāti mariyādabaddhā.
atk-s0203a0:409_0: Yānīkatāyāti yuttayānaṃ viya katāya. Vatthukatāyāti patiṭṭhākatāya. Anuṭṭhitāyāti
atk-s0203a0:409_1: anuppavattitāya. Paricitāyāti paricayakatāya. Susamāraddhāyāti suṭṭhu samāraddhāya
atk-s0203a0:413: 160. Evaṃ me sutanti saṅkhārupapattisuttaṃ. Tattha saṅkhārupapattinti saṅkhārānaṃyeva upapattiṃ, na sattassa, na posassa, puññābhisaṅkhārena vā bhavūpagakkhandhānaṃ upapattiṃ.
atk-s0203a0:414_0: 161. Saddhāya samannāgatoti saddhādayo pañca dhammā lokikā vaṭṭanti. Dahatīti ṭhapeti.
atk-s0203a0:414_1: Adhiṭṭhātīti patiṭṭhāpeti. Saṅkhārā ca vihārā cāti saha patthanāya saddhādayova pañca
atk-s0203a0:414_2: dhammā. Tatrupapattiyāti tasmiṃ ṭhāne nibbattanatthāya. Ayaṃ maggo ayaṃ paṭipadāti
atk-s0203a0:414_3: saha patthanāya pañca dhammāva. Yassa hi pañca dhammā atthi, na patthanā, tassa gati
atk-s0203a0:414_4: anibaddhā. Yassa patthanā atthi, na pañca dhammā, tassapi anibaddhā. Yesaṃ ubhayaṃ
atk-s0203a0:414_5: atthi, tesaṃ gati nibaddhā. Yathā hi ākāse khittadaṇḍo aggena vā majjhena vā mūlena
atk-s0203a0:414_6: vā nipatissatīti niyamo natthi, evaṃ sattānaṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇaṃ aniyataṃ. Tasmā
atk-s0203a0:414_7: kusalaṃ kammaṃ katvā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne patthanaṃ kātuṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0203a0:415: 165. Āmaṇḍanti āmalakaṃ. Yathā taṃ parisuddhacakkhussa purisassa sabbasova pākaṭaṃ hoti, evaṃ tassa brahmuno saddhiṃ tattha nibbattasattehi sahassī lokadhātu. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0203a0:416: 167. Subhoti sundaro. Jātimāti ākarasampanno. Suparikammakatoti dhovanādīhi suṭṭhukataparikammo. Paṇḍukambale nikkhittoti rattakambale ṭhapito.
atk-s0203a0:417_1: kataṃ piḷandhanaṃ, nikkhaṃ nāma pañcasuvaṇṇaṃ, ūnakanikkhena kataṃ pasādhanañhi ghaṭṭanamajjanakkhamaṃ
atk-s0203a0:417_2: na hoti, atirekena kataṃ ghaṭṭanamajjanaṃ khamati, vaṇṇavantaṃ pana na hoti, pharusadhātukaṃ
atk-s0203a0:417_3: khāyati. Nikkhena kataṃ ghaṭṭanamajjanañceva khamati, vaṇṇavantañca hoti. Jambonadanti
atk-s0203a0:417_4: jambunadiyaṃ nibbattaṃ. Mahājamburukkhassa hi ekekā sākhā paṇṇāsa paṇṇāsa yojanāni
atk-s0203a0:417_5: vaḍḍhitā, tāsu mahantā nadiyo sandanti, tāsaṃ nadīnaṃ ubhayatīresu jambupakkānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:417_6: patitaṭṭhāne suvaṇṇaṅkurā uṭṭhahanti, te nadījalena vuyhamānā anupubbena mahāsamuddaṃ
atk-s0203a0:417_8: dakkhena sukusalena kammāraputtena ukkāmukhe pacitvā sampahaṭṭhaṃ. Ukkāmukheti uddhane.
atk-s0203a0:417_9: Sampahaṭṭhanti dhotaghaṭṭitamajjitaṃ. Vatthopame ca dhātuvibhaṅge ca piṇḍasodhanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:418_0: Yaṃ pana sabbavāresu pharitvā adhimuccitvāti vuttaṃ, tattha pañcavidhaṃ pharaṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:418_1: cetopharaṇaṃ kasiṇapharaṇaṃ dibbacakkhupharaṇaṃ ālokapharaṇaṃ sarīrapharaṇanti. Tattha
atk-s0203a0:418_2: cetopharaṇaṃ nāma lokadhātusahasse sattānaṃ cittajānanaṃ. Kasiṇapharaṇaṃ nāma lokadhātusahasse
atk-s0203a0:418_3: kasiṇapattharaṇaṃ. Dibbacakkhupharaṇaṃ nāma ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbena cakkhunā sahassalokadhātudassanaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:418_4: Ālokapharaṇampi etadeva. Sarīrapharaṇaṃ nāma lokadhātusahasse sarīrapabhāya pattharaṇaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:418_5: Sabbattha imāni pañca pharaṇāni avināsentena kathetabbanti.
atk-s0203a0:419_0: Tipiṭakacūḷābhayatthero panāha – “maṇiopamme kasiṇapharaṇaṃ viya nikkhopamme sarīrapharaṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:419_1: viya dissatī”ti. Tassa vādaṃ viya aṭṭhakathā nāma natthīti paṭikkhitvā sarīrapharaṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:419_2: na sabbakālikaṃ, cattārimāni pharaṇāni avināsetvāva kathetabbanti vuttaṃ. Adhimuccatīti
atk-s0203a0:419_3: padaṃ pharaṇapadasseva vevacanaṃ, atha vā pharatīti pattharati. Adhimuccatīti jānāti.
atk-s0203a0:420: 169. Ābhātiādīsu ābhādayo nāma pāṭiyekkā devā natthi, tayo parittābhādayo devā ābhā nāma, parittāsubhādayo ca. Subhakiṇhādayo ca subhā nāma. Vehapphalādivārā pākaṭāyeva.
atk-s0203a0:421_0: Ime tāva pañca dhamme bhāvetvā kāmāvacaresu nibbattatu. Brahmaloke nibbattaṃ pana
atk-s0203a0:421_1: āsavakkhayañca kathaṃ pāpuṇātīti? Ime pañca dhammā sīlaṃ, so imasmiṃ sīle patiṭṭhāya
atk-s0203a0:421_2: kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā tā tā samāpattiyo bhāvetvā rūpībrahmaloke nibbattati, arūpajjhānāni
atk-s0203a0:421_3: nibbattetvā arūpībrahmaloke, samāpattipadaṭṭhānaṃ vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā anāgāmiphalaṃ
atk-s0203a0:421_4: sacchikatvā pañcasu suddhāvāsesu nibbattati. Uparimaggaṃ bhāvetvā āsavakkhayaṃ pāpuṇātīti.
atk-s0203a0:426_0: 176. Evaṃ me sutanti cūḷasuññatasuttaṃ. Tattha ekamidanti thero kira bhagavato vattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:426_1: katvā attano divāṭṭhānaṃ gantvā kālaparicchedaṃ katvā nibbānārammaṇaṃ suññatāphalasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0203a0:426_2: appetvā nisinno yathāparicchedena vuṭṭhāsi. Athassa saṅkhārā suññato upaṭṭhahiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:426_3: So suññatākathaṃ sotukāmo jāto. Athassa etadahosi – “na kho pana sakkā dhurena dhuraṃ
atk-s0203a0:426_4: paharantena viya gantvā ‘suññatākathaṃ me, bhante, kathethā’ti bhagavantaṃ vattuṃ,
atk-s0203a0:426_5: handāhaṃ yaṃ me bhagavā nagarakaṃ upanissāya viharanto ekaṃ kathaṃ kathesi, taṃ sāremi,
atk-s0203a0:426_6: evaṃ me bhagavā suññatākathaṃ kathessatī”ti dasabalaṃ sārento ekamidantiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:427_0: Tattha idanti nipātamattameva. Kaccimetaṃ, bhanteti thero ekapade ṭhatvā saṭṭhipadasahassāni
atk-s0203a0:427_1: uggahetvā dhāretuṃ samattho, kiṃ so “suññatāvihārenā”ti ekaṃ padaṃ dhāretuṃ na sakkhissati,
atk-s0203a0:427_2: sotukāmena pana jānantena viya pucchituṃ na vaṭṭati, pākaṭaṃ katvā vitthāriyamānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:427_3: suññatākathaṃ sotukāmo ajānanto viya evamāha. Eko ajānantopi jānanto viya hoti, thero
atk-s0203a0:427_4: evarūpaṃ kohaññaṃ kiṃ karissati, attano jānanaṭṭhānepi bhagavato apacitiṃ dassetvā
atk-s0203a0:428_0: Pubbepīti paṭhamabodhiyaṃ nagarakaṃ upanissāya viharaṇakālepi. Etarahipīti idānipi.
atk-s0203a0:428_1: Evaṃ pana vatvā cintesi – “ānando suññatākathaṃ sotukāmo, eko pana sotuṃ sakkoti,
atk-s0203a0:428_2: na uggahetuṃ, eko sotumpi uggahetumpi sakkoti, na kathetuṃ, ānando pana sotumpi sakkoti
atk-s0203a0:428_3: uggahetumpi kathetumpi, (kathemissa) suññatākatha”nti. Iti taṃ kathento seyyathāpītiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:428_5: katā hatthiādayo atthi, vessavaṇamandhātādīnaṃ ṭhitaṭṭhāne cittakammavasena katampi,
atk-s0203a0:428_7: ṭhapitampi jātarūparajataṃ atthi, kaṭṭharūpādivasena katā dhammasavanapañhapucchanādivasena
atk-s0203a0:428_8: āgacchantā ca itthipurisāpi atthi, tasmā na so tehi suñño. Indriyabaddhānaṃ saviññāṇakānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:429_0: Bhikkhusaṅghaṃ paṭiccāti bhikkhūsu hi piṇḍāya paviṭṭhesupi vihārabhattaṃ sādiyantehi
atk-s0203a0:429_1: bhikkhūhi ceva gilānagilānupaṭṭhākauddesacīvarakammapasutādīhi ca bhikkhūhi so asuññova
atk-s0203a0:429_2: hoti, iti niccampi bhikkhūnaṃ atthitāya evamāha. Ekattanti ekabhāvaṃ, ekaṃ asuññataṃ
atk-s0203a0:429_3: atthīti attho. Eko asuññabhāvo atthīti vuttaṃ hoti. Amanasikaritvāti citte akatvā
atk-s0203a0:429_4: anāvajjitvā apaccavekkhitvā. Gāmasaññanti gāmoti pavattavasena vā kilesavasena vā
atk-s0203a0:429_5: uppannaṃ gāmasaññaṃ. Manussasaññāyapi eseva nayo. Araññasaññaṃ paṭicca manasi karoti
atk-s0203a0:429_6: ekattanti idaṃ araññaṃ, ayaṃ rukkho, ayaṃ pabbato, ayaṃ nīlobhāso vanasaṇḍoti evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:429_7: ekaṃ araññaṃyeva paṭicca araññasaññaṃ manasi karoti. Pakkhandatīti otarati. Adhimuccatīti
atk-s0203a0:429_8: evanti adhimuccati. Ye assu darathāti ye ca pavattadarathā vā kilesadarathā vā gāmasaññaṃ
atk-s0203a0:429_9: paṭicca bhaveyyuṃ, te idha araññasaññāya na santi. Dutiyapadepi eseva nayo. Atthi
atk-s0203a0:429_10: cevāyanti ayaṃ pana ekaṃ araññasaññaṃ paṭicca uppajjamānā pavattadarathamattā atthi.
atk-s0203a0:430_0: Yañhi kho tattha na hotīti yaṃ migāramātupāsāde hatthiādayo viya imissā araññasaññāya
atk-s0203a0:430_2: hoti. Yaṃ pana tattha avasiṭṭhanti yaṃ migāramātupāsāde bhikkhusaṅgho viya tattha
atk-s0203a0:430_3: araññasaññāya pavattadarathamattaṃ avasiṭṭhaṃ hoti. Taṃ santamidaṃ atthīti pajānātīti
atk-s0203a0:430_4: taṃ vijjamānameva “atthi ida”nti pajānāti, suññatāvakkantīti suññatānibbatti.
atk-s0203a0:431_0: 177. Amanasikaritvā manussasaññanti idha gāmasaññaṃ na gaṇhāti. Kasmā? Evaṃ kirassa
atk-s0203a0:431_1: ahosi – “manussasaññāya gāmasaññaṃ nivattetvā, araññasaññāya manussasaññaṃ, pathavīsaññāya
atk-s0203a0:431_4: nivattetvā anupubbena accantasuññataṃ nāma dassessāmī”ti. Tasmā evaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0203a0:431_5: Tattha pathavīsaññanti kasmā araññasaññaṃ pahāya pathavīsaññaṃ manasi karoti? Araññasaññāya
atk-s0203a0:431_6: visesānadhigamanato. Yathā hi purisassa ramaṇīyaṃ khettaṭṭhānaṃ disvā – “idha vuttā
atk-s0203a0:431_7: sāliādayo suṭṭhu sampajjissanti, mahālābhaṃ labhissāmī”ti sattakkhattumpi khettaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:431_8: olokentassa sāliādayo na sampajjanteva, sace pana taṃ ṭhānaṃ vihatakhāṇukakaṇṭakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:431_9: katvā kasitvā vapati, evaṃ sante sampajjanti, evameva – “idaṃ araññaṃ, ayaṃ rukkho,
atk-s0203a0:431_10: ayaṃ pabbato, ayaṃ nīlobhāso vanasaṇḍo”ti sacepi sattakkhattuṃ araññasaññaṃ manasi
atk-s0203a0:431_11: karoti, nevūpacāraṃ na samādhiṃ pāpuṇāti, pathavīsaññāya panassa dhuvasevanaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:431_12: pathavīkasiṇaṃ parikammaṃ katvā jhānāni nibbattetvā jhānapadaṭṭhānampi vipassanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:431_13: vaḍḍhetvā sakkā arahattaṃ pāpuṇituṃ. Tasmā araññasaññaṃ pahāya pathavīsaññaṃ manasi
atk-s0203a0:432_0: Idāni yasmiṃ pathavīkasiṇe so pathavīsaññī hoti, tassa opammadassanatthaṃ seyyathāpītiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:432_1: Tattha usabhassa etanti āsabhaṃ. Aññesaṃ pana gunnaṃ gaṇḍāpi honti pahārāpi. Tesañhi
atk-s0203a0:432_2: cammaṃ pasāriyamānaṃ nibbalikaṃ na hoti, usabhassa lakkhaṇasampannatāya te dosā natthi.
atk-s0203a0:432_3: Tasmā tassa cammaṃ gahitaṃ. Saṅkusatenāti khilasatena. Suvihatanti pasāretvā suṭṭhu
atk-s0203a0:432_4: vihataṃ. Ūnakasatasaṅkuvihatañhi nibbalikaṃ na hoti, saṅkusatena vihataṃ bheritalaṃ
atk-s0203a0:432_5: viya nibbalikaṃ hoti. Tasmā evamāha. Ukkūlavikkūlanti uccanīcaṃ thalaṭṭhānaṃ ninnaṭṭhānaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:432_6: Nadīvidugganti nadiyo ceva duggamaṭṭhānañca. Pathavīsaññaṃ paṭicca manasi karoti
atk-s0203a0:432_7: ekattanti kasiṇapathaviyaṃyeva paṭicca sambhūtaṃ ekaṃ saññaṃ manasi karoti. Darathamattāti
atk-s0203a0:432_8: ito paṭṭhāya sabbavāresu pavattadarathavasena darathamattā veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:433_0: 182. Animittaṃ cetosamādhinti vipassanācittasamādhiṃ. So hi niccanimittādivirahito
atk-s0203a0:433_1: animittoti vuccati. Imameva kāyanti vipassanāya vatthuṃ dasseti. Tattha imamevāti
atk-s0203a0:433_2: imaṃ eva catumahābhūtikaṃ. Saḷāyatanikanti saḷāyatanapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ. Jīvitapaccayāti
atk-s0203a0:433_3: yāva jīvitindriyānaṃ pavatti, tāva jīvitapaccayā pavattadarathamattā atthīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:434_0: 183. Puna animittanti vipassanāya paṭivipassanaṃ dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Kāmāsavaṃ paṭiccāti
atk-s0203a0:434_1: kāmāsavaṃ paṭicca uppajjanapavattadarathā idha na santi, ariyamagge ceva ariyaphale
atk-s0203a0:434_2: ca natthīti vuttaṃ hoti. Imameva kāyanti imaṃ upādisesadarathadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:434_3: Iti manussasaññāya gāmasaññaṃ nivattetvā…pe… maggena vipassanaṃ nivattetvā anupubbena
atk-s0203a0:435_0: 184. Parisuddhanti nirupakkilesaṃ. Anuttaranti uttaravirahitaṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ. Suññatanti
atk-s0203a0:435_2: samaṇabrāhmaṇā. Anāgatepi, etarahipi buddhabuddhasāvakasaṅkhātā samaṇabrāhmaṇā imaṃyeva
atk-s0203a0:435_3: parisuddhaṃ paramaṃ anuttaraṃ suññataṃ upasampajja vihariṃsu viharissanti viharanti
atk-s0203a0:439_0: 185. Evaṃ me sutanti mahāsuññatasuttaṃ. Tattha kāḷakhemakassāti chavivaṇṇena so kāḷo,
atk-s0203a0:439_1: khemakoti panassa nāmaṃ. Vihāroti tasmiṃyeva nigrodhārāme ekasmiṃ padese pākārena
atk-s0203a0:439_2: parikkhipitvā dvārakoṭṭhakaṃ māpetvā haṃsavaṭṭakādisenāsanāni ceva maṇḍalamāḷabhojanasālādīni
atk-s0203a0:439_3: ca patiṭṭhapetvā kato vihāro. Sambahulāni senāsanānīti mañco pīṭhaṃ bhisibimbohanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:439_4: taṭṭikā cammakhaṇḍo tiṇasanthāro paṇṇasanthāro palālasanthārotiādīni paññattāni honti,
atk-s0203a0:439_5: mañcena mañcaṃ…pe… palālasanthāreneva palālasanthāraṃ āhacca ṭhapitāni, gaṇabhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:440_0: Sambahulā nu khoti bhagavato bodhipallaṅkeyeva sabbakilesānaṃ samugghāṭitattā saṃsayo
atk-s0203a0:440_1: nāma natthi, vitakkapubbabhāgā pucchā, vitakkapubbabhāge cāyaṃ nukāro nipātamatto.
atk-s0203a0:440_2: Pāṭimatthakaṃ gacchante avinicchito nāma na hoti. Ito kira pubbe bhagavatā dasa dvādasa
atk-s0203a0:441_0: Athassa etadahosi – gaṇavāso nāmāyaṃ vaṭṭe āciṇṇasamāciṇṇo nadīotiṇṇaudakasadiso,
atk-s0203a0:441_2: āciṇṇo. Dasayojanasahasso hi nirayo tipucuṇṇabharitā nāḷi viya sattehi nirantaro,
atk-s0203a0:441_3: pañcavidhabandhanakammakāraṇakaraṇaṭṭhāne sattānaṃ pamāṇaṃ vā paricchedo vā natthi,
atk-s0203a0:441_4: tathā vāsīhi tacchanādiṭhānesu, iti gaṇabhūtāva paccanti. Tiracchānayoniyaṃ ekasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:441_5: vammike upasikānaṃ pamāṇaṃ vā paricchedo vā natthi, tathā ekekabilādīsupi kipillikādīnaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:441_6: Tiracchānayoniyampi gaṇavāsova. Petanagarāni ca gāvutikāni aḍḍhayojanikānipi petabharitāni
atk-s0203a0:441_7: honti. Evaṃ pettivisayepi gaṇavāsova. Asurabhavanaṃ dasayojanasahassaṃ kaṇṇe pakkhittasūciyā
atk-s0203a0:441_8: kaṇṇabilaṃ viya hoti. Iti asurakāyepi gaṇavāsova. Manussaloke sāvatthiyaṃ sattapaṇṇāsa
atk-s0203a0:441_9: kulasatasahassāni, rājagahe anto ca bahi ca aṭṭhārasa manussakoṭiyo vasiṃsu. Evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:441_10: aññesupi ṭhānesūti manussalokepi gaṇavāsova. Bhummadevatā ādiṃ katvā devalokabrahmalokesupi
atk-s0203a0:441_11: gaṇavāsova. Ekekassa hi devaputtassa aḍḍhatiyā nāṭakakoṭiyo honti, navapi koṭiyo
atk-s0203a0:442_0: Tato cintesi – “mayā satasahassakappādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni gaṇavāsaviddhaṃsanatthaṃ
atk-s0203a0:442_1: dasa pāramiyo pūritā, ime ca bhikkhū ito paṭṭhāyeva gaṇaṃ bandhitvā gaṇābhiratā jātā
atk-s0203a0:442_2: ananucchavikaṃ karontī”ti. So dhammasaṃvegaṃ uppādetvā puna cintesi – “sace ‘ekaṭṭhāne
atk-s0203a0:442_3: dvīhi bhikkhūhi na vasitabba’nti sakkā bhaveyya sikkhāpadaṃ paññapetuṃ, sikkhāpadaṃ
atk-s0203a0:442_4: paññāpeyyaṃ, na kho panetaṃ sakkā. Handāhaṃ mahāsuññatāpaṭipattiṃ nāma suttantaṃ
atk-s0203a0:442_5: desemi, yaṃ sikkhākāmānaṃ kulaputtānaṃ sikkhāpadapaññatti viya nagaradvāre nikkhittasabbakāyikaādāso
atk-s0203a0:442_6: viya ca bhavissati. Tato yathā nāmekasmiṃ ādāse khattiyādayo attano vajjaṃ disvā
atk-s0203a0:442_7: taṃ pahāya anavajjā honti, evamevaṃ mayi parinibbutepi pañcavassasahassāni imaṃ suttaṃ
atk-s0203a0:442_8: āvajjitvā gaṇaṃ vinodetvā ekībhāvābhiratā kulaputtā vaṭṭadukkhassa antaṃ karissantī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:442_9: Bhagavato ca manorathaṃ pūrentā viya imaṃ suttaṃ āvajjitvā gaṇaṃ vinodetvā vaṭṭadukkhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:442_10: khepetvā parinibbutā kulaputtā gaṇanapathaṃ vītivattā. Vālikapiṭṭhivihārepi hi ābhidhammikaabhayatthero
atk-s0203a0:442_11: nāma vassūpanāyikasamaye sambahulehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ imaṃ suttaṃ sañjhāyitvā “sammāsambuddho
atk-s0203a0:442_12: evaṃ kāreti, mayaṃ kiṃ karomā”ti āha. Te sabbepi antovasse gaṇaṃ vinodetvā ekībhāvābhiratā
atk-s0203a0:442_13: arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Gaṇabhedanaṃ nāma idaṃ suttanti.
atk-s0203a0:443_0: 186. Ghaṭāyāti evaṃnāmakassa sakkassa. Vihāreti ayampi vihāro nigrodhārāmasseva ekadese
atk-s0203a0:443_1: kāḷakhemakassa vihāro viya katoti veditabbo. Cīvarakammanti jiṇṇamalinānaṃ aggaḷaṭṭhānuppādanadhovanādīhi
atk-s0203a0:443_2: kataparibhaṇḍampi, cīvaratthāya uppannavatthānaṃ vicāraṇasibbanādīhi akataṃ saṃvidhānampi
atk-s0203a0:443_3: vaṭṭati, idha pana akataṃ saṃvidhānaṃ adhippetaṃ. Manussā hi ānandattherassa cīvarasāṭake
atk-s0203a0:443_4: adaṃsu. Tasmā thero sambahule bhikkhū gahetvā tattha cīvarakammaṃ akāsi. Tepi bhikkhū
atk-s0203a0:443_5: pātova sūcipāsakassa paññāyanakālato paṭṭhāya nisinnā apaññāyanakāle uṭṭhahanti.
atk-s0203a0:443_6: Sūcikamme niṭṭhiteyeva senāsanāni saṃvidahissāmāti na saṃvidahiṃsu. Cīvarakārasamayo
atk-s0203a0:443_7: noti thero kira cintesi – “addhā etehi bhikkhūhi na paṭisāmitāni senāsanāni, bhagavatā
atk-s0203a0:443_8: ca diṭṭhāni bhavissanti. Iti anattamano satthā suṭṭhu niggahetukāmo, imesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:443_9: upatthambho bhavissāmī”ti; tasmā evamāha. Ayaṃ panettha adhippāyo – “na, bhante,
atk-s0203a0:443_10: ime bhikkhū kammārāmā eva, cīvarakiccavasena pana evaṃ vasantī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:444_0: Na kho, ānandāti, ānanda, kammasamayo vā hotu akammasamayo vā, cīvarakārasamayo vā
atk-s0203a0:444_1: hotu acīvarakārasamayo vā, atha kho saṅgaṇikārāmo bhikkhu na sobhatiyeva. Mā tvaṃ
atk-s0203a0:444_2: anupatthambhaṭṭhāne upatthambho ahosīti. Tattha saṅgaṇikāti sakaparisasamodhānaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:444_3: Gaṇoti nānājanasamodhānaṃ. Iti saṅgaṇikārāmo vā hotu gaṇārāmo vā, sabbathāpi gaṇabāhullābhirato
atk-s0203a0:444_4: gaṇabandhanabaddho bhikkhu na sobhati. Pacchābhatte pana divāṭṭhānaṃ sammajjitvā
atk-s0203a0:444_5: sudhotahatthapādo mūlakammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā ekārāmatamanuyutto bhikkhu buddhasāsane
atk-s0203a0:444_6: sobhati. Nekkhammasukhanti kāmato nikkhantassa sukhaṃ. Pavivekasukhampi kāmapavivekasukhameva.
atk-s0203a0:444_7: Rāgādīnaṃ pana vūpasamatthāya saṃvattatīti upasamasukhaṃ. Maggasambodhatthāya saṃvattatīti
atk-s0203a0:444_8: sambodhisukhaṃ. Nikāmalābhīti kāmalābhī icchitalābhī. Akicchalābhīti adukkhalābhī.
atk-s0203a0:445_0: Sāmāyikanti appitappitasamaye kilesehi vimuttaṃ. Kantanti manāpaṃ. Cetovimuttinti
atk-s0203a0:445_1: rūpārūpāvacaracittavimuttiṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “cattāri ca jhānāni catasso ca arūpasamāpattiyo,
atk-s0203a0:445_2: ayaṃ sāmāyiko vimokkho”ti. Asāmāyikanti na samayavasena kilesehi vimuttaṃ, atha kho
atk-s0203a0:445_3: accantavimuttaṃ lokuttaraṃ vuttaṃ. Vuttañhetaṃ – “cattāro ca ariyamaggā cattāri ca
atk-s0203a0:445_4: sāmaññaphalāni, ayaṃ asāmāyiko vimokkho”ti. Akuppanti kilesehi akopetabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:446_0: Ettāvatā kiṃ kathitaṃ hoti? Saṅgaṇikārāmo bhikkhu gaṇabandhanabaddho neva lokiyaguṇaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:446_1: na ca lokuttaraguṇaṃ nibbattetuṃ sakkoti, gaṇaṃ vinodetvā pana ekābhirato sakkoti.
atk-s0203a0:446_2: Tathā hi vipassī bodhisatto caturāsītiyā pabbajitasahassehi parivuto satta vassāni
atk-s0203a0:446_3: vicaranto sabbaññuguṇaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi, gaṇaṃ vinodetvā sattadivase ekībhāvābhirato
atk-s0203a0:446_4: bodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha sabbaññuguṇaṃ nibbattesi. Amhākaṃ bodhisatto pañcavaggiyehi saddhiṃ
atk-s0203a0:446_5: chabbassāni vicaranto sabbaññuguṇaṃ nibbattetuṃ nāsakkhi, tesu pakkantesu ekībhāvābhirato
atk-s0203a0:447_0: Evaṃ saṅgaṇikārāmassa guṇādhigamābhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni dosuppattiṃ dassento nāhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:447_1: ānandātiādimāha. Tattha rūpanti sarīraṃ. Yattha rattassāti yasmiṃ rūpe rāgavasena
atk-s0203a0:447_2: rattassa. Na uppajjeyyunti yasmiṃ rūpe rattassa na uppajjeyyuṃ, taṃ rūpaṃ na samanupassāmi,
atk-s0203a0:447_4: sañcayassa viya, upāligahapatino aññathābhāvena nāṭaputtassa viya, piyajātikasutte
atk-s0203a0:448_0: 187. Ayaṃ kho panānandāti ko anusandhi? Sace hi koci dubbuddhī navapabbajito vadeyya
atk-s0203a0:448_1: – “sammāsambuddho khettaṃ paviṭṭhā gāviyo viya amheyeva gaṇato nīharati, ekībhāve
atk-s0203a0:448_2: niyojeti, sayaṃ pana rājarājamahāmattādīhi parivuto viharatī”ti, tassa vacanokāsupacchedanatthaṃ
atk-s0203a0:448_3: – “cakkavāḷapariyantāya parisāya majjhe nisinnopi tathāgato ekakovā”ti dassetuṃ imaṃ
atk-s0203a0:448_4: desanaṃ ārabhi. Tattha sabbanimittānanti rūpādīnaṃ saṅkhanimittānaṃ. Ajjhattanti
atk-s0203a0:448_5: visayajjhattaṃ. Suññatanti suññataphalasamāpattiṃ. Tatra ceti upayogatthe bhummaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:448_6: taṃ ceti vuttaṃ hoti. Puna tatrāti tasmiṃ parisamajjhe ṭhito. Vivekaninnenāti nibbānaninnena.
atk-s0203a0:448_7: Byantībhūtenāti āsavaṭṭhānīyadhammehi vigatantena nissaṭena visaṃyuttena. Uyyojanikapaṭisaṃyuttanti
atk-s0203a0:448_8: gacchatha tumheti evaṃ uyyojanikena vacanena paṭisaṃyuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:449_0: Kāya pana velāya bhagavā evaṃ katheti? Pacchābhattakiccavelāya, vā purimayāmakiccavelāya
atk-s0203a0:449_1: vā. Bhagavā hi pacchābhatte gandhakuṭiyaṃ sīhaseyyaṃ kappetvā vuṭṭhāya phalasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0203a0:449_2: appetvā nisīdati. Tasmiṃ samaye dhammassavanatthāya parisā sannipatanti. Atha bhagavā
atk-s0203a0:449_3: kālaṃ viditvā gandhakuṭito nikkhamitvā buddhāsanavaragato dhammaṃ desetvā bhesajjatelapākaṃ
atk-s0203a0:449_4: gaṇhanto viya kālaṃ anatikkamitvā vivekaninnena cittena parisaṃ uyyojeti. Purimayāmepi
atk-s0203a0:449_5: “abhikkantā kho vāseṭṭhā ratti, yassa dāni kālaṃ maññathā”ti evaṃ uyyojeti. Buddhānañhi
atk-s0203a0:449_6: bodhipattito paṭṭhāya dve pañcaviññāṇānipi nibbānaninnāneva. Tasmātihānandāti yasmā
atk-s0203a0:450_0: 188. Ajjhattamevāti gocarajjhattameva. Ajjhattaṃ suññatanti idha niyakajjhattaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:450_1: attano pañcasu khandhesu nissitanti attho. Sampajāno hotīti kammaṭṭhānassa asampajjanabhāvajānanena
atk-s0203a0:450_2: sampajāno. Bahiddhāti parassa pañcasu khandhesu. Ajjhattabahiddhāti kālena ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:450_3: kālena bahiddhā. Āneñjanti ubhatobhāgavimutto bhavissāmāti āneñjaṃ arūpasamāpattiṃ manasi karoti.
atk-s0203a0:451_0: Tasmiṃyeva purimasminti pādakajjhānaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. Apaguṇapādakajjhānato vuṭṭhitassa
atk-s0203a0:451_1: hi ajjhattaṃ suññataṃ manasikaroto tattha cittaṃ na pakkhandati. Tato “parassa santāne
atk-s0203a0:451_2: nu kho katha”nti bahiddhā manasi karoti, tatthapi na pakkhandati. Tato – “kālena
atk-s0203a0:451_3: attano santāne, kālena parassa santāne nu kho katha”nti ajjhattabahiddhā manasi karoti,
atk-s0203a0:451_4: tatthapi na pakkhandati. Tato ubhatobhāgavimutto hotukāmo “arūpasamāpattiyaṃ nu kho
atk-s0203a0:451_5: katha”nti āneñjaṃ manasi karoti, tatthapi na pakkhandati. Idāni – “na me cittaṃ pakkhandatīti
atk-s0203a0:451_6: vissaṭṭhavīriyena upaṭṭhākādīnaṃ pacchato na caritabbaṃ, pādakajjhānameva pana sādhukaṃ
atk-s0203a0:451_7: punappunaṃ manasikātabbaṃ. Evamassa rukkhe chindato pharasumhi avahante puna nisitaṃ
atk-s0203a0:451_8: kāretvā chindantassa chijjesu pharasu viya kammaṭṭhāne manasikāro vahatī”ti dassetuṃ
atk-s0203a0:451_9: tasmiṃyevātiādimāha. Idānissa evaṃ paṭipannassa yaṃ yaṃ manasi karoti, tattha tattha
atk-s0203a0:452_0: 189. Iminā vihārenāti iminā samathavipassanāvihārena. Itiha tattha sampajānoti iti
atk-s0203a0:452_1: caṅkamantopi tasmiṃ kammaṭṭhāne sampajjamāne “sampajjati me kammaṭṭhāna”nti jānanena
atk-s0203a0:452_2: sampajāno hoti. Sayatīti nipajjati. Ettha kañci kālaṃ caṅkamitvā – “idāni ettakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:452_3: kālaṃ caṅkamituṃ sakkhissāmī”ti ñatvā iriyāpathaṃ ahāpetvā ṭhātabbaṃ. Esa nayo sabbavāresu.
atk-s0203a0:452_4: Na kathessāmīti, itiha tatthāti evaṃ na kathessāmīti jānanena tattha sampajānakārī hoti.
atk-s0203a0:453: Puna dutiyavāre evarūpiṃ kathaṃ kathessāmīti jānanena sampajānakārī hoti, imassa bhikkhuno samathavipassanā taruṇāva, tāsaṃ anurakkhaṇatthaṃ –
atk-s0203a0:456: Satta sappāyāni icchitabbāni. Tesaṃ dassanatthamidaṃ vuttaṃ. Vitakkavāresu avitakkanassa ca vitakkanassa ca jānanena sampajānatā veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:457_0: 190. Iti vitakkapahānena dve magge kathetvā idāni tatiyamaggassa vipassanaṃ ācikkhanto
atk-s0203a0:457_1: pañca kho ime, ānanda, kāmaguṇātiādimāha. Āyataneti tesuyeva kāmaguṇesu kismiñcideva
atk-s0203a0:457_2: kilesuppattikāraṇe. Samudācāroti samudācaraṇato appahīnakileso. Evaṃ santanti evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:457_3: vijjamānameva. Sampajānoti kammaṭṭhānassa asampattijānanena sampajāno. Dutiyavāre
atk-s0203a0:457_4: evaṃ santametanti evaṃ sante etaṃ. Sampajānoti kammaṭṭhānasampattijānanena sampajāno.
atk-s0203a0:457_5: Ayañhi “pahīno nu kho me pañcasu kāmaguṇesu chandarāgo no”ti paccavekkhamāno apahīnabhāvaṃ
atk-s0203a0:457_6: ñatvā vīriyaṃ paggahetvā taṃ anāgāmimaggena samugghāṭeti, tato maggānantaraṃ phalaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:457_7: phalato vuṭṭhāya paccavekkhamāno pahīnabhāvaṃ jānāti, tassa jānanena “sampajāno hotī”ti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:458_0: 191. Idāni arahattamaggassa vipassanaṃ ācikkhanto pañca kho ime, ānanda, upādānakkhandhātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:458_1: Tattha so pahīyatīti rūpe asmīti māno asmīti chando asmīti anusayo pahīyati. Tathā
atk-s0203a0:459_0: Ime kho te, ānanda, dhammāti heṭṭhā kathite samathavipassanāmaggaphaladhamme sandhāyāha.
atk-s0203a0:459_1: Kusalāyatikāti kusalato āgatā. Kusalā hi kusalāpi honti kusalāyatikāpi, seyyathidaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:459_2: paṭhamajjhānaṃ kusalaṃ, dutiyajjhānaṃ kusalañceva kusalāyatikañca…pe… ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:459_4: kusalaṃ, sotāpattimaggo kusalo ceva kusalāyatiko ca…pe… anāgāmimaggo kusalo, arahattamaggo
atk-s0203a0:459_5: kusalo ceva kusalāyatiko ca. Tathā paṭhamajjhānaṃ kusalaṃ, taṃsampayuttakā dhammā
atk-s0203a0:459_6: kusalā ceva kusalāyatikā ca…pe… arahattamaggo kusalo, taṃsampayuttakā dhammā kusalā
atk-s0203a0:460_0: Ariyāti nikkilesā visuddhā. Lokuttarāti loke uttarā visiṭṭhā. Anavakkantā pāpimatāti
atk-s0203a0:460_1: pāpimantena mārena anokkantā. Vipassanāpādakā aṭṭha samāpattiyo appetvā nisinnassa
atk-s0203a0:460_2: hi bhikkhuno cittaṃ māro na passati, “idaṃ nāma ārammaṇaṃ nissāya saṃvattatī”ti jātituṃ
atk-s0203a0:461: Taṃ kiṃ maññasīti idaṃ kasmā āha? Gaṇepi eko ānisaṃso atthi, taṃ dassetuṃ idamāha. Anubandhitunti anugacchituṃ paricarituṃ.
atk-s0203a0:462_0: Na kho, ānandāti ettha kiñcāpi bhagavatā – “sutāvudho, bhikkhave, ariyasāvako akusalaṃ
atk-s0203a0:462_1: pajahati, kusalaṃ bhāveti, sāvajjaṃ pajahati, anavajjaṃ bhāveti, suddhaṃ attānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:462_2: pariharatī”ti bahussuto pañcāvudhasampanno yodho viya kato. Yasmā pana so sutapariyattiṃ
atk-s0203a0:462_3: uggahetvāpi tadanucchavikaṃ anulomapaṭipadaṃ na paṭipajjati, na tassa taṃ āvudhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:462_4: hoti. Yo paṭipajjati, tasseva hoti. Tasmā etadatthaṃ anubandhituṃ nārahatīti dassento
atk-s0203a0:463_0: Idāni yadatthaṃ anubandhitabbo, taṃ dassetuṃ yā ca khotiādimāha. Iti imasmiṃ sutte
atk-s0203a0:463_1: tīsu ṭhānesu dasa kathāvatthūni āgatāni. “Iti evarūpaṃ kathaṃ kathessāmī”ti sappāyāsappāyavasena
atk-s0203a0:463_2: āgatāni, “yadidaṃ suttaṃ geyya”nti ettha sutapariyattivasena āgatāni, imasmiṃ ṭhāne
atk-s0203a0:463_3: paripūraṇavasena āgatāni. Tasmā imasmiṃ sutte dasa kathāvatthūni kathentena imasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:464_0: Idāni yasmā ekaccassa ekakassa viharatopi attho na sampajjati, tasmā taṃ sandhāya
atk-s0203a0:464_1: ekībhāve ādīnavaṃ dassento evaṃ sante kho, ānandātiādimāha. Tattha evaṃ santeti evaṃ ekībhāve sante.
atk-s0203a0:465_0: 193. Satthāti bāhirako titthakarasatthā. Anvāvattantīti anuāvattanti upasaṅkamanti.
atk-s0203a0:465_1: Mucchaṃ kāmayatīti mucchanataṇhaṃ pattheti, pavattetīti attho. Ācariyūpaddavenāti
atk-s0203a0:465_2: abbhantare uppannena kilesūpaddavena ācariyassupaddavo. Sesupaddavesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0203a0:465_3: Avadhiṃsu nanti mārayiṃsu naṃ. Etena hi guṇamaraṇaṃ kathitaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:466_0: Vinipātāyāti suṭṭhu nipatanāya. Kasmā pana brahmacārupaddavova – “dukkhavipākataro
atk-s0203a0:466_1: ca kaṭukavipākataro ca vinipātāya ca saṃvattatī”ti vuttoti. Bāhirapabbajjā hi appalābhā,
atk-s0203a0:466_2: tattha mahanto nibbattetabbaguṇo natthi, aṭṭhasamāpattipañcābhiññāmattakameva hoti.
atk-s0203a0:466_3: Iti yathā gadrabhapiṭṭhito patitassa mahantaṃ dukkhaṃ na hoti, sarīrassa paṃsumakkhanamattameva
atk-s0203a0:466_4: hoti, evaṃ bāhirasamaye lokiyaguṇamattatova parihāyati, tena purimaṃ upaddavadvayaṃ
atk-s0203a0:466_5: na evaṃ vuttaṃ. Sāsane pana pabbajjā mahālābhā, tattha cattāro maggā cattāri phalāni
atk-s0203a0:466_6: nibbānanti mahantā adhigantabbaguṇā. Iti yathā ubhato sujāto khattiyakumāro hatthikkhandhavaragato
atk-s0203a0:466_7: nagaraṃ anusañcaranto hatthikkhandhato patito mahādukkhaṃ nigacchati, evaṃ sāsanato
atk-s0203a0:466_8: parihāyamāno navahi lokuttaraguṇehi parihāyati. Tenāyaṃ brahmacārupaddavo evaṃ vutto.
atk-s0203a0:467_0: 196. Tasmāti yasmā sesupaddavehi brahmacārupaddavo dukkhavipākataro, yasmā vā sapattapaṭipattiṃ
atk-s0203a0:467_1: vītikkamanto dīgharattaṃ ahitāya dukkhāya saṃvattati, mittapaṭipatti hitāya, tasmā.
atk-s0203a0:467_2: Evaṃ uparimenapi heṭṭhimenapi atthena yojetabbaṃ. Mittavatāyāti mittapaṭipattiyā.
atk-s0203a0:468: Vokkamma ca satthusāsanāti dukkaṭadubbhāsitamattampi hi sañcicca vītikkamanto vokkamma vattati nāma. Tadeva avītikkamanto na vokkamma vattati nāma.
atk-s0203a0:469_0: Na vo ahaṃ, ānanda, tathā parakkamissāmīti ahaṃ tumhesu tathā na paṭipajjissāmi.
atk-s0203a0:469_1: Āmaketi apakke. Āmakamatteti āmake nātisukkhe bhājane. Kumbhakāro hi āmakaṃ nātisukkhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:469_2: apakkaṃ ubhohi hatthehi saṇhikaṃ gaṇhāti “mā bhijjatū”ti. Iti yathā kumbhakāro tattha
atk-s0203a0:469_3: paṭipajjati, nāhaṃ tumhesu tathā paṭipajjissāmi. Niggayha niggayhāti sakiṃ ovaditvā
atk-s0203a0:469_4: tuṇhī na bhavissāmi, niggaṇhitvā niggaṇhitvā punappunaṃ ovadissāmi anusāsissāmi.
atk-s0203a0:469_5: Pavayha pavayhāti dose pavāhetvā pavāhetvā. Yathā pakkabhājanesu kumbhakāro bhinnachinnajajjarāni
atk-s0203a0:469_6: pavāhetvā ekato katvā supakkāneva ākoṭetvā ākoṭetvā gaṇhāti, evameva ahampi pavāhetvā
atk-s0203a0:469_7: pavāhetvā punappunaṃ ovadissāmi anusāsissāmi. Yo sāro so ṭhassatīti evaṃ vo mayā
atk-s0203a0:469_8: ovadiyamānānaṃ yo maggaphalasāro, so ṭhassati. Apica lokiyaguṇāpi idha sārotveva
atk-s0203a0:473_0: 197. Evaṃ me sutanti acchariyaabbhutasuttaṃ. Tattha yatra hi nāmāti acchariyatthe
atk-s0203a0:473_1: nipāto. Yo nāma tathāgatoti attho. Chinnapapañceti ettha papañcā nāma taṇhā māno
atk-s0203a0:473_2: diṭṭhīti ime tayo kilesā. Chinnavaṭumeti ettha vaṭumanti kusalākusalakammavaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0203a0:473_3: vuccati. Pariyādinnavaṭṭeti tasseva vevacanaṃ. Sabbadukkhavītivatteti sabbaṃ vipākavaṭṭasaṅkhātaṃ
atk-s0203a0:473_4: dukkhaṃ vītivatte. Anussarissatīti idaṃ yatrāti nipātavasena anāgatavacanaṃ, attho
atk-s0203a0:473_5: panettha atītavasena veditabbo. Bhagavā hi te buddhe anussari, na idāni anussarissati.
atk-s0203a0:473_6: Evaṃjaccāti vipassīādayo khattiyajaccā, kakusandhādayo brāhmaṇajaccāti. Evaṃgottāti
atk-s0203a0:473_7: vipassīādayo koṇḍaññagottā, kakusandhādayo kassapagottāti. Evaṃsīlāti lokiyalokuttarasīlena
atk-s0203a0:473_8: evaṃsīlā. Evaṃdhammāti ettha samādhipakkhā dhammā adhippetā. Lokiyalokuttarena samādhinā
atk-s0203a0:473_9: evaṃsamādhinoti attho. Evaṃpaññāti lokiyalokuttarapaññāya evaṃpaññā. Evaṃvihārīti
atk-s0203a0:473_10: ettha pana heṭṭhā samādhipakkhānaṃ dhammānaṃ gahitattā vihāro gahitova, puna kasmā
atk-s0203a0:473_11: gahitameva gaṇhātīti ce, na idaṃ gahitameva. Idañhi nirodhasamāpattidīpanatthaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:474_0: Evaṃvimuttāti ettha vikkhambhanavimutti tadaṅgavimutti samucchedavimutti paṭippassaddhivimutti
atk-s0203a0:474_1: nissaraṇavimuttīti pañcavidhā vimuttiyo. Tattha aṭṭha samāpattiyo sayaṃ vikkhambhitehi
atk-s0203a0:474_2: nīvaraṇādīhi vimuttattā vikkhambhanavimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti. Aniccānupassanādikā
atk-s0203a0:474_3: satta anupassanā sayaṃ tassa tassa paccanīkaṅgavasena paricattāhi niccasaññādīhi
atk-s0203a0:474_4: vimuttattā tadaṅgavimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti. Cattāro ariyamaggā sayaṃ samucchinnehi
atk-s0203a0:474_5: kilesehi vimuttattā samucchedavimuttīti saṅkhaṃ gacchanti. Cattāri sāmaññaphalāni
atk-s0203a0:474_6: maggānubhāvena kilesānaṃ paṭippassaddhante uppannattā paṭippassaddhivimuttīti saṅkhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:474_7: gacchanti. Nibbānaṃ sabbakilesehi nissaṭattā apagatattā dūre ṭhitattā nissaraṇavimuttīti
atk-s0203a0:474_8: saṅkhaṃ gataṃ. Iti imāsaṃ pañcannaṃ vimuttīnaṃ vasena evaṃvimuttāti evamettha attho veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:475_0: 199. Tasmātihāti yasmā tvaṃ “tathāgatā acchariyā”ti vadasi, tasmā taṃ bhiyyoso mattāya
atk-s0203a0:475_1: paṭibhantu tathāgatassa acchariyā abbhutadhammāti. Sato sampajānoti ettha dvesampajaññāni
atk-s0203a0:475_2: manussaloke devaloke ca. Tattha vessantarajātake brāhmaṇassa dve putte datvā punadivase
atk-s0203a0:475_3: sakkassa deviṃ datvā sakkena pasīditvā dinne aṭṭha vare gaṇhanto –
atk-s0203a0:477: Anivattī tato assaṃ, aṭṭhametaṃ varaṃ vare”ti. –
atk-s0203a0:478_0: Evaṃ tusitabhavane me paṭisandhi hotūti varaṃ aggahesi, tato paṭṭhāya tusitabhavane
atk-s0203a0:478_1: uppajjissāmīti jānāti, idaṃ manussaloke sampajaññaṃ. Vessantarattabhāvato pana cuto
atk-s0203a0:478_2: puna tusitabhavane nibbattitvā nibbattosmīti aññāsi, idaṃ devaloke sampajaññaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:479_0: Kiṃ pana sesadevatā na jānantīti? No na jānanti. Tā pana uyyānavimānakapparukkhe
atk-s0203a0:479_1: oloketvā devanāṭakehi tūriyasaddena pabodhitā “mārisa ayaṃ devaloko tumhe idha nibbattā”ti
atk-s0203a0:479_2: sāritā jānanti. Bodhisatto paṭhamajavanavāre na jānāti, dutiyajavanato paṭṭhāya jānāti.
atk-s0203a0:480_0: Aṭṭhāsīti ettha kiñcāpi aññepi devā tattha ṭhitā ṭhitamhāti jānanti, te pana chasu
atk-s0203a0:480_1: dvāresu balavatā iṭṭhārammaṇena abhibhuyyamānā satiṃ vissajjetvā attano bhuttapītabhāvampi
atk-s0203a0:480_2: ajānantā āhārūpacchedena kālaṃ karonti. Bodhisattassa kiṃ tathārūpaṃ ārammaṇaṃ natthīti?
atk-s0203a0:480_3: No natthi. So hi sesadeve dasahi ṭhānehi adhiggaṇhāti, ārammaṇena pana attānaṃ maddituṃ
atk-s0203a0:480_4: na deti, taṃ ārammaṇaṃ abhibhavitvā tiṭṭhati. Tena vuttaṃ – “sato sampajāno, ānanda,
atk-s0203a0:481_0: 200. Yāvatāyukanti sesattabhāvesu kiṃ yāvatāyukaṃ na tiṭṭhattīti? Āma na tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0203a0:481_1: Aññadā hi dīghāyukadevaloke nibbatto tattha pāramiyo na sakkā pūretunti akkhīni nimīletvā
atk-s0203a0:481_2: adhimuttikālaṃkiriyaṃ nāma katvā manussaloke nibbattati. Ayaṃ kālaṅkiriyā aññesaṃ
atk-s0203a0:481_3: na hoti. Tadā pana adinnadānaṃ nāma natthi, arakkhitasīlaṃ nāma natthi, sabbapāramīnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:482_0: Sato sampajāno tusitā kāyā cavitvā mātukucchiṃ okkamatīti evaṃ tāva sabbapāramiyo
atk-s0203a0:482_1: pūretvā tadā bodhisatto yāvatāyukaṃ aṭṭhāsi. Devatānaṃ pana – “manussagaṇanāvasena
atk-s0203a0:482_2: idāni sattahi divasehi cuti bhavissatī”ti pañca pubbanimittāni uppajjanti – mālā
atk-s0203a0:482_3: milāyanti, vatthāni kilissanti, kacchehi sedā muccanti, kāye dubbaṇṇiyaṃ okkamati,
atk-s0203a0:483_0: Tattha mālāti paṭisandhiggahaṇadivase piḷandhanamālā. Tā kira saṭṭhisatasahassādhikā
atk-s0203a0:483_1: sattapaṇṇāsa-vassakoṭiyo amilāyitvā tadā milāyanti. Vatthesupi eseva nayo. Ettakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:483_2: pana kālaṃ devānaṃ neva sītaṃ na uṇhaṃ hoti, tasmiṃ kāle sarīrato bindubinduvasena
atk-s0203a0:483_3: sedā muccanti. Ettakañca kālaṃ tesaṃ sarīre khaṇḍiccapāliccādivasena vivaṇṇatā na
atk-s0203a0:483_4: paññāyati, devadhītā soḷasavassuddesikā viya, devaputtā vīsativassuddesikā viya khāyanti.
atk-s0203a0:483_5: Maraṇakāle pana nesaṃ kilantarūpo attabhāvo hoti. Ettakañca nesaṃ kālaṃ devaloke
atk-s0203a0:483_6: ukkaṇṭhitā nāma natthi, maraṇakāle pana nissasanti vijambhanti, sake āsane nābhiramanti.
atk-s0203a0:484_0: Imāni pana pubbanimittāni, yathā loke mahāpuññānaṃ rājarājamahāmattādīnaṃyeva ukkāpātabhūmicālacandaggāhādīni
atk-s0203a0:484_1: nimittāni paññāyanti, na sabbesaṃ, evameva mahesakkhānaṃ devatānaṃyeva paññāyanti,
atk-s0203a0:484_2: na sabbesaṃ. Yathā ca manussesu pubbanimittāni nakkhattapāṭhakādayova jānanti, na
atk-s0203a0:484_3: sabbe, evameva tānipi sabbe devā na jānanti, paṇḍitā eva pana jānanti. Tattha ye
atk-s0203a0:484_4: ca mandena kusalakammena nibbattā devaputtā, te tesu uppannesu – “idāni ko jānāti,
atk-s0203a0:484_5: kuhiṃ nibbattissāmā”ti bhāyanti. Ye mahāpuññā, te – “amhehi dinnaṃ dānaṃ rakkhitaṃ
atk-s0203a0:484_6: sīlaṃ bhāvitaṃ bhāvanaṃ āgamma uparidevalokesu sampattiṃ anubhavissāmā”ti na bhāyanti.
atk-s0203a0:484_7: Bodhisattopi tāni pubbanimittāni disvā “idāni anantare attabhāve buddho bhavissāmī”ti
atk-s0203a0:484_8: na bhāyi. Athassa tesu nimittesu pātubhūtesu dasasahassacakkavāḷadevatā sannipatitvā
atk-s0203a0:484_9: – “mārisa tumhehi dasa pāramiyo pūrentehi na sakkasampattiṃ na mārabrahmacakkavattisampattiṃ
atk-s0203a0:484_10: patthentehi pūritā, lokanittharaṇatthāya pana buddhattaṃ patthayamānehi pūritā. So
atk-s0203a0:484_11: vo idāni kālo mārisa buddhattāya, samayo mārisa buddhattāyā”ti yācanti.
atk-s0203a0:485_1: pañcamahāvilokanaṃ nāma vilokesi. Tattha “kālo nu kho, na kālo”ti paṭhamaṃ kālaṃ
atk-s0203a0:485_2: vilokesi. Tattha vassasatasahassato uddhaṃ vaḍḍhitaāyukālo kālo nāma na hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0203a0:485_3: Tadā hi sattānaṃ jātijarāmaraṇāni na paññāyanti, buddhānañca dhammadesanā nāma tilakkhaṇamuttā
atk-s0203a0:485_4: natthi, tesaṃ aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti kathentānaṃ “kiṃ nāmetaṃ kathentī”ti neva
atk-s0203a0:485_5: sotuṃ na saddhātuṃ maññanti, tato abhisamayo na hoti, tasmiṃ asati aniyyānikaṃ sāsanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:485_6: hoti. Tasmā so akālo. Vassasatato ūnaāyukālopi kālo nāma na hoti. Kasmā? Tadā hi
atk-s0203a0:485_7: sattā ussannakilesā honti, ussannakilesānañca dinnovādo ovādaṭṭhāne na tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0203a0:485_8: Udake daṇḍarāji viya khippaṃ vigacchati. Tasmā sopi akālo. Satasahassato pana paṭṭhāya
atk-s0203a0:485_9: heṭṭhā vassasatato paṭṭhāya uddhaṃ āyukālo kālo nāma. Tadā ca vassasatakālo hoti.
atk-s0203a0:486: Tato dīpaṃ vilokento saparivāre cattāro dīpe oloketvā – “tīsu dīpesu buddhā na nibbattanti, jambudīpeyeva nibbattantī”ti dīpaṃ passi.
atk-s0203a0:487_0: Tato – “jambudīpo nāma mahā, dasayojanasahassaparimāṇo, katarasmiṃ nu kho padese
atk-s0203a0:487_1: buddhā nibbattantī”ti desaṃ vilokento majjhimadesaṃ passi. Majjhimadeso nāma “puratthimāya
atk-s0203a0:487_2: disāya gajaṅgalaṃ nāma nigamo”tiādinā nayena vinaye vuttova. So pana āyāmato tīṇi
atk-s0203a0:487_3: yojanasatāni. Vitthārato aḍḍhatiyāni, parikkhepato navayojanasatānīti. Etasmiñhi
atk-s0203a0:487_4: padese cattāri aṭṭha soḷasa vā asaṅkhyeyyāni, kappasatasahassañca pāramiyo pūretvā
atk-s0203a0:487_5: sammāsambuddhā uppajjanti. Dve asaṅkhyeyyāni, kappasatasahassañca pāramiyo pūretvā
atk-s0203a0:487_6: paccekabuddhā uppajjanti, ekaṃ asaṅkhyeyyaṃ, kappasatasahassañca pāramiyo pūretvā
atk-s0203a0:487_7: sāriputtamoggallānādayo mahāsāvakā uppajjanti, catunnaṃ mahādīpānaṃ dvisahassānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:487_8: parittadīpānañca issariyādhipaccakārakacakkavattirājāno uppajjanti, aññe ca mahesakkhā
atk-s0203a0:487_9: khattiyabrāhmaṇagahapatimahāsālā uppajjanti. Idañcettha kapilavatthu nāma nagaraṃ,
