atk-s0203a0:488: Tato kulaṃ vilokento – “buddhā nāma lokasammate kule nibbattanti, idāni ca khattiyakulaṃ lokasammataṃ, tattha nibbattissāmi, suddhodano nāma rājā me pitā bhavissatī”ti kulaṃ passi.
atk-s0203a0:489_0: Tato mātaraṃ vilokento – “buddhamātā nāma lolā surādhuttā na hoti, kappasatasahassaṃ
atk-s0203a0:489_1: pūritapāramī jātito paṭṭhāya akhaṇḍapañcasīlā hoti, ayañca mahāmāyā nāma devī edisā.
atk-s0203a0:489_2: Ayaṃ me mātā bhavissati. Kittakaṃ panassā āyū”ti āvajjanto – “dasannaṃ māsānaṃ upari
atk-s0203a0:490_0: Iti imaṃ pañcamahāvilokanaṃ viloketvā – “kālo me mārisā buddhabhāvāyā”ti devatānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:490_1: saṅgahaṃ karonto paṭiññaṃ datvā “gacchatha tumhe”ti tā devatā uyyojetvā tusitadevatāhi
atk-s0203a0:490_2: parivuto tusitapure nandanavanaṃ pāvisi. Sabbadevalokesu hi nandanavanaṃ atthiyeva.
atk-s0203a0:490_3: Tattha naṃ devatā – “ito cuto sugatiṃ gaccha, ito cuto sugatiṃ gacchā”ti pubbekatakusalakammokāsaṃ
atk-s0203a0:490_4: sārayamānā vicaranti. So evaṃ devatāhi kusalaṃ sārayamānāhi parivuto tattha vicarantova cavi.
atk-s0203a0:491_0: Evaṃ cuto cavāmīti pajānāti, cuticittaṃ na jānāti. Paṭisandhiṃ gahetvāpi paṭisandhicittaṃ
atk-s0203a0:491_1: na jānāti, imasmiṃ me ṭhāne paṭisandhi gahitāti evaṃ pana jānāti. Keci pana therā
atk-s0203a0:491_2: “āvajjanapariyāyo nāma laddhuṃ vaṭṭati, dutiyatatiyacittavāreyeva jānissatī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0203a0:491_3: Tipiṭakamahāsīvatthero panāha – “mahāsattānaṃ paṭisandhi na aññesaṃ paṭisandhisadisā,
atk-s0203a0:491_4: koṭippattaṃ tesaṃ satisampajaññaṃ. Yasmā pana teneva cittena taṃ cittaṃ ñātuṃ na
atk-s0203a0:491_5: sakkā, tasmā cuticittaṃ na jānāti. Cutikkhaṇepi cavāmīti pajānāti, paṭisandhiṃ gahetvāpi
atk-s0203a0:491_6: paṭisandhicittaṃ na jānāti, asukasmiṃ ṭhāne paṭisandhi gahitāti pajānāti, tasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:491_7: kāle dasasahassī kampatī”ti. Evaṃ sato sampajāno mātukucchiṃ okkamanto pana ekūnavīsatiyā
atk-s0203a0:491_9: sadisamahāvipākacittena paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhi. Mahāsīvatthero pana “upekkhāsahagatenā”ti āha.
atk-s0203a0:492_0: Paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhanto pana āsāḷhīpuṇṇamāyaṃ uttarāsāḷhanakkhattena aggahesi. Tadā
atk-s0203a0:492_1: kira mahāmāyā pure puṇṇamāya sattamadivasato paṭṭhāya vigatasurāpānaṃ mālāgandhavibhūsanasampannaṃ
atk-s0203a0:492_2: nakkhattakīḷaṃ anubhavamānā sattame divase pāto vuṭṭhāya gandhodakena nhāyitvā sabbālaṅkāravibhūsitā
atk-s0203a0:492_3: varabhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya sirīgabbhaṃ pavisitvā sirīsayane
atk-s0203a0:492_4: nipannā niddaṃ okkamamānā idaṃ supinaṃ addasa – “cattāro kira naṃ mahārājāno sayaneneva
atk-s0203a0:492_5: saddhiṃ ukkhipitvā anotattadahaṃ netvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhaṃsu. Atha nesaṃ deviyo āgantvā
atk-s0203a0:492_6: manussamalaharaṇatthaṃ nhāpetvā dibbavatthaṃ nivāsetvā gandhehi vilimpetvā dibbapupphāni
atk-s0203a0:492_7: piḷandhitvā tato avidūre rajatapabbato, tassa anto kanakavimānaṃ atthi, tasmiṃ pācīnato
atk-s0203a0:492_8: sīsaṃ katvā nipajjāpesuṃ. Atha bodhisatto setavaravāraṇo hutvā tato avidūre eko suvaṇṇapabbato,
atk-s0203a0:492_9: tattha caritvā tato oruyha rajatapabbataṃ abhiruhitvā uttaradisato āgamma kanakavimānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:492_10: pavisitvā mātaraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā dakkhiṇapassaṃ phāletvā kucchiṃ paviṭṭhasadiso ahosi.
atk-s0203a0:493_0: Atha pabuddhā devī taṃ supinaṃ rañño ārocesi. Rājā pabhātāya rattiyā catusaṭṭhimatte
atk-s0203a0:493_1: brāhmaṇapāmokkhe pakkosāpetvā haritūpalittāya lājādīhi katamaṅgalasakkārāya bhūmiyā
atk-s0203a0:493_2: mahārahāni āsanāni paññāpetvā tattha nisinnānaṃ brāhmaṇānaṃ sappimadhusakkarābhisaṅkhārassa
atk-s0203a0:493_3: varapāyāsassa suvaṇṇarajatapātiyo pūretvā suvaṇṇarajatapātītiheva paṭikujjitvā adāsi,
atk-s0203a0:493_4: aññehi ca ahatavatthakapilagāvīdānādīhi te santappesi. Atha nesaṃ sabbakāmasantappitānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:493_5: supinaṃ ārocāpetvā – “kiṃ bhavissatī”ti pucchi. Brāhmaṇā āhaṃsu – “mā cintayi mahārāja,
atk-s0203a0:493_6: deviyā te kucchimhi gabbho patiṭṭhito, so ca kho purisagabbho, na itthigabbho, putto
atk-s0203a0:493_7: te bhavissati. So sace agāraṃ ajjhāvasissati, rājā bhavissati cakkavattī. Sace agārā
atk-s0203a0:493_8: nikkhamma pabbajissati, buddho bhavissati loke vivaṭṭacchado”ti. Evaṃ sato sampajāno
atk-s0203a0:494: Tattha sato sampajānoti iminā catutthāya gabbhāvakkantiyā okkamatīti dasseti. Catasso hi gabbhāvakkantiyo.
atk-s0203a0:495_0: “Catasso imā, bhante, gabbhāvakkantiyo. Idha, bhante, ekacco asampajāno mātukucchiṃ
atk-s0203a0:495_1: okkamati, asampajāno mātukucchismiṃ ṭhāti, asampajāno mātukucchimhā nikkhamati, ayaṃ
atk-s0203a0:496: Puna caparaṃ, bhante, idhekacco sampajāno mātukucchiṃ okkamati, asampajāno mātukucchismiṃ ṭhāti, asampajāno mātukucchimhā nikkhamati, ayaṃ dutiyā gabbhāvakkanti.
atk-s0203a0:497: Puna caparaṃ, bhante, idhekacco sampajāno mātukucchiṃ okkamati, sampajāno mātukucchismiṃ ṭhāti, asampajāno mātukucchimhā nikkhamati, ayaṃ tatiyā gabbhāvakkanti.
atk-s0203a0:498: Puna caparaṃ, bhante, idhekacco sampajāno mātukucchiṃ okkamati, sampajāno mātukucchismiṃ ṭhāti, sampajāno mātukucchimhā nikkhamati, ayaṃ catutthā gabbhāvakkantī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:499_0: Etāsu paṭhamā lokiyamanussānaṃ hoti, dutiyā asītimahāsāvakānaṃ, tatiyā dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:499_1: paccekabodhisattānañca. Te kira kammajavātehi uddhaṃpādā adhosirā anekasataporise
atk-s0203a0:499_2: papāte viya yonimukhe tāḷacchiggalena hatthī viya ativiya sambādhena yonimukhena
atk-s0203a0:499_3: nikkhamamānā anantaṃ dukkhaṃ pāpuṇanti. Tena nesaṃ “mayaṃ nikkhamāmā”ti sampajānatā
atk-s0203a0:499_4: na hoti. Catutthā sabbaññubodhisattānaṃ. Te hi mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiṃ gaṇhantāpi
atk-s0203a0:499_5: jānanti, tattha vasantāpi jānanti. Nikkhamanakālepi nesaṃ kammajavātā uddhaṃpāde
atk-s0203a0:499_6: adhosire katvā khipituṃ na sakkonti, dve hatthe pasāretvā akkhīni ummīletvā ṭhitakāva nikkhamanti.
atk-s0203a0:500_0: 201. Mātukucchiṃ okkamatīti ettha mātukucchiṃ okkanto hotīti attho. Okkante hi tasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:500_1: evaṃ hoti, na okkamamāne. Appamāṇoti buddhappamāṇo, vipuloti attho. Uḷāroti tasseva
atk-s0203a0:500_2: vevacanaṃ. Devānubhāvanti ettha devānaṃ ayamānubhāvo – nivatthavatthassa pabhā dvādasa
atk-s0203a0:500_3: yojanāni pharati, tathā sarīrassa, tathā alaṅkārassa, tathā vimānassa, taṃ atikkamitvāti attho.
atk-s0203a0:501_0: Lokantarikāti tiṇṇaṃ tiṇṇaṃ cakkavāḷānaṃ antarā ekeko lokantarikā hoti, tiṇṇaṃ sakaṭacakkānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:501_1: pattānaṃ vā aññamaññaṃ āhacca ṭhapitānaṃ majjhe okāso viya. So pana lokantarikanirayo
atk-s0203a0:501_2: parimāṇato aṭṭhayojanasahasso hoti. Aghāti niccavivaṭā. Asaṃvutāti heṭṭhāpi appatiṭṭhā.
atk-s0203a0:501_4: samannāgatā. Tattha kira cakkhuviññāṇaṃ na jāyati. Evaṃmahiddhikāti candimasūriyā
atk-s0203a0:501_5: kira ekappahāreneva tīsu dīpesu paññāyanti, evaṃmahiddhikā. Ekekāya disāya navanavayojanasatasahassāni
atk-s0203a0:501_6: andhakāraṃ vidhamitvā ālokaṃ dassenti, evaṃ mahānubhāvā. Ābhāya nānubhontīti attano
atk-s0203a0:501_7: pabhāya nappahonti. Te kira cakkavāḷapabbatassa vemajjhena caranti, cakkavāḷapabbatañca
atk-s0203a0:501_8: atikkamma lokantarikanirayo, tasmā te tattha ābhāya nappahonti.
atk-s0203a0:502_0: Yepi tattha sattāti yepi tasmiṃ lokantaramahāniraye sattā upapannā. Kiṃ pana kammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:502_1: katvā te tattha uppajjantīti? Bhāriyaṃ dāruṇaṃ mātāpitūnaṃ dhammikasamaṇabrāhmaṇānañca
atk-s0203a0:502_2: upari aparādhaṃ aññañca divase divase pāṇavadhādisāhasikakammaṃ katvā uppajjanti
atk-s0203a0:502_3: tambapaṇṇidīpe abhayacoranāgacorādayo viya. Tesaṃ attabhāvo tigāvutiko hoti, vaggulīnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:502_4: viya dīghanakhā honti. Te rukkhe vagguliyo viya nakhehi cakkavāḷapāde lagganti. Yadā
atk-s0203a0:502_5: pana saṃsappantā aññamaññassa hatthapāsaṃ gatā honti, atha “bhakkho no laddho”ti
atk-s0203a0:502_6: maññamānā tattha vāvaṭā viparivattitvā lokasandhārakaudake patanti. Vāte paharante
atk-s0203a0:502_7: madhukaphalāni viya chijjitvā udake patanti. Patitamattā ca accantakhāre udake piṭṭhapiṇḍi viya vilīyanti.
atk-s0203a0:503_0: Aññepi kira bho santi sattāti – “yathā mayaṃ mahādukkhaṃ anubhavāma, evaṃ aññepi
atk-s0203a0:503_1: kira sattā idaṃ dukkhaṃ anubhavantā idhūpapannā”ti taṃ divasaṃ passanti. Ayaṃ pana
atk-s0203a0:503_2: obhāso ekayāgupānamattampi na tiṭṭhati, yāvatā niddāyitvā pabuddho ārammaṇaṃ vibhāveti,
atk-s0203a0:503_3: tattakaṃ kālaṃ hoti. Dīghabhāṇakā pana “accharāsaṅghāṭamattameva vijjubhāso viya
atk-s0203a0:503_4: niccharitvā kiṃ idanti bhaṇantānaṃyeva antaradhāyatī”ti vadanti. Saṅkampatīti samantato
atk-s0203a0:503_5: kampati. Itaradvayaṃ purimapasseva vevacanaṃ. Puna appamāṇo cātiādi nigamanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:504_0: 202. Cattāro devaputtā catuddisaṃ ārakkhāya upagacchantīti ettha cattāroti catunnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:504_1: mahārājūnaṃ vasena vuttaṃ, dasasahassacakkavāḷe pana cattāro cattāro katvā cattālīsadasasahassā
atk-s0203a0:504_2: honti. Tattha imasmiṃ cakkavāḷe mahārājāno khaggahatthā āgantvā bodhisattassa ārakkhaṇatthāya
atk-s0203a0:504_3: upagantvā sirīgabbhaṃ paviṭṭhā, itare gabbhadvārato paṭṭhāya avaruddhapaṃsupisācakādiyakkhagaṇe
atk-s0203a0:505_0: Kimatthaṃ panāyaṃ rakkhā āgatā? Nanu paṭisandhikkhaṇe kalalakālato paṭṭhāya sacepi
atk-s0203a0:505_1: koṭisatasahassā mārā koṭisatasahassaṃ sineruṃ ukkhipitvā bodhisattassa vā bodhisattamātuyā
atk-s0203a0:505_2: vā antarāyakaraṇatthaṃ āgaccheyyuṃ, sabbe antarāva antaradhāyeyyuṃ. Vuttampi cetaṃ
atk-s0203a0:505_3: bhagavatā ruhiruppādavatthusmiṃ – “aṭṭhānametaṃ, bhikkhave, anavakāso, yaṃ parūpakkamena
atk-s0203a0:505_4: tathāgataṃ jīvitā voropeyya. Anupakkamena, bhikkhave, tathāgatā parinibbāyanti. Gacchatha
atk-s0203a0:505_5: tumhe, bhikkhave, yathāvihāraṃ, arakkhiyā, bhikkhave, tathāgatā”ti. Evametaṃ, na
atk-s0203a0:505_6: parūpakkamena tesaṃ jīvitantarāyo atthi. Santi kho pana amanussā virūpā duddasikā,
atk-s0203a0:505_7: bheravarupā pakkhino, yesaṃ rūpaṃ disvā saddaṃ vā sutvā bodhisattamātu bhayaṃ vā
atk-s0203a0:505_8: santāso vā uppajjeyya, tesaṃ nivāraṇatthāya rakkhaṃ aggahesuṃ. Apica kho bodhisattassa
atk-s0203a0:505_9: puññatejena sañjātagāravā attano gāravacoditāpi te evamakaṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:506_0: Kiṃ pana te antogabbhaṃ pavisitvā ṭhitā cattāro mahārājāno bodhisattamātuyā attānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:506_1: dassenti na dassentīti? Nahānamaṇḍanabhojanādisarīrakiccakāle na dassenti, sirīgabbhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:506_2: pavisitvā varasayane nipannakāle pana dassenti. Tattha kiñcāpi amanussadassanaṃ nāma
atk-s0203a0:506_3: manussānaṃ sappaṭibhayaṃ hoti, bodhisattamātā pana attano ceva puttassa ca puññānubhāvena
atk-s0203a0:506_4: te disvā na bhāyati, pakatiantepurapālakesu viya assā tesu cittaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0203a0:507_0: 203. Pakatiyā sīlavatīti sabhāveneva sīlasampannā. Anuppanne kira buddhe manussā
atk-s0203a0:507_1: tāpasaparibbājakānaṃ santike vanditvā ukkuṭikaṃ nisīditvā sīlaṃ gaṇhanti, bodhisattamātāpi
atk-s0203a0:507_2: kāladevilassa isino santike gaṇhāti. Bodhisatte pana kucchigate aññassa pādamūle
atk-s0203a0:507_3: nisīdituṃ nāma na sakkā, samāsane nisīditvā gahitasīlampi avaññā kāraṇamattaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:507_4: Tasmā sayameva sīlaṃ aggahesīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:508_0: Purisesūti bodhisattassa pitaraṃ ādiṃ katvā kesuci manussesu purisādhippāyacittaṃ
atk-s0203a0:508_1: nuppajjati. Tañca kho bodhisatte gāravena, na pahīnakilesatāya. Bodhisattamātu rūpaṃ
atk-s0203a0:508_2: pana sukusalāpi sippikā potthakammādīsupi kātuṃ na sakkonti, taṃ disvā purisassa
atk-s0203a0:508_3: rāgo nuppajjatīti na sakkā vattuṃ. Sace pana taṃ rattacitto upasaṅkamitukāmo hoti,
atk-s0203a0:508_4: pādā na vahanti, dibbasaṅkhalikā viya bajjhanti. Tasmā “anatikkamanīyā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:509_1: kathito, idha ārammaṇappaṭilābho dassito. Tadā kira “deviyā evarūpo putto kucchismiṃ
atk-s0203a0:509_2: uppanno”ti, sutvā samantato rājāno mahagghaābharaṇatūriyādivasena pañcadvārārammaṇavatthubhūtaṃ
atk-s0203a0:509_3: paṇṇākāraṃ pesenti, bodhisattassa ca bodhisattamātuyā ca katakammassa ussannattā
atk-s0203a0:510_0: 204. Akilantakāyāti yathā aññā itthiyo gabbhabhārena kilamanti, hatthapādā uddhumātakādīni
atk-s0203a0:510_1: pāpuṇanti, na evaṃ tassā koci kilamatho ahosi. Tirokucchigatanti antokucchigataṃ.
atk-s0203a0:510_2: Kalalādikālaṃ atikkamitvā sañjātaaṅgapaccaṅgaṃ ahīnindriyabhāvaṃ upagataṃyeva passati.
atk-s0203a0:510_3: Kimatthaṃ passati? Sukhavāsatthaṃ. Yatheva hi mātā puttena saddhiṃ nisinnā vā nipannā
atk-s0203a0:510_4: vā “hatthaṃ vā pādaṃ vā olambantaṃ ukkhipitvā saṇṭhapessāmī”ti sukhavāsatthaṃ puttaṃ
atk-s0203a0:510_5: oloketi, evaṃ bodhisattamātāpi yaṃ taṃ mātu uṭṭhānagamanaparivattananisajjādīsu uṇhasītaloṇikatittakakaṭukāhāraajjhoharaṇakālesu
atk-s0203a0:510_6: ca gabbhassa dukkhaṃ uppajjati, atthi nu kho me taṃ puttassāti sukhavāsatthaṃ bodhisattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:510_7: olokayamānā pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā nisinnaṃ bodhisattaṃ passati. Yathā hi aññe antokucchigatā
atk-s0203a0:510_8: pakkāsayaṃ ajjhottharitvā āmāsayaṃ ukkhipitvā udarapaṭalaṃ piṭṭhito katvā piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:510_9: nissāya ukkuṭikā dvīsu muṭṭhīsu hanukaṃ ṭhapetvā deve vassante rukkhasusire makkaṭā
atk-s0203a0:510_10: viya nisīdanti, na evaṃ bodhisatto. Bodhisatto pana piṭṭhikaṇṭakaṃ piṭṭhito katvā
atk-s0203a0:510_11: dhammāsane dhammakathiko viya pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā puratthābhimukho nisīdati. Pubbe
atk-s0203a0:510_12: katakammaṃ panassā vatthuṃ sodheti, suddhe vatthumhi sukhumacchavilakkhaṇaṃ nibbattati.
atk-s0203a0:510_13: Atha naṃ kucchigataṃ taco paṭicchādetuṃ na sakkoti, olokentiyā bahi ṭhito viya paññāyati.
atk-s0203a0:510_14: Tamatthaṃ upamāya vibhāvento seyyathāpītiādimāha. Bodhisatto pana antokucchigato
atk-s0203a0:510_15: mātaraṃ na passati. Na hi antokucchiyaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0203a0:511_0: 205. Kālaṃ karotīti na vijātabhāvapaccayā, āyuparikkhayeneva. Bodhisattena vasitaṭṭhānañhi
atk-s0203a0:511_1: cetiyakuṭisadisaṃ hoti aññesaṃ aparibhogaṃ, na ca sakkā bodhisattamātaraṃ apanetvā
atk-s0203a0:511_2: aññaṃ aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhapetunti tattakaṃyeva bodhisattamātu āyuppamāṇaṃ hoti, tasmā
atk-s0203a0:511_3: tadā kālaṃ karoti. Katarasmiṃ pana vaye kālaṃ karotīti? Majjhimavaye. Paṭhamavayasmiñhi
atk-s0203a0:511_4: sattānaṃ attabhāve chandarāgo balavā hoti, tena tadā sañjātagabbhā itthī taṃ gabbhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:511_5: anurakkhituṃ na sakkonti, gabbho bahvābādho hoti. Majjhimavayassa pana dve koṭṭhāse
atk-s0203a0:511_6: atikkamma tatiyakoṭṭhāse vatthuṃ visadaṃ hoti, visade vatthumhi nibbattā dārakā arogā
atk-s0203a0:511_7: honti. Tasmā bodhisattamātāpi paṭhamavaye sampattiṃ anubhavitvā majjhimavayassa tatiyakoṭṭhāse
atk-s0203a0:512_0: Nava vā dasa vāti ettha vā-saddena vikappanavasena satta vā aṭṭha vā ekādasa vā dvādasa
atk-s0203a0:512_1: vāti evamādīnampi saṅgaho veditabbo. Tattha sattamāsajāto jīvati, sītuṇhakkhamo pana
atk-s0203a0:512_2: na hoti. Aṭṭhamāsajāto na jīvati, sesā jīvanti.
atk-s0203a0:513_0: Ṭhitāvāti ṭhitāva hutvā. Mahāmāyāpi devī upavijaññā ñātikulagharaṃ gamissāmīti rañño
atk-s0203a0:513_1: ārocesi. Rājā kapilavatthuto devadahanagaragāmimaggaṃ alaṅkārāpetvā deviṃ suvaṇṇasivikāya
atk-s0203a0:513_2: nisīdāpesi. Sakalanagaravāsino sakyā parivāretvā gandhamālādīhi pūjayamānā deviṃ
atk-s0203a0:513_3: gahetvā pāyiṃsu. Sā devadahanagarassa avidūre lumbinisālavanuyyānaṃ disvā uyyānavicaraṇatthāya
atk-s0203a0:513_4: cittaṃ uppādetvā rañño saññaṃ adāsi. Rājā uyyānaṃ paṭijaggāpetvā ārakkhaṃ saṃvidahāpesi.
atk-s0203a0:513_5: Deviyā uyyānaṃ paviṭṭhamattāya kāyadubbalyaṃ ahosi, athassā maṅgalasālamūle sirīsayanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:513_6: paññāpetvā sāṇiyā parikkhipiṃsu. Sā antosāṇiṃ pavisitvā sālasākhaṃ hatthena gahetvā
atk-s0203a0:514_0: Devā naṃ paṭhamaṃ paṭiggaṇhantīti khīṇāsavā suddhāvāsabrahmāno paṭiggaṇhanti. Kathaṃ?
atk-s0203a0:514_1: Sūtivesaṃ gaṇhitvāti eke. Taṃ pana paṭikkhipitvā idaṃ vuttaṃ – tadā bodhisattamātā
atk-s0203a0:514_2: suvaṇṇakhacitaṃ vatthaṃ nivāsetvā macchakkhisadisaṃ dukūlapaṭaṃ yāva pādantāva pārupitvā
atk-s0203a0:514_3: aṭṭhāsi. Athassā sallahukaṃ gabbhavuṭṭhānaṃ ahosi dhammakaraṇato udakanikkhamanasadisaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:514_4: Atha te pakatibrahmaveseneva upasaṅkamitvā paṭhamaṃ suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggahesuṃ. Tesaṃ
atk-s0203a0:514_5: hatthato manussā dukūlacumbaṭakena paṭiggahesuṃ. Tena vuttaṃ – “devā naṃ paṭhamaṃ
atk-s0203a0:515: 206. Cattāro naṃ devaputtāti cattāro mahārājāno. Paṭiggahetvāti ajinappaveṇiyā paṭiggahetvā. Mahesakkhoti mahātejo mahāyaso lakkhaṇasampannoti attho.
atk-s0203a0:516_0: Visadova nikkhamatīti yathā aññe sattā yonimagge laggantā bhaggavibhaggā nikkhamanti,
atk-s0203a0:516_1: na evaṃ nikkhamati, alaggo hutvā nikkhamatīti attho. Udenāti udakena. Kenaci asucināti
atk-s0203a0:516_2: yathā aññe sattā kammajavātehi uddhaṃpādā adhosirā yonimagge pakkhittā sataporisanarakapapātaṃ
atk-s0203a0:516_3: patantā viya tāḷacchiddena nikkaḍḍhiyamānā hatthī viya mahādukkhaṃ anubhavantā nānāasucimakkhitāva
atk-s0203a0:516_4: nikkhamanti, na evaṃ bodhisatto. Bodhisattañhi kammajavātā uddhaṃpādaṃ adhosiraṃ
atk-s0203a0:516_5: kātuṃ na sakkonti. So dhammāsanato otaranto dhammakathiko viya nisseṇito otaranto
atk-s0203a0:516_6: puriso viya ca dve hatthe ca pāde ca pasāretvā ṭhitakova mātukucchisambhavena kenaci
atk-s0203a0:517_0: Udakassa dhārāti udakavaṭṭiyo. Tāsu sītā suvaṇṇakaṭāhe patati, uṇhā rajatakaṭāhe.
atk-s0203a0:517_1: Idañca pathavītale kenaci asucinā asammissaṃ tesaṃ pānīyaparibhojanīyaudakañceva
atk-s0203a0:517_2: aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ kīḷanaudakañca dassetuṃ vuttaṃ. Aññassa pana suvaṇṇarajataghaṭehi
atk-s0203a0:517_3: āhariyamānaudakassa ceva haṃsavaṭṭakādipokkharaṇigatassa ca udakassa paricchedo natthi.
atk-s0203a0:518_0: 207. Sampatijātoti muhuttajāto. Pāḷiyaṃ pana mātukucchito nikkhantamatto viya dassito,
atk-s0203a0:518_1: na pana evaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Nikkhantamattañhi taṃ paṭhamaṃ brahmāno suvaṇṇajālena paṭiggaṇhiṃsu,
atk-s0203a0:518_2: tesaṃ hatthato cattāro mahārājāno maṅgalasammatāya sukhasamphassāya ajinappaveṇiyā,
atk-s0203a0:518_3: tesaṃ hatthato manussā dukūlacumbaṭakena, manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhito.
atk-s0203a0:519_0: Setamhi chatte anudhāriyamāneti dibbasetacchatte anudhāriyamāne. Ettha ca chattassa
atk-s0203a0:519_1: parivārāni khaggādīni pañca rājakakudhabhaṇḍānipi āgatāneva. Pāḷiyaṃ pana rājagamane
atk-s0203a0:519_2: rājā viya chattameva vuttaṃ. Tesu chattameva paññāyati, na chattaggāhakā. Tathā khagga-tālavaṇṭa-morahatthaka-vāḷabījani-uṇhīsamattāyeva
atk-s0203a0:519_3: paññāyanti, na tesaṃ gāhakā. Sabbāni kira tāni adissamānarūpā devatā gaṇhiṃsu. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0203a0:524_0: Sabbā ca disāti idaṃ sattapadavītihārūpari ṭhitassa viya sabbadisānuvilokanaṃ vuttaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:524_1: na kho panevaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Mahāsatto hi manussānaṃ hatthato muccitvā puratthimadisaṃ
atk-s0203a0:524_2: olokesi, anekacakkavāḷasahassāni ekaṅgaṇāni ahesuṃ. Tattha devamanussā gandhamālādīhi
atk-s0203a0:524_3: pūjayamānā – “mahāpurisa idha tumhehi sadisopi natthi, kuto uttaritaro”ti āhaṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:524_4: Evaṃ catasso disā, catasso anudisā, heṭṭhā, uparīti dasapi disā anuviloketvā attanā
atk-s0203a0:524_5: sadisaṃ adisvā ayaṃ uttarā disāti sattapadavītihārena agamāsīti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo.
atk-s0203a0:524_6: Āsabhinti uttamaṃ. Aggoti guṇehi sabbapaṭhamo. Itarāni dve padāni etasseva vevacanāni.
atk-s0203a0:524_7: Ayamantimā jāti, natthi dāni punabbhavoti padadvayena imasmiṃ attabhāve pattabbaṃ arahattaṃ byākāsi.
atk-s0203a0:525_0: Ettha ca samehi pādehi pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhānaṃ catuiddhipādapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:525_1: uttarābhimukhabhāvo mahājanaṃ ajjhottharitvā abhibhavitvā gamanassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:525_6: jātī”ti sīhanādo anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbānassa pubbanimittanti veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:525_7: Ime vārā pāḷiyaṃ āgatā, sambahulavāro pana āgato, āharitvā dīpetabbo.
atk-s0203a0:526_0: Mahāpurisassa hi jātadivase dasasahassilokadhātu kampi. Dasasahassilokadhātumhi devatā
atk-s0203a0:526_1: ekacakkavāḷe sannipatiṃsu. Paṭhamaṃ devā paṭiggahiṃsu, pacchā manussā. Tantibaddhā
atk-s0203a0:526_2: vīṇā cammabaddhā bheriyo ca kenaci avāditā sayameva vajjiṃsu, manussānaṃ andubandhanādīni
atk-s0203a0:526_3: khaṇḍākhaṇḍaṃ bhijjiṃsu. Sabbarogā ambilena dhotatambamalaṃ viya vigacchiṃsu, jaccandhā
atk-s0203a0:526_4: rūpāni passiṃsu. Jaccabadhirā saddaṃ suṇiṃsu, pīṭhasappī javanasampannā ahesuṃ, jātijaḷānampi
atk-s0203a0:526_5: eḷamūgānaṃ sati patiṭṭhāsi, videse pakkhandanāvā supaṭṭanaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu, ākāsaṭṭhakabhūmaṭṭhakaratanāni
atk-s0203a0:526_6: sakatejobhāsitāni ahesuṃ, verino mettacittaṃ paṭilabhiṃsu, avīcimhi aggi nibbāyi.
atk-s0203a0:526_7: Lokantare āloko udapādi, nadīsu jalaṃ na pavatti, mahāsamuddesu madhurasadisaṃ udakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:526_8: ahosi, vāto na vāyi, ākāsapabbatarukkhagatā sakuṇā bhassitvā pathavīgatā ahesuṃ,
atk-s0203a0:526_9: cando atiroci, sūriyo na uṇho na sītalo nimmalo utusampanno ahosi, devatā attano
atk-s0203a0:526_10: attano vimānadvāre ṭhatvā apphoṭanaseḷanacelukkhepādīhi mahākīḷaṃ kīḷiṃsu, cātuddīpikamahāmegho
atk-s0203a0:526_11: vassi, mahājanaṃ neva khudā na pipāsā pīḷesi, dvārakavāṭāni sayameva vivariṃsu, pupphūpagaphalūpagā
atk-s0203a0:526_12: rukkhā pupphaphalāni gaṇhiṃsu, dasasahassilokadhātu ekaddhajamālā ahosīti.
atk-s0203a0:527_1: ekacakkavāḷe sannipāto dhammacakkappavattanakāle ekappahārena sannipatitvā dhammapaṭiggaṇhanassa
atk-s0203a0:527_2: pubbanimittaṃ, paṭhamaṃ devatānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ catunnaṃ rūpāvacarajjhānānaṃ paṭilābhassa
atk-s0203a0:527_3: pubbanimittaṃ. Pacchā manussānaṃ paṭiggahaṇaṃ catunnaṃ arūpajjhānānaṃ paṭilābhassa
atk-s0203a0:527_4: pubbanimittaṃ, tantibaddhavīṇānaṃ sayaṃ vajjanaṃ anupubbavihārapaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:527_5: cammabaddhabherīnaṃ vajjanaṃ mahatiyā dhammabheriyā anussāvanassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:527_6: andubandhanādīnaṃ chedo asmimānasamucchedassa pubbanimittaṃ, sabbarogavigamo sabbakilesavigamassa
atk-s0203a0:527_7: pubbanimittaṃ, jaccandhānaṃ rūpadassanaṃ dibbacakkhupaṭilābhassa pubbanimittaṃ, jaccabadhirānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:527_11: pubbanimittaṃ, ratanānaṃ sakatejobhāsitattaṃ yaṃ lokassa dhammobhāsaṃ dassessati
atk-s0203a0:528_1: agginibbānaṃ ekādasaagginibbānassa pubbanimittaṃ, lokantarāloko avijjandhakāraṃ vidhamitvā
atk-s0203a0:528_2: ñāṇālokadassanassa pubbanimittaṃ, mahāsamuddassa madhuratā nibbānarasena ekarasabhāvassa
atk-s0203a0:528_3: pubbanimittaṃ, vātassa avāyanaṃ dvāsaṭṭhidiṭṭhigatabhindanassa pubbanimittaṃ, sakuṇānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:528_4: pathavīgamanaṃ mahājanassa ovādaṃ sutvā pāṇehi saraṇagamanassa pubbanimittaṃ, candassa
atk-s0203a0:528_7: kīḷanaṃ buddhabhāvaṃ patvā udānaṃ udānassa pubbanimittaṃ, cātuddīpikamahāmeghavassanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:528_8: mahato dhammameghavassanassa pubbanimittaṃ, khudāpīḷanassa abhāvo kāyagatāsatiamatapaṭilābhassa
atk-s0203a0:528_9: pubbanimittaṃ, pipāsāpīḷanassa abhāvo vimuttisukhena sukhitabhāvassa pubbanimittaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:528_11: rukkhānaṃ pupphaphalagahaṇaṃ vimuttipupphehi pupphitassa ca sāmaññaphalabhārabharitabhāvassa
atk-s0203a0:529_0: Ettha pañhe pucchanti – “yadā mahāpuriso pathaviyaṃ patiṭṭhahitvā uttarābhimukho
atk-s0203a0:529_1: gantvā āsabhiṃ vācaṃ bhāsati, tadā kiṃ pathaviyā gato, udāhu ākāsena? Dissamāno gato,
atk-s0203a0:529_2: udāhu adissamāno? Acelako gato, udāhu alaṅkatappaṭiyatto? Daharo hutvā gato, udāhu
atk-s0203a0:529_3: mahallako? Pacchāpi kiṃ tādisova ahosi, udāhu puna bāladārako”ti? Ayaṃ pana pañho
atk-s0203a0:529_4: heṭṭhā lohapāsāde saṅghasannipāte tipiṭakacūḷābhayattherena vissajjitova. Thero kirettha
atk-s0203a0:529_5: niyati pubbekatakamma-issaranimmānavādavasena taṃ taṃ bahuṃ vatvā avasāne evaṃ byākāsi
atk-s0203a0:529_6: – “mahāpuriso pathaviyaṃ gato, mahājanassa pana ākāse gacchanto viya ahosi. Dissamāno
atk-s0203a0:529_7: gato, mahājanassa pana adissamāno viya ahosi. Acelako gato, mahājanassa pana alaṅkatappaṭiyattova
atk-s0203a0:529_8: upaṭṭhāsi. Daharova gato, mahājanassa pana soḷasavassuddesiko viya ahosi. Pacchā
atk-s0203a0:529_9: pana bāladārakova ahosi, na tādiso”ti. Evaṃ vutte parisā cassa “buddhena viya hutvā
atk-s0203a0:529_10: bho therena pañho kathito”ti attamanā ahosi. Lokantarikavāro vuttanayo eva.
atk-s0203a0:530_0: Viditāti pākaṭā hutvā. Yathā hi sāvakā nahānamukhadhovanakhādanapivanādikāle anokāsagate
atk-s0203a0:530_1: atītasaṅkhāre nippadese sammasituṃ na sakkonti, okāsapattayeva sammasanti, na evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:530_2: buddhā. Buddhā hi sattadivasabbhantare vavatthitasaṅkhāre ādito paṭṭhāya sammasitvā
atk-s0203a0:530_3: tilakkhaṇaṃ āropetvāva vissajjenti, tesaṃ avipassitadhammo nāma natthi, tasmā “viditā”ti
atk-s0203a0:534_0: 209. Evaṃ me sutanti bākulasuttaṃ. Tattha bākuloti yathā dvāvīsati dvattiṃsātiādimhi
atk-s0203a0:534_1: vattabbe bāvīsati bāttiṃsātiādīni vuccanti, evameva dvikuloti vattabbe bākuloti vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:534_2: Tassa hi therassa dve kulāni ahesuṃ. So kira devaloko cavitvā kosambinagare nāma
atk-s0203a0:534_3: mahāseṭṭhikule nibbatto, tamenaṃ pañcame divase sīsaṃ nhāpetvā gaṅgākīḷaṃ akaṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:534_4: Dhātiyā dārakaṃ udake nimujjanummujjanavasena kīḷāpentiyā eko maccho dārakaṃ disvā
atk-s0203a0:534_5: “bhakkho me aya”nti maññamāno mukhaṃ vivaritvā upagato. Dhātī dārakaṃ chaḍḍetvā palātā.
atk-s0203a0:534_6: Maccho taṃ gili. Puññavā satto dukkhaṃ na pāpuṇi, sayanagabbhaṃ pavisitvā nipanno
atk-s0203a0:534_7: viya ahosi. Maccho dārakassa tejena tattakapallaṃ gilitvā dayhamāno viya vegena tiṃsayojanamaggaṃ
atk-s0203a0:534_8: gantvā bārāṇasinagaravāsino macchabandhassa jālaṃ pāvisi, mahāmacchā nāma jālabaddhā
atk-s0203a0:534_9: pahariyamānā maranti. Ayaṃ pana dārakassa tejena jālato nīhaṭamattova mato. Macchabandhā
atk-s0203a0:534_10: ca mahantaṃ macchaṃ labhitvā phāletvā vikkiṇanti. Taṃ pana dārakassa ānubhāvena aphāletvā
atk-s0203a0:534_11: sakalameva kājena haritvā sahassena demāti vadantā nagare vicariṃsu. Koci na gaṇhāti.
atk-s0203a0:535_0: Tasmiṃ pana nagare aputtakaṃ asītikoṭivibhavaṃ seṭṭhikulaṃ atthi, tassa dvāramūlaṃ
atk-s0203a0:535_1: patvā “kiṃ gahetvā dethā”ti vuttā kahāpaṇanti āhaṃsu. Tehi kahāpaṇaṃ datvā gahito.
atk-s0203a0:535_2: Seṭṭhibhariyāpi aññesu divasesu macche na kelāyati, taṃ divasaṃ pana macchaṃ phalake
atk-s0203a0:535_3: ṭhapetvā sayameva phālesi. Macchañca nāma kucchito phālenti, sā pana piṭṭhito phālentī
atk-s0203a0:535_4: macchakucchiyaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇaṃ dārakaṃ disvā – “macchakucchiyaṃ me putto laddho”ti
atk-s0203a0:535_5: nādaṃ naditvā dārakaṃ ādāya sāmikassa santikaṃ agamāsi. Seṭṭhi tāvadeva bheriṃ carāpetvā
atk-s0203a0:535_6: dārakaṃ ādāya rañño santikaṃ gantvā – “macchakucchiyaṃ me deva dārako laddho, kiṃ
atk-s0203a0:535_7: karomī”ti āha. Puññavā esa, yo macchakucchiyaṃ arogo vasi, posehi nanti.
atk-s0203a0:536_0: Assosi kho itaraṃ kulaṃ – “bārāṇasiyaṃ kira ekaṃ seṭṭhikulaṃ macchakucchiyaṃ dārakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:536_1: labhatī”ti, te tattha agamaṃsu. Athassa mātā dārakaṃ alaṅkaritvā kīḷāpiyamānaṃ disvāva
atk-s0203a0:536_2: “manāpo vatāyaṃ dārako”ti gantvā pavatiṃ ācikkhi. Itarā mayhaṃ puttotiādimāha. Kahaṃ
atk-s0203a0:536_3: te laddhoti? Macchakucchiyanti. No tuyhaṃ putto, mayhaṃ puttoti. Kahaṃ te laddhoti?
atk-s0203a0:536_4: Mayā dasamāse kucchiyā dhārito, atha naṃ nadiyā kīḷāpiyamānaṃ maccho gilīti. Tuyhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:536_5: putto aññena macchena gilito bhavissati, ayaṃ pana mayā macchakucchiyaṃ laddhoti,
atk-s0203a0:536_6: ubhopi rājakulaṃ agamaṃsu. Rājā āha – “ayaṃ dasa māse kucchiyā dhāritattā amātā kātuṃ
atk-s0203a0:536_7: na sakkā, macchaṃ gaṇhantāpi vakkayakanādīni bahi katvā gaṇhantā nāma natthīti macchakucchiyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:536_8: laddhattā ayampi amātā kātuṃ na sakkā, dārako ubhinnampi kulānaṃ dāyādo hotu, ubhopi
atk-s0203a0:537_0: Viññutaṃ pattassa dvīsupi nagaresu pāsādaṃ kāretvā nāṭakāni paccupaṭṭhāpesuṃ. Ekekasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:537_1: nagare cattāro cattāro māse vasati, ekasmiṃ nagare cattāro māse vuṭṭhassa saṅghāṭanāvāya
atk-s0203a0:537_2: maṇḍapaṃ kāretvā tattha naṃ saddhiṃ nāṭakāhi āropenti. So sampattiṃ anubhavamāno
atk-s0203a0:537_3: itaraṃ nagaraṃ gacchati. Taṃnagaravāsino nāṭakāni upaḍḍhamaggaṃ agamaṃsu. Te paccuggantvā
atk-s0203a0:537_4: taṃ parivāretvā attano pāsādaṃ nayanti. Itarāni nāṭakāni nivattitvā attano nagarameva
atk-s0203a0:537_5: gacchanti. Tattha cattāro māse vasitvā teneva niyāmena puna itaraṃ nagaraṃ gacchati.
atk-s0203a0:537_6: Evamassa sampattiṃ anubhavantassa asīti vassāni paripuṇṇāni.
atk-s0203a0:538_0: Atha bhagavā cārikaṃ caramāno bārāṇasiṃ patto. So bhagavato santike dhammaṃ sutvā
atk-s0203a0:538_1: paṭiladdhasaddho pabbajito. Pabbajitvā sattāhameva puthujjano ahosi, aṭṭhame pana
atk-s0203a0:538_2: so saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇīti evamassa dve kulāni ahesuṃ. Tasmā bākuloti saṅkhaṃ agamāsīti.
atk-s0203a0:539_0: Purāṇagihisahāyoti pubbe gihikāle sahāyo. Ayampi dīghāyukova theraṃ pabbajitaṃ passituṃ
atk-s0203a0:539_1: gacchanto asītime vasse gato. Methuno dhammoti bālo naggasamaṇako bālapucchaṃ pucchati,
atk-s0203a0:539_2: na sāsanavacanaṃ, idāni therena dinnanaye ṭhito imehi pana teti pucchi.
atk-s0203a0:540_0: 210. Yaṃpāyasmātiādīni padāni sabbavāresu dhammasaṅgāhakattherehi niyametvā ṭhapitāni.
atk-s0203a0:540_1: Tattha saññā uppannamattāva, vitakko kammapathabhedakoti. Thero panāha – “kasmā visuṃ
atk-s0203a0:541_0: 211. Gahapaticīvaranti vassāvāsikaṃ cīvaraṃ. Satthenāti pipphalakena. Sūciyāti sūciṃ
atk-s0203a0:541_1: gahetvā sibbitabhāvaṃ na sarāmīti attho. Kathine cīvaranti kathinacīvaraṃ, kathinacīvarampi
atk-s0203a0:541_2: hi vassāvāsikagatikameva. Tasmā tattha “sibbitā nābhijānāmī”ti āha.
atk-s0203a0:542_0: Ettakaṃ panassa kālaṃ gahapaticīvaraṃ asādiyantassa chindanasibbanādīni akarontassa
atk-s0203a0:542_1: kuto cīvaraṃ uppajjatīti. Dvīhi nagarehi. Thero hi mahāyasassī, tassa puttadhītaro
atk-s0203a0:542_2: nattapanattakā sukhumasāṭakehi cīvarāni kāretvā rajāpetvā samugge pakkhipitvā pahiṇanti.
atk-s0203a0:542_3: Therassa nhānakāle nhānakoṭṭhake ṭhapenti. Thero tāni nivāseti ceva pārupati ca,
atk-s0203a0:542_4: purāṇacīvarāni sampattapabbajitānaṃ deti. Thero tāni nivāsetvā ca pārupitvā ca navakammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:542_5: na karoti, kiñci āyūhanakammaṃ natthi. Phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā appetvā nisīdati.
atk-s0203a0:542_6: Catūsu māsesu pattesu lomakiliṭṭhāni honti, athassa puna teneva niyāmena pahiṇitvā
atk-s0203a0:543_0: Anacchariyañcetaṃ therassa mahāpuññassa mahābhiññassa satasahassakappe pūritapāramissa,
atk-s0203a0:543_1: asokadhammarañño kulūpako nigrodhatthero divasassa nikkhattuṃ cīvaraṃ parivattesi.
atk-s0203a0:543_2: Tassa hi ticīvaraṃ hatthikkhandhe ṭhapetvā pañcahi ca gandhasamuggasatehi pañcahi
atk-s0203a0:543_3: ca mālāsamuggasatehi saddhiṃ pātova āhariyittha, tathā divā ceva sāyañca. Rājā kira
atk-s0203a0:543_4: divasassa nikkhattuṃ sāṭake parivattento “therassa cīvaraṃ nīta”nti pucchitvā “āma
atk-s0203a0:543_5: nīta”nti sutvāva parivattesi. Theropi na bhaṇḍikaṃ bandhitvā ṭhapesi, sampattasabrahmacārīnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:543_6: adāsi. Tadā kira jambudīpe bhikkhusaṅghassa yebhuyyena nigrodhasseva santakaṃ cīvaraṃ ahosi.
atk-s0203a0:544_0: Aho vata maṃ koci nimanteyyāti kiṃ pana cittassa anuppādanaṃ bhāriyaṃ, uppannassa
atk-s0203a0:544_1: pahānanti. Cittaṃ nāma lahukaparivattaṃ, tasmā anuppādanaṃ bhāriyaṃ, uppannassa pahānampi
atk-s0203a0:544_2: bhāriyameva. Antaraghareti mahāsakuludāyisutte indakhīlato paṭṭhāya antaragharaṃ
atk-s0203a0:544_3: nāma idha nimbodakapatanaṭṭhānaṃ adhippetaṃ. Kuto panassa bhikkhā uppajjitthāti.
atk-s0203a0:544_4: Thero dvīsu nagaresu abhiññāto, gehadvāraṃ āgatassevassa pattaṃ gahetvā nānārasabhojanassa
atk-s0203a0:544_5: pūretvā denti. So laddhaṭṭhānato nivattati, bhattakiccakaraṇaṭṭhānaṃ panassa nibaddhameva
atk-s0203a0:544_6: ahosi. Anubyañjanasoti therena kira rūpe nimittaṃ gahetvā mātugāmo na olokitapubbo.
atk-s0203a0:544_7: Mātugāmassa dhammanti mātugāmassa chappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ desetuṃ vaṭṭati, pañhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:544_8: puṭṭhena gāthāsahassampi vattuṃ vaṭṭatiyeva. Thero pana kappiyameva na akāsi. Yebhuyyena
atk-s0203a0:544_9: hi kulūpakatherānametaṃ kammaṃ hoti. Bhikkhunupassayanti bhikkhuniupassayaṃ. Taṃ
atk-s0203a0:544_10: pana gilānapucchakena gantuṃ vaṭṭati, thero pana kappiyameva na akāsi. Esa nayo sabbattha.
atk-s0203a0:544_11: Cuṇṇenāti kosambacuṇṇādinā. Gattaparikammeti sarīrasambāhanakamme. Vicāritāti payojayitā.
atk-s0203a0:544_12: Gaddūhanamattanti gāviṃ thane gahetvā ekaṃ khīrabinduṃ dūhanakālamattampi.
atk-s0203a0:545_0: Kena pana kāraṇena thero nirābādho ahosi. Padumuttare kira bhagavati satasahassabhikkhuparivāre
atk-s0203a0:545_1: cārikaṃ caramāne himavati visarukkhā pupphiṃsu. Bhikkhusatasahassānampi tiṇapupphakarogo
atk-s0203a0:545_2: uppajjati. Thero tasmiṃ samaye iddhimā tāpaso hoti, so ākāsena gacchanto bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0203a0:545_3: disvā otaritvā rogaṃ pucchitvā himavantato osadhaṃ āharitvā adāsi. Upasiṅghanamatteneva
atk-s0203a0:545_4: rogo vūpasami. Kassapasammāsambuddhakālepi paṭhamavappadivase vappaṃ ṭhapetvā bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0203a0:545_5: paribhogaṃ aggisālañceva vaccakuṭiñca kāretvā bhikkhusaṅghassa bhesajjavattaṃ nibandhi,
atk-s0203a0:545_6: iminā kammena nirābādho ahosi. Ukkaṭṭhanesajjiko panesa ukkaṭṭhāraññako ca tasmā
atk-s0203a0:546_0: Saraṇoti sakileso. Aññā udapādīti anupasampannassa aññaṃ byākātuṃ na vaṭṭati. Thero
atk-s0203a0:546_1: kasmā byākāsi? Na thero ahaṃ arahāti āha, aññā udapādīti panāha. Apica thero arahāti
atk-s0203a0:547: 212. Pabbajjanti thero sayaṃ neva pabbājesi, na upasampādesi aññehi pana bhikkhūhi evaṃ kārāpesi. Avāpuraṇaṃ ādāyāti kuñcikaṃ gahetvā.
atk-s0203a0:548_0: Nisinnakova parinibbāyīti ahaṃ dharamānopi na aññassa bhikkhussa bhāro ahosiṃ, parinibbutassāpi
atk-s0203a0:548_1: me sarīraṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa palibodho mā ahosīti tejodhātuṃ samāpajjitvā parinibbāyi.
atk-s0203a0:548_2: Sarīrato jālā uṭṭhahi, chavimaṃsalohitaṃ sappi viya jhāyamānaṃ parikkhayaṃ gataṃ,
atk-s0203a0:548_3: sumanamakulasadisā dhātuyova avasesiṃsu. Sesaṃ sabbattha pākaṭameva. Idaṃ pana suttaṃ
atk-s0203a0:552_0: 213. Evaṃ me sutanti dantabhūmisuttaṃ. Tattha araññakuṭikāyanti tasseva veḷuvanassa
atk-s0203a0:552_1: ekasmiṃ vivittaṭṭhāne padhānakammikānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ atthāya katasenāsane. Rājakumāroti
atk-s0203a0:553_0: Phuseyyāti labheyya. Ekaggatanti evaṃ paṭipanno samāpattiṃ nāma labhati, jhānaṃ nāma
atk-s0203a0:553_1: labhatīti idaṃ mayā sutanti vadati. Kilamathoti kāyakilamatho. Vihesāti sveva kilamatho
atk-s0203a0:553_2: vutto. Yathāsake tiṭṭheyyāsīti attano ajānanakoṭṭhāseyeva tiṭṭheyyāsīti.
atk-s0203a0:554: 214. Desesīti cittekaggataṃ nāma evaṃ labhati, samāpattiṃ evaṃ nibbattetīti appanāupacāraṃ pāpetvā ekakasiṇaparikammaṃ kathesi. Pavedetvāti pakāsetvā.
atk-s0203a0:555_0: Nekkhammena ñātabbanti kāmato nissaṭaguṇena ñātabbaṃ. Kāmato nissaṭaguṇe ṭhitena
atk-s0203a0:555_1: puggalena ekaggaṃ nāma jānitabbanti adhippāyenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Sesāni tasseva vevacanāni.
atk-s0203a0:556_0: 215. Hatthidammā vā assadammā vā godammā vāti ettha adantahatthidammādayo viya cittekaggarahitā
atk-s0203a0:556_1: puggalā daṭṭhabbā. Dantahatthiādayo viya cittekaggasampannā. Yathā adantahatthidammādayo
atk-s0203a0:556_2: kūṭākāraṃ akatvā dhuraṃ achaḍḍetvā dantagamanaṃ vā gantuṃ, dantehi vā pattabbaṃ bhūmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:556_3: pāpuṇituṃ na sakkonti, evameva cittekaggarahitā sampannacittekaggehi nibbattitaguṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:556_4: vā nibbattetuṃ pattabhūmiṃ vā pāpuṇituṃ na sakkonti.
atk-s0203a0:558: Daṭṭheyyanti passitabbayuttakaṃ. Āvutoti āvarito. Nivutoti nivārito. Ophuṭoti onaddho.
atk-s0203a0:559_0: 217. Nāgavanikanti hatthipadopame nāgavanacarako puriso “nāgavaniko”ti vutto, idha
atk-s0203a0:559_1: hatthisikkhāya kusalo hatthiṃ gahetuṃ samattho. Atipassitvāti disvā. Etthagedhāti
atk-s0203a0:559_2: etasmiṃ pavattagedhā. Sarasaṅkappānanti dhāvanasaṅkappānaṃ. Manussakantesu sīlesu
atk-s0203a0:559_3: samādapanāyāti ettha yadā nāgo itthipurisehi kumārakumārikāhi soṇḍādīsu gahetvā upakeḷayamāno
atk-s0203a0:559_4: vikāraṃ na karoti sukhāyati, tadānena manussakantāni sīlāni samādinnāni nāma honti.
atk-s0203a0:560_0: Pemanīyāti tāta rājā te pasanno maṅgalahatthiṭṭhāneva ṭhapessati, rājārahāni bhojanādīni
atk-s0203a0:560_1: labhissasīti evarūpī nāgehi piyāpitabbā kathā. Sussūsatīti taṃ pemanīyakathaṃ sotukāmo
atk-s0203a0:560_2: hoti. Tiṇaghāsodakanti tiṇaghāsañceva udakañca, tiṇaghāsanti ghāsitabbaṃ tiṇaṃ, khāditabbanti attho.
atk-s0203a0:561: Paṇavoti ḍiṇḍimo. Sabbavaṅkadosanihitaninnītakasāvoti nihitasabbavaṅkadoso ceva apanītakasāvo ca. Aṅganteva saṅkhaṃ gacchatīti aṅgasamo hoti.
atk-s0203a0:563_0: 222. Adantamaraṇaṃ mahallako rañño nāgo kālaṅkatoti rañño mahallako nāgo adantamaraṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:563_1: mato kālaṃ kato hoti, adantamaraṇaṃ kālaṃkiriyaṃ nāma kariyatīti ayamettha attho.
atk-s0203a0:567_0: 223. Evaṃ me sutanti bhūmijasuttaṃ. Tattha bhūmijoti ayaṃ thero jayasenarājakumārassa
atk-s0203a0:567_1: mātulo. Āsañca anāsañcāti kālena āsaṃ kālena anāsaṃ. Sakena thālipākenāti pakatipavattāya
atk-s0203a0:567_2: bhikkhāya attano niṭṭhitabhattatopi bhattena parivisi. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:571_0: 230. Evaṃ me sutanti anuruddhasuttaṃ. Tattha evamāhaṃsūti tassa upāsakassa aphāsukakālo
atk-s0203a0:571_1: ahosi, tadā upasaṅkamitvā evamāhaṃsu. Apaṇṇakanti avirādhitaṃ. Ekatthāti appamāṇāti
atk-s0203a0:571_2: vā mahaggatāti vā jhānameva cittekaggatāyeva evaṃ vuccatīti imaṃ sandhāya evamāha.
atk-s0203a0:572_0: 231. Yāvatā ekaṃ rukkhamūlaṃ mahaggatanti pharitvā adhimuccitvā viharatīti ekarukkhamūlapamāṇaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:572_1: kasiṇanimittena ottharitvā tasmiṃ kasiṇanimitte mahaggatajjhānaṃ pharitvā adhimuccitvā
atk-s0203a0:572_2: viharati. Mahaggatanti panassa ābhogo natthi, kevalaṃ mahaggatajjhānapavattivasena
atk-s0203a0:572_3: panetaṃ vuttaṃ. Esa nayo sabbattha. Iminā kho etaṃ gahapati pariyāyenāti iminā kāraṇena.
atk-s0203a0:572_4: Ettha hi appamāṇāti vuttānaṃ brahmavihārānaṃ nimittaṃ na vaḍḍhati, ugghāṭanaṃ na
atk-s0203a0:572_5: jāyati, tāni jhānāni abhiññānaṃ vā nirodhassa vā pādakāni na honti, vipassanāpādakāni
atk-s0203a0:572_6: pana vaṭṭapādakāni bhavokkamanāni ca honti. “Mahaggatā”ti vuttānaṃ pana kasiṇajjhānānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:572_7: nimittaṃ vaḍḍhati, ugghāṭanaṃ jāyati, samatikkamā honti, abhiññāpādakāni nirodhapādakāni
atk-s0203a0:572_8: vaṭṭapādakāni bhavokkamanāni ca honti. Evamime dhammā nānatthā, appamāṇā mahaggatāti
atk-s0203a0:573_0: 232. Idāni mahaggatasamāpattito nīharitvā bhavūpapattikāraṇaṃ dassento catasso kho
atk-s0203a0:573_1: imātiādimāha. Parittābhāti pharitvā jānantassa ayamābhogo atthi, parittābhesu pana
atk-s0203a0:573_2: devesu nibbattikāraṇaṃ jhānaṃ bhāvento evaṃ vutto. Esa nayo sabbattha. Parittābhā
atk-s0203a0:573_3: siyā saṃkiliṭṭhābhā honti siyā parisuddhābhā, appamāṇābhā siyā saṃkiliṭṭhābhā honti
atk-s0203a0:573_4: siyā parisuddhābhā. Kathaṃ? Suppamatte vā sarāvamatte vā kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā samāpattiṃ
atk-s0203a0:573_5: nibbattetvā pañcahākārehi āciṇṇavasibhāvo paccanīkadhammānaṃ suṭṭhu aparisodhitattā
atk-s0203a0:573_6: dubbalameva samāpattiṃ vaḷañjitvā appaguṇajjhāne ṭhito kālaṃ katvā parittābhesu nibbattati,
atk-s0203a0:573_7: vaṇṇo panassa paritto ceva hoti saṃkiliṭṭho ca. Pañcahi panākārehi āciṇṇavasibhāvo
atk-s0203a0:573_8: paccanīkadhammānaṃ suṭṭhu parisodhitattā suvisuddhaṃ samāpattiṃ vaḷañjitvā paguṇajjhāne
atk-s0203a0:573_9: ṭhito kālaṃ katvā parittābhesu nibbattati, vaṇṇo panassa paritto ceva hoti parisuddho
atk-s0203a0:573_10: ca. Evaṃ parittābhā siyā saṃkiliṭṭhābhā honti siyā parisuddhābhā. Kasiṇe pana vipulaparikammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:573_11: katvā samāpattiṃ nibbattetvā pañcahākārehi āciṇṇavasibhāvoti sabbaṃ purimasadisameva
atk-s0203a0:573_12: veditabbaṃ. Evaṃ appamāṇābhā siyā saṃkiliṭṭhābhā honti siyā parisuddhābhāti.
atk-s0203a0:574: Vaṇṇanānattanti sarīravaṇṇassa nānattaṃ. No ca ābhānānattanti āloke nānattaṃ na paññāyati. Accinānattanti dīgharassaaṇuthūlavasena acciyā nānattaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:575_1: vasanti. Abhiramantīti ramanti na ukkaṇṭhanti. Kājenāti yāgubhattatelaphāṇitamacchamaṃsakājesu
atk-s0203a0:575_2: yena kenaci kājena. “Kācenāti”pi pāṭho, ayameva attho. Piṭakenāti pacchiyā. Tattha
atk-s0203a0:575_4: nītā “pubbe amhākaṃ vasanaṭṭhānaṃ phāsukaṃ, tattha sukhaṃ vasimhā, idha loṇaṃ vā
atk-s0203a0:575_5: no bādhati pūtimacchagandho vā sīsarogaṃ uppādetī”ti evaṃ cittaṃ anuppādetvā tattha tattheva ramanti.
atk-s0203a0:576: 234. Ābhāti ābhāsampannā. Tadaṅgenāti tassā bhavūpapattiyā aṅgena, bhavūpapattikāraṇenāti attho. Idāni taṃ kāraṇaṃ pucchanto ko nu kho, bhantetiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:578_0: 235. Dīgharattaṃ kho meti thero kira pāramiyo pūrento isipabbajjaṃ pabbajitvā samāpattiṃ
atk-s0203a0:578_1: nibbattetvā nirantaraṃ tīṇi attabhāvasatāni brahmaloke paṭilabhi, taṃ sandhāyetaṃ
atk-s0203a0:585_0: 236. Evaṃ me sutanti upakkilesasuttaṃ. Tattha etadavocāti neva bhedādhippāyena na
atk-s0203a0:585_1: piyakamyatāya, atha khvāssa etadahosi – “ime bhikkhū mama vacanaṃ gahetvā na oramissanti,
atk-s0203a0:585_2: buddhā ca nāma hitānukampakā, addhā nesaṃ bhagavā ekaṃ kāraṇaṃ kathessati, taṃ sutvā
atk-s0203a0:585_3: ete oramissanti, tato tesaṃ phāsuvihāro bhavissatī”ti. Tasmā etaṃ “idha, bhante”tiādivacanamavoca.
atk-s0203a0:585_4: Mā bhaṇḍanantiādīsu “akatthā”ti pāṭhasesaṃ gahetvā “mā bhaṇḍanaṃ akatthā”ti evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:585_5: attho daṭṭhabbo. Aññataroti so kira bhikkhu bhagavato atthakāmo, ayaṃ kirassa adhippāyo
atk-s0203a0:585_6: – “ime bhikkhū kodhābhibhūtā satthu vacanaṃ na gaṇhanti, mā bhagavā ete ovadanto
atk-s0203a0:586_0: Piṇḍāya pāvisīti na kevalaṃ pāvisi, yenapi janena na diṭṭho, so maṃ passatūtipi adhiṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0203a0:586_1: Kimatthaṃ adhiṭṭhāsīti? Tesaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ damanatthaṃ. Bhagavā hi tadā piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto
atk-s0203a0:586_2: “puthusaddo samajano”tiādigāthā bhāsitvā kosambito bālakaloṇakāragāmaṃ gato. Tato
atk-s0203a0:586_3: pācīnavaṃsadāyaṃ, tato pālileyyakavanasaṇḍaṃ gantvā pālileyyahatthināgena upaṭṭhahiyamāno
atk-s0203a0:586_4: temāsaṃ vasi. Nagaravāsinopi – “satthā vihāraṃ gato, gacchāma dhammassavanāyā”ti
atk-s0203a0:586_5: gandhapupphahatthā vihāraṃ gantvā “kahaṃ, bhante, satthā”ti pucchiṃsu. “Kahaṃ tumhe
atk-s0203a0:586_6: satthāraṃ dakkhatha, satthā ‘ime bhikkhū samagge karissāmī’ti āgato, samagge kātuṃ
atk-s0203a0:586_7: asakkonto nikkhamitvā gato”ti. “Mayaṃ satampi sahassampi datvā satthāraṃ ānetuṃ na
atk-s0203a0:586_8: sakkoma, so no ayācito sayameva āgato, mayaṃ ime bhikkhū nissāya satthu sammukhā
atk-s0203a0:586_9: dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ na labhimhā. Ime satthāraṃ uddissa pabbajitā, tasmimpi sāmaggiṃ
atk-s0203a0:586_10: karonte samaggā na jātā, kassāññassa vacanaṃ karissanti. Alaṃ na imesaṃ bhikkhā dātabbā”ti
atk-s0203a0:586_11: sakalanagare daṇḍaṃ ṭhapayiṃsu. Te punadivase sakalanagaraṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kaṭacchumattampi
atk-s0203a0:586_12: bhikkhaṃ alabhitvā vihāraṃ āgamaṃsu. Upāsakāpi te puna āhaṃsu – “yāva satthāraṃ na
atk-s0203a0:586_13: khamāpetha, tāva vo tameva daṇḍakamma”nti. Te “satthāraṃ khamāpessāmā”ti bhagavati
atk-s0203a0:586_14: sāvatthiyaṃ anuppatte tattha agamaṃsu. Satthā tesaṃ aṭṭhārasa bhedakaravatthūni desesīti
atk-s0203a0:587_0: 237. Idāni puthusaddotiādigāthāsu puthu mahāsaddo assāti puthusaddo. Samajanoti samāno
atk-s0203a0:587_1: ekasadiso jano, sabbovāyaṃ bhaṇḍanakārakajano samantato saddaniccharaṇena puthusaddo
atk-s0203a0:587_2: ceva sadiso cāti vuttaṃ hoti. Na bālo koci maññathāti tatra koci ekopi ahaṃ bāloti
atk-s0203a0:587_3: na maññati, sabbepi paṇḍitamāninoyeva. Nāññaṃ bhiyyo amaññarunti koci ekopi ahaṃ
atk-s0203a0:587_4: bāloti na ca maññi, bhiyyo ca saṅghasmiṃ bhijjamāne aññampi ekaṃ “mayhaṃ kāraṇā saṅgho
atk-s0203a0:587_5: bhijjatī”ti idaṃ kāraṇaṃ na maññīti attho.
atk-s0203a0:588_0: Parimuṭṭhāti muṭṭhassatino. Vācāgocarabhāṇinoti rākārassa rassādeso kato; vācāgocarāva,
atk-s0203a0:588_1: na satipaṭṭhānagocarā, bhāṇino ca, kathaṃ bhāṇino? Yāvicchanti mukhāyāmaṃ, yāva mukhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:588_2: pasāretuṃ icchanti, tāva pasāretvā bhāṇino, ekopi saṅghagāravena mukhasaṅkocanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:588_3: na karotīti attho. Yena nītāti yena kalahena imaṃ nillajjabhāvaṃ nītā. Na taṃ vidū
atk-s0203a0:589: Ye ca taṃ upanayhantīti taṃ akkocchi mantiādikaṃ ākāraṃ ye upanayhanti. Sanantanoti porāṇo.
atk-s0203a0:590_0: Pareti paṇḍite ṭhapetvā tato aññe bhaṇḍanakārakā pare nāma. Te ettha saṅghamajjhe
atk-s0203a0:590_1: kalahaṃ karontā “mayaṃ yamāmase upayamāma nassāma satataṃ samitaṃ maccusantikaṃ gacchāmā”ti
atk-s0203a0:590_2: na jānanti. Ye ca tattha vijānantīti ye ca tattha paṇḍitā “mayaṃ maccuno samīpaṃ
atk-s0203a0:590_3: gacchāmā”ti vijānanti. Tato sammanti medhagāti evañhi te jānantā yonisomanasikāraṃ
atk-s0203a0:591_0: Aṭṭhicchinnāti ayaṃ gāthā jātake āgatā, brahmadattañca dīghāvukumārañca sandhāya
atk-s0203a0:591_1: vuttā. Ayañhettha attho – tesampi tathā pavattaverānaṃ hoti saṅgati, kasmā tumhākaṃ
atk-s0203a0:591_2: na hoti, yesaṃ vo neva mātāpitūnaṃ aṭṭhīni chinnāni, na pāṇā haṭā na gavāssadhanāni haṭānīti.
atk-s0203a0:592_0: Sace labhethātiādigāthā paṇḍitasahāyassa ca bālasahāyassa ca vaṇṇāvaṇṇadīpanatthaṃ
atk-s0203a0:592_1: vuttā. Abhibhuyya sabbāni parissayānīti pākaṭaparissaye ca paṭicchannaparissaye ca
atk-s0203a0:592_2: abhibhavitvā tena saddhiṃ attamano satimā careyyāti.
atk-s0203a0:593_0: Rājāva raṭṭhaṃ vijitanti yathā attano vijitaraṭṭhaṃ mahājanakarājā ca arindamamahārājā
atk-s0203a0:593_1: ca pahāya ekakā vicariṃsu, evaṃ vicareyyāti attho. Mātaṅgaraññeva nāgoti mātaṅgo
atk-s0203a0:593_2: araññe nāgova. Mātaṅgoti hatthi vuccati. Nāgoti mahantādhivacanametaṃ. Yathā hi mātuposako
atk-s0203a0:593_3: mātaṅganāgo araññe eko cari, na ca pāpāni akāsi, yathā ca pālileyyako, evaṃ eko care,
atk-s0203a0:593_4: na ca pāpāni kayirāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:594_0: 238. Bālakaloṇakāragāmoti upāligahapatissa bhogagāmo. Tenupasaṅkamīti kasmā upasaṅkami?
atk-s0203a0:594_1: Gaṇe kirassa ādīnavaṃ disvā ekavihāriṃ bhikkhuṃ passitukāmatā udapādi, tasmā sītādīhi
atk-s0203a0:594_2: pīḷito uṇhādīni patthayamāno viya upasaṅkami. Dhammiyā kathāyāti ekībhāve ānisaṃsappaṭisaṃyuttāya.
atk-s0203a0:594_3: Yena pācīnavaṃsadāyo, tattha kasmā upasaṅkami? Kalahakārake kirassa diṭṭhādīnavattā
atk-s0203a0:594_4: samaggavāsino bhikkhū passitukāmatā udapādi, tasmā sītādīhi pīḷito uṇhādīni patthayamāno
atk-s0203a0:594_5: viya tattha upasaṅkami. Āyasmā ca anuruddhotiādi vuttanayameva.
atk-s0203a0:595_0: 241. Atthi pana voti pacchimapucchāya lokuttaradhammaṃ puccheyya. So pana therānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:595_1: natthi, tasmā taṃ pucchituṃ na yuttanti parikammobhāsaṃ pucchati. Obhāsañceva sañjānāmāti
atk-s0203a0:595_2: parikammobhāsaṃ sañjānāma. Dassanañca rūpānanti dibbacakkhunā rūpadassanañca sañjānāma.
atk-s0203a0:595_3: Tañca nimittaṃ nappaṭivijjhāmāti tañca kāraṇaṃ na jānāma, yena no obhāso ca rūpadassanañca antaradhāyati.
atk-s0203a0:596_0: Taṃ kho pana vo anuruddhā nimittaṃ paṭivijjhitabbanti taṃ vo kāraṇaṃ jānitabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:596_1: Ahampi sudanti anuruddhā tumhe kiṃ na āḷulessanti, ahampi imehi ekādasahi upakkilesehi
atk-s0203a0:596_2: āḷulitapubboti dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. Vicikicchā kho metiādīsu mahāsattassa
atk-s0203a0:596_3: ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dibbacakkhunā nānāvidhāni rūpāni disvā “idaṃ kho ki”nti vicikicchā
atk-s0203a0:596_4: udapādi. Samādhi cavīti parikammasamādhi cavi. Obhāsoti parikammobhāsopi antaradhāyi,
atk-s0203a0:596_5: dibbacakkhunāpi rūpaṃ na passi. Amanasikāroti rūpāni passato vicikicchā uppajjati,
atk-s0203a0:596_6: idāni kiñci na manasikarissāmīti amanasikāro udapādi.
atk-s0203a0:598: Chambhitattanti himavantābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā dānavarakkhasaajagarādayo addasa, athassa chambhitattaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0203a0:599: Uppilanti “mayā diṭṭhabhayaṃ pakatiyā olokiyamānaṃ natthi. Adiṭṭhe kiṃ nāma bhaya”nti cintayato uppilāvitattaṃ udapādi. Sakidevāti ekapayogeneva pañca nidhikumbhiyopi passeyya.
atk-s0203a0:600: Duṭṭhullanti mayā vīriyaṃ gāḷhaṃ paggahitaṃ, tena me uppilaṃ uppannanti vīriyaṃ sithilamakāsi, tato kāyadaratho kāyaduṭṭhullaṃ kāyālasiyaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0203a0:601: Accāraddhavīriyanti mama vīriyaṃ sithilaṃ karoto duṭṭhullaṃ uppannanti puna vīriyaṃ paggaṇhato accāraddhavīriyaṃ udapādi. Patameyyāti mareyya.
atk-s0203a0:602: Atilīnavīriyanti mama vīriyaṃ paggaṇhato evaṃ jātanti puna vīriyaṃ sithilaṃ karoto atilīnavīriyaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0203a0:603: Abhijappāti devalokābhimukhaṃ ālokaṃ vaḍḍhetvā devasaṅghaṃ passato taṇhā udapādi.
atk-s0203a0:604_0: Nānattasaññāti mayhaṃ ekajātikaṃ rūpaṃ manasikarontassa abhijappā uppannā, nānāvidharūpaṃ
atk-s0203a0:604_1: manasi karissāmīti kālena devalokābhimukhaṃ kālena manussalokābhimukhaṃ vaḍḍhetvā
atk-s0203a0:605_0: Atinijjhāyitattanti mayhaṃ nānāvidhāni rūpāni manasikarontassa nānattasaññā udapādi,
atk-s0203a0:605_1: iṭṭhaṃ vā aniṭṭhaṃ vā ekajātikameva manasi karissāmīti tathā manasikaroto atinijjhāyitattaṃ rūpānaṃ udapādi.
atk-s0203a0:606_0: 243. Obhāsanimittaṃ manasi karomīti parikammobhāsameva manasi karomi. Na ca rūpāni
atk-s0203a0:606_1: passāmīti dibbacakkhunā rūpāni na passāmi. Rūpanimittaṃ manasi karomīti dibbacakkhunā
atk-s0203a0:607_0: Parittañceva obhāsanti parittakaṭṭhāne obhāsaṃ. Parittāni ca rūpānīti parittakaṭṭhāne
atk-s0203a0:607_1: rūpāni. Vipariyāyena dutiyavāro veditabbo. Paritto samādhīti parittako parikammobhāso,
atk-s0203a0:607_2: obhāsaparittatañhi sandhāya idha parikammasamādhi “paritto”ti vutto. Parittaṃ me
atk-s0203a0:607_3: tasmiṃ samayeti tasmiṃ samaye dibbacakkhupi parittakaṃ hoti. Appamāṇavārepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0203a0:608_0: 245. Avitakkampi vicāramattanti pañcakanaye dutiyajjhānasamādhiṃ. Avitakkampi avicāranti
atk-s0203a0:609_0: Kadā pana bhagavā imaṃ tividhaṃ samādhiṃ bhāveti? Mahābodhimūle nisinno pacchimayāme.
atk-s0203a0:609_1: Bhagavato hi paṭhamamaggo paṭhamajjhāniko ahosi, dutiyādayo dutiyatatiyacatutthajjhānikā.
atk-s0203a0:609_2: Pañcakanaye pañcamajjhānassa maggo natthīti so lokiyo ahosīti lokiyalokuttaramissakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:613_0: 246. Evaṃ me sutanti bālapaṇḍitasuttaṃ. Tattha bālalakkhaṇānīti bālo ayanti etehi
atk-s0203a0:613_1: lakkhiyati ñāyatīti bālalakkhaṇāni. Tāneva tassa sañjānanakāraṇānīti bālanimittāni.
atk-s0203a0:613_2: Bālassa apadānānīti bālāpadānāni. Duccintitacintīti cintayanto abhijjhābyāpādamicchādassanavasena
atk-s0203a0:613_3: duccintitameva cinteti. Dubbhāsitabhāsīti bhāsamānopi musāvādādibhedaṃ dubbhāsitameva
atk-s0203a0:613_4: bhāsati. Dukkaṭakammakārīti karontopi pāṇātipātādivasena dukkaṭakammameva karoti.
atk-s0203a0:613_5: Tatra ceti yattha nisinno, tassaṃ parisati. Tajjaṃ tassāruppanti tajjātikaṃ tadanucchavikaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:613_7: tāya kathāya kacchamānāya. Bālantiādīni sāmiatthe upayogavacanaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:614_0: 248. Olambantīti upaṭṭhahanti. Sesapadadvayaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ, olambanādiākārena
atk-s0203a0:614_1: hi tāni upaṭṭhahanti, tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ. Pathaviyā olambantīti pathavitale pattharanti.
atk-s0203a0:614_2: Sesapadadvayaṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. Pattharaṇākāroyeva hesa. Tatra, bhikkhave, bālassāti
atk-s0203a0:614_3: tasmiṃ upaṭṭhānākāre āpāthagate bālassa evaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:615_0: 249. Etadavocāti anusandhikusalo bhikkhu “nirayassa upamā kātuṃ na sakkā”ti na bhagavā
atk-s0203a0:615_1: vadati, “na sukarā”ti pana vadati, na sukaraṃ pana sakkā hoti kātuṃ, handāhaṃ dasabalaṃ
atk-s0203a0:615_2: upamaṃ kārāpemīti cintetvā etaṃ “sakkā, bhante”ti vacanaṃ avoca. Haneyyunti vinivijjhitvā
atk-s0203a0:615_3: gamanavasena yathā ekasmiṃ ṭhāne dve pahārā nipatanti, evaṃ haneyyuṃ. Tenassa dve
atk-s0203a0:615_4: vaṇamukhasatāni honti. Ito uttaripi eseva nayo.
atk-s0203a0:616_0: 250. Pāṇimattanti antomuṭṭhiyaṃ ṭhapanamattaṃ. Saṅkhampi na upetīti gaṇanamattampi
atk-s0203a0:616_1: na gacchati. Kalabhāgampīti satimaṃ kalaṃ sahassimaṃ kalaṃ satasahassimaṃ vā kalaṃ
atk-s0203a0:616_2: upagacchatītipi vattabbataṃ na upeti. Upanidhampīti upanikkhepanamattampi na upeti,
atk-s0203a0:616_3: olokentassa olokitamattampi natthi. Tattaṃ ayokhilanti tigāvutaṃ attabhāvaṃ sampajjalitāya
atk-s0203a0:616_4: lohapathaviyā uttānakaṃ nipajjāpetvā tassa dakkhiṇahatthe tālappamāṇaṃ ayasūlaṃ pavesenti,
atk-s0203a0:616_5: tathā vāmahatthādīsu. Yathā ca uttānakaṃ nipajjāpetvā, evaṃ urenapi dakkhiṇapassenapi
atk-s0203a0:616_6: vāmapassenapi nipajjāpetvā taṃ kammakāraṇaṃ karontiyeva. Saṃvesetvāti sampajjalitāya
atk-s0203a0:616_7: lohapathaviyā tigāvutaṃ attabhāvaṃ nipajjāpetvā. Kuṭhārīhīti mahatīhi gehassa ekapakkhachadanamattāhi
atk-s0203a0:616_8: kuṭhārīhi tacchanti. Lohitaṃ nadī hutvā sandati, lohapathavito jālā uṭṭhahitvā tacchitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:616_9: gaṇhanti. Mahādukkhaṃ uppajjati, tacchantā pana suttāhataṃ karitvā dārū viya aṭṭhaṃsampi
atk-s0203a0:616_10: chaḷaṃsampi karonti. Vāsīhīti mahāsuppapamāṇāhi vāsīhi. Tāhi tacchantā tacato yāva
atk-s0203a0:616_11: aṭṭhīni saṇikaṃ tacchanti, tacchitaṃ tacchitaṃ paṭipākatikaṃ hoti. Rathe yojetvāti
atk-s0203a0:616_12: saddhiṃ yugayottapañcaracakkakubbarapācanehi sabbato sampajjalite rathe yojetvā.
atk-s0203a0:616_13: Mahantanti mahākūṭāgārappamāṇaṃ. Āropentīti sampajjalitehi ayamuggarehi pothentā
atk-s0203a0:616_14: āropenti. Sakimpi uddhanti supakkuthitāya ukkhaliyā pakkhittataṇḍulā viya uddhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:617: Bhāgaso mitoti bhāge ṭhapetvā ṭhapetvā vibhatto. Pariyantoti parikkhitto. Ayasāti upari ayapaṭṭena chādito.
atk-s0203a0:618: Samantā yojanasataṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhatīti evaṃ pharitvā tiṭṭhati, yathā samantā yojanasate ṭhāne ṭhatvā olokentassa akkhīni yamakagoḷakā viya nikkhamanti.
atk-s0203a0:619: Na sukarā akkhānena pāpuṇitunti nirayo nāma evampi dukkho evampi dukkhoti vassasataṃ vassasahassaṃ kathentenāpi matthakaṃ pāpetvā kathetuṃ na sukarāti attho.
atk-s0203a0:620: 251. Dantullehakanti dantehi ullehitvā, luñcitvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Rasādoti rasagedhena paribhuttaraso.
atk-s0203a0:622_0: Dubbaṇṇoti durūpo. Duddasikoti dārakānaṃ bhayāpanatthaṃ katayakkho viya duddaso.
atk-s0203a0:622_1: Okoṭimakoti lakuṇḍako paviṭṭhagīvo mahodaro. Kāṇoti ekakkhikāṇo vā ubhayakkhikāṇo
atk-s0203a0:622_2: vā. Kuṇīti ekahatthakuṇī vā ubhayahatthakuṇī vā. Pakkhahatoti pīṭhasappī. So kāyenāti
atk-s0203a0:623_0: Kaliggahenāti parājayena. Adhibandhaṃ nigaccheyyāti yasmā bahuṃ jito sabbasāpateyyampissa
atk-s0203a0:623_1: nappahoti, tasmā attanāpi bandhaṃ nigaccheyya. Kevalā paripūrā bālabhūmīti bālo tīṇi
atk-s0203a0:623_2: duccaritāni pūretvā niraye nibbattati, tattha pakkāvasesena manussattaṃ āgato pañcasu
atk-s0203a0:623_3: nīcakulesu nibbattitvā puna tīṇi duccaritāni pūretvā niraye nibbattatīti ayaṃ sakalā
atk-s0203a0:624: 253. Paṇḍitalakkhaṇānītiādi vuttānusāreneva veditabbaṃ. Sucintitacintītiādīni cettha manosucaritādīnaṃ vasena yojetabbāni.
atk-s0203a0:626_0: 256. Sīsaṃ nhātassāti sīsena saddhiṃ gandhodakena nhātassa. Uposathikassāti samādinnauposathaṅgassa.
atk-s0203a0:626_1: Uparipāsādavaragatassāti pāsādavarassa upari gatassa subhojanaṃ bhuñjitvā pāsādavarassa
atk-s0203a0:626_2: upari mahātale sirīgabbhaṃ pavisitvā sīlāni āvajjantassa. Tadā kira rājā pātova satasahassaṃ
atk-s0203a0:626_3: vissajjetvā mahādānaṃ datvā punapi soḷasahi gandhodakaghaṭehi sīsaṃ nhāyitvā katapātarāso
atk-s0203a0:626_4: suddhaṃ uttarāsaṅgaṃ ekaṃsaṃ katvā uparipāsādassa sirīsayane pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
atk-s0203a0:626_5: nisinno attano dānamayapuññasamudayaṃ āvajjetvā nisīdati, ayaṃ sabbacakkavattīnaṃ dhammatā.
atk-s0203a0:627_0: Tesaṃ taṃ āvajjantānaṃyeva vuttappakārapuññakammapaccayaṃ utusamuṭṭhānaṃ nīlamaṇisaṅghāṭasadisaṃ
atk-s0203a0:627_1: pācīnasamuddajalatalaṃ chindamānaṃ viya ākāsaṃ alaṅkurumānaṃ viya dibbaṃ cakkaratanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:627_2: pātubhavati. Tayidaṃ dibbānubhāvayuttattā dibbanti vuttaṃ. Sahassaṃ assa arānanti
atk-s0203a0:627_3: sahassāraṃ. Saha nemiyā saha nābhiyā cāti sanemikaṃ sanābhikaṃ. Sabbehi ākārehi paripūranti sabbākāraparipūraṃ.
atk-s0203a0:628_0: Tattha cakkañca taṃ ratijananaṭṭhena ratanañcāti cakkaratanaṃ. Yāya pana taṃ nābhiyā
atk-s0203a0:628_1: “sanābhika”nti vuttaṃ, sā indanīlamaṇimayā hoti. Majjhe panassā rajatamayā panāḷi,
atk-s0203a0:628_2: yāya suddhasiniddhadantapantiyā hasamānaṃ viya virocati. Majjhe chiddena viya candamaṇḍalena
atk-s0203a0:628_3: ubhosupi bāhirantesu rajatapaṭṭena kataparikkhepo hoti. Tesu panassā nābhipanāḷi
atk-s0203a0:628_4: parikkhepapaṭṭesu yuttaṭṭhāne paricchedalekhā suvibhattāva hutvā paññāyanti. Ayaṃ
atk-s0203a0:629_0: Yehi pana taṃ arehi “sahassāra”nti vuttaṃ, te sattaratanamayā sūriyarasmiyo viya
atk-s0203a0:629_1: pabhāsampannā honti. Tesampi ghaṭamaṇikaparicchedalekhādīni suvibhattāneva paññāyanti.
atk-s0203a0:630_0: Yāya pana taṃ nemiyā saha “sanemika”nti vuttaṃ, sā bālasūriyarasmikalāpasiriṃ avahasamānā
atk-s0203a0:630_1: viya surattasuddhasiniddhapavāḷamayā hoti. Sandhīsu panassā sañjhārāgasassirikarattajambonadapaṭṭā
atk-s0203a0:630_2: vaṭṭaparicchedalekhā ca suvibhattā paññāyanti. Ayamassa nemiyā sabbākāraparipūratā.
atk-s0203a0:631_0: Nemimaṇḍalapiṭṭhiyaṃ panassa dasannaṃ dasannaṃ arānamantare dhamanavaṃso viya antosusiro
atk-s0203a0:631_1: chiddamaṇḍalacitto vātagāhī pavāḷadaṇḍo hoti, yassa vātena paharitassa sukusalasamannāhatassa
atk-s0203a0:631_2: pañcaṅgikatūriyassa viya saddo vaggu ca rajanīyo ca kamanīyo ca hoti. Tassa kho pana
atk-s0203a0:631_3: pavāḷadaṇḍassa upari setacchattaṃ, ubhosu passesu samosaritakusumadāmapantiyoti evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:631_5: samupasobhitanemiparikkhepassa dvinnampi nābhipanāḷīnaṃ anto dve sīhamukhāni honti,
atk-s0203a0:631_7: ākāsagaṅgāgatisobhaṃ abhibhavamānā viya dve muttakalāpā olambanti, yehi cakkaratanena
atk-s0203a0:631_8: saddhiṃ ākāse samparivattamānehi tīṇi cakkāni ekato parivattantāni viya khāyanti.
atk-s0203a0:632_0: Taṃ panetaṃ evaṃ sabbākāraparipūraṃ pakatiyā sāyamāsabhattaṃ bhuñjitvā attano attano
atk-s0203a0:632_1: gharadvāre paññattāsanesu nisīditvā pavattakathāsallāpesu manussesu vīthicatukkādīsu
atk-s0203a0:632_2: kīḷamāne dārakajane nātiuccena nātinīcena vanasaṇḍamatthakāsannena ākāsappadesena
atk-s0203a0:632_3: upasobhayamānaṃ viya rukkhasākhaggāni, dvādasayojanato paṭṭhāya suyyamānena madhurassarena
atk-s0203a0:632_4: sattānaṃ sotāni odhāpayamānaṃ yojanato paṭṭhāya nānappabhāsamudayasamujjalena vaṇṇena
atk-s0203a0:632_5: nayanāni samākaḍḍhantaṃ rañño cakkavattissa puññānubhāvaṃ ugghosayantaṃ viya rājadhāniabhimukhaṃ āgacchati.
atk-s0203a0:633_0: Atha tassa cakkaratanassa saddassavaneneva “kuto nu kho, kassa nu kho ayaṃ saddo”ti
atk-s0203a0:633_1: āvajjitahadayānaṃ puratthimadisaṃ olokayamānānaṃ tesaṃ manussānaṃ aññataro aññataraṃ
atk-s0203a0:633_2: evamāha – “passa bho acchariyaṃ, ayaṃ puṇṇacando pubbe eko uggacchati, ajja pana
atk-s0203a0:633_3: attadutiyo uggato, etañhi rājahaṃsamithunaṃ viya puṇṇacandamithunaṃ pubbāpariyena
atk-s0203a0:633_4: gaganatalaṃ abhilaṅghatī”ti. Tamañño āha – “kiṃ kathesi samma kahaṃ nāma tayā dve
atk-s0203a0:633_5: puṇṇacandā ekato uggacchantā diṭṭhapubbā, nanu esa tapanīyaraṃsidhāro piñcharakiraṇo
atk-s0203a0:633_6: divākaro uggato”ti. Tamañño sitaṃ katvā evamāha – “kiṃ ummattosi, nanu kho idānimeva
atk-s0203a0:633_7: divākaro atthaṅgato, so kathaṃ imaṃ puṇṇacandaṃ anubandhamāno uggacchissati, addhā
atk-s0203a0:633_8: panetaṃ anekaratanappabhāsamujjalaṃ ekassa puññavato vimānaṃ bhavissatī”ti. Te sabbepi
atk-s0203a0:633_9: apasādayantā aññe evamāhaṃsu – “kiṃ bahuṃ vippalapatha, nevesa puṇṇacando, na sūriyo
atk-s0203a0:633_10: na devavimānaṃ. Na hetesaṃ evarūpā sirisampatti atthi, cakkaratanena panetena bhavitabba”nti.
atk-s0203a0:634_0: Evaṃ pavattasallāpasseva tassa janassa candamaṇḍalaṃ ohāya taṃ cakkaratanaṃ abhimukhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:634_1: hoti. Tato tehi “kassa nu kho idaṃ nibbatta”nti vutte bhavanti vattāro – “na kassaci
atk-s0203a0:634_2: aññassa, nanu amhākaṃ rājā pūritacakkavattivatto, tassetaṃ nibbatta”nti. Atha so
atk-s0203a0:634_3: ca mahājano, yo ca añño passati, sabbo cakkaratanameva anugacchati. Tampi cakkaratanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:634_4: raññoyeva atthāya attano āgatabhāvaṃ ñāpetukāmaṃ viya sattakkhattuṃ pākāramatthakeneva
atk-s0203a0:634_5: nagaraṃ anusaṃyāyitvā rañño antepuraṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā antepurassa uttarasīhapañjaraāsanne
atk-s0203a0:634_6: ṭhāne yathā gandhapupphādīhi sukhena sakkā hoti pūjetuṃ, evaṃ akkhāhataṃ viya tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0203a0:635_0: Evaṃ ṭhitassa panassa vātapānacchiddādīhi pavisitvā nānāvirāgaratanappabhāsamujjalaṃ
atk-s0203a0:635_1: anto pāsādaṃ alaṅkurumānaṃ pabhāsamūhaṃ disvā dassanatthāya sañjātābhilāso rājā hoti.
atk-s0203a0:635_2: Parijanopissa piyavacanapābhatena āgantvā tamatthaṃ nivedeti. Atha rājā balavapītipāmojjaphuṭasarīro
atk-s0203a0:635_3: pallaṅkaṃ mocetvā uṭṭhāyāsanā sīhapañjarasamīpaṃ gantvā taṃ cakkaratanaṃ disvā “sutaṃ
atk-s0203a0:635_4: kho pana meta”ntiādikaṃ cintanaṃ cintesi. Tena vuttaṃ – “disvāna rañño khattiyassa…pe…
atk-s0203a0:635_5: assaṃ nu kho ahaṃ rājā cakkavattī”ti. Tattha so hoti rājā cakkavattīti kittāvatā
atk-s0203a0:635_6: cakkavattī hoti? Ekaṅguladvaṅgulamattampi cakkaratane ākāsaṃ abbhuggantvā pavatte.
atk-s0203a0:636_0: Idāni tassa pavattāpanatthaṃ yaṃ kātabbaṃ taṃ dassento atha kho, bhikkhavetiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:636_1: Tattha uṭṭhāyāsanāti nisinnāsanato uṭṭhahitvā cakkaratanasamīpaṃ āgantvā. Bhiṅkāraṃ
atk-s0203a0:636_2: gahetvāti hatthisoṇḍasadisapanāḷiṃ suvaṇṇabhiṅkāraṃ ukkhipitvā vāmahatthena udakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:636_3: gahetvā. Pavattatu bhavaṃ cakkaratanaṃ, abhivijinātu bhavaṃ cakkaratananti. Anvadeva
atk-s0203a0:636_4: rājā cakkavattī saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāyāti sabbacakkavattīnañhi udakena abhisiñcitvā
atk-s0203a0:636_5: “abhivijānātu bhavaṃ cakkaratana”nti vacanasamanantarameva vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā cakkaratanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:636_6: pavattati, yassa pavattisamakālameva so rājā cakkavattī nāma hoti.
atk-s0203a0:637_0: Pavatte pana cakkaratane taṃ anubandhamānova rājā cakkavattī yānavaraṃ āruyha vehāsaṃ
atk-s0203a0:637_1: abbhuggacchati, athassa chattacāmarādihattho parijano ceva antepurajano ca. Tato
atk-s0203a0:637_3: attano attano balakāyena saddhiṃ uparājasenāpati pabhūtayopi vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā
atk-s0203a0:637_4: rājānameva parivārenti. Rājayuttā pana janasaṅgahatthaṃ nagaravīthīsu bheriyo carāpenti
atk-s0203a0:637_5: “tātā amhākaṃ rañño cakkaratanaṃ nibbattaṃ, attano attano vibhavānurūpena maṇḍitappasādhitā
atk-s0203a0:637_6: sannipatathā”ti. Mahājano pana pakatiyā cakkaratanasaddeneva sabbakiccāni pahāya
atk-s0203a0:637_7: gandhapupphādīni ādāya sannipatitova, sopi sabbo vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā rājānameva
atk-s0203a0:637_8: parivāreti. Yassa yassa hi raññā saddhiṃ gantukāmatā uppajjati, so so ākāsagatova
atk-s0203a0:637_9: hoti. Evaṃ dvādasayojanāyāmavitthārā parisā hoti. Tattha ekapurisopi chinnabhinnasarīro
atk-s0203a0:637_10: vā kiliṭṭhavattho vā natthi. Suciparivāro hi rājā cakkavattī. Cakkavattiparisā nāma
atk-s0203a0:637_11: vijjādharaparisā viya ākāse gacchamānā indanīlamaṇitale vippakiṇṇaratanasadisā hoti.
atk-s0203a0:637_12: Tena vuttaṃ “anvadeva rājā cakkavattī saddhiṃ caturaṅginiyā senāyā”ti.
atk-s0203a0:638_0: Tampi cakkaratanaṃ rukkhaggānaṃ uparūpari nātiuccena gaganapadesena pavattati, yathā
atk-s0203a0:638_1: rukkhānaṃ pupphaphalapallavehi atthikā tāni sukhena gahetuṃ sakkonti, bhūmiyaṃ ṭhitā
atk-s0203a0:638_2: “esa rājā, esa uparājā, esa senāpatī”ti sallakkhetuṃ sakkonti. Ṭhānādīsupi iriyāpathesu
atk-s0203a0:638_3: yo yena icchati, so teneva gacchati. Cittakammādisippapasutā cettha attano attano
atk-s0203a0:638_4: kiccaṃ karontāyeva gacchanti. Yatheva hi bhūmiyaṃ, tathā nesaṃ sabbakiccāni ākāse
atk-s0203a0:638_5: ijjhanti. Evaṃ cakkavattiparisaṃ gahetvā taṃ cakkaratanaṃ vāmapassena sineruṃ pahāya
atk-s0203a0:639_0: Tattha yo vinibbedhena dvādasayojanāya parikkhepato chattiṃsayojanaparisāya sannivesakkhamo
atk-s0203a0:639_1: sulabhāhārūpakaraṇo chāyūdakasampanno sucisamatalo ramaṇīyo bhūmibhāgo, tassa uparibhāge
atk-s0203a0:639_2: taṃ cakkaratanaṃ ākāse akkhāhataṃ viya tiṭṭhati. Atha tena saññāṇena so mahājano
atk-s0203a0:639_3: otaritvā yathāruci nhānabhojanādīni sabbakiccāni karonto vāsaṃ kappeti, tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0203a0:639_4: “yasmiṃ kho pana, bhikkhave, padese taṃ cakkaratanaṃ patiṭṭhāti, tattha rājā cakkavattī
atk-s0203a0:640_0: Evaṃ vāsaṃ upagate cakkavattimhi ye tattha rājāno, te “paracakkaṃ āgata”nti sutvāpi
atk-s0203a0:640_1: na balakāyaṃ sannipātetvā yuddhasajjā honti. Cakkaratanassa uppattisamanantarameva
atk-s0203a0:640_2: natthi so satto nāma, yo paccatthikasaññāya rājānaṃ ārabbha āvudhaṃ ukkhipituṃ visaheyya.
atk-s0203a0:645_0: Tasmā sabbepi te rājāno attano attano rajjasirivibhavānurūpaṃ pābhataṃ gahetvā taṃ
atk-s0203a0:645_1: rājānaṃ upagamma onatasirā attano moḷiyamaṇippabhābhisekenassa pādapūjaṃ karonto
atk-s0203a0:645_2: “ehi kho mahārājā”tiādīhi vacanehi tassa kiṅkārappaṭissāvitaṃ āpajjanti. Tena vuttaṃ
atk-s0203a0:645_3: ye kho pana, bhikkhave, puratthimāya…pe… anusāsa mahārājāti.
atk-s0203a0:646_0: Tattha svāgatanti suāgamanaṃ. Ekasmiñhi āgate socanti, gate nandanti. Ekasmiṃ āgate
atk-s0203a0:646_1: nandanti, gate socanti. Tādiso tvaṃ āgatanandano gamanasocano, tasmā tava āgamanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:646_2: suāgamananti vuttaṃ hoti. Evaṃ vutte pana cakkavattī nāpi “ettakaṃ nāma me anuvassaṃ
atk-s0203a0:646_3: baliṃ upakappethā”ti vadati, nāpi aññassa bhogaṃ acchinditvā aññassa deti. Attano
atk-s0203a0:646_4: pana dhammarājabhāvassa anurūpāya paññāya pāṇātipātādīni upaparikkhitvā pemanīyena
atk-s0203a0:646_5: mañjunā sarena “passatha tātā, pāṇātipāto nāmesa āsevito bhāvito bahulīkato nirayasaṃvattaniko
atk-s0203a0:646_6: hotī”tiādinā nayena dhammaṃ desetvā “pāṇo na hantabbo”tiādikaṃ ovādaṃ deti. Tena
atk-s0203a0:646_7: vuttaṃ rājā cakkavattī evamāha pāṇo na hantabbo…pe… yathābhuttañca bhuñjathāti.
atk-s0203a0:647_0: Kiṃ pana sabbepi rañño imaṃ ovādaṃ gaṇhantīti. Buddhassapi tāva sabbe na gaṇhanti,
atk-s0203a0:647_1: rañño kiṃ gaṇhissanti. Tasmā ye paṇḍitā vibhāvino, te gaṇhanti. Sabbe pana anuyantā
atk-s0203a0:648_0: Atha taṃ cakkaratanaṃ evaṃ pubbavidehavāsīnaṃ ovāde dinne katapātarāse cakkavattībalena
atk-s0203a0:648_1: vehāsaṃ abbhuggantvā puratthimaṃ samuddaṃ ajjhogāhati. Yathā yathā ca taṃ ajjhogāhati,
atk-s0203a0:648_2: tathā tathā agadagandhaṃ ghāyitvā saṃkhittaphaṇo nāgarājā viya saṃkhittaūmivipphāraṃ
atk-s0203a0:648_3: hutvā ogacchamānaṃ mahāsamuddasalilaṃ yojanamattaṃ ogantvā antosamudde veḷuriyabhitti
atk-s0203a0:648_4: viya tiṭṭhati. Taṅkhaṇaññeva ca tassa rañño puññasiriṃ daṭṭhukāmāni viya mahāsamuddatale
atk-s0203a0:648_5: vippakiṇṇāni nānāratanāni tato tato āgantvā taṃ padesaṃ pūrayanti. Atha sā rājaparisā
atk-s0203a0:648_6: taṃ nānāratanaparipūraṃ mahāsamuddatalaṃ disvā yathāruci ucchaṅgādīhi ādiyati, yathāruci
atk-s0203a0:648_7: ādinnaratanāya pana parisāya taṃ cakkaratanaṃ paṭinivattati. Paṭinivattamāne ca tasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:648_8: parisā aggato hoti, majjhe rājā, ante cakkaratanaṃ. Tampi jalanidhijalaṃ palobhiyamānamiva
atk-s0203a0:648_9: cakkaratanasiriyā, asahamānamiva ca tena viyogaṃ, nemimaṇḍalapariyantaṃ abhihanantaṃ
atk-s0203a0:649_0: 257. Evaṃ rājā cakkavattī puratthimasamuddapariyantaṃ pubbavidehaṃ abhivijinitvā
atk-s0203a0:649_1: dakkhiṇasamuddapariyantaṃ jambudīpaṃ vijetukāmo cakkaratanadesitena maggena dakkhiṇasamuddābhimukho
atk-s0203a0:649_2: gacchati. Tena vuttaṃ atha kho taṃ, bhikkhave, cakkaratanaṃ puratthimasamuddaṃ ajjhogāhetvā
atk-s0203a0:649_3: paccuttaritvā dakkhiṇaṃ disaṃ pavattatīti. Evaṃ pavattamānassa pana tassa pavattanavidhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:649_4: senāsanniveso paṭirājagamanaṃ tesaṃ anusāsanippadānaṃ dakkhiṇasamuddaṃ ajjhogāhanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:649_5: samuddasalilassa ogacchanaṃ ratanādānanti sabbaṃ purimanayeneva veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:650_0: Vijinitvā pana taṃ dasasahassayojanappamāṇaṃ jambudīpaṃ dakkhiṇasamuddatopi paccuttaritvā
atk-s0203a0:650_1: sattayojanasahassappamāṇaṃ aparagoyānaṃ vijetuṃ pubbe vuttanayeneva gantvā tampi
atk-s0203a0:650_2: samuddapariyantaṃ tatheva abhivijinitvā pacchimasamuddatopi paccuttaritvā aṭṭhayojanasahassappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:650_3: uttarakuruṃ vijetuṃ tatheva gantvā tampi samuddapariyantaṃ tatheva abhivijiya uttarasamuddatopi paccuttarati.
atk-s0203a0:651_0: Ettāvatā raññā cakkavattinā cāturantāya pathaviyā ādhipaccaṃ adhigataṃ hoti. So evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:651_1: vijitavijayo attano rajjasirisampattidassanatthaṃ sapariso uddhaṃ gaganatalaṃ abhilaṅghitvā
atk-s0203a0:651_3: cattāro mahādīpe oloketvā cakkaratanadesiteneva maggena yathānukkamaṃ attano rājadhānimeva
atk-s0203a0:651_4: paccāgacchati. Atha taṃ cakkaratanaṃ antepuradvāraṃ sobhayamānaṃ viya hutvā tiṭṭhati.
atk-s0203a0:652_0: Evaṃ patiṭṭhite pana tasmiṃ cakkaratane rājantepure ukkāhi vā dīpikāhi vā kiñci karaṇīyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:652_1: na hoti, cakkaratanobhāsoyeva rattiṃ andhakāraṃ vidhamati. Ye ca pana rattiṃ andhakāratthikā
atk-s0203a0:652_2: honti, tesaṃ andhakārameva hoti. Tena vuttaṃ dakkhiṇasamuddaṃ ajjhogāhetvā…pe… evarūpaṃ
atk-s0203a0:654_0: 258. Evaṃ pātubhūtacakkaratanassa panassa cakkavattino amaccā pakatimaṅgalahatthiṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:654_1: sucibhūmibhāgaṃ kāretvā haricandanādīhi surabhigandhehi upalimpāpetvā heṭṭhā vicittavaṇṇasurabhikusumasamākiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:654_3: devavimānaṃ viya abhisaṅkharitvā “evarūpassa nāma deva hatthiratanassa āgamanaṃ cintethā”ti
atk-s0203a0:654_4: vadanti. So pubbe vuttanayeneva mahādānaṃ datvā sīlāni samādāya taṃ puññasampattiṃ
atk-s0203a0:654_5: āvajjanto nisīdati, athassa puññānubhāvacodito chaddantakulā vā uposathakulā vā taṃ
atk-s0203a0:654_8: yogī viya vehāsaṃ gamanasamattho manosilācuṇṇarañjitapariyanto viya rajatapabbato
atk-s0203a0:654_9: hatthiseṭṭho tasmiṃ padese patiṭṭhāti. So chaddantakulā āgacchanto sabbakaniṭṭho
atk-s0203a0:654_10: āgacchati, uposathakulā sabbajeṭṭho. Pāḷiyaṃ pana “uposatho nāgarājā” icceva āgacchati.
atk-s0203a0:654_11: Svāyaṃ pūritacakkavattivattānaṃ cakkavattīnaṃ sutte vuttanayeneva cintayantānaṃ āgacchati,
atk-s0203a0:654_12: na itaresaṃ. Sayameva pakatimaṅgalahatthiṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā maṅgalahatthiṃ apanetvā
atk-s0203a0:654_13: tattha tiṭṭhati. Tena vuttaṃ puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave…pe… nāgarājāti.
atk-s0203a0:655_0: Evaṃ pātubhūtaṃ pana taṃ hatthiratanaṃ disvā hatthigopakādayo haṭṭhatuṭṭhā vegena
atk-s0203a0:655_1: gantvā rañño ārocenti. Rājā turitaturitaṃ āgantvā taṃ disvā pasannacitto “bhaddakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:655_2: vata bho hatthiyānaṃ, sace damathaṃ upeyyā”ti cintayanto hatthaṃ pasāreti. Atha so
atk-s0203a0:655_3: gharadhenuvacchako viya kaṇṇe olambetvā sūratabhāvaṃ dassento rājānaṃ upasaṅkamati,
atk-s0203a0:655_4: rājā taṃ abhiruhitukāmo hoti. Athassa parijanā adhippāyaṃ ñatvā taṃ hatthiratanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:655_5: sovaṇṇaddhajaṃ sovaṇṇālaṅkāraṃ hemajālapaṭicchannaṃ katvā upanenti. Rājā taṃ anisīdāpetvāva
atk-s0203a0:655_6: sattaratanamayāya nisseṇiyā abhiruyha ākāsaṃ gamananinnacitto hoti. Tassa saha cittuppādeneva
atk-s0203a0:655_7: so hatthirājā rājahaṃso viya indanīlamaṇippabhājālanīlagaganatalaṃ abhilaṅghati,
atk-s0203a0:655_8: tato cakkacārikāya vuttanayeneva sakalarājaparisā. Iti sapariso rājā antopātarāseyeva
atk-s0203a0:655_9: sakalapathaviṃ anusaṃyāyitvā rājadhāniṃ paccāgacchati, evaṃ mahiddhikaṃ cakkavattino
atk-s0203a0:655_10: hatthiratanaṃ hoti. Tena vuttaṃ disvāna rañño cakkavattissa…pe… evarūpaṃ hatthiratanaṃ pātubhavatīti.
atk-s0203a0:657_0: Evaṃ pātubhūtahatthiratanassa pana cakkavattino parisā pakatimaṅgalaassaṭṭhānaṃ sucisamatalaṃ
atk-s0203a0:657_1: kāretvā alaṅkaritvā ca purimanayeneva rañño tassa āgamanacintanatthaṃ ussāhaṃ janenti.
atk-s0203a0:657_2: So purimanayeneva katadānasakkāro samādinnasīlova pāsādatale nisinno puññasampattiṃ
atk-s0203a0:657_5: viya indanīlamaṇi viya ca kāḷavaṇṇena sīsena samannāgatattā kāḷasīso suṭṭhu kappetvā
atk-s0203a0:657_6: ṭhapitehi viya muñjasadisehi saṇhavaṭṭaujugatigatehi kesehi samannāgatattā muñjakeso
atk-s0203a0:657_7: vehāsaṅgamo valāhako nāma assarājā āgantvā tasmiṃ ṭhāne patiṭṭhāti. Sesaṃ sabbaṃ
atk-s0203a0:657_8: hatthiratane vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Evarūpaṃ assaratanaṃ sandhāya bhagavā puna caparantiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:659_0: Evaṃ pātubhūtaassaratanassa pana rañño cakkavattissa catuhatthāyāmaṃ sakaṭanābhisamappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:659_1: ubhosu antesu kaṇṇikapariyantato viniggatasuparisuddhamuttākalāpehi dvīhi kañcanapadumehi
atk-s0203a0:659_3: paṭippharamānaṃ viya vepullapabbatato maṇiratanaṃ āgacchati. Tassevaṃ āgatassa muttājālake
atk-s0203a0:659_4: ṭhapetvā veḷuparamparāya saṭṭhihatthappamāṇaṃ ākāsaṃ āropitassa rattibhāge samantā
atk-s0203a0:659_5: yojanappamāṇaṃ okāsaṃ ābhā pharati, yāya sabbo so okāso aruṇuggamanavelā viya sañjātāloko
atk-s0203a0:659_6: hoti. Tato kassakā kasikammaṃ, vāṇijā āpaṇugghāṭanaṃ, te te ca sippino taṃ taṃ kammantaṃ
atk-s0203a0:659_7: payojenti divāti maññamānā. Tena vuttaṃ puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave…pe… maṇiratanaṃ pātubhavatīti.
atk-s0203a0:661_0: Evaṃ pātubhūtamaṇiratanassa pana cakkavattissa visayasukhavisesakāraṇaṃ itthiratanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:661_1: pātubhavati. Maddarājakulato vā hissa aggamahesiṃ ānenti, uttarakuruto vā puññānubhāvena
atk-s0203a0:661_2: sayaṃ āgacchati. Avasesā panassā sampatti “puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, rañño cakkavattissa
atk-s0203a0:661_3: itthiratanaṃ pātubhavati abhirūpā dassanīyā”tiādinā nayena pāḷiyaṃyeva āgatā.
atk-s0203a0:662_0: Tattha saṇṭhānapāripūriyā adhikaṃ rūpaṃ assāti abhirūpā. Dissamānā ca cakkhūni pīṇayati,
atk-s0203a0:662_1: tasmā aññaṃ kiccavikkhepaṃ hitvāpi daṭṭhabbāti dassanīyā. Dissamānā ca somanassavasena
atk-s0203a0:662_2: cittaṃ pasādetīti pāsādikā. Paramāyāti evaṃ pasādāvahattā uttamāya. Vaṇṇapokkharatāyāti
atk-s0203a0:662_3: vaṇṇasundaratāya. Samannāgatāti upetā. Abhirūpā vā yasmā nātidīghā nātirassā dassanīyā
atk-s0203a0:662_4: yasmā nātikisā nātithūlā, pāsādikā yasmā nātikāḷikā naccodātā. Paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya
atk-s0203a0:662_5: samannāgatā yasmā atikkantā mānusaṃ vaṇṇaṃ appattā dibbavaṇṇaṃ. Manussānañhi vaṇṇābhā
atk-s0203a0:662_6: bahi na niccharati, devānaṃ atidūraṃ niccharati, tassā pana dvādasahatthappamāṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:663_0: Nātidīghādīsu cassā paṭhamayugaḷena ārohasampatti, dutiyayugaḷena pariṇāhasampatti,
atk-s0203a0:663_1: tatiyayugaḷena vaṇṇasampatti vuttā. Chahi vāpi etehi kāyavipattiyā abhāvo, atikkantā
atk-s0203a0:664_0: Tūlapicuno vā kappāsapicuno vāti sappimaṇḍe pakkhipitvā ṭhapitassa satavihatassa
atk-s0203a0:664_1: tūlapicuno vā satavihatassa kappāsapicuno vā kāyasamphasso hoti. Sīteti rañño sītakāle.
atk-s0203a0:664_2: Uṇheti rañño uṇhakāle. Candanagandhoti niccakālameva supisitassa abhinavassa catujjātisamāyojitassa
atk-s0203a0:664_3: haricandanassa gandho kāyato vāyati. Uppalagandhoti hasitakathitakālesu mukhato nikkhanto
atk-s0203a0:665_0: Evaṃ rūpasamphassagandhasampattiyuttāya panassā sarīrasampattiyā anurūpaṃ ācāraṃ
atk-s0203a0:665_1: dassetuṃ taṃ kho panātiādi vuttaṃ. Tattha rājānaṃ disvā nisinnāsanato aggidaḍḍhā
atk-s0203a0:665_2: viya paṭhamameva uṭṭhātīti pubbuṭṭhāyinī. Tasmiṃ nisinne tassa rañño tālavaṇṭena
atk-s0203a0:665_3: bījanādikiccaṃ katvā pacchā nipatati nisīdatīti pacchānipātinī. Kiṃ karomi devāti
atk-s0203a0:665_4: tassa kiṃkāraṃ paṭissāvetīti kiṃkārapaṭissāvinī. Rañño manāpameva carati karotīti
atk-s0203a0:665_5: manāpacārinī. Yaṃ rañño piyaṃ, tadeva vadatīti piyavādinī.
atk-s0203a0:666_0: Idāni svāssā ācāro bhāvasuddhiyā eva, na sāṭheyyenāti dassetuṃ taṃ kho panātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:666_1: Tattha no aticaratīti na atikkamitvā carati, aññaṃ purisaṃ cittenapi na patthetīti
atk-s0203a0:666_2: vuttaṃ hoti. Tattha ye tassā ādimhi “abhirūpā”tiādayo ante “pubbuṭṭhāyinī”tiādayo
atk-s0203a0:666_3: guṇā vuttā, te pakatiguṇā eva “atikkantā mānusaṃ vaṇṇa”ntiādayo pana cakkavattino
atk-s0203a0:666_4: puññaṃ upanissāya cakkaratanapātubhāvato paṭṭhāya purimakammānubhāvena nibbattantīti
atk-s0203a0:666_5: veditabbā. Abhirūpatādikāpi vā cakkaratanapātubhāvato paṭṭhāya sabbākārapāripūrā
atk-s0203a0:668_0: Evaṃ pātubhūtaitthiratanassa pana rañño cakkavattissa dhanakaraṇīyānaṃ kiccānaṃ yathāsukhappavattanatthaṃ
atk-s0203a0:668_1: gahapatiratanaṃ pātubhavati. So pakatiyāva mahābhogo mahābhogakule jāto rañño dhanarāsivaḍḍhako
atk-s0203a0:668_2: seṭṭhi gahapati hoti, cakkaratanānubhāvasahitaṃ panassa kammavipākajaṃ dibbacakkhu
atk-s0203a0:668_3: pātubhavati, yena antopathaviyaṃ yojanabbhantare nidhiṃ passati. So taṃ sampattiṃ
atk-s0203a0:668_4: disvā tuṭṭhahadayo gantvā rājānaṃ dhanena pavāretvā sabbāni dhanakaraṇīyāni sampādeti.
atk-s0203a0:668_5: Tena vuttaṃ puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave…pe… evarūpaṃ gahapatiratanaṃ pātubhavatīti.
atk-s0203a0:670_0: Evaṃ pātubhūtagahapatiratanassa pana rañño cakkavattissa sabbakiccasaṃvidhānasamatthaṃ
atk-s0203a0:670_1: pariṇāyakaratanaṃ pātubhavati. So rañño jeṭṭhaputtova hoti. Pakatiyā eva paṇḍito
atk-s0203a0:670_2: byatto medhāvī, rañño puññānubhāvaṃ nissāya panassa attano kammānubhāvena paracittañāṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:670_3: uppajjati. Yena dvādasayojanāya rājaparisāya cittācāraṃ ñatvā rañño ahite hite ca
atk-s0203a0:670_4: vavatthapetuṃ samattho hoti. Sopi taṃ attano ānubhāvaṃ disvā tuṭṭhahadayo rājānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:670_5: sabbakiccānusāsanena pavāreti. Tena vuttaṃ puna caparaṃ…pe… pariṇāyakaratanaṃ pātubhavatīti.
atk-s0203a0:670_6: Tattha ṭhapetabbaṃ ṭhapetunti tasmiṃ tasmiṃ ṭhānantare ṭhapetabbaṃ ṭhapetuṃ.
atk-s0203a0:672_0: 260. Kaṭaggahenāti jayaggāhena. Mahantaṃ bhogakkhandhanti ekappahāreneva dve vā tīṇi
atk-s0203a0:672_1: vā satasahassāni. Kevalā paripūrā paṇḍitabhūmīti paṇḍito tīṇi sucaritāni pūretvā
atk-s0203a0:672_2: sagge nibbattati, tato manussalokaṃ āgacchanto kularūpabhogasampattiyaṃ nibbattati,
atk-s0203a0:672_3: tattha ṭhito tīṇi ca sucaritāni pūretvā puna sagge nibbattatīti ayaṃ sakalā paripuṇṇā
atk-s0203a0:676: 261. Evaṃ me sutanti devadūtasuttaṃ. Tattha dve agārātiādi assapurasutte vitthāritameva.
atk-s0203a0:677_0: 262. Nirayaṃ upapannāti bhagavā katthaci nirayato paṭṭhāya desanaṃ devalokena osāpeti,
atk-s0203a0:677_1: katthaci devalokato paṭṭhāya nirayena osāpeti. Sace saggasampattiṃ vitthāretvā kathetukāmo
atk-s0203a0:677_2: hoti, nirayadukkhaṃ ekadesato katheti, tiracchānayonidukkhaṃ pettivisayadukkhaṃ manussalokasampattiṃ
atk-s0203a0:677_3: ekadesato katheti, saggasampattimeva vitthāreti. Sace nirayadukkhaṃ vitthāretvā kathetukāmo
atk-s0203a0:677_4: hoti, devalokamanussalokesu sampattiṃ tiracchānayonipettivisayesu ca dukkhaṃ ekadesato
atk-s0203a0:677_5: katheti, nirayadukkhameva vitthāreti. So imasmiṃ sutte nirayadukkhaṃ vitthāretukāmo,
atk-s0203a0:677_6: tasmā devalokato paṭṭhāya desanaṃ nirayena osāpeti. Devalokamanussalokasampattiyo
atk-s0203a0:677_7: tiracchānayonipettivisayadukkhāni ca ekadesato kathetvā nirayadukkhameva vitthārena
atk-s0203a0:678_0: Tattha ekacce therā “nirayapālā nāma natthi, yantarūpaṃ viya kammameva kāraṇaṃ kāretī”ti
atk-s0203a0:678_1: vadanti. Tesaṃ taṃ “atthi niraye nirayapālāti, āmantā, atthi ca kāraṇikā”tiādinā
atk-s0203a0:678_2: nayena abhidhamme paṭisedhitameva. Yathā hi manussaloke kammakāraṇakārakā atthi,
atk-s0203a0:678_3: evameva niraye nirayapālā atthīti. Yamassa raññoti yamarājā nāma vemānikapetarājā,
atk-s0203a0:678_5: ekasmiṃ kāle kammavipākaṃ, dhammiko rājā. Na cesa ekova hoti, catūsu pana dvāresu
atk-s0203a0:678_6: cattāro janā honti. Nāddasanti attano santike pesitassa kassaci devadūtassa abhāvaṃ
atk-s0203a0:678_7: sandhāya evaṃ vadati. Atha naṃ yamo “nāyaṃ bhāsitassa atthaṃ sallakkhetī”ti ñatvā
atk-s0203a0:679: Jātidhammoti jātisabhāvo, aparimutto jātiyā, jāti nāma mayhaṃ abbhantareyeva atthīti. Parato jarādhammotiādīsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0203a0:680_0: 263. Paṭhamaṃ devadūtaṃ samanuyuñjitvāti ettha daharakumāro atthato evaṃ vadati nāma
atk-s0203a0:680_1: “passatha, bho, mayhampi tumhākaṃ viya hatthapādā atthi, sake panamhi muttakarīse
atk-s0203a0:680_2: palipanno, attano dhammatāya uṭṭhahitvā nhāyituṃ na sakkomi, ahaṃ kiliṭṭhagattomhi,
atk-s0203a0:680_3: nhāpetha manti vattumpi na sakkomi, jātitomhi aparimuttatāya ediso jāto. Na kho panāhameva,
atk-s0203a0:680_4: tumhepi jātito aparimuttāva. Yatheva hi mayhaṃ, evaṃ tumhākampi jāti āgamissati,
atk-s0203a0:680_5: iti tassā pure āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ karothā”ti. Tenesa devadūto nāma jāto, vacanattho
atk-s0203a0:681_0: Dutiyaṃ devadūtanti etthāpi jarājiṇṇasatto atthato evaṃ vadati nāma – “passatha,
atk-s0203a0:681_1: bho, ahampi tumhe viya taruṇo ahosiṃ ūrubalabāhubalajavanasampanno, tassa me tā balajavanasampattiyo
atk-s0203a0:681_2: antarahitā, vijjamānāpi me hatthapādā hatthapādakiccaṃ na karonti, jarāyamhi aparimuttatāya
atk-s0203a0:681_3: ediso jāto. Na kho panāhameva, tumhepi jarāya aparimuttāva. Yatheva hi mayhaṃ, evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:681_4: tumhākampi jarā āgamissati, iti tassā pure āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ karothā”ti. Tenesa devadūto nāma jāto.
atk-s0203a0:682_0: Tatiyaṃ devadūtanti etthāpi gilānasatto atthato eva vadati nāma – “passatha, bho,
atk-s0203a0:682_1: ahampi tumhe viya nirogo ahosiṃ, somhi etarahi byādhinā abhihato sake muttakarīse
atk-s0203a0:682_2: palipanno, uṭṭhātumpi na sakkomi, vijjamānāpi me hatthapādā hatthapādakiccaṃ na karonti,
atk-s0203a0:682_3: byādhitomhi aparimuttatāya ediso jāto. Na kho panāhameva, tumhepi byādhito aparimuttāva.
atk-s0203a0:682_4: Yatheva hi mayhaṃ, evaṃ tumhākaṃ byādhi āgamissati, iti tassa pure āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:683_0: 265. Catutthaṃ devadūtanti ettha pana kammakāraṇā vā devadūtāti kātabbā kammakāraṇikā
