atk-s0203a0:683_1: vā. Tattha pana kammakāraṇapakkhe bāttiṃsa tāva kammakāraṇā atthato evaṃ vadanti
atk-s0203a0:683_2: nāma – “mayaṃ nibbattamānā na rukkhe vā pāsāṇe vā nibbattāma, tumhādisānaṃ sarīre
atk-s0203a0:683_3: nibbattāma, iti amhākaṃ pure nibbattitova kalyāṇaṃ karothā”ti. Tenete devadūtā nāma
atk-s0203a0:683_4: jātā. Kammakāraṇikāpi atthato evaṃ vadanti nāma – “mayaṃ dvattiṃsa kammakāraṇā karontā
atk-s0203a0:683_5: na rukkhādīsu karoma, tumhādisesu sattesuyeva karoma, iti amhākaṃ tumhesu pure kammakāraṇākaraṇatova
atk-s0203a0:683_6: kalyāṇaṃ karothā”ti. Tenetepi devadūtā nāma jātā.
atk-s0203a0:684_0: 266. Pañcamaṃ devadūtanti ettha matakasatto atthato evaṃ vadati nāma – “passatha
atk-s0203a0:684_1: bho maṃ āmakasusāne chaḍḍitaṃ uddhumātakādibhāvaṃ pattaṃ, maraṇatomhi aparimuttatāya
atk-s0203a0:684_2: ediso jāto. Na kho panāhameva, tumhepi maraṇato aparimuttāva. Yatheva hi mayhaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:684_3: evaṃ tumhākampi maraṇaṃ āgamissati, iti tassa pure āgamanāva kalyāṇaṃ karothā”ti.
atk-s0203a0:685_0: Imaṃ pana devadūtānuyogaṃ ko labhati, ko na labhatīti? Yena tāva bahuṃ pāpaṃ kataṃ,
atk-s0203a0:685_1: so gantvā niraye nibbattatiyeva. Yena pana parittaṃ pāpakammaṃ kataṃ, so labhati.
atk-s0203a0:685_2: Yathā hi sabhaṇḍaṃ coraṃ gahetvā kattabbameva karonti, na vinicchinanti. Anuvijjitvā
atk-s0203a0:685_3: gahitaṃ pana vinicchayaṭṭhānaṃ nayanti, so vinicchayaṃ labhati. Evaṃsampadametaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:685_4: Parittapāpakammā hi attano dhammatāyapi saranti, sāriyamānāpi saranti.
atk-s0203a0:686_0: Tattha dīghajayantadamiḷo nāma attano dhammatāya sari. So kira damiḷo sumanagirivihāre
atk-s0203a0:686_1: ākāsacetiyaṃ rattapaṭena pūjesi. Atha niraye ussadasāmante nibbatto aggijālasaddaṃ
atk-s0203a0:686_2: sutvāva attano pūjitapaṭaṃ anussari, so gantvā sagge nibbatto. Aparopi puttassa daharabhikkhuno
atk-s0203a0:686_3: khalisāṭakaṃ dento pādamūle ṭhapesi, maraṇakālamhi paṭapaṭāti sadde nimittaṃ gaṇhi,
atk-s0203a0:686_4: sopi ussadasāmante nibbatto jālasaddena taṃ sāṭakaṃ anussaritvā sagge nibbatto. Evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:686_5: tāva attano dhammatāya kusalaṃ kammaṃ saritvā sagge nibbattatīti.
atk-s0203a0:687_0: Attano dhammatāya asarante pana pañca devadūte pucchati. Tattha koci paṭhamena devadūtena
atk-s0203a0:687_1: sarati, koci dutiyādīhi. Yo pana pañcahipi na sarati, taṃ yamo rājā sayaṃ sāreti.
atk-s0203a0:687_2: Eko kira amacco sumanapupphakumbhena mahācetiyaṃ pūjetvā yamassa pattiṃ adāsi, taṃ
atk-s0203a0:687_3: akusalakammena niraye nibbattaṃ yamassa santikaṃ nayiṃsu. Tasmiṃ pañcahipi devadūtehi
atk-s0203a0:687_4: kusale asarante yamo sayaṃ olokento disvā – “nanu tvaṃ mahācetiyaṃ sumanapupphakumbhena
atk-s0203a0:687_5: pūjetvā mayhaṃ pattiṃ adāsī”ti sāresi, so tasmiṃ kāle saritvā devalokaṃ gato. Yamo
atk-s0203a0:687_6: pana sayaṃ oloketvāpi apassanto – “mahādukkhaṃ nāma anubhavissati ayaṃ satto”ti tuṇhī hoti.
atk-s0203a0:688_0: 267. Mahānirayeti avīcimahānirayamhi. Kiṃ panassa pamāṇaṃ? Abbhantaraṃ āyāmena ca
atk-s0203a0:688_1: vitthārena ca yojanasataṃ hoti. Lohapathavī lohachadanaṃ ekekā ca bhitti navanavayojanikā
atk-s0203a0:688_2: hoti. Puratthimāya bhittiyā acci uṭṭhitā pacchimaṃ bhittiṃ gahetvā taṃ vinivijjhitvā
atk-s0203a0:688_3: parato yojanasataṃ gacchati. Sesadisāsupi eseva nayo. Iti jālapariyantavasena āyāmavitthārato
atk-s0203a0:688_4: aṭṭhārasayojanādhikāni tīṇi yojanasatāni, parikkhepato pana navayojanasatāni catupaṇṇāsayojanāni,
atk-s0203a0:688_5: samantā pana ussadehi saddhiṃ dasayojanasahassaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:689_0: 268. Ubbhataṃ tādisameva hotīti ettha akkantapadaṃ yāva aṭṭhito daḷhaṃ uddharitumeva
atk-s0203a0:689_1: na sakkā. Ayaṃ panettha attho – heṭṭhato paṭṭhāya ḍayhati, uparito paṭṭhāya jhāyati,
atk-s0203a0:689_2: iti akkamanakāle ḍayhamānaṃ paññāyati, uddharaṇakāle tādisameva, tasmā evaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:690_0: Kasmā panesa narako avīcīti saṅkhaṃ gatoti. Vīci nāma antaraṃ vuccati, tattha ca
atk-s0203a0:690_1: aggijālānaṃ vā sattānaṃ vā dukkhassa vā antaraṃ natthi. Tasmā so avīcīti saṅkhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:690_2: gatoti. Tassa hi puratthimabhittito jālā uṭṭhitā saṃsibbamānā yojanasataṃ gantvā
atk-s0203a0:690_3: pacchimabhittiṃ vinivijjhitvā parato yojanasataṃ gacchati. Sesadisāsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0203a0:691_0: Imesaṃ channaṃ jālānaṃ majjhe nibbatto devadatto, tassa yojanasatappamāṇo attabhāvo,
atk-s0203a0:691_1: dve pādā yāva gopphakā lohapathaviṃ paviṭṭhā, dve hatthā yāva maṇibandhā lohabhittiyo
atk-s0203a0:691_2: paviṭṭhā, sīsaṃ yāva bhamukaṭṭhito lohachadane paviṭṭhaṃ, adhobhāgena ekaṃ lohasūlaṃ
atk-s0203a0:691_3: pavisitvā kāyaṃ vinivijjhantaṃ chadane paviṭṭhaṃ, pācīnabhittito nikkhantasūlaṃ hadayaṃ
atk-s0203a0:691_4: vinivijjhitvā pacchimabhittiṃ paviṭṭhaṃ, uttarabhittito nikkhantasūlaṃ phāsukā vinivijjhitvā
atk-s0203a0:691_5: dakkhiṇabhittiṃ paviṭṭhaṃ. Niccale tathāgatamhi aparaddhattā niccalova hutvā paccatīti
atk-s0203a0:691_6: kammasarikkhatāya ediso jāto. Evaṃ jālānaṃ nirantaratāya avīci nāma.
atk-s0203a0:692_0: Abbhantare panassa yojanasatike ṭhāne nāḷiyaṃ koṭṭetvā pūritapiṭṭhaṃ viya sattā nirantarā,
atk-s0203a0:692_1: “imasmiṃ ṭhāne satto atthi, imasmiṃ natthī”ti na vattabbaṃ, gacchantānaṃ ṭhitānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:692_2: nisinnānaṃ nipannānaṃ anto natthi, gacchante vā ṭhite vā nisinne vā nipanne vā aññamaññaṃ
atk-s0203a0:692_3: na bādhanti. Evaṃ sattānaṃ nirantaratāya avīci.
atk-s0203a0:693_0: Kāyadvāre pana cha upekkhāsahagatāni cittāni uppajjanti, ekaṃ dukkhasahagataṃ. Evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:693_1: santepi yathā jivhagge cha madhubindūni ṭhapetvā ekasmiṃ tambalohabindumhi ṭhapite
atk-s0203a0:693_2: anudahanabalavatāya tadeva paññāyati, itarāni abbohārikāni honti, evaṃ anudahanabalavatāya
atk-s0203a0:693_3: dukkhamevettha nirantaraṃ, itarāni abbohārikānīti. Evaṃ dukkhassa nirantaratāya avīci.
atk-s0203a0:694: 269. Mahantoti yojanasatiko. So tattha patatīti eko pādo mahāniraye hoti, eko gūthaniraye nipatati. Sūcimukhāti sūcisadisamukhā, te hatthigīvappamāṇā ekadoṇikanāvāppamāṇā vā honti.
atk-s0203a0:695_1: yattha patitapatitā kudrūsakarāsimhi khittaphālavāsisilādīni viya heṭṭhimatalameva gaṇhanti.
atk-s0203a0:696: Āropentīti ayadaṇḍehi pothentā āropenti. Tesaṃ ārohanakāle te kaṇṭakā adhomukhā honti, orohanakāle uddhaṃmukhā.
atk-s0203a0:697_0: Vāteritānīti kammamayena vātena calitāni. Hatthampi chindantīti phalake maṃsaṃ viya
atk-s0203a0:697_1: koṭṭayamānāni chindanti. Sace uṭṭhāya palāyati, ayopākāro samuṭṭhahitvā parikkhipati,
atk-s0203a0:698_0: Khārodakā nadīti vetaraṇī nāma tambalohanadī. Tattha ayomayāni kharavālika-pokkharapattāni,
atk-s0203a0:698_1: heṭṭhā khuradhārā ubhosu tīresu vettalatā ca kusatiṇāni ca. So tattha dukkhā tibbā
atk-s0203a0:698_2: kharāti so tattha uddhañca adho ca vuyhamāno pokkharapattesu chijjati. Siṅghāṭakasaṇṭhānāya
atk-s0203a0:698_3: kharavālikāya kaṇṭakehi vijjhiyati, khuradhārāhi phāliyati, ubhosu tīresu kusatiṇehi
atk-s0203a0:699_0: 270. Tattena ayosaṅkunāti tena jigacchitomhīti vutte mahantaṃ lohapacchiṃ lohaguḷānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:699_1: pūretvā taṃ upagacchanti, so lohaguḷabhāvaṃ ñatvā dante samphuseti, athassa te tattena
atk-s0203a0:699_2: ayosaṅkunā mukhaṃ vivaranti, tambalohadhārehi mahantena lohakaṭāhena tambalohaṃ upanetvā
atk-s0203a0:699_3: evamevaṃ karonti. Puna mahānirayeti evaṃ pañcavidhabandhanato paṭṭhāya yāva tambalohapānā
atk-s0203a0:699_4: tambalohapānato paṭṭhāya puna pañcavidhabandhanādīni kāretvā mahāniraye pakkhipanti.
atk-s0203a0:699_5: Tattha koci pañcavidhabandhaneneva muccati, koci dutiyena, koci tatiyena, koci tambalohapānena
atk-s0203a0:699_6: muccati, kamme pana aparikkhīṇe puna mahāniraye pakkhipanti.
atk-s0203a0:700_0: Idaṃ pana suttaṃ gaṇhanto eko daharabhikkhu, – “bhante, ettakaṃ dukkhamanubhavitasattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:700_1: punapi mahāniraye pakkhipantī”ti āha. Āma, āvuso, kamme aparikkhīṇe punappunaṃ evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:700_2: karontīti. Tiṭṭhatu, bhante, uddeso, kammaṭṭhānameva kathethāti kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā
atk-s0203a0:700_3: sotāpanno hutvā āgamma uddesaṃ aggahesi. Aññesampi imasmiṃ padese uddesaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0203a0:700_4: arahattaṃ pattānaṃ gaṇanā natthi. Sabbabuddhānañcetaṃ suttaṃ avijahitameva hoti.
atk-s0203a0:701_0: 271. Hīnakāyūpagāti hīnakāyaṃ upagatā hutvā. Upādāneti taṇhādiṭṭhigahaṇe. Jātimaraṇasambhaveti
atk-s0203a0:701_1: jātiyā ca maraṇassa ca kāraṇabhūte. Anupādāti catūhi upādānehi anupādiyitvā. Jātimaraṇasaṅkhayeti
atk-s0203a0:702: Diṭṭhadhammābhinibbutāti diṭṭhadhamme imasmiṃyeva attabhāve sabbakilesanibbānena nibbutā. Sabbadukkhaṃ upaccagunti sabbadukkhātikkantā nāma honti.
atk-s0203a0:707: 272. Evaṃ me sutanti bhaddekarattasuttaṃ. Tattha bhaddekarattassāti vipassanānuyogasamannāgatattā bhaddakassa ekarattassa. Uddesanti mātikaṃ. Vibhaṅganti vitthārabhājanīyaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:708_0: Atītanti atīte pañcakkhandhe. Nānvāgameyyāti taṇhādiṭṭhīhi nānugaccheyya. Nappaṭikaṅkheti
atk-s0203a0:708_1: taṇhādiṭṭhīhi na pattheyya. Yadatītanti idamettha kāraṇavacanaṃ. Yasmā yaṃ atītaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:708_2: taṃ pahīnaṃ niruddhaṃ atthaṅgataṃ, tasmā taṃ puna nānugaccheyya. Yasmā ca yaṃ anāgataṃ,
atk-s0203a0:708_3: taṃ appattaṃ ajātaṃ anibbattaṃ, tasmā tampi na pattheyya.
atk-s0203a0:709_0: Tattha tatthāti paccuppannampi dhammaṃ yattha yattheva uppanno, tattha tattheva ca
atk-s0203a0:709_1: naṃ aniccānupassanādīhi sattahi anupassanāhi yo vipassati araññādīsu vā tattha tattheva
atk-s0203a0:709_2: vipassati. Asaṃhīraṃ asaṃkuppanti idaṃ vipassanāpaṭivipassanādassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:709_3: Vipassanā hi rāgādīhi na saṃhīrati na saṃkuppatīti asaṃhīraṃ asaṃkuppaṃ, taṃ anubrūhaye
atk-s0203a0:709_4: vaḍḍheyya, paṭivipasseyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Atha vā nibbānaṃ rāgādīhi na saṃhīrati na
atk-s0203a0:709_5: saṃkuppatīti asaṃhīraṃ asaṃkuppaṃ. Taṃ vidvā paṇḍito bhikkhu anubrūhaye, punappunaṃ
atk-s0203a0:709_6: tadārammaṇaṃ taṃ taṃ phalasamāpattiṃ appento vaḍḍheyyāti attho.
atk-s0203a0:710_0: Tassa pana anubrūhantassa atthāya – ajjeva kiccamātappanti kilesānaṃ ātāpanaparitāpanena
atk-s0203a0:710_1: ātappanti laddhanāmaṃ vīriyaṃ ajjeva kātabbaṃ. Ko jaññā maraṇaṃ suveti sve jīvitaṃ
atk-s0203a0:710_2: vā maraṇaṃ vā ko jānāti. Ajjeva dānaṃ vā dassāmi, sīlaṃ vā rakkhissāmi, aññataraṃ
atk-s0203a0:710_3: vā pana kusalaṃ karissāmīti hi “ajja tāva papañco atthi, sve vā punadivase vā karissāmī”ti
atk-s0203a0:710_4: cittaṃ anuppādetvā ajjeva karissāmīti evaṃ vīriyaṃ kātabbanti dasseti. Mahāsenenāti
atk-s0203a0:710_5: aggivisasatthādīni anekāni maraṇakāraṇāni tassa senā, tāya mahatiyā senāya vasena
atk-s0203a0:710_6: mahāsenena evarūpena maccunā saddhiṃ “katipāhaṃ tāva āgamehi yāvāhaṃ buddhapūjādiṃ
atk-s0203a0:710_7: attano avassayakammaṃ karomī”ti. Evaṃ mittasanthavākārasaṅkhāto vā, “idaṃ sataṃ vā
atk-s0203a0:710_8: sahassaṃ vā gahetvā katipāhaṃ āgamehī”ti evaṃ lañjānuppadānasaṅkhāto vā, “imināhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:710_9: balarāsinā paṭibāhissāmī”ti evaṃ balarāsisaṅkhāto vā saṅgaro natthi. Saṅgaroti hi
atk-s0203a0:711_0: Atanditanti analasaṃ uṭṭhāhakaṃ. Evaṃ paṭipannattā bhaddo ekaratto assāti bhaddekaratto.
atk-s0203a0:711_1: Iti taṃ evaṃ paṭipannapuggalaṃ “bhaddekaratto aya”nti. Rāgādīnaṃ santatāya santo
atk-s0203a0:712_0: 273. Evaṃrūpotiādīsu kāḷopi samāno indanīlamaṇivaṇṇo ahosinti evaṃ manuññarūpavaseneva
atk-s0203a0:712_2: saññādīnaṃ vasena evaṃsañño evaṃsaṅkhāro evaṃviññāṇo ahosiṃ atītamaddhānanti.
atk-s0203a0:713: Tattha nandiṃ samanvānetīti tesu rūpādīsu taṇhaṃ samanvāneti anupavatteti. Hīnarūpādivasena pana evaṃrūpo ahosiṃ…pe… evaṃviññāṇo ahosinti na maññati.
atk-s0203a0:714: Nandiṃ na samanvānetīti taṇhaṃ vā taṇhāsampayuttadiṭṭhiṃ vā nānupavattayati.
atk-s0203a0:715: 274. Evaṃrūpo siyantiādīsupi taṃmanuññarūpādivaseneva taṇhādiṭṭhipavattasaṅkhātā nandisamanvānayanāva veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:716_0: 275. Kathañca, bhikkhave, paccuppannesu dhammesu saṃhīratīti idaṃ “paccuppannañca
atk-s0203a0:716_1: yo dhammaṃ, tattha tattha vipassati. Asaṃhīraṃ asaṃkuppa”nti uddesassa niddesatthaṃ
atk-s0203a0:716_2: vuttaṃ. Kāmañcettha “kathañca, bhikkhave, paccuppannaṃ dhammaṃ na vipassatī”tiādi
atk-s0203a0:716_3: vattabbaṃ siyā, yasmā pana asaṃhīrāti ca asaṃkuppāti ca vipassanā vuttā, tasmā tassā
atk-s0203a0:716_4: eva abhāvañca bhāvañca dassetuṃ saṃhīratīti mātikaṃ uddharitvā vitthāro vutto. Tattha
atk-s0203a0:716_5: saṃhīratīti vipassanāya abhāvato taṇhādiṭṭhīhi ākaḍḍhiyati. Na saṃhīratīti vipassanāya
atk-s0203a0:716_6: bhāvena taṇhādiṭṭhīhi nākaḍḍhiyati. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:720: 276. Evaṃ me sutanti ānandabhaddekarattasuttaṃ. Tattha paṭisallānā vuṭṭhitoti phalasamāpattito vuṭṭhito. Ko nu kho, bhikkhaveti jānantova kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ pucchi.
atk-s0203a0:721: 278. Sādhu sādhūti therassa sādhukāramadāsi. Sādhu kho tvanti parimaṇḍalehi padabyañjanehi parisuddhehi kathitattā desanaṃ pasaṃsanto āha. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:725_0: 279. Evaṃ me sutanti mahākaccānabhaddekarattasuttaṃ. Tattha tapodārāmeti tattodakassa
atk-s0203a0:725_1: rahadassa vasena evaṃladdhanāme ārāme. Vebhārapabbatassa kira heṭṭhā bhūmaṭṭhakanāgānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:725_2: pañcayojanasatikaṃ nāgabhavanaṃ devalokasadisaṃ maṇimayena talena ārāmauyyānehi ca
atk-s0203a0:725_3: samannāgataṃ, tattha nāgānaṃ kīḷanaṭṭhāne mahāudakarahado, tato tapodā nāma nadī
atk-s0203a0:725_4: sandati kuthitā uṇhodakā. Kasmā panesā edisā jātā? Rājagahaṃ kira parivāretvā mahā
atk-s0203a0:725_5: petaloko, tattha dvinnaṃ mahālohakumbhinirayānaṃ antarena ayaṃ tapodā āgacchati,
atk-s0203a0:725_6: tasmā sā kuthitā sandati. Vuttampi cetaṃ – “yatāyaṃ, bhikkhave, tapodā sandati, so
atk-s0203a0:725_7: daho acchodako sītodako sātodako setodako suppatittho ramaṇīyo pahūtamacchakacchapo,
atk-s0203a0:725_8: cakkamattāni ca padumāni pupphanti. Apicāyaṃ, bhikkhave, tapodā dvinnaṃ mahānirayānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:725_9: antarikāya āgacchati, tenāyaṃ tapodā kuthitā sandatī”ti. Imassa pana ārāmassa abhisammukhaṭṭhāne
atk-s0203a0:725_10: tato mahāudakarahado jāto, tassa nāmavasenāyaṃ vihāro tapodārāmoti vuccati.
atk-s0203a0:726_0: 280. Samiddhīti tassa kira therassa attabhāvo samiddho abhirūpo pāsādiko, tasmā samiddhitveva
atk-s0203a0:726_1: saṅkhaṃ gato. Ādibrahmacariyakoti maggabrahmacariyassa ādi pubbabhāgappaṭipattibhūto.
atk-s0203a0:726_2: Idaṃ vatvāna sugato uṭṭhāyāsanāti madhupiṇḍikasutte vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:727_0: 282. Iti me cakkhunti imasmiṃ kira sutte bhagavā dvādasāyatanavaseneva mātikaṃ ṭhapesi.
atk-s0203a0:727_1: Theropi “bhagavatā heṭṭhā dvīsu, upari catutthe cāti imesu tīsu suttesu pañcakkhandhavasena
atk-s0203a0:727_2: mātikā ca vibhaṅgo ca kato, idha pana dvādasāyatanavaseneva vibhajanatthaṃ mātikā
atk-s0203a0:727_3: ṭhapitā”ti nayaṃ paṭilabhitvā evamāha. Imaṃ pana nayaṃ labhantena therena bhāriyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:727_4: kataṃ, apade padaṃ dassitaṃ, ākāse padaṃ kataṃ, tena naṃ bhagavā imameva suttaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0203a0:727_5: – “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ saṃkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena
atk-s0203a0:727_6: atthaṃ vibhajantānaṃ yadidaṃ mahākaccāno”ti etadagge ṭhapesi. Ettha pana cakkhūti
atk-s0203a0:727_7: cakkhupasādo. Rūpāti catusamuṭṭhānikarūpā. Iminā nayena sesāyatanānipi veditabbāni.
atk-s0203a0:727_8: Viññāṇanti nikantiviññāṇaṃ. Tadabhinandatīti taṃ cakkhuñceva rūpañca taṇhādiṭṭhivasena
atk-s0203a0:728: Iti me mano ahosi atītamaddhānaṃ iti dhammāti ettha pana manoti bhavaṅgacittaṃ. Dhammāti tebhūmakadhammārammaṇaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:729: 283. Paṇidahatīti patthanāvasena ṭhapesi. Paṇidhānapaccayāti patthanāṭṭhapanakāraṇā. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:733_0: 286. Evaṃ me sutanti lomasakaṅgiyabhaddekarattasuttaṃ. Tattha lomasakaṅgiyoti aṅgathero
atk-s0203a0:733_1: kira nāmesa, kāyassa pana īsakalomasākāratāya lomasakaṅgiyoti pākaṭo jāto. Candano
atk-s0203a0:733_2: devaputtoti kassapasammāsambuddhakāle kiresa candano nāma upāsako aḍḍho mahaddhano
atk-s0203a0:733_3: tīṇi ratanāni catūhi paccayehi pūjetvā devaloke nibbatto, purimanāmena candano devaputtotveva
atk-s0203a0:733_4: saṅkhaṃ gato. Paṇḍukambalasilāyanti rattakambalasilāyaṃ. Tassā kira rattakambalasseva
atk-s0203a0:734_0: Kadā pana tattha bhagavā vihāsīti? Bodhipattito sattame saṃvacchare sāvatthiyaṃ āsāḷhīmāsapuṇṇamāya
atk-s0203a0:734_1: dvādasayojanāya parisāya majjhe yamakapāṭihāriyaṃ katvā oruyha kaṇḍambamūle paññattavarabuddhāsane
atk-s0203a0:734_2: nisīditvā dhammadesanāya mahājanaṃ mahāviduggato uddharitvā buddhā nāma yasmā pāṭihāriyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:734_3: katvā manussapathe na vasanti, tasmā passamānasseva tassa janassa padavīkkamaṃ katvā
atk-s0203a0:734_4: tāvatiṃsabhavane pāricchattakamūle paṇḍukambalasilāyaṃ vassaṃ upagato, tasmiṃ samaye vihāsi.
atk-s0203a0:735_0: Tatra bhagavāti tatra viharanto bhagavā yebhuyyena dasahi cakkavāḷasahassehi sannipatitāhi
atk-s0203a0:735_1: devatāhi parivuto mātaraṃ kāyasakkhiṃ katvā abhidhammapiṭakaṃ kathento gambhīraṃ
atk-s0203a0:735_2: nipuṇaṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ rūpārūpaparicchedakathaṃ paṭivijjhituṃ asakkontānaṃ devānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:735_3: saṃvegajananatthaṃ antarantarā bhaddekarattassa uddesañca vibhaṅgañca abhāsi. Tatrāyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:735_4: devaputto uggaṇhanto imā gāthā saddhiṃ vibhaṅgena uggaṇhi, devattassa pana pamādādhiṭṭhānattā
atk-s0203a0:735_5: dibbehi ārammaṇehi nippīḷiyamāno anupubbena suttaṃ sammuṭṭho gāthāmattameva dhāresi.
atk-s0203a0:735_6: Tenāha “evaṃ kho ahaṃ bhikkhu dhāremi bhaddekarattiyo gāthā”ti.
atk-s0203a0:736: Uggaṇhāhi tvantiādīsu tuṇhībhūto nisīditvā suṇanto uggaṇhāti nāma, vācāya sajjhāyaṃ karonto pariyāpuṇāti nāma, aññesaṃ vācento dhāreti nāma. Sesamettha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:740_0: 289. Evaṃ me sutanti cūḷakammavibhaṅgasuttaṃ. Tattha subhoti so kira dassanīyo ahosi
atk-s0203a0:740_1: pāsādiko, tenassa aṅgasubhatāya subhotveva nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Māṇavoti pana taṃ taruṇakāle
atk-s0203a0:740_2: vohariṃsu, so mahallakakālepi teneva vohārena vohariyati. Todeyyaputtoti todeyyassa
atk-s0203a0:740_3: nāma pasenadirañño purohitabrāhmaṇassa putto. So kira sāvatthiyā avidūre tudigāmo
atk-s0203a0:740_4: nāma atthi, tassa adhipatittā todeyyoti saṅkhaṃ gato. Mahādhano pana hoti sattāsītikoṭivibhavo
atk-s0203a0:740_5: paramamaccharī, “dadato bhogānaṃ aparikkhayo nāma natthī”ti cintetvā kassaci kiñci
atk-s0203a0:743_0: Evaṃ adānameva sikkhāpesi. Dhuravihāre vasato sammāsambuddhassa yāguuḷuṅgamattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:743_1: vā bhattakaṭacchumattaṃ vā adatvā dhanalobhena kālaṃ katvā tasmiṃyeva ghare sunakho
atk-s0203a0:743_2: hutvā nibbatto. Subho taṃ sunakhaṃ ativiya piyāyati, attano bhuñjanakabhattaṃyeva
atk-s0203a0:743_3: bhojeti, ukkhipitvā varasayane sayāpeti. Atha bhagavā ekadivasaṃ paccūsasamaye lokaṃ
atk-s0203a0:743_4: volokento taṃ sunakhaṃ disvā – “todeyyabrāhmaṇo dhanalobhena attanova ghare sunakho
atk-s0203a0:743_5: hutvā nibbatto, ajja mayi subhassa gharaṃ gate maṃ disvā sunakho bhukkāraṃ karissati,
atk-s0203a0:743_6: athassāhaṃ ekaṃ vacanaṃ vakkhāmi, so ‘jānāti maṃ samaṇo gotamo’ti gantvā uddhanaṭṭhāne
atk-s0203a0:743_7: nipajjissati. Tatonidānaṃ subhassa mayā saddhiṃ eko kathāsallāpo bhavissati, so dhammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:743_8: sutvā saraṇesu patiṭṭhahissati, sunakho pana kālaṃ katvā niraye nibbattissatī”ti
atk-s0203a0:743_9: imaṃ māṇavassa saraṇesu patiṭṭhānabhāvaṃ ñatvā bhagavā taṃ divasaṃ sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ
atk-s0203a0:743_10: katvā ekakova gāmaṃ pavisitvā nikkhante māṇave taṃ gharaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi.
atk-s0203a0:744_0: Sunakho bhagavantaṃ disvā bhukkāraṃ karonto bhagavato samīpaṃ gato. Tato naṃ bhagavā
atk-s0203a0:744_1: etadavoca – “todeyya tvaṃ pubbepi maṃ bho bhoti paribhavitvā sunakho jāto, idānipi
atk-s0203a0:744_2: bhukkāraṃ katvā avīciṃ gamissasī”ti. Sunakho taṃ sutvā – “jānāti maṃ samaṇo gotamo”ti
atk-s0203a0:744_3: vippaṭisārī hutvā gīvaṃ onāmetvā uddhanantare chārikāyaṃ nipanno. Manussā ukkhipitvā
atk-s0203a0:744_4: sayane sayāpetuṃ nāsakkhiṃsu. Subho āgantvā – “kenāyaṃ sunakho sayanā oropito”ti
atk-s0203a0:744_5: āha. Manussā na kenacīti vatvā taṃ pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Māṇavo sutvā – “mama pitā brahmaloke
atk-s0203a0:744_6: nibbatto, todeyyo nāma sunakho natthi. Samaṇo pana gotamo pitaraṃ sunakhaṃ karoti,
atk-s0203a0:744_7: yaṃkiñci esa mukhāruḷhaṃ bhāsatī”ti kujjhitvā bhagavantaṃ musāvādena niggahetukāmo
atk-s0203a0:745_0: Bhagavāpi tassa tatheva vatvā avisaṃvādanatthaṃ āha – “atthi pana te māṇava pitarā
atk-s0203a0:745_1: anakkhātaṃ dhana”nti. Atthi, bho gotama, satasahassagghanikā suvaṇṇamālā satasahassagghanikā
atk-s0203a0:745_2: suvaṇṇapādukā satasahassagghanikā suvaṇṇapāti satasahassañca kahāpaṇanti. Gaccha
atk-s0203a0:745_3: taṃ sunakhaṃ appodakapāyāsaṃ bhojāpetvā sayane āropetvā īsakaṃ niddaṃ okkantakāle
atk-s0203a0:745_4: puccha, sabbaṃ te ācikkhissati. Atha naṃ jāneyyāsi “pitā me eso”ti. Māṇavo – “sace
atk-s0203a0:745_5: saccaṃ bhavissati, dhanaṃ lacchāmi, no ce, samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ musāvādena niggaṇhissāmī”ti
atk-s0203a0:745_6: dvīhipi kāraṇehi tuṭṭho gantvā tathā akāsi. Sunakho – “ñātomhi iminā”ti roditvā huṃ
atk-s0203a0:745_7: hunti karonto dhananidhānaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā pādena pathaviṃ khaṇitvā saññaṃ adāsi, māṇavo
atk-s0203a0:745_8: dhanaṃ gahetvā – “bhavapaṭicchannaṃ nāma evaṃ sukhumaṃ paṭisandhiantaraṃ pākaṭaṃ
atk-s0203a0:745_9: samaṇassa gotamassa, addhā esa sabbaññū”ti bhagavati pasannacitto cuddasa pañhe abhisaṅkhari.
atk-s0203a0:745_10: Aṅgavijjāpāṭhako kiresa, tenassa etadahosi – “idaṃ dhammapaṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā samaṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:745_11: gotamaṃ pañhe pucchissāmī”ti dutiyagamanena yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, tena puṭṭhapañhe
atk-s0203a0:746_0: Tattha kammaṃ etesaṃ sakaṃ attano bhaṇḍakanti kammassakā. Kammassa dāyādāti kammadāyādā,
atk-s0203a0:746_1: kammaṃ etesaṃ dāyajjaṃ bhaṇḍakanti attho. Kammaṃ etesaṃ yoni kāraṇanti kammayonī.
atk-s0203a0:746_2: Kammaṃ etesaṃ bandhūti kammabandhū, kammañātakāti attho. Kammaṃ etesaṃ paṭisaraṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:746_3: patiṭṭhāti kammapaṭisaraṇā. Yadidaṃ hīnappaṇītatāyāti yaṃ idaṃ “tvaṃ hīno bhava,
atk-s0203a0:746_4: tvaṃ paṇīto, tvaṃ appāyuko, tvaṃ dīghāyuko…pe… tvaṃ duppañño bhava, tvaṃ paññavā”ti
atk-s0203a0:746_5: evaṃ hīnappaṇītatāya vibhajanaṃ, taṃ na añño koci karoti, kammameva evaṃ satte vibhajatīti
atk-s0203a0:746_6: attho. Na māṇavo kathitassa atthaṃ sañjānāsi, ghanadussapaṭṭenassa mukhaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0203a0:746_7: madhuraṃ purato ṭhapitaṃ viya ahosi. Mānanissito kiresa paṇḍitamānī, attanā samaṃ
atk-s0203a0:746_8: na passati. Athassa “kiṃ samaṇo gotamo katheti, yamahaṃ jānāmi, tadeva kathetīti
atk-s0203a0:746_9: ayaṃ māno mā ahosī”ti mānabhañjanatthaṃ bhagavā “āditova duppaṭivijjhaṃ katvā kathessāmi,
atk-s0203a0:746_10: tato ‘nāhaṃ bho gotama jānāmi, vitthārena me pākaṭaṃ katvā kathethā’ti maṃ yācissati,
atk-s0203a0:746_11: athassāhaṃ yācitakāle kathessāmi, evañcassa sātthakaṃ bhavissatī”ti duppaṭivijjhaṃ katvā kathesi.
atk-s0203a0:747: Idāni so attano appaṭividdhabhāvaṃ pakāsento na kho ahantiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:748_0: 290. Samattenāti paripuṇṇena. Samādinnenāti gahitena parāmaṭṭhena. Appāyukasaṃvattanikā
atk-s0203a0:748_1: esā, māṇava, paṭipadā yadidaṃ pāṇātipātīti yaṃ idaṃ pāṇātipātakammaṃ, esā appāyukasaṃvattanikā paṭipadāti.
atk-s0203a0:749_0: Kathaṃ panesā appāyukataṃ karoti? Cattāri hi kammāni upapīḷakaṃ upacchedakaṃ janakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:749_1: upatthambhakanti. Balavakammena hi nibbattaṃ pavatte upapīḷakaṃ āgantvā atthato evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:749_2: vadati nāma – “sacāhaṃ paṭhamataraṃ jāneyyaṃ, na te idha nibbattituṃ dadeyyaṃ, catūsuyeva
atk-s0203a0:749_3: taṃ apāyesu nibbattāpeyyaṃ. Hotu, tvaṃ yattha katthaci nibbatta, ahaṃ upapīḷakakammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:749_4: nāma taṃ pīḷetvā nirojaṃ niyūsaṃ kasaṭaṃ karissāmī”ti. Tato paṭṭhāya taṃ tādisaṃ
atk-s0203a0:749_5: karoti. Kiṃ karoti? Parissayaṃ upaneti, bhoge vināseti.
atk-s0203a0:750_0: Tattha dārakassa mātukucchiyaṃ nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya mātu assādo vā sukhaṃ vā na
atk-s0203a0:750_1: hoti, mātāpitūnaṃ pīḷāva uppajjati. Evaṃ parissayaṃ upaneti. Dārakassa pana mātukucchimhi
atk-s0203a0:750_2: nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya gehe bhogā udakaṃ patvā loṇaṃ viya rājādīnaṃ vasena nassanti,
atk-s0203a0:750_3: kumbhadohanadhenuyo khīraṃ na denti, sūratā goṇā caṇḍā honti, kāṇā honti, khujjā
atk-s0203a0:750_4: honti, gomaṇḍale rogo patati, dāsādayo vacanaṃ na karonti, vāpitaṃ sassaṃ na jāyati,
atk-s0203a0:750_5: gehagataṃ gehe, araññagataṃ araññe nassati, anupubbena ghāsacchādanamattaṃ dullabhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:750_6: hoti, gabbhaparihāro na hoti, vijātakāle mātuthaññaṃ chijjati, dārako parihāraṃ alabhanto
atk-s0203a0:750_7: pīḷito nirojo niyūso kasaṭo hoti, idaṃ upapīḷakakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0203a0:751_0: Dīghāyukakammena pana nibbattassa upacchedakakammaṃ āgantvā āyuṃ chindati. Yathā
atk-s0203a0:751_1: hi puriso aṭṭhusabhagamanaṃ katvā saraṃ khipeyya tamañño dhanuto vimuttamattaṃ muggarena
atk-s0203a0:751_2: paharitvā tattheva pāteyya, evaṃ dīghāyukakammena nibbattassa upacchedakakammaṃ āyuṃ
atk-s0203a0:751_3: chindati. Kiṃ karoti? Corānaṃ aṭaviṃ paveseti, vāḷamacchodakaṃ otāreti, aññataraṃ
atk-s0203a0:751_4: vā pana saparissayaṭṭhānaṃ upaneti, idaṃ upacchedakakammaṃ nāma, “upaghātaka”ntipi etasseva nāmaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:752: Paṭisandhinibbattakaṃ pana kammaṃ janakakammaṃ nāma. Appabhogakulādīsu nibbattassa bhogasampadādikaraṇena upatthambhakakammaṃ upatthambhakakammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0203a0:753_0: Imesu catūsu purimāni dve akusalāneva, janakaṃ kusalampi akusalampi, upatthambhakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:753_1: kusalameva. Tattha pāṇātipātakammaṃ upacchedakakammena appāyukasaṃvattanikaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:753_2: Pāṇātipātinā vā kataṃ kusalakammaṃ uḷāraṃ na hoti, dīghāyukapaṭisandhiṃ janetuṃ na
atk-s0203a0:753_3: sakkoti. Evaṃ pāṇātipāto appāyukasaṃvattaniko hoti. Paṭisandhimeva vā niyāmetvā appāyukaṃ
atk-s0203a0:753_4: karoti, sanniṭṭhānacetanāya vā niraye nibbattati, pubbāparacetanāhi vuttanayena appāyuko hoti.
atk-s0203a0:754_0: Dīghāyukasaṃvattanikā esā māṇava paṭipadāti ettha parittakammenapi nibbattaṃ pavatte
atk-s0203a0:754_1: etaṃ pāṇātipātā viratikammaṃ āgantvā atthato evaṃ vadati nāma – “sacāhaṃ paṭhamataraṃ
atk-s0203a0:754_2: jāneyyaṃ, na te idha nibbattituṃ dadeyyaṃ, devalokeyeva taṃ nibbattāpeyyaṃ. Hotu,
atk-s0203a0:754_3: tvaṃ yattha katthaci nibbatti, ahaṃ upatthambhakakammaṃ nāma thambhaṃ te karissāmī”ti
atk-s0203a0:754_4: upatthambhaṃ karoti. Kiṃ karoti? Parissayaṃ nāseti, bhoge uppādeti.
atk-s0203a0:755_0: Tattha dārakassa mātukucchiyaṃ nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya mātāpitūnaṃ sukhameva sātameva
atk-s0203a0:755_1: hoti. Yepi pakatiyā manussāmanussaparissayā honti, te sabbe apagacchanti. Evaṃ parissayaṃ
atk-s0203a0:755_2: nāseti. Dārakassa pana mātukucchimhi nibbattakālato paṭṭhāya gehe bhogānaṃ pamāṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:755_3: na hoti, nidhikumbhiyo puratopi pacchatopi gehaṃ pavaṭṭamānā pavisanti. Mātāpitaro
atk-s0203a0:755_4: parehi ṭhapitadhanassāpi sammukhībhāvaṃ gacchanti. Dhenuyo bahukhīrā honti, goṇā
atk-s0203a0:755_5: sukhasīlā honti, vappaṭṭhāne sassāni sampajjanti. Vaḍḍhiyā vā sampayuttaṃ, tāvakālikaṃ
atk-s0203a0:755_6: vā dinnaṃ dhanaṃ acoditā sayameva āharitvā denti, dāsādayo suvacā honti, kammantā
atk-s0203a0:755_7: na parihāyanti. Dārako gabbhato paṭṭhāya parihāraṃ labhati, komārikavejjā sannihitāva
atk-s0203a0:755_8: honti. Gahapatikule jāto seṭṭhiṭṭhānaṃ, amaccakulādīsu jāto senāpatiṭṭhānādīni labhati.
atk-s0203a0:755_9: Evaṃ bhoge uppādeti. So aparissayo sabhogo ciraṃ jīvatīti. Evaṃ apāṇātipātakammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:756_0: Apāṇātipātinā vā kataṃ aññampi kusalaṃ uḷāraṃ hoti, dīghāyukapaṭisandhiṃ janetuṃ
atk-s0203a0:756_1: sakkoti, evampi dīghāyukasaṃvattanikaṃ hoti. Paṭisandhimeva vā niyāmetvā dīghāyukaṃ
atk-s0203a0:756_2: karoti. Sanniṭṭhānacetanāya vā devaloke nibbattati, pubbāparacetanāhi vuttanayena
atk-s0203a0:756_3: dīghāyuko hoti. Iminā nayena sabbapañhavissajjanesu attho veditabbo.
atk-s0203a0:757_0: Viheṭhanakammādīnipi hi pavatte āgantvā atthato tatheva vadamānāni viya upapīḷanena
atk-s0203a0:757_1: nibbhogataṃ āpādetvā paṭijagganaṃ alabhantassa roguppādanādīhi vā, viheṭhakādīhi
atk-s0203a0:757_2: katassa kusalassa anuḷāratāya vā, āditova paṭisandhiniyāmanena vā, vuttanayeneva
atk-s0203a0:757_3: pubbāparacetanāvasena vā bahvābādhatādīni karonti, apāṇātipāto viya ca aviheṭhanādīnipi appābādhatādīnīti.
atk-s0203a0:758_0: 293. Ettha pana issāmanakoti issāsampayuttacitto. Upadussatīti issāvaseneva upakkosanto
atk-s0203a0:758_1: dussati. Issaṃ bandhatīti yavakalāpaṃ bandhanto viya yathā na nassati evaṃ bandhitvā
atk-s0203a0:758_2: viya ṭhapeti. Appesakkhoti appaparivāro, rattiṃ khitto viya saro na paññāyati, ucchiṭṭhahattho
atk-s0203a0:759: 294. Na dātā hotīti macchariyavasena na dātā hoti. Tena kammenāti tena macchariyakammena.
atk-s0203a0:760_0: 295. Abhivādetabbanti abhivādanārahaṃ buddhaṃ vā paccekabuddhaṃ vā ariyasāvakaṃ vā.
atk-s0203a0:760_1: Paccuṭṭhātabbādīsupi eseva nayo. Imasmiṃ pana pañhavissajjane upapīḷakaupatthambhakakammāni
atk-s0203a0:760_2: na gahetabbāni. Na hi pavatte nīcakulinaṃ vā uccākulinaṃ vā sakkā kātuṃ, paṭisandhimeva
atk-s0203a0:760_3: pana niyāmetvā nīcakuliyaṃ kammaṃ nīcakule nibbatteti, uccākuliyaṃ kammaṃ uccākule.
atk-s0203a0:761_0: 296. Na paripucchitā hotīti ettha pana aparipucchanena niraye na nibbattati. Aparipucchako
atk-s0203a0:761_1: pana “idaṃ kātabbaṃ, idaṃ na kātabba”nti na jānāti, ajānanto kātabbaṃ na karoti,
atk-s0203a0:761_2: akātabbaṃ karoti. Tena niraye nibbattati, itaro sagge. Iti kho, māṇava…pe… yadidaṃ
atk-s0203a0:761_3: hīnappaṇītatāyāti satthā desanaṃ yathānusandhiṃ pāpesi. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:766_0: 298. Evaṃ me sutanti mahākammavibhaṅgasuttaṃ. Tattha moghanti tucchaṃ aphalaṃ. Saccanti
atk-s0203a0:766_1: tathaṃ bhūtaṃ. Idañca etena na sammukhā sutaṃ, upālisutte pana – “manokammaṃ mahāsāvajjataraṃ
atk-s0203a0:766_2: paññapemi pāpassa kammassa kiriyāya pāpassa kammassa pavattiyā, no tathā kāyakammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:766_3: no tathā vacīkamma”nti bhagavatā vuttaṃ atthi, sā kathā titthiyānaṃ antare pākaṭā
atk-s0203a0:766_4: jātā, taṃ gahetvā esa vadati. Atthi ca sā samāpattīti idaṃ – “kathaṃ nu kho, bho,
atk-s0203a0:766_5: abhisaññānirodho hotī”ti poṭṭhapādasutte uppannaṃ abhisaññānirodhakathaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0203a0:766_6: vadati. Na kiñci vediyatīti ekavedanampi na vediyati. Atthi ca khoti thero nirodhasamāpattiṃ
atk-s0203a0:766_7: sandhāya anujānāti. Parirakkhitabbanti garahato mocanena rakkhitabbaṃ. Sañcetanā
atk-s0203a0:766_8: assa atthīti sañcetanikaṃ, sābhisandhikaṃ sañcetanikakammaṃ katvāti attho. Dukkhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:766_9: soti thero “akusalameva sandhāya paribbājako pucchatī”ti saññāya evaṃ vadati.
atk-s0203a0:767_0: Dassanampi kho ahanti bhagavā caturaṅgepi andhakāre samantā yojanaṭṭhāne tilamattampi
atk-s0203a0:767_1: saṅkhāraṃ maṃsacakkhunāva passati, ayañca paribbājako na dūre gāvutamattabbhantare
atk-s0203a0:767_2: vasati, kasmā bhagavā evamāhāti? Samāgamadassanaṃ sandhāyevamāha.
atk-s0203a0:768: 299. Udāyīti lāludāyī. Taṃ dukkhasminti sabbaṃ taṃ dukkhameva. Iti imaṃ vaṭṭadukkhaṃ kilesadukkhaṃ saṅkhāradukkhaṃ sandhāya “sace bhāsitaṃ bhaveyya bhagavā”ti pucchati.
atk-s0203a0:769_0: 300. Ummaṅganti pañhāummaṅgaṃ. Ummujjamānoti sīsaṃ nīharamāno. Ayoniso ummujjissatīti
atk-s0203a0:769_1: anupāyena sīsaṃ nīharissati. Idañca pana bhagavā jānanto neva dibbacakkhunā na cetopariyañāṇena
atk-s0203a0:769_2: na sabbaññutañāṇena jāni, adhippāyeneva pana aññāsi. Kathentassa hi adhippāyo nāma
atk-s0203a0:769_3: suvijāno hoti, kathetukāmo gīvaṃ paggaṇhāti, hanukaṃ cāleti, mukhamassa phandati,
atk-s0203a0:769_4: sannisīdituṃ na sakkoti. Bhagavā tassa taṃ ākāraṃ disvā “ayaṃ udāyī sannisīdituṃ
atk-s0203a0:769_5: na sakkoti, yaṃ abhūtaṃ, tadeva kathessatī”ti oloketvāva aññāsi. Ādiṃ yevātiādimhiyeva.
atk-s0203a0:769_6: Tisso vedanāti “kiṃ so vediyatī”ti? Pucchantena “tisso vedanā pucchāmī”ti evaṃ vavatthapetvāva
atk-s0203a0:769_7: tisso vedanā pucchitā. Sukhavedaniyanti sukhavedanāya paccayabhūtaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0203a0:770_0: Ettha ca kāmāvacarakusalato somanassasahagatacittasampayuttā catasso cetanā, heṭṭhā
atk-s0203a0:770_1: tikajjhānacetanāti evaṃ paṭisandhipavattesu sukhavedanāya jananato sukhavedaniyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:770_2: kammaṃ nāma. Kāmāvacarañcettha paṭisandhiyaṃyeva ekantena sukhaṃ janeti, pavatte
atk-s0203a0:771_0: Akusalacetanā paṭisandhipavattesu dukkhasseva jananato dukkhavedaniyaṃ kammaṃ nāma.
atk-s0203a0:771_1: Kāyadvāre pavatteyeva cetaṃ ekantena dukkhaṃ janeti, aññattha adukkhamasukhampi,
atk-s0203a0:771_2: sā pana vedanā aniṭṭhāniṭṭhamajjhattesuyeva ārammaṇesu uppajjanato dukkhātveva saṅkhaṃ gatā.
atk-s0203a0:772_0: Kāmāvacarakusalato pana upekkhāsahagatacittasampayuttā catasso cetanā, rūpāvacarakusalato
atk-s0203a0:772_1: catutthajjhānacetanāti evaṃ paṭisandhipavattesu tatiyavedanāya jananato adukkhamasukhavedaniyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:772_2: kammaṃ nāma. Ettha ca kāmāvacaraṃ paṭisandhiyaṃyeva ekantena adukkhamasukhaṃ janeti,
atk-s0203a0:772_3: pavatte iṭṭhārammaṇe sukhampi. Apica sukhavedaniyakammaṃ paṭisandhipavattivasena
atk-s0203a0:772_4: vaṭṭati, tathā adukkhamasukhavedaniyaṃ, dukkhavedaniyaṃ pavattivaseneva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0203a0:772_5: Etassa pana vasena sabbaṃ pavattivaseneva vaṭṭati.
atk-s0203a0:773_0: Etassa bhagavāti thero tathāgatena mahākammavibhaṅgakathanatthaṃ ālayo dassito, tathāgataṃ
atk-s0203a0:773_1: yācitvā mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa pākaṭaṃ karissāmīti cintetvā anusandhikusalatāya
atk-s0203a0:773_2: evamāha. Tattha mahākammavibhaṅganti mahākammavibhajanaṃ. Katame cattāro…pe… idhānanda,
atk-s0203a0:773_3: ekacco puggalo…pe… nirayaṃ upapajjatīti idaṃ na mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇabhājanaṃ, mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇabhājanatthāya
atk-s0203a0:774_0: 301. Idhānanda, ekacco samaṇo vāti pāṭiyekko anusandhi. Idañhi bhagavā – “dibbacakkhukā
atk-s0203a0:774_1: samaṇabrāhmaṇā idaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā imaṃ paccayaṃ labhitvā idaṃ dassanaṃ gaṇhantī”ti
atk-s0203a0:774_2: pakāsanatthaṃ ārabhi. Tattha ātappantiādīni pañcapi vīriyasseva nāmāni. Cetosamādhinti
atk-s0203a0:774_3: dibbacakkhusamādhiṃ. Passatīti “so satto kuhiṃ nibbatto”ti olokento passati. Ye aññathāti
atk-s0203a0:774_4: ye “dasannaṃ kusalānaṃ kammapathānaṃ pūritattā nirayaṃ upapajjatī”ti jānanti, micchā
atk-s0203a0:774_5: tesaṃ ñāṇanti vadati. Iminā nayena sabbavāresu attho veditabbo. Viditanti pākaṭaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:774_6: Thāmasāti diṭṭhithāmena. Parāmāsāti diṭṭhiparāmāsena. Abhinivissa voharatīti adhiṭṭhahitvā ādiyitvā voharati.
atk-s0203a0:775_0: 302. Tatrānandāti idampi na mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇassa bhājanaṃ, atha khvāssa mātikāṭṭhapanameva.
atk-s0203a0:775_1: Ettha pana etesaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ vacane ettakā anuññātā, ettakā ananuññātāti idaṃ
atk-s0203a0:775_2: dassitaṃ. Tattha tatrāti tesu catūsu samaṇabrāhmaṇesu. Idamassāti idaṃ vacanaṃ assa.
atk-s0203a0:775_3: Aññathāti aññenākārena. Iti imesaṃ samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ vāde dvīsu ṭhānesu anuññātā,
atk-s0203a0:775_4: tīsu ananuññātāti evaṃ sabbattha anuññā nānuññā veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:776: 303. Evaṃ dibbacakkhukānaṃ vacane anuññā ca ananuññā ca dassetvā idāni mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇaṃ vibhajanto tatrānanda, yvāyaṃ puggalotiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:777_0: Pubbe vāssa taṃ kataṃ hotīti yaṃ iminā dibbacakkhukena kammaṃ karonto diṭṭho, tato
atk-s0203a0:777_1: pubbe kataṃ. Pubbe katenapi hi niraye nibbattati, pacchā katenapi nibbattati, maraṇakāle
atk-s0203a0:777_2: vā pana – “khando seṭṭho sivo seṭṭho, pitāmaho seṭṭho, issarādīhi vā loko visaṭṭho”tiādinā
atk-s0203a0:777_3: micchādassanenapi nibbattateva. Diṭṭheva dhammeti yaṃ tattha diṭṭhadhammavedanīyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:777_4: hoti, tassa diṭṭheva dhamme, yaṃ upapajjavedanīyaṃ, tassa upapajjitvā, yaṃ aparāpariyavedanīyaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:778_0: Iti ayaṃ samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā ekaṃ kammarāsiṃ ekañca vipākarāsiṃ addasa, sammāsambuddho
atk-s0203a0:778_1: iminā adiṭṭhe tayo kammarāsī, dve ca vipākarāsī addasa. Iminā pana diṭṭhe adiṭṭhe
atk-s0203a0:778_2: ca cattāro kammarāsī tayo ca vipākarāsī addasa. Imāni satta ṭhānāni jānanañāṇaṃ tathāgatassa
atk-s0203a0:778_3: mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇaṃ nāma. Dutiyavāre dibbacakkhukena kiñci na diṭṭhaṃ, tathāgatena
atk-s0203a0:778_4: pana tayo kammarāsī, dve ca vipākarāsī diṭṭhāti. Imānipi pañca paccattaṭṭhānāni jānanañāṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:778_5: tathāgatassa mahākammavibhaṅgañāṇaṃ nāma. Sesavāradvayepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0203a0:779_0: Abhabbanti bhūtavirahitaṃ akusalaṃ. Abhabbābhāsanti abhabbaṃ ābhāsati abhibhavati
atk-s0203a0:779_1: paṭibāhatīti attho. Bahukasmiñhi akusalakamme āyūhite balavakammaṃ dubbalakammassa
atk-s0203a0:779_2: vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti idaṃ abhabbañceva abhabbābhāsañca.
atk-s0203a0:779_3: Kusalaṃ pana āyūhitvā āsanne akusalaṃ kataṃ hoti, taṃ kusalassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā
atk-s0203a0:779_4: attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti, idaṃ abhabbaṃ bhabbābhāsaṃ. Bahumhi kusale āyūhitepi
atk-s0203a0:779_5: balavakammaṃ dubbalakammassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti,
atk-s0203a0:779_6: idaṃ bhabbañceva bhabbābhāsañca. Akusalaṃ pana āyūhitvā āsanne kusalaṃ kataṃ hoti,
atk-s0203a0:779_7: taṃ akusalassa vipākaṃ paṭibāhitvā attano vipākassa okāsaṃ karoti, idaṃ bhabbaṃ abhabbābhāsaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:780_0: Apica upaṭṭhānākārenapettha attho veditabbo. Idañhi vuttaṃ hoti, abhabbato ābhāsati
atk-s0203a0:780_1: upaṭṭhātīti abhabbābhāsaṃ. Tattha “yvāyaṃ puggalo idha pāṇātipātī”tiādinā nayena
atk-s0203a0:780_2: cattāro puggalā vuttā, tesu paṭhamassa kammaṃ abhabbaṃ abhabbābhāsaṃ, tañhi akusalattā
atk-s0203a0:780_3: abhabbaṃ, tassa ca niraye nibbattattā tattha nibbattikāraṇabhūtaṃ akusalaṃ hutvā
atk-s0203a0:780_4: upaṭṭhāti. Dutiyassa kammaṃ abhabbaṃ bhabbābhāsaṃ, tañhi akusalattā abhabbaṃ. Tassa
atk-s0203a0:780_5: pana sagge nibbattattā aññatitthiyānaṃ sagge nibbattikāraṇabhūtaṃ kusalaṃ hutvā upaṭṭhāti.
atk-s0203a0:780_6: Itarasmimpi kammadvaye eseva nayo. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:784_0: 304. Evaṃ me sutanti saḷāyatanavibhaṅgasuttaṃ. Tattha veditabbānīti sahavipassanena
atk-s0203a0:784_1: maggena jānitabbāni. Manopavicārāti vitakkavicārā. Vitakkuppādakañhi mano idha manoti
atk-s0203a0:784_2: adhippetaṃ, manassa upavicārāti manopavicārā. Sattapadāti vaṭṭavivaṭṭanissitānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:784_3: sattānaṃ padā. Ettha hi aṭṭhārasa vaṭṭapadā nāma, aṭṭhārasa vivaṭṭapadā nāma, tepi
atk-s0203a0:784_5: dametabbadamakānanti attho. Sesaṃ vibhaṅgeyeva āvibhavissati. Ayamuddesoti idaṃ mātikāṭṭhapanaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:785_1: dve cakkhuviññāṇāni. Sesapasādaviññāṇesupi eseva nayo. Imāni pana dasa ṭhapetvā sesaṃ
atk-s0203a0:786: Cakkhusamphassoti cakkhumhi samphasso. Cakkhuviññāṇasampayuttasamphassassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. Sesesupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0203a0:787_0: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvāti cakkhuviññāṇena rūpaṃ disvā. Eseva nayo sabbattha. Somanassaṭṭhāniyanti
atk-s0203a0:787_1: somanassassa ārammaṇavasena kāraṇabhūtaṃ. Upavicaratīti tattha vicārapavattanena
atk-s0203a0:787_2: upavicarati, vitakko taṃsampayutto cāti iminā nayena aṭṭhārasa vitakkavicārasaṅkhātā
atk-s0203a0:787_3: manopavicārā veditabbā. Cha somanassūpavicārāti ettha pana somanassena saddhiṃ upavicarantīti
atk-s0203a0:788_1: pariyesitānaṃ. Kantānanti kāmitānaṃ. Manoramānanti mano etesu ramatīti manoramāni,
atk-s0203a0:788_2: tesaṃ manoramānaṃ. Lokāmisapaṭisaṃyuttānanti taṇhāpaṭisaṃyuttānaṃ. Atītanti paṭiladdhaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:788_3: Paccuppannaṃ tāva ārabbha somanassaṃ uppajjatu, atīte kathaṃ uppajjatīti. Atītepi
atk-s0203a0:788_4: – “yathāhaṃ etarahi iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ anubhavāmi, evaṃ pubbepi anubhavi”nti anussarantassa
atk-s0203a0:789_1: vigacchanena virāgaṃ, nirujjhanena nirodhaṃ. Sammapaññāyāti vipassanāpaññāya. Idaṃ
atk-s0203a0:789_2: vuccati nekkhammasitaṃ somanassanti idaṃ rañño viya attano sirisampattiṃ olokentassa
atk-s0203a0:789_3: vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nisinnassa saṅkhārānaṃ bhedaṃ passato saṅkhāragatamhi tikkhe
atk-s0203a0:789_4: sūre vipassanāñāṇe vahante uppannasomanassaṃ “nekkhammasitaṃ somanassa”nti vuccati. Vuttampi cetaṃ –
atk-s0203a0:791: Amānusī ratī hoti, sammā dhammaṃ vipassato.
atk-s0203a0:794: Imānīti imāni chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate aniccādivasena vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā nisinnassa uppannāni cha nekkhammasitāni somanassāni.
atk-s0203a0:795_0: 307. Atītanti paccuppannaṃ tāva patthetvā alabhantassa domanassaṃ uppajjatu, atīte
atk-s0203a0:795_1: kathaṃ uppajjatīti. Atītepi “yathāhaṃ etarahi iṭṭhārammaṇaṃ patthetvā na labhāmi,
atk-s0203a0:795_2: evaṃ pubbepi patthetvā na labhi”nti anussarantassa balavadomanassaṃ uppajjati.
atk-s0203a0:796_0: Anuttaresu vimokkhesūti anuttaravimokkho nāma arahattaṃ, arahatte patthanaṃ paṭṭhapentassāti
atk-s0203a0:796_1: attho. Āyatananti arahattāyatanaṃ. Pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayatoti patthanaṃ paṭṭhapentassa.
atk-s0203a0:796_2: Taṃ panetaṃ patthanaṃ paṭṭhapentassa uppajjati, iti patthanāmūlakattā “pihaṃ upaṭṭhāpayato”ti
atk-s0203a0:796_3: vuttaṃ. Imāni cha nekkhammasitāni domanassānīti imāni evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe
atk-s0203a0:796_4: āpāthagate arahatte pihaṃ paṭṭhapetvā tadadhigamāya aniccādivasena vipassanaṃ upaṭṭhapetvā
atk-s0203a0:796_5: ussukkāpetuṃ asakkontassa – “imampi pakkhaṃ imampi māsaṃ imampi saṃvaccharaṃ arahattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:796_6: pāpuṇituṃ nāsakkhi”nti anusocato gāmantapabbhāravāsimahāsīvattherassa viya assudhārāpavattanavasena
atk-s0203a0:796_7: uppannadomanassāni cha nekkhammasitadomanassānīti veditabbāni. Vatthu pana sumaṅgalavilāsiniyā
atk-s0203a0:796_8: dīghanikāyaṭṭhakathāya sakkapañhavaṇṇanāyaṃ vitthāritaṃ, icchantena tato gahetabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:797_0: 308. Uppajjati upekkhāti ettha upekkhā nāma aññāṇupekhā. Anodhijinassāti kilesodhiṃ
atk-s0203a0:797_1: jinitvā ṭhitattā khīṇāsavo odhijino nāma, tasmā akhīṇāsavassāti attho. Avipākajinassāti
atk-s0203a0:797_2: etthapi āyatiṃ vipākaṃ jinitvā ṭhitattā khīṇāsavova vipākajino nāma, tasmā akhīṇāsavassevāti
atk-s0203a0:797_3: attho. Anādīnavadassāvinotiādīnavato upaddavato apassantassa. Imā cha gehasitā upekkhāti
atk-s0203a0:797_4: imā evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhārammaṇe āpāthagate guḷapiṇḍake nilīnamakkhikā viya rūpādīni
atk-s0203a0:797_5: anativattamānā tattha laggā laggitā hutvā uppannā upekkhā cha gehasitā upekkhāti veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:798_0: Rūpaṃ sā ativattatīti rūpaṃ sā anatikkamati, tattha nikantivasena na tiṭṭhati. Imā
atk-s0203a0:798_1: cha nekkhammasitā upekkhāti imā evaṃ chasu dvāresu iṭṭhādiārammaṇe āpāthagate iṭṭhe
atk-s0203a0:798_2: arajjantassa, aniṭṭhe adussantassa, asamapekkhane asammuyhantassa, uppannavipassanā-ñāṇasampayuttā
atk-s0203a0:799_0: 309. Tatra idaṃ nissāya idaṃ pajahathāti tesu chattiṃsasattapadesu aṭṭhārasa nissāya
atk-s0203a0:799_1: aṭṭhārasa pajahathāti attho. Teneva – “tatra, bhikkhave, yāni cha nekkhammasitānī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:799_2: Nissāya āgammāti pavattanavasena nissāya ceva āgamma ca. Evametesaṃ samatikkamo hotīti
atk-s0203a0:799_3: evaṃ nekkhammasitānaṃ pavattanena gehasitāni atikkantāni nāma honti.
atk-s0203a0:800_0: Evaṃ sarikkhakeneva sarikkhakaṃ jahāpetvā idāni balavatā dubbalaṃ jahāpento – “tatra,
atk-s0203a0:800_1: bhikkhave, yāni cha nekkhammasitāni somanassānī”tiādimāha. Evaṃ nekkhammasitasomanassehi
atk-s0203a0:801_0: Ettha pana ṭhatvā upekkhākathā veditabbā – aṭṭhasu hi samāpattīsu paṭhamādīni ca
atk-s0203a0:801_1: tīṇi jhānāni, suddhasaṅkhāre ca pādake katvā vipassanaṃ āraddhānaṃ catunnaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:801_2: pubbabhāgavipassanā somanassasahagatā vā hoti upekkhāsahagatā vā, vuṭṭhānagāminī
atk-s0203a0:801_3: pana somanassasahagatāva. Catutthajjhānādīni pādakāni katvā vipassanaṃ āraddhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:801_4: pañcannaṃ pubbabhāgavipassanā purimasadisāva. Vuṭṭhānagāminī pana upekkhāsahagatā
atk-s0203a0:801_5: hoti. Idaṃ sandhāya – “yā cha nekkhammasitā upekkhā, tā nissāya tā āgamma, yāni cha
atk-s0203a0:801_6: nekkhammasitāni somanassāni, tāni pajahathā”ti vuttaṃ. Na kevalañca evaṃpaṭipannassa
atk-s0203a0:801_7: bhikkhuno ayaṃ vipassanāya vedanāvisesova hoti, ariyamaggepi pana jhānaṅgabojjhaṅgamaggaṅgānampi viseso hoti.
atk-s0203a0:802_0: Ko panetaṃ visesaṃ niyameti? Keci tāva therā vipassanāpādakajjhānaṃ niyametīti vadanti,
atk-s0203a0:802_1: keci vipassanāya ārammaṇabhūtā khandhā niyamentīti vadanti, keci puggalajjhāsayo
atk-s0203a0:802_2: niyametīti vadanti. Tesampi vāde ayameva pubbabhāge vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanā niyametīti
atk-s0203a0:802_3: veditabbā. Vinicchayakathā panettha visuddhimagge saṅkhārupekkhāniddese vuttāva.
atk-s0203a0:803_0: 310. Nānattāti nānā bahū anekappakārā. Nānattasitāti nānārammaṇanissitā. Ekattāti
atk-s0203a0:803_1: ekā. Ekattasitāti ekārammaṇanissitā. Katamā panāyaṃ upekkhāti? Heṭṭhā tāva aññāṇupekkhā
atk-s0203a0:803_2: vuttā, upari chaḷaṅgupekkhā vakkhati, idha samathaupekkhā, vipassanupekkhāti dve upekkhā gahitā.
atk-s0203a0:804_0: Tattha yasmā aññāva rūpesu upekkhā, aññāva saddādīsu, na hi yā rūpe upekkhā, sā saddādīsu
atk-s0203a0:804_1: hoti. Rūpe upekkhā ca rūpameva ārammaṇaṃ karoti, na saddādayo. Rūpe upekkhābhāvañca
atk-s0203a0:804_2: aññā samathaupekkhā pathavīkasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā uppajjati, aññā āpokasiṇādīni.
atk-s0203a0:804_3: Tasmā nānattaṃ nānattasitaṃ vibhajanto atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhā rūpesūtiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:804_4: Yasmā pana dve vā tīṇi vā ākāsānañcāyatanāni vā viññāṇañcāyatanādīni vā natthi, tasmā
atk-s0203a0:804_5: ekattaṃ ekattasitaṃ vibhajanto atthi, bhikkhave, upekkhā ākāsānañcāyatananissitātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:805_1: vipassantassa vipassanupekkhā ārammaṇavasena ākāsānañcāyatananissitā. Sesāsupi eseva nayo.
atk-s0203a0:806: Taṃ pajahathāti ettha arūpāvacarasamāpattiupekkhāya rūpāvacarasamāpattiupekkhaṃ pajahāpeti, arūpāvacaravipassanupekkhāya rūpāvacaravipassanupekkhaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:807_0: Atammayatanti ettha tammayatā nāma taṇhā, tassā pariyādānato vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanā
atk-s0203a0:807_1: atammayatāti vuccati. Taṃ pajahathāti idha vuṭṭhānagāminīvipassanāya arūpāvacarasamāpattiupekkhañca
atk-s0203a0:808_0: 311. Yadariyoti ye satipaṭṭhāne ariyo sammāsambuddho sevati. Tattha tīsu ṭhānesu
atk-s0203a0:808_1: satiṃ paṭṭhapento satipaṭṭhāne sevatīti veditabbo. Na sussūsantīti saddahitvā sotuṃ
atk-s0203a0:808_2: na icchanti. Na aññāti jānanatthāya cittaṃ na upaṭṭhapenti. Vokkammāti atikkamitvā.
atk-s0203a0:808_3: Satthu sāsanāti satthu ovādaṃ gahetabbaṃ pūretabbaṃ na maññantīti attho. Na ca attamanoti
atk-s0203a0:808_4: na sakamano. Ettha ca gehasitadomanassavasena appatīto hotīti na evamattho daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0203a0:808_5: appaṭipannakesu pana attamanatākāraṇassa abhāvenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Anavassutoti paṭighaavassavena
atk-s0203a0:808_6: anavassuto. Sato sampajānoti satiyā ca ñāṇena ca samannāgato. Upekkhakoti chaḷaṅgupekkhāya
atk-s0203a0:808_7: upekkhako. Attamanoti idhāpi gehasitasomanassavasena uppilāvitoti na evamattho daṭṭhabbo,
atk-s0203a0:808_8: paṭipannakesu pana anattamanatākāraṇassa abhāvenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Anavassutoti rāgāvassavena anavassuto.
atk-s0203a0:809_0: 312. Sāritoti damito. Ekameva disaṃ dhāvatīti anivattitvā dhāvanto ekaṃyeva disaṃ
atk-s0203a0:809_1: dhāvati, nivattitvā pana aparaṃ dhāvituṃ sakkoti. Aṭṭha disā vidhāvatīti ekapallaṅkena
atk-s0203a0:809_2: nisinno kāyena anivattitvāva vimokkhavasena ekappahāreneva aṭṭha disā vidhāvati,
atk-s0203a0:809_3: puratthābhimukho vā dakkhiṇādīsu aññataradisābhimukho vā nisīditvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo
atk-s0203a0:813_0: 313. Evaṃ me sutanti uddesavibhaṅgasuttaṃ. Tattha uddesavibhaṅganti uddesañca vibhaṅgañca,
atk-s0203a0:813_1: mātikañca vibhajanañcāti attho. Upaparikkheyyāti tuleyya tīreyya pariggaṇheyya paricchindeyya.
atk-s0203a0:813_2: Bahiddhāti bahiddhāārammaṇesu. Avikkhittaṃ avisaṭanti nikantivasena ārammaṇe tiṭṭhamānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:813_3: vikkhittaṃ visaṭaṃ nāma hoti, taṃ paṭisedhento evamāha. Ajjhattaṃ asaṇṭhitanti gocarajjhatte
atk-s0203a0:813_4: nikantivasena asaṇṭhitaṃ. Anupādāya na paritasseyyāti anupādiyitvā aggahetvā taṃ
atk-s0203a0:813_5: viññāṇaṃ na paritasseyya. Yathā viññāṇaṃ bahiddhā avikkhittaṃ avisaṭaṃ, ajjhattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:813_6: asaṇṭhitaṃ anupādāya na paritasseyya, evaṃ bhikkhu upaparikkheyyāti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:813_7: Jātijarāmaraṇadukkhasamudayasambhavoti jātijarāmaraṇassa ceva avasesassa ca dukkhassa
atk-s0203a0:815: 318. Evaṃ kho, āvuso, ajjhattaṃ asaṇṭhitanti nikantivasena asaṇṭhitaṃ. Nikantivasena hi atiṭṭhamānaṃ hānabhāgiyaṃ na hoti, visesabhāgiyameva hoti.
atk-s0203a0:816_0: 320. Anupādā paritassanāti satthārā khandhiyavagge “upādāparitassanañca vo, bhikkhave,
atk-s0203a0:816_1: desessāmi anupādāaparitassanañcā”ti evaṃ gahetvā paritassanā, aggahetvāva aparitassanā
atk-s0203a0:816_2: ca kathitā, taṃ mahāthero upādāparitassanameva anupādāparitassananti katvā dassento
atk-s0203a0:816_3: evamāha. Kathaṃ panesā anupādāparitassanā hotīti. Upādātabbassa abhāvato. Yadi hi
atk-s0203a0:816_4: koci saṅkhāro nicco vā dhuvo vā attā vā attaniyo vāti gahetabbayuttako abhavissa,
atk-s0203a0:816_5: ayaṃ paritassanā upādāparitassanāva assa. Yasmā pana evaṃ upādātabbo saṅkhāro nāma
atk-s0203a0:816_6: natthi, tasmā rūpaṃ attātiādinā nayena rūpādayo upādinnāpi anupādinnāva honti. Evamesā
atk-s0203a0:816_7: diṭṭhivasena upādāparitassanāpi samānā atthato anupādāparitassanāyeva nāma hotīti veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:817_0: Aññathā hotīti parivattati pakatijahanena nassati, rūpavipariṇāmānuparivattīti “mama
atk-s0203a0:817_1: rūpaṃ vipariṇata”nti vā, “yaṃ ahu, taṃ vata me natthī”ti vā ādinā nayena kammaviññāṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:817_2: rūpassa bhedānuparivatti hoti. Vipariṇāmānuparivattajāti vipariṇāmassa anuparivattanato
atk-s0203a0:817_3: vipariṇāmārammaṇacittato jātā. Paritassanā dhammasamuppādāti taṇhāparitassanā ca
atk-s0203a0:817_4: akusaladhammasamuppādā ca. Cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantīti kusalacittaṃ pariyādiyitvā
atk-s0203a0:817_5: gahetvā khepetvā tiṭṭhanti. Uttāsavāti bhayatāsenapi sauttāso taṇhātāsenapi sauttāso.
atk-s0203a0:817_6: Vighātavāti savighāto sadukkho. Apekkhavāti sālayo sasineho. Evaṃ kho, āvuso, anupādā
atk-s0203a0:817_7: paritassanā hotīti evaṃ maṇikaraṇḍakasaññāya tucchakaraṇḍakaṃ gahetvā tasmiṃ naṭṭhe
atk-s0203a0:817_8: pacchā vighātaṃ āpajjantassa viya pacchā aggahetvā paritassanā hoti.
atk-s0203a0:818: 321. Na ca rūpavipariṇāmānuparivattīti khīṇāsavassa kammaviññāṇameva natthi, tasmā rūpabhedānuparivatti na hoti. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:822_0: 323. Evaṃ me sutanti araṇavibhaṅgasuttaṃ. Tattha nevussādeyya na apasādeyyāti gehasitavasena
atk-s0203a0:822_1: kañci puggalaṃ neva ukkhipeyya na avakkhipeyya. Dhammameva deseyyāti sabhāvameva
atk-s0203a0:822_2: katheyya. Sukhavinicchayanti vinicchitasukhaṃ. Raho vādanti parammukhā avaṇṇaṃ, pisuṇavācanti
atk-s0203a0:822_3: attho. Sammukhā na khīṇanti sammukhāpi khīṇaṃ ākiṇṇaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhaṃ vācaṃ na bhaṇeyya.
atk-s0203a0:822_4: Nābhiniveseyyāti na adhiṭṭhahitvā ādāya vohareyya. Samaññanti lokasamaññaṃ lokapaṇṇattiṃ.
atk-s0203a0:823_1: Sadukkhoti vipākadukkhena saṃkilesadukkhenapi sadukkho. Saupaghātoti vipākūpaghātakilesūpaghāteheva
atk-s0203a0:823_2: saupaghāto. Tathā sapariḷāho. Micchāpaṭipadāti ayāthāvapaṭipadā akusalapaṭipadā.
atk-s0203a0:824: 326. Ittheke apasādetīti evaṃ gehasitavasena ekacce puggale apasādeti. Ussādanepi eseva nayo. Bhavasaṃyojananti bhavabandhanaṃ, taṇhāyetaṃ nāmaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:825_0: Subhūtitthero kira imaṃ catukkaṃ nissāya etadagge ṭhapito. Bhagavato hi dhammaṃ desentassa
atk-s0203a0:825_1: puggalānaṃ ussādanāapasādanā paññāyanti, tathā sāriputtattherādīnaṃ. Subhūtittherassa
atk-s0203a0:825_2: pana dhammadesanāya “ayaṃ puggalo appaṭipannako anārādhako”ti vā, “ayaṃ sīlavā guṇavā
atk-s0203a0:825_3: lajjipesalo ācārasampanno”ti vā natthi, dhammadesanāya panassa “ayaṃ micchāpaṭipadā,
atk-s0203a0:825_4: ayaṃ sammāpaṭipadā”tveva paññāyati. Tasmā bhagavā “etadaggaṃ, bhikkhave, mama sāvakānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:826: 329. Kālaññū assāti asampatte ca atikkante ca kāle akathetvā “idāni vuccamānaṃ mahājano gaṇhissatī”ti yuttapattakālaṃ ñatvāva parammukhā avaṇṇaṃ bhāseyya. Khīṇavādepi eseva nayo.
atk-s0203a0:827: 330. Upahaññatīti ghātiyati. Saropi upahaññatīti saddopi bhijjati. Āturīyatīti āturo hoti gelaññappatto sābādho. Avissaṭṭhanti vissaṭṭhaṃ apalibuddhaṃ na hoti.
atk-s0203a0:828_0: 331. Tadevāti taṃyeva bhājanaṃ. Abhinivissa voharatīti pattanti sañjānanajanapadaṃ
atk-s0203a0:828_1: gantvā “pattaṃ āharatha dhovathā”ti sutvā “andhabālaputhujjano, nayidaṃ pattaṃ, pāti
atk-s0203a0:828_2: namesā, evaṃ vadāhī”ti abhinivissa voharati. Evaṃ sabbapadehi yojetabbaṃ. Atisāroti atidhāvanaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:829_0: 332. Tathā tathā voharati aparāmasanti amhākaṃ janapade bhājanaṃ pātīti vuccati,
atk-s0203a0:829_1: ime pana naṃ pattanti vadantīti tato paṭṭhāya janapadavohāraṃ muñcitvā pattaṃ pattanteva
atk-s0203a0:830_0: 333. Idāni mariyādabhājanīyaṃ karonto tatra, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha saraṇoti
atk-s0203a0:830_1: sarajo sakileso. Araṇoti arajo nikkileso. Subhūti ca pana, bhikkhaveti ayaṃ thero
atk-s0203a0:830_2: dvīsu ṭhānesu etadaggaṃ āruḷho “araṇavihārīnaṃ yadidaṃ subhūti, dakkhiṇeyyānaṃ yadidaṃ subhūtī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:831_0: Dhammasenāpati kira vatthuṃ sodheti, subhūtitthero dakkhiṇaṃ sodheti. Tathā hi dhammasenāpati
atk-s0203a0:831_1: piṇḍāya caranto gehadvāre ṭhito yāva bhikkhaṃ āharanti, tāva pubbabhāge paricchinditvā
atk-s0203a0:831_2: nirodhaṃ samāpajjati, nirodhā vuṭṭhāya deyyadhammaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti. Subhūtitthero ca
atk-s0203a0:831_3: tatheva mettājhānaṃ samāpajjati, mettājhānā vuṭṭhāya deyyadhammaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti. Evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:831_4: pana kātuṃ sakkāti. Āma sakkā, neva acchariyañcetaṃ, yaṃ mahābhiññappattā sāvakā
atk-s0203a0:831_5: evaṃ kareyyuṃ. Imasmimpi hi tambapaṇṇidīpe porāṇakarājakāle piṅgalabuddharakkhitatthero
atk-s0203a0:831_6: nāma uttaragāmaṃ nissāya vihāsi. Tattha satta kulasatāni honti, ekampi taṃ kuladvāraṃ
atk-s0203a0:831_7: natthi, yattha thero samāpattiṃ na samāpajji. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:835_0: 342. Evaṃ me sutanti dhātuvibhaṅgasuttaṃ. Tattha cārikanti turitagamanacārikaṃ. Sace
atk-s0203a0:835_1: te bhaggava agarūti sace tuyhaṃ bhāriyaṃ aphāsukaṃ kiñci natthi. Sace so anujānātīti
atk-s0203a0:835_2: bhaggavassa kira etadahosi – “pabbajitā nāma nānāajjhāsayā, eko gaṇābhirato hoti,
atk-s0203a0:835_3: eko ekābhirato. Sace so ekābhirato bhavissati, ‘āvuso, mā pāvisi, mayā sālā laddhā’ti
atk-s0203a0:835_4: vakkhati. Sace ayaṃ ekābhirato bhavissati, ‘āvuso, nikkhama, mayā sālā laddhā’ti
atk-s0203a0:835_5: vakkhati. Evaṃ sante ahaṃ ubhinnaṃ vivādakāretā nāma bhavissāmi, dinnaṃ nāma dinnameva
atk-s0203a0:836: Kulaputtoti jātikulaputtopi ācārakulaputtopi. Vāsūpagatoti vāsaṃ upagato. Kuto āgantvāti? Takkasīlanagarato.
atk-s0203a0:837_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – majjhimappadese kira rājagahanagare bimbisāre rajjaṃ kārente
atk-s0203a0:837_1: paccante takkasīlanagare pukkusāti rājā rajjaṃ kāresi. Atha takkasīlato bhaṇḍaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0203a0:837_2: vāṇijā rājagahaṃ āgatā paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā rājānaṃ addasaṃsu. Rājā te vanditvā ṭhite
atk-s0203a0:837_3: “katthavāsino tumhe”ti pucchi. Takkasīlavāsino devāti. Atha ne rājā janapadassa khemasubhikkhatādīni
atk-s0203a0:837_4: nagarassa ca pavattiṃ pucchitvā “ko nāma tumhākaṃ rājā”ti pucchi. Pukkusāti nāma
atk-s0203a0:837_5: devāti. Dhammikoti? Āma deva dhammiko. Catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi janaṃ saṅgaṇhāti, lokassa
atk-s0203a0:837_6: mātāpitiṭṭhāne ṭhito, aṅge nipannadārakaṃ viya janaṃ tosetīti. Katarasmiṃ vaye vattatīti?
atk-s0203a0:837_7: Athassa vayaṃ ācikkhiṃsu. Vayesupi bimbisārena samavayo jāto. Atha te rājā āha –
atk-s0203a0:837_8: “tātā tumhākaṃ rājā dhammiko, vayena ca me samāno, sakkuṇeyyātha tumhākaṃ rājānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:837_9: mama mittaṃ kātu”nti. Sakkoma devāti. Rājā tesaṃ suṅkaṃ vissajjetvā gehañca dāpetvā
atk-s0203a0:837_10: – “gacchatha bhaṇḍaṃ vikkiṇitvā gamanakāle maṃ disvā gaccheyyāthā”ti āha. Te tathā
atk-s0203a0:837_11: katvā gamanakāle rājānaṃ addasaṃsu. “Gacchatha tumhākaṃ rājānaṃ mama vacanena punappunaṃ
atk-s0203a0:837_12: ārogyaṃ pucchitvā ‘rājā tumhehi saddhiṃ mittabhāvaṃ icchatī’ti vadathā”ti āha.
atk-s0203a0:838_0: Te sādhūti paṭissuṇitvā gantvā bhaṇḍaṃ paṭisāmetvā bhuttapātarāsā rājānaṃ upasaṅkamitvā
atk-s0203a0:838_1: vandiṃsu. Rājā “kahaṃ bhaṇe tumhe ettake ime divase na dissathā”ti pucchi. Te sabbaṃ
atk-s0203a0:838_2: pavattiṃ ārocesuṃ. Rājā – “sādhu, tātā, tumhe nissāya mayā majjhimappadese rājā mitto
atk-s0203a0:838_3: laddho”ti attamano ahosi. Aparabhāge rājagahavāsinopi vāṇijā takkasīlaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:838_4: Te paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā āgate pukkusāti rājā “kuto āgatatthā”ti pucchitvā “rājagahato”ti
atk-s0203a0:838_5: sutvā “mayhaṃ sahāyassa nagarato āgatā tumhe”ti. Āma devāti. Ārogyaṃ me sahāyassāti
atk-s0203a0:838_6: ārogyaṃ pucchitvā “ajja paṭṭhāya ye mayhaṃ sahāyassa nagarato jaṅghasatthena vā sakaṭasatthena
atk-s0203a0:838_7: vā vāṇijā āgacchanti, sabbesaṃ mama visayaṃ paviṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya vasanagehāni,
atk-s0203a0:838_8: rājakoṭṭhāgārato nivāpañca dentu, suṅkaṃ vissajjentu, kiñci upaddavaṃ mā karontū”ti
atk-s0203a0:838_9: bheriṃ carāpesi. Bimbisāropi attano nagare tatheva bheriṃ carāpesi.
atk-s0203a0:839_0: Atha bimbisāro pukkusātissa paṇṇaṃ pahiṇi – “paccantadese nāma maṇimuttādīni ratanāni
atk-s0203a0:839_1: uppajjanti, yaṃ mayhaṃ sahāyassa rajje dassanīyaṃ vā savanīyaṃ vā ratanaṃ uppajjati,
atk-s0203a0:839_2: tattha me mā maccharāyatū”ti. Pukkusātipi – “majjhimadeso nāma mahājanapado, yaṃ
atk-s0203a0:839_3: tattha evarūpaṃ ratanaṃ uppajjati, tattha me sahāyo mā maccharāyatū”ti paṭipaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:839_4: pahiṇi. Evaṃ te gacchante gacchante kāle aññamaññaṃ adisvāpi daḷhamittā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0203a0:840_0: Evaṃ tesaṃ katikaṃ katvā vasantānaṃ paṭhamataraṃ pukkusātissa paṇṇākāro uppajji.
atk-s0203a0:840_1: Rājā kira aṭṭha pañcavaṇṇe anagghakambale labhi. So – “atisundarā ime kambalā, ahaṃ
atk-s0203a0:840_2: sahāyassa pesissāmī”ti lākhāguḷamatte aṭṭha sārakaraṇḍake likhāpetvā tesu te kambale
atk-s0203a0:840_3: pakkhipitvā lākhāya vaṭṭāpetvā setavatthena veṭhetvā samugge pakkhipitvā vatthena
atk-s0203a0:840_4: veṭhetvā rājamuddikāya lañchetvā “mayhaṃ sahāyassa dethā”ti amacce pesesi. Sāsanañca
atk-s0203a0:840_5: adāsi – “ayaṃ paṇṇākāro nagaramajjhe amaccādiparivutena daṭṭhabbo”ti. Te gantvā bimbisārassa adaṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:841_0: So sāsanaṃ sutvā amaccādayo sannipatantūti bheriṃ carāpetvā nagaramajjhe amaccādiparivuto
atk-s0203a0:841_1: setacchattena dhāriyamānena pallaṅkavare nisinno lañchanaṃ bhinditvā vatthaṃ apanetvā
atk-s0203a0:841_2: samuggaṃ vivaritvā anto bhaṇḍikaṃ muñcitvā lākhāguḷe disvā “mayhaṃ sahāyo pukkusāti
atk-s0203a0:841_3: ‘jutavittako me sahāyo’ti maññamāno maññe imaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ pahiṇī”ti ekaṃ guḷaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0203a0:841_4: hatthena vaṭṭetvā tulayantova anto dussabhaṇḍikaṃ atthīti aññāsi. Atha naṃ pallaṅkapāde
atk-s0203a0:841_5: paharitvā tāvadeva lākhā paripati, so nakhena karaṇḍakaṃ vivaritvā anto kambalaratanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:841_6: disvā itarepi vivarāpesi, sabbepi kambalā ahesuṃ. Atha ne pattharāpesi, te vaṇṇasampannā
atk-s0203a0:841_7: phassasampannā dīghato soḷasahatthā tiriyaṃ aṭṭhahatthā ahesuṃ. Mahājano disvā aṅguliyo
atk-s0203a0:841_8: poṭhesi, celukkhepaṃ akāsi, – “amhākaṃ rañño adiṭṭhasahāyo pukkusāti adisvāva evarūpaṃ
atk-s0203a0:841_9: paṇṇākāraṃ pesesi, yuttaṃ evarūpaṃ mittaṃ kātu”nti attamano ahosi. Rājā ekamekaṃ
atk-s0203a0:841_10: kambalaṃ agghāpesi, sabbe anagghā ahesuṃ. Tesu cattāro sammāsambuddhassa pesesi,
atk-s0203a0:841_11: cattāro attano ghare akāsi. Tato cintesi – “pacchā pesentena paṭhamaṃ pesitapaṇṇākārato
atk-s0203a0:841_12: atirekaṃ pesetuṃ vaṭṭati, sahāyena ca me anaggho paṇṇākāro pesito, kiṃ nu kho pesemī”ti?
atk-s0203a0:842_0: Kiṃ pana rājagahe tato adhikaṃ ratanaṃ natthīti? No natthi, mahāpuñño rājā, apica
atk-s0203a0:842_1: kho panassa sotāpannakālato paṭṭhāya ṭhapetvā tīṇi ratanāni aññaṃ ratanaṃ somanassaṃ
atk-s0203a0:842_2: janetuṃ samatthaṃ nāma natthi. So ratanaṃ vicinituṃ āraddho – ratanaṃ nāma saviññāṇakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:842_3: aviññāṇakanti duvidhaṃ. Tattha aviññāṇakaṃ suvaṇṇarajatādi, saviññāṇakaṃ indriyabaddhaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:842_4: Aviññāṇakaṃ saviññāṇakasseva alaṅkārādivasena paribhogaṃ hoti, iti imesu dvīsu ratanesu
atk-s0203a0:842_5: saviññāṇakaṃ seṭṭhaṃ. Saviññāṇakampi duvidhaṃ tiracchānaratanaṃ manussaratananti.
atk-s0203a0:842_6: Tattha tiracchānaratanaṃ hatthiassaratanaṃ, tampi manussānaṃ upabhogatthameva nibbattati,
atk-s0203a0:842_7: iti imesupi dvīsu manussaratanaṃ seṭṭhaṃ. Manussaratanampi duvidhaṃ itthiratanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:842_8: purisaratananti. Tattha cakkavattino rañño uppannaṃ itthiratanampi purisasseva upabhogaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:843_0: Purisaratanampi duvidhaṃ agāriyaratanaṃ anagāriyaratanañca. Tattha agāriyaratanesupi
atk-s0203a0:843_1: cakkavattirājā ajja pabbajitasāmaṇeraṃ pañcapatiṭṭhitena vandati, iti imesupi dvīsu
atk-s0203a0:843_2: anagāriyaratanameva seṭṭhaṃ. Anagāriyaratanampi duvidhaṃ sekkharatanañca asekkharatanañca.
atk-s0203a0:843_3: Tattha satasahassampi sekkhānaṃ asekkhassa padesaṃ na pāpuṇāti, iti imesupi dvīsu
atk-s0203a0:843_4: asekkharatanameva seṭṭhaṃ. Tampi duvidhaṃ buddharatanaṃ sāvakaratananti. Tattha satasahassampi
atk-s0203a0:843_5: sāvakaratanānaṃ buddharatanassa padesaṃ na pāpuṇāti, iti imesupi dvīsū buddharatanameva seṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:844_0: Buddharatanampi duvidhaṃ paccekabuddharatanaṃ sabbaññubuddharatananti. Tattha satasahassampi
atk-s0203a0:844_1: paccekabuddhānaṃ sabbaññubuddhassa padesaṃ na pāpuṇāti, iti imesupi dvīsu sabbaññubuddharatanaṃyeva
atk-s0203a0:844_2: seṭṭhaṃ. Sadevakasmiñhi loke buddharatanasamaṃ ratanaṃ nāma natthi. Tasmā asadisameva
atk-s0203a0:844_3: ratanaṃ mayhaṃ sahāyassa pesessāmīti cintetvā takkasīlavāsino pucchi – “tātā tumhākaṃ
atk-s0203a0:844_4: janapade buddho dhammo saṅghoti imāni tīṇi ratanāni dissantī”ti. Ghosopi so mahārāja
atk-s0203a0:844_5: tāva tattha natthi, dassanaṃ pana kutoti.
atk-s0203a0:845_0: “Sundaraṃ tātā”ti rājā tuṭṭho cintesi – “sakkā bhaveyya janasaṅgahatthāya mayhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:845_1: sahāyassa vasanaṭṭhānaṃ sammāsambuddhaṃ pesetuṃ, buddhā pana paccantimesu janapadesu
atk-s0203a0:845_2: na aruṇaṃ uṭṭhapenti. Tasmā satthārā gantuṃ na sakkā. Sāriputtamoggallānādayo mahāsāvake
atk-s0203a0:845_3: pesetuṃ sakkā bhaveyya. Mayā pana ‘therā paccante vasantī’ti sutvāpi manusse pesetvā
atk-s0203a0:845_4: te attano samīpaṃ āṇāpetvā upaṭṭhātumeva yuttaṃ. Tasmā na therehipi sakkā gantuṃ.
atk-s0203a0:845_5: Yena panākārena sāsane pesite satthā ca mahāsāvakā ca gatā viya honti, tenākārena
atk-s0203a0:845_6: sāsanaṃ pahiṇissāmī”ti. Cintetvā caturatanāyāmaṃ vidatthimattaputhulaṃ nātitanuṃ
atk-s0203a0:845_7: nātibahalaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭṭaṃ kārāpetvā “tattha ajja akkharāni likhissāmī”ti. Pātova
atk-s0203a0:845_8: sīsaṃ nhāyitvā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya bhuttapātarāso apanītagandhamālābharaṇo suvaṇṇasarakena
atk-s0203a0:845_9: jātihiṅgulikaṃ ādāya heṭṭhato paṭṭhāya dvārāni pidahanto pāsādamāruyha pubbadisāmukhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:845_10: sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā ākāsatale nisīditvā suvaṇṇapaṭṭe akkharāni likhanto – “idha
atk-s0203a0:845_11: tathāgato loke uppanno arahaṃ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū
atk-s0203a0:845_12: anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṃ buddho bhagavā”ti. Buddhaguṇe tāva ekadesena likhi.
atk-s0203a0:846_0: Tato “evaṃ dasa pāramiyo pūretvā tusitabhavanato cavitvā mātukucchimhi paṭisandhiṃ
atk-s0203a0:846_1: gaṇhi, evaṃ lokavivaraṇaṃ ahosi, mātukucchiyaṃ vasamāne idaṃ nāma ahosi, agāramajjhe
atk-s0203a0:846_2: vasamāne idaṃ nāma ahosi, evaṃ mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhanto evaṃ mahāpadhānaṃ padahi.
atk-s0203a0:846_3: Evaṃ dukkarakārikaṃ katvā mahābodhimaṇḍaṃ āruyha aparājitapallaṅke nisinno sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:846_4: paṭivijjhi, sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ paṭivijjhantassa evaṃ lokavivaraṇaṃ ahosi. Sadevake
atk-s0203a0:846_5: loke aññaṃ evarūpaṃ ratanaṃ nāma natthīti.
atk-s0203a0:847: Yaṃkiñci vittaṃ idha vā huraṃ vā,
atk-s0203a0:852_0: Evaṃ ekadesena buddhaguṇepi likhitvā dutiyaṃ dhammaratanaṃ thomento – “svākkhāto
atk-s0203a0:852_1: bhagavatā dhammo…pe… paccattaṃ veditabbo viññūhī”ti. “Cattāro satipaṭṭhānā…pe… ariyo
atk-s0203a0:852_2: aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti. “Satthārā desitadhammo nāma evarūpo ca evarūpo cā”ti sattatiṃsa
atk-s0203a0:858_0: Evaṃ ekadesena dhammaguṇe likhitvā tatiyaṃ saṅgharatanaṃ thomento – “suppaṭipanno
atk-s0203a0:858_1: bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho…pe… puññakkhettaṃ lokassā”ti. “Kulaputtā nāma satthu dhammakathaṃ
atk-s0203a0:858_2: sutvā evaṃ nikkhamitvā pabbajanti, keci setacchattaṃ pahāya pabbajanti, keci uparajjaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:858_3: keci senāpatiṭṭhānādīni pahāya pabbajanti. Pabbajitvā ca pana imañca paṭipattiṃ pūrentī”ti
atk-s0203a0:858_5: catupaccayasantosaṃ navavidhaṃ senāsanaṃ, nīvaraṇappahānaṃ parikammaṃ jhānābhiññā
atk-s0203a0:858_6: aṭṭhatiṃsa kammaṭṭhānāni yāva āsavakkhayā ekadesena likhi, soḷasavidhaṃ ānāpānassatikammaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:858_7: vitthāreneva likhitvā “satthu sāvakasaṅgho nāma evarūpehi ca guṇehi samannāgato.
atk-s0203a0:865_0: Evaṃ ekadesena saṅghaguṇe likhitvā – “bhagavato sāsanaṃ svākkhātaṃ niyyānikaṃ, sace
atk-s0203a0:865_1: mayhaṃ sahāyo sakkoti, nikkhamitvā pabbajatū”ti likhitvā suvaṇṇapaṭṭaṃ saṃharitvā
atk-s0203a0:865_2: sukhumakambalena veṭhetvā sārasamugge pakkhipitvā taṃ samuggaṃ suvaṇṇamaye, suvaṇṇamayaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:865_3: rajatamaye rajatamayaṃ maṇimaye, maṇimayaṃ pavāḷamaye, pavāḷamayaṃ lohitaṅkamaye,
atk-s0203a0:865_4: lohitaṅkamayaṃ masāragallamaye, masāragallamayaṃ phalikamaye, phalikamayaṃ dantamaye,
atk-s0203a0:865_5: dantamayaṃ sabbaratanamaye, sabbaratanamayaṃ kilañjamaye, kilañjamayaṃ samuggaṃ sārakaraṇḍake ṭhapesi.
atk-s0203a0:866_0: Puna sārakaraṇḍakaṃ suvaṇṇakaraṇḍaketi purimanayeneva haritvā sabbaratanamayaṃ karaṇḍakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:866_1: kilañjamaye karaṇḍake ṭhapesi. Tato kilañjamayaṃ karaṇḍakaṃ sāramayapeḷāyāti puna
atk-s0203a0:866_2: vuttanayeneva haritvā sabbaratanamayaṃ peḷaṃ kilañjamayapeḷāya ṭhapetvā bahi vatthena
atk-s0203a0:866_3: veṭhetvā rājamuddikāya lañchetvā amacce āṇāpesi – “mama āṇāpavattiṭṭhāne maggaṃ alaṅkārāpetha
atk-s0203a0:866_4: maggo aṭṭhusabhavitthato hotu, catuusabhaṭṭhānaṃ sodhitamattakameva hotu, majjhe
atk-s0203a0:866_5: catuusabhaṃ rājānubhāvena paṭiyādethā”ti. Tato maṅgalahatthiṃ alaṅkārāpetvā tassa
atk-s0203a0:866_6: upari pallaṅkaṃ paññapetvā setacchattaṃ ussāpetvā nagaravīthiyo sittasammaṭṭhā samussitaddhajapaṭākā
atk-s0203a0:866_8: evarūpaṃ pūjaṃ kārentū”ti antarabhogikānaṃ javanadūte pesetvā sayaṃ sabbālaṅkārena
atk-s0203a0:866_10: visayapariyantaṃ gantvā amaccassa mukhasāsanaṃ adāsi – “tāta mayhaṃ sahāyo pukkusāti
atk-s0203a0:866_11: imaṃ paṇṇākāraṃ paṭicchanto orodhamajjhe apaṭicchitvā pāsādaṃ āruyha paṭicchatū”ti.
atk-s0203a0:866_12: Evaṃ sāsanaṃ datvā paccantadesaṃ satthā gacchatīti pañcapatiṭṭhitena vanditvā nivatti.
atk-s0203a0:866_13: Antarabhogikā teneva niyāmena maggaṃ paṭiyādetvā paṇṇākāraṃ nayiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:867_0: Pukkusātipi attano rajjasīmato paṭṭhāya teneva niyāmena maggaṃ paṭiyādetvā nagaraṃ
atk-s0203a0:867_1: alaṅkārāpetvā paṇṇākārassa paccuggamanaṃ akāsi. Paṇṇākāro takkasīlaṃ pāpuṇanto uposathadivase
atk-s0203a0:867_2: pāpuṇi, paṇṇākāraṃ gahetvā gataamaccopi rañño vuttasāsanaṃ ārocesi. Rājā taṃ sutvā
atk-s0203a0:867_3: paṇṇākārena saddhiṃ āgatānaṃ kattabbakiccaṃ vicāretvā paṇṇākāraṃ ādāya pāsādaṃ āruyha
atk-s0203a0:867_4: “mā idha koci pavisatū”ti dvāre ārakkhaṃ kāretvā sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā paṇṇākāraṃ
atk-s0203a0:867_5: uccāsane ṭhapetvā sayaṃ nīcāsane nisinno lañchanaṃ bhinditvā nivāsanaṃ apanetvā kilañjapeḷato
atk-s0203a0:867_6: paṭṭhāya anupubbena vivaranto sāramayaṃ samuggaṃ disvā cintesi – “mahāparihāro nāyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:867_7: aññassa ratanassa bhavissati, addhā majjhimadese sotabbayuttakaṃ ratanaṃ uppanna”nti.
atk-s0203a0:867_8: Atha taṃ samuggaṃ vivaritvā rājalañchanaṃ bhinditvā sukhumakambalaṃ ubhato viyūhitvā
atk-s0203a0:868_0: So taṃ pasāretvā – “manāpāni vata akkharāni samasīsāni samapantīni caturassānī”tiādito
atk-s0203a0:868_1: paṭṭhāya vācetuṃ ārabhi. Tassa – “idha tathāgato loke uppanno”ti buddhaguṇe vācentassa
atk-s0203a0:868_2: balavasomanassaṃ uppajji, navanavutilomakūpasahassāni uddhaggalomāni ahesuṃ. Attano
atk-s0203a0:868_3: ṭhitabhāvaṃ vā nisinnabhāvaṃ vā na jānāti. Athassa – “kappakoṭisatasahassehipi etaṃ
atk-s0203a0:868_4: dullabhasāsanaṃ sahāyaṃ nissāya sotuṃ labhāmī”ti bhiyyo balavapīti udapādi. So hi
atk-s0203a0:868_5: upari vācetuṃ asakkonto yāva pītivegapassaddhiyā nisīditvā parato – “svākkhāto bhagavatā
atk-s0203a0:868_6: dhammo”ti dhammaguṇe ārabhi. Tatrāpissa tatheva ahosi. So puna yāva pītivegapassaddhiyā
atk-s0203a0:868_7: nisīditvā parato “suppaṭipanno”ti saṅghaguṇe ārabhi. Tatrāpissa tatheva ahosi. Atha
atk-s0203a0:868_9: so jhānasukheneva vītināmesi. Añño koci daṭṭhuṃ na labhati, ekova cūḷupaṭṭhāko pavisati.
atk-s0203a0:869_0: Nāgarā rājaṅgaṇe sannipatitvā ukkuṭṭhiṃ akaṃsu “paṇṇākāraṃ paṭicchitadivasato paṭṭhāya
atk-s0203a0:869_1: baladassanaṃ vā nāṭakadassanaṃ vā natthi, vinicchayadānaṃ natthi, rājā sahāyena pahitaṃ
atk-s0203a0:869_2: paṇṇākāraṃ yassicchati tassa dassetu, rājāno nāma ekaccassa paṇṇākāravasenapi vañcetvā
atk-s0203a0:869_3: rajjaṃ attano kātuṃ vāyamanti. Kiṃ nāma amhākaṃ rājā karotī”ti? Rājā ukkuṭṭhisaddaṃ
atk-s0203a0:869_4: sutvā – “rajjaṃ nu kho dhāremi, udāhu satthāra”nti cintesi. Athassa etadahosi – “rajjakāritaattabhāvo
atk-s0203a0:869_5: nāma neva gaṇakena, na gaṇakamahāmattena gaṇetuṃ sakko. Satthusāsanaṃ dhāressāmī”ti
atk-s0203a0:869_6: sayane ṭhapitaṃ asiṃ gahetvā kese chinditvā sīhapañjaraṃ vivaritvā – “etaṃ gahetvā
atk-s0203a0:869_7: rajjaṃ kārethā”ti saddhiṃ cūḷāmaṇinā kesakalāpaṃ parisamajjhe pātesi, mahājano taṃ
atk-s0203a0:869_8: ukkhipitvā – “sahāyakasantikā laddhapaṇṇākārā nāma rājāno tumhādisā honti devā”ti
atk-s0203a0:869_9: ekappahāreneva viravi. Raññopi dvaṅgulamattaṃ kesamassu ahosi. Bodhisattassa pabbajjāsadisameva kira jātaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:870_0: Tato cūḷupaṭṭhākaṃ pesetvā antarāpaṇā dve kāsāyavatthāni mattikāpattañca āharāpetvā
atk-s0203a0:870_1: – “ye loke arahanto, te uddissa mayhaṃ pabbajjā”ti satthāraṃ uddissa ekaṃ kāsāvaṃ
atk-s0203a0:870_2: nivāsetvā ekaṃ pārupitvā pattaṃ vāmaaṃsakūṭe katvā kattaradaṇḍaṃ gahetvā – “sobhati
atk-s0203a0:870_3: nu kho me pabbajjā no vā”ti mahātale katipayavāre aparāparaṃ caṅkamitvā – “sobhati
atk-s0203a0:870_4: me pabbajjā”ti dvāraṃ vivaritvā pāsādā otari. Otarantaṃ pana naṃ tīsu dvāresu ṭhitanāṭakādīni
atk-s0203a0:870_5: disvāpi na sañjāniṃsu. “Eko paccekabuddho amhākaṃ rañño dhammakathaṃ kathetuṃ āgato”ti
atk-s0203a0:870_6: kira cintayiṃsu. Uparipāsādaṃ pana āruyha rañño ṭhitanisinnaṭṭhānāni disvā rājā gatoti
atk-s0203a0:870_7: ñatvā samuddamajjhe osīdamānāya nāvāya jano viya ekappahāreneva viraviṃsu. Kulaputtaṃ
atk-s0203a0:870_8: bhūmitalaṃ otiṇṇamattaṃ aṭṭhārasaseniyo sabbe nāgarā balakāyā ca parivāretvā mahāviravaṃ
atk-s0203a0:870_9: viraviṃsu. Amaccāpi taṃ etadavocuṃ – “deva majjhimadesarājāno nāma bahumāyā, sāsanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:870_10: pesetvā buddharatanaṃ nāma loke uppannaṃ vā no vāti ñatvā gamissatha, nivattatha
atk-s0203a0:870_11: devā”ti. Saddahāmahaṃ mayhaṃ sahāyakassa, tassa mayā saddhiṃ dvejjhavacanaṃ nāma
atk-s0203a0:871_0: Kulaputto kattaradaṇḍena lekhaṃ katvā – “idaṃ rajjaṃ kassā”ti āha? Tumhākaṃ devāti.
atk-s0203a0:871_1: Yo imaṃ lekhaṃ antaraṃ karoti, rājāṇāya kāretabboti. Mahājanakajātake bodhisattena
atk-s0203a0:871_2: katalekhaṃ sīvalidevī antaraṃ kātuṃ avisahantī vivattamānā agamāsi. Tassā gatamaggena
atk-s0203a0:871_3: mahājano agamāsi. Taṃ pana lekhaṃ mahājano antaraṃ kātuṃ na visahi, lekhaṃ ussīsakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:871_4: katvā vivattamānā viraviṃsu. Kulaputto “ayaṃ me gataṭṭhāne dantakaṭṭhaṃ vā mukhodakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:871_5: vā dassatī”ti antamaso ekaceṭakampi aggahetvā pakkāmi. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi “mama satthā
atk-s0203a0:871_6: ca mahābhinikkhamanaṃ nikkhamitvā ekakova pabbajito”ti ekakova agamāsi. “Satthu lajjāmī”ti
atk-s0203a0:871_7: ca – “satthā kira me pabbajitvā yānaṃ nāruḷho”ti ca antamaso ekapaṭalikampi upāhanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:871_8: nāruhi, paṇṇacchattakampi na dhāresi. Mahājano rukkhapākāraṭṭālakādīni āruyha esa
atk-s0203a0:871_9: amhākaṃ rājā gacchatīti olokesi. Kulaputto – “dūraṃ gantabbaṃ, na sakkā ekena maggo
atk-s0203a0:871_10: nittharitu”nti ekaṃ satthavāhaṃ anubandhi. Sukhumālassa kulaputtassa kaṭhinatattāya
atk-s0203a0:871_11: pathaviyā gachantassa pādatalesu phoṭā uṭṭhahitvā bhijjanti, dukkhā vedanā uppajjanti.
atk-s0203a0:871_12: Satthavāhe khandhāvāraṃ bandhitvā nisinne kulaputto maggā okkamma ekasmiṃ rukkhamūle
atk-s0203a0:871_13: nisīdati. Nisinnaṭṭhāne pādaparikammaṃ vā piṭṭhiparikammaṃ vā kattā nāma natthi,
atk-s0203a0:872_0: Punadivase uṭṭhite aruṇe sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā puna satthavāhaṃ anubandhati. Pātarāsakāle
atk-s0203a0:872_1: kulaputtassa pattaṃ gahetvā khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ patte pakkhipitvā denti. Taṃ uttaṇḍulampi
atk-s0203a0:872_2: hoti kilinnampi samasakkharampi aloṇātiloṇampi, kulaputto pavisanaṭṭhānaṃ paccavekkhitvā
atk-s0203a0:872_3: amataṃ viya paribhuñjitvā etena niyāmena aṭṭhahi ūnakāni dve yojanasatāni gato. Jetavanadvārakoṭṭhakassa
atk-s0203a0:872_4: pana samīpena gacchantopi – “kahaṃ satthā vasatī”ti nāpucchi. Kasmā? Satthugāravena
atk-s0203a0:872_5: ceva rañño pesitasāsanavasena ca. Rañño hi – “idha tathāgato loke uppajjatī”ti satthāraṃ
atk-s0203a0:872_6: rājagahe uppannaṃ viya katvā sāsanaṃ pesitaṃ, tasmā naṃ apucchitvāva pañcacattālīsayojanamattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:872_7: maggaṃ atikkanto. So sūriyatthaṅgamanavelāya rājagahaṃ patvā satthā kahaṃ vasatīti
atk-s0203a0:872_8: pucchi. Kuto nu, bhante, āgatoti? Ito uttaratoti. Satthā tuyhaṃ āgatamagge ito pañcacattālīsayojanamatte
atk-s0203a0:872_9: sāvatthi nāma atthi, tattha vasatīti. Kulaputto cintesi – “idāni akālo na sakkā gantuṃ,
atk-s0203a0:872_10: ajja idheva vasitvā sve satthu santikaṃ gamissāmī”ti. Tato – “vikāle sampattapabbajitā
atk-s0203a0:872_11: kahaṃ vasantī”ti pucchi. Imāya kumbhakārasālāya, bhanteti. Atha so taṃ kumbhakāraṃ
atk-s0203a0:873_0: Bhagavāpi taṃdivasaṃ paccūsakāle lokaṃ volokento pukkusātiṃ disvā cintesi – “ayaṃ
atk-s0203a0:873_1: kulaputto sahāyena pesitaṃ sāsanamattakaṃ vācetvā atirekatiyojanasatikaṃ mahārajjaṃ
atk-s0203a0:873_2: pahāya maṃ uddissa pabbajitvā aṭṭhahi ūnakāni dve yojanasatāni atikkamma rājagahaṃ
atk-s0203a0:873_3: pāpuṇissati, mayi agacchante pana tīṇi sāmaññaphalāni appaṭivijjhitvā ekarattivāsena
atk-s0203a0:873_4: anāthakālakiriyaṃ karissati, mayi pana gate tīṇi sāmaññaphalāni paṭivijjhissati.
atk-s0203a0:873_5: Janasaṅgahatthāyeva pana mayā satasahassakappādhikāni cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni pāramiyo
atk-s0203a0:873_6: pūritā, karissāmi tassa saṅgaha”nti pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto
atk-s0203a0:873_7: sāvatthiyaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātappaṭikkanto gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0203a0:873_8: muhuttaṃ attadarathakilamathaṃ paṭipassambhetvā – “kulaputto mayi gāravena dukkaraṃ
atk-s0203a0:873_9: akāsi, atirekayojanasataṃ rajjaṃ pahāya antamaso mukhadhovanadāyakampi ceṭakaṃ aggahetvā
atk-s0203a0:873_10: ekakova nikkhanto”ti sāriputtamahāmoggallānādīsu kañci anāmantetvā sayameva attano
atk-s0203a0:873_11: pattacīvaraṃ gahetvā ekakova nikkhanto. Gacchanto ca neva ākāse uppati, na pathaviṃ
atk-s0203a0:873_13: anisīditvā antamaso ekapaṭalikaṃ upāhanampi anāruyha paṇṇacchattakampi aggahetvā
atk-s0203a0:873_14: nikkhanto, mayāpi padasāva gantuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti pana cintetvā padasāva agamāsi.
atk-s0203a0:874_0: So asīti anubyañjanāni byāmappabhā bāttiṃsa mahāpurisalakkhaṇānīti imaṃ buddhasiriṃ
atk-s0203a0:874_1: paṭicchādetvā valāhakapaṭicchanno puṇṇacando viya aññatarabhikkhuvesena gacchanto
atk-s0203a0:874_2: ekapacchābhatteneva pañcacattālīsa yojanāni atikkamma sūriyatthaṅgamalīvelāya kulaputte
atk-s0203a0:874_3: paviṭṭhamatteyeva taṃ kumbhakārasālaṃ pāpuṇi. Taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ – “tena kho pana
atk-s0203a0:874_4: samayena, pukkusāti, nāma kulaputto bhagavantaṃ uddissa saddhāya agārasmā anagāriyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:874_5: pabbajito, so tasmiṃ kumbhakārāvesane paṭhamaṃ vāsūpagato hotī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:875_0: Evaṃ gantvāpi pana bhagavā – “ahaṃ sammāsambuddho”ti pasayha kumbhakārasālaṃ apavisitvā
atk-s0203a0:875_1: dvāre ṭhitova kulaputtaṃ okāsaṃ kārento sace te bhikkhūtiādimāha. Urundanti vivittaṃ
atk-s0203a0:875_2: asambādhaṃ. Viharatāyasmā yathāsukhanti yena yena iriyāpathena phāsu hoti, tena tena
atk-s0203a0:875_3: yathāsukhaṃ āyasmā viharatūti okāsaṃ akāsi. Atirekatiyojanasatañhi rajjaṃ pahāya
atk-s0203a0:875_4: pabbajito kulaputto parassa chaḍḍitapatitaṃ kumbhakārasālaṃ kiṃ aññassa sabrahmacārino
atk-s0203a0:875_5: maccharāyissati. Ekacce pana moghapurisā sāsane pabbajitvā āvāsamacchariyādīhi abhibhūtā
atk-s0203a0:875_6: attano vasanaṭṭhāne mayhaṃ kuṭi mayhaṃ pariveṇanti aññesaṃ avāsāya parakkamanti.
atk-s0203a0:875_7: Nisīdīti accantasukhumālo lokanātho devavimānasadisaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ pahāya tattha tattha
atk-s0203a0:875_9: kumbhakārasālāya tiṇasanthāraṃ santharitvā paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ paññapetvā devavimānasadisaṃ
atk-s0203a0:875_10: dibbagandhasugandhaṃ gandhakuṭiṃ pavisitvā nisīdanto viya nisīdi.
atk-s0203a0:876_0: Iti bhagavāpi asambhinnamahāsammatavaṃse uppanno, kulaputtopi khattiyagabbhe vaḍḍhito.
atk-s0203a0:876_1: Bhagavāpi abhinīhārasampanno, kulaputtopi abhinīhārasampanno. Bhagavāpi rajjaṃ pahāya
atk-s0203a0:876_2: pabbajito, kulaputtopi. Bhagavāpi suvaṇṇavaṇṇo, kulaputtopi. Bhagavāpi samāpattilābhī,
atk-s0203a0:876_3: kulaputtopi. Iti dvepi khattiyā dvepi abhinīhārasampannā dvepi rājapabbajitā dvepi
atk-s0203a0:876_4: suvaṇṇavaṇṇā dvepi samāpattilābhino kumbhakārasālaṃ pavisitvā nisinnāti tehi kumbhakārasālā
atk-s0203a0:876_5: ativiya sobhati, dvīhi sīhādīhi paviṭṭhaguhādīhi āharitvā dīpetabbaṃ. Tesu pana dvīsu
atk-s0203a0:876_6: bhagavā – “sukhumālo ahaṃ paramasukhumālo ekapacchābhattena pañcacattālīsa yojanāni
atk-s0203a0:876_7: āgato, muhuttaṃ tāva sīhaseyyaṃ kappetvā maggadarathaṃ paṭipassambhemī”ti cittampi
atk-s0203a0:876_9: āgatomhi, muhuttaṃ tāva nipajjitvā maggadarathaṃ vinodemī”ti cittaṃ anuppādetvā nisīdamānova
atk-s0203a0:876_10: ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ samāpajji. Idaṃ sandhāya atha kho bhagavā bahudeva rattintiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:877_0: Nanu ca bhagavā kulaputtassa dhammaṃ desessāmīti āgato, kasmā na desesīti? Kulaputtassa
atk-s0203a0:877_1: maggadaratho appaṭipassaddho, na sakkhissati dhammadesanaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ, so tāvassa
atk-s0203a0:877_2: paṭipassambhatūti na desesi. Apare – “rājagahaṃ nāma ākiṇṇamanussaṃ avivittaṃ dasahi
atk-s0203a0:877_3: saddehi, so saddo diyaḍḍhayāmamattena sannisīdati, taṃ āgamento na desesī”ti vadanti.
atk-s0203a0:877_4: Taṃ akāraṇaṃ, brahmalokappamāṇampi hi saddaṃ bhagavā attano ānubhāvena vūpasametuṃ
atk-s0203a0:877_5: sakkoti, maggadarathavūpasamaṃ āgamentoyeva pana na desesi.
atk-s0203a0:878_0: Tattha bahudeva rattinti diyaḍḍhayāmamattaṃ. Etadahosīti bhagavā phalasamāpattito
atk-s0203a0:878_1: vuṭṭhāya suvaṇṇavimāne maṇisīhapañjaraṃ vivaranto viya pañcapasādappaṭimaṇḍitāni
atk-s0203a0:878_3: sunikhātaindakhīlaṃ viya niccalaṃ avibbhantaṃ suvaṇṇapaṭimaṃ viya nisinnaṃ kulaputtaṃ
atk-s0203a0:878_4: disvā etaṃ – “pāsādikaṃ kho”tiādi ahosi. Tattha pāsādikanti pasādāvahaṃ. Bhāvanapuṃsakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:878_5: panetaṃ, pāsādikena iriyāpathena iriyati. Yathā iriyato iriyāpatho pāsādiko hoti,
atk-s0203a0:878_6: evaṃ iriyatīti ayamettha attho. Catūsu hi iriyāpathesu tayo iriyāpathā na sobhanti.
atk-s0203a0:878_7: Gacchantassa hi bhikkhuno hatthā calanti, pādā calanti, sīsaṃ calati, ṭhitassa kāyo
atk-s0203a0:878_8: thaddho hoti, nipannassāpi iriyāpatho amanāpo hoti, pacchābhatte pana divāṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:878_9: sammajjitvā cammakhaṇḍaṃ paññapetvā sudhotahatthapādassa catusandhikapallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā
atk-s0203a0:878_10: nipannasseva iriyāpatho sobhati. Ayañca kulaputto pallaṅkaṃ ābhujitvā ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:878_11: appetvā nisīdi. Itissa iriyāpatheneva pasanno bhagavā – “pāsādikaṃ kho”ti parivitakkesi.
atk-s0203a0:879_0: Yaṃnūnāhaṃ puccheyyanti kasmā pucchati? Kiṃ bhagavā attānaṃ uddissa pabbajitabhāvaṃ
atk-s0203a0:879_1: na jānātīti? No na jānāti, apucchite pana kathā na patiṭṭhāti, apatiṭṭhitāya kathāya
atk-s0203a0:880_0: Disvā ca pana jāneyyāsīti tathāgataṃ buddhasiriyā virocantaṃ ayaṃ buddhoti sabbe
atk-s0203a0:880_1: jānanti. Anacchariyametaṃ jānanaṃ, buddhasiriṃ pana paṭicchādetvā aññatarapiṇḍapātikavesena
atk-s0203a0:880_2: caranto dujjāno hoti. Iccāyasmā, pukkusāti, “na jāneyya”nti sabhāvameva katheti.
atk-s0203a0:880_3: Tathā hi naṃ ekakumbhakārasālāya nisinnampi na jānāti.
atk-s0203a0:881_0: Etadahosīti maggadarathassa vūpasamabhāvaṃ ñatvā ahosi. Evamāvusoti kulaputto sahāyena
atk-s0203a0:881_1: pesitaṃ sāsanamattaṃ vācetvā rajjaṃ pahāya pabbajamāno – “dasabalassa madhuradhammadesanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:881_2: sotuṃ labhissāmī”ti. Pabbajito, pabbajitvā ettakaṃ addhānaṃ āgacchanto – “dhammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:881_3: te bhikkhu desessāmī”ti padamattassa vattāraṃ nālattha, so “dhammaṃ te bhikkhu desessāmī”ti
atk-s0203a0:881_4: vuttaṃ kiṃ sakkaccaṃ na suṇissati. Pipāsitasoṇḍo viya hi pipāsitahatthī viya cāyaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:882_0: 343. Chadhāturo ayanti bhagavā kulaputtassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ akathetvā āditova
atk-s0203a0:882_1: arahattassa padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ accantasuññataṃ vipassanālakkhaṇameva ācikkhituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0203a0:882_2: Yassa hi pubbabhāgapaṭipadā aparisuddhā hoti, tassa paṭhamameva sīlasaṃvaraṃ indriyesu
