atk-s0203a0:882_3: guttadvārataṃ bhojane mattaññutaṃ jāgariyānuyogaṃ satta saddhamme cattāri jhānānīti
atk-s0203a0:882_4: imaṃ pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ ācikkhati. Yassa panesā parisuddhā, tassa taṃ akathetvā
atk-s0203a0:882_5: arahattassa padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ vipassanameva ācikkhati. Kulaputtassa ca pubbabhāgapaṭipadā
atk-s0203a0:882_6: parisuddhā. Tathā hi anena sāsanaṃ vācetvā pāsādavaragateneva ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:882_7: nibbattitaṃ, yadassa dvānavutiyojanasabhaṃ āgacchantassa yānakiccaṃ sādhesi, sāmaṇerasīlampissa
atk-s0203a0:882_8: paripuṇṇaṃ. Tasmā pubbabhāgapaṭipadaṃ akathetvā arahattassa padaṭṭhānabhūtaṃ accantasuññataṃ
atk-s0203a0:883_0: Tattha chadhāturoti dhātuyo vijjamānā, puriso avijjamāno. Bhagavā hi katthaci vijjamānena
atk-s0203a0:883_1: avijjamānaṃ dasseti, katthaci avijjamānena vijjamānaṃ, katthaci vijjamānena vijjamānaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:883_2: katthaci avijjamānena avijjamānanti sabbāsave vuttanayeneva vitthāretabbaṃ. Idha
atk-s0203a0:883_3: pana vijjamānena avijjamānaṃ dassento evamāha. Sace hi bhagavā purisoti paṇṇattiṃ
atk-s0203a0:883_4: vissajjetvā dhātuyo icceva vatvā cittaṃ upaṭṭhāpeyya, kulaputto sandehaṃ kareyya,
atk-s0203a0:883_5: sammohaṃ āpajjeyya, desanaṃ sampaṭicchituṃ na sakkuṇeyya. Tasmā tathāgato anupubbena
atk-s0203a0:883_6: purisoti paṇṇattiṃ pahāya “sattoti vā purisoti vā puggaloti vā paṇṇattimattameva,
atk-s0203a0:883_7: paramatthato satto nāma natthi, dhātumatteyeva cittaṃ ṭhapāpetvā tīṇi phalāni paṭivijjhāpessāmī”ti
atk-s0203a0:883_8: anaṅgaṇasutte vuttabhāsantarakusalo tāya tāya bhāsāya sippaṃ uggaṇhāpento ācariyo viya evamāha.
atk-s0203a0:884_0: Tattha cha dhātuyo assāti chadhāturo. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yaṃ tvaṃ purisoti sañjānāsi,
atk-s0203a0:884_1: so chadhātuko, na cettha paramatthato puriso atthi, purisoti pana paṇṇattimattamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:884_2: Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Caturādhiṭṭhānoti ettha adhiṭṭhānaṃ vuccati patiṭṭhā, catupatiṭṭhānoti
atk-s0203a0:884_3: attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – svāyaṃ bhikkhu puriso chadhāturo chaphassāyatano aṭṭhārasamanopavicāro,
atk-s0203a0:884_4: so ettova vivaṭṭitvā uttamasiddhibhūtaṃ arahattaṃ gaṇhamāno imesu catūsu ṭhānesu
atk-s0203a0:884_5: patiṭṭhāya gaṇhātīti caturādhiṭṭhānoti. Yattha ṭhitanti yesu adhiṭṭhānesu patiṭṭhitaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:884_6: Maññassa vā nappavattantīti maññassa vā mānassa vā nappavattanti. Muni santoti vuccatīti
atk-s0203a0:884_7: khīṇāsavamuni upasanto nibbutoti vuccati. Paññaṃ nappamajjeyyāti arahattaphalapaññāya
atk-s0203a0:884_9: paramatthasaccassa nibbānassa sacchikiriyatthaṃ āditova vacīsaccaṃ rakkheyya. Cāgamanubrūheyyāti
atk-s0203a0:884_11: Santimeva so sikkheyyāti arahattamaggena sabbakilesavūpasamanatthaṃ āditova kilesavūpasamanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:884_12: sikkheyya. Iti paññādhiṭṭhānādīnaṃ adhigamatthāya imāni samathavipassanāpaññādīni
atk-s0203a0:885: 345. Phassāyatananti phassassa āyatanaṃ, ākaroti attho. Paññādhiṭṭhānantiādīni pubbe vuttānaṃ arahattaphalapaññādīnaṃ vasena veditabbāni.
atk-s0203a0:886_0: 348. Idāni nikkhittamātikāvasena “yattha ṭhitaṃ maññassa vā nappavattantī”ti vattabbaṃ
atk-s0203a0:886_1: bhaveyya, arahatte pana patte puna “paññaṃ nappamajjeyyā”tiādīhi kiccaṃ natthi. Iti
atk-s0203a0:886_2: bhagavā mātikaṃ uppaṭipāṭidhātukaṃ ṭhapetvāpi yathādhammavaseneva vibhaṅgaṃ vibhajanto
atk-s0203a0:886_3: paññaṃ nappamajjeyyātiādimāha. Tattha ko paññaṃ pamajjati, ko nappamajjati? Yo tāva
atk-s0203a0:886_4: imasmiṃ sāsane pabbajitvā vejjakammādivasena ekavīsatividhāya anesanāya jīvikaṃ kappento
atk-s0203a0:886_5: pabbajjānurūpena cittuppādaṃ ṭhapetuṃ na sakkoti, ayaṃ paññaṃ pamajjati nāma. Yo
atk-s0203a0:886_6: pana sāsane pabbajitvā sīle patiṭṭhāya buddhavacanaṃ uggaṇhitvā sappāyaṃ dhutaṅgaṃ
atk-s0203a0:886_7: samādāya cittarucitaṃ kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā vivittaṃ senāsanaṃ nissāya kasiṇaparikammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:886_8: katvā samāpattiṃ patvā ajjeva arahattanti vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā vicarati, ayaṃ paññaṃ
atk-s0203a0:886_9: nappamajjati nāma. Imasmiṃ pana sutte dhātukammaṭṭhānavasena esa paññāya appamādo
atk-s0203a0:886_10: vutto. Dhātukammaṭṭhāne panettha yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā hatthipadopamasuttādīsu vuttameva.
atk-s0203a0:887_0: 354. Athāparaṃ viññāṇaṃyeva avasissatīti ayampettha pāṭiyekko anusandhi. Heṭṭhato
atk-s0203a0:887_1: hi rūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ kathitaṃ, idāni arūpakammaṭṭhānaṃ vedanāvasena nibbattetvā dassetuṃ
atk-s0203a0:887_2: ayaṃ desanā āraddhā. Yaṃ vā panetaṃ imassa bhikkhuno pathavīdhātuādīsu āgamaniyavipassanāvasena
atk-s0203a0:887_3: kammakārakaviññāṇaṃ, taṃ viññāṇadhātuvasena bhājetvā dassentopi imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi.
atk-s0203a0:887_4: Tattha avasissatīti kimatthāya avasissati? Satthu kathanatthāya kulaputtassa ca paṭivijjhanatthāya
atk-s0203a0:887_5: avasissati. Parisuddhanti nirupakkilesaṃ. Pariyodātanti pabhassaraṃ. Sukhantipi vijānātīti
atk-s0203a0:887_6: sukhavedanaṃ vedayamāno sukhavedanaṃ vedayāmīti pajānāti. Sesapadadvayesupi eseva
atk-s0203a0:887_7: nayo. Sace panāyaṃ vedanākathā heṭṭhā na kathitā bhaveyya, idha ṭhatvā kathetuṃ vaṭṭeyya.
atk-s0203a0:887_8: Satipaṭṭhāne panesā kathitāvāti tattha kathitanayeneva veditabbā. Sukhavedaniyanti
atk-s0203a0:887_9: evamādi paccayavasena udayatthaṅgamanadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha sukhavedaniyanti
atk-s0203a0:888_0: 360. Upekkhāyeva avasissatīti ettāvatā hi yathā nāma chekena maṇikārācariyena vajirasūciyā
atk-s0203a0:888_1: vijjhitvā cammakhaṇḍe pātetvā pātetvā dinnamuttaṃ antevāsiko gahetvā gahetvā suttagataṃ
atk-s0203a0:888_2: karonto muttolambakamuttajālādīni karoti, evameva bhagavatā kathetvā kathetvā dinnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:888_3: kammaṭṭhānaṃ ayaṃ kulaputto manasikaronto manasikaronto paguṇaṃ akāsīti rūpakammaṭṭhānampissa
atk-s0203a0:888_4: arūpakammaṭṭhānampi paguṇaṃ jātaṃ, atha bhagavā “athāparaṃ upekkhāyeva avasissatī”ti āha.
atk-s0203a0:889_0: Kimatthaṃ pana avasissatīti? Satthu kathanatthaṃ. Kulaputtassa paṭivijjhanatthantipi
atk-s0203a0:889_1: vadanti, taṃ na gahetabbaṃ. Kulaputtena hi sahāyassa sāsanaṃ vācetvā pāsādatale ṭhiteneva
atk-s0203a0:889_2: ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ nibbattitaṃ, yadassa ettakaṃ maggaṃ āgacchantassa yānakiccaṃ
atk-s0203a0:889_3: sādheti. Satthu kathanatthaṃyeva avasissati. Imasmiñhi ṭhāne satthā kulaputtassa
atk-s0203a0:889_4: rūpāvacarajjhāne vaṇṇaṃ kathesi. Idañhi vuttaṃ hoti “bhikkhu paguṇaṃ tava idaṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāna”nti.
atk-s0203a0:889_5: Parisuddhātiādi tassāyeva upekkhāya vaṇṇabhaṇanaṃ. Ukkaṃ bandheyyāti aṅgārakapallaṃ
atk-s0203a0:889_6: sajjeyya. Ālimpeyyāti tattha aṅgāre pakkhipitvā aggiṃ datvā nāḷikāya dhamento aggiṃ
atk-s0203a0:889_7: jāleyya. Ukkāmukhe pakkhipeyyāti aṅgāre viyūhitvā aṅgāramatthake vā ṭhapeyya, tattake
atk-s0203a0:889_8: vā pakkhipeyya. Nīhaṭanti nīhaṭadosaṃ. Ninnītakasāvanti apanītakasāvaṃ. Evameva khoti
atk-s0203a0:889_9: yathā taṃ suvaṇṇaṃ icchiticchitāya piḷandhanavikatiyā saṃvattati, evameva ayaṃ tāva
atk-s0203a0:889_10: catutthajjhānupekkhā vipassanā abhiññā nirodho bhavokkantīti imesu yaṃ icchati, tassatthāya
atk-s0203a0:890_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā imasmiṃ rūpāvacaracatutthajjhāne nikantipariyādānatthaṃ avaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:890_1: akathetvā vaṇṇaṃ kathesīti. Kulaputtassa hi catutthajjhāne nikantipariyuṭṭhānaṃ balavaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:890_2: Sace avaṇṇaṃ katheyya, – “mayhaṃ pabbajitvā dvānavutiyojanasataṃ āgacchantassa imaṃ
atk-s0203a0:890_3: catutthajjhānaṃ yānakiccaṃ sādhesi, ahaṃ ettakaṃ maggaṃ āgacchanto jhānasukhena jhānaratiyā
atk-s0203a0:890_4: āgato, evarūpassa nāma paṇītadhammassa avaṇṇaṃ katheti, jānaṃ nu kho katheti ajāna”nti
atk-s0203a0:890_5: kulaputto saṃsayaṃ sammohaṃ āpajjeyya, tasmā bhagavā vaṇṇaṃ kathesi.
atk-s0203a0:891_0: 361. Tadanudhammanti ettha arūpāvacarajjhānaṃ dhammo nāma, taṃ anugatattā rūpāvacarajjhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:891_1: anudhammoti vuttaṃ. Vipākajjhānaṃ vā dhammo, kusalajjhānaṃ anudhammo. Tadupādānāti
atk-s0203a0:891_2: taggahaṇā. Ciraṃ dīghamaddhānanti vīsatikappasahassāni. Vipākavasena hetaṃ vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:892_0: 362. Evaṃ catūhi vārehi arūpāvacarajjhānassa vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā idāni tasseva ādīnavaṃ
atk-s0203a0:892_1: dassento so evaṃ pajānātītiādimāha. Tattha saṅkhatametanti kiñcāpi ettha vīsatikappasahassāni
atk-s0203a0:892_2: āyu atthi, etaṃ pana saṅkhataṃ pakappitaṃ āyūhitaṃ, karontena karīyati, aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ
atk-s0203a0:892_3: asassataṃ tāvakālikaṃ, cavanaparibhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammaṃ, jātiyā anugataṃ, jarāya
atk-s0203a0:892_4: anusaṭaṃ, maraṇena abbhāhataṃ, dukkhe patiṭṭhitaṃ, atāṇaṃ aleṇaṃ asaraṇaṃ asaraṇībhūtanti.
atk-s0203a0:893_0: Idāni arahattanikūṭena desanaṃ gaṇhanto so neva taṃ abhisaṅkharotītiādimāha. Yathā
atk-s0203a0:893_1: hi cheko bhisakko visavikāraṃ disvā vamanaṃ kāretvā visaṃ ṭhānato cāvetvā upari āropetvā
atk-s0203a0:893_2: khandhaṃ vā sīsaṃ vā gahetuṃ adatvā visaṃ otāretvā pathaviyaṃ pāteyya, evameva bhagavā
atk-s0203a0:893_3: kulaputtassa arūpāvacarajjhāne vaṇṇaṃ kathesi. Taṃ sutvā kulaputto rūpāvacarajjhāne
atk-s0203a0:894_0: Bhagavā taṃ ñatvā taṃ asampattassa appaṭiladdhasseva bhikkhuno “atthesā ākāsānañcāyatanādīsu
atk-s0203a0:894_1: sampatti nāma. Tesañhi paṭhamabrahmaloke vīsatikappasahassāni āyu, dutiye cattālīsaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:894_2: tatiye saṭṭhi, catutthe caturāsīti kappasahassāni āyu. Taṃ pana aniccaṃ adhuvaṃ asassataṃ
atk-s0203a0:894_3: tāvakālikaṃ, cavanaparibhedanaviddhaṃsanadhammaṃ, jātiyā anugataṃ, jarāya anusaṭaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:894_4: maraṇena abbhāhataṃ, dukkhe patiṭṭhitaṃ, atāṇaṃ aleṇaṃ asaraṇaṃ asaraṇībhūtaṃ, ettakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:894_5: kālaṃ tattha sampattiṃ anubhavitvāpi puthujjanakālakiriyaṃ katvā puna catūsu apāyesu
atk-s0203a0:894_6: patitabba”nti sabbametaṃ ādīnavaṃ ekapadeneva “saṅkhatameta”nti kathesi. Kulaputto
atk-s0203a0:894_7: taṃ sutvā arūpāvacarajjhāne nikantiṃ pariyādiyi, bhagavā tassa rūpāvacarārūpāvacaresu
atk-s0203a0:894_8: nikantiyā pariyādinnabhāvaṃ ñatvā arahattanikūṭaṃ gaṇhanto “so neva taṃ abhisaṅkharotī”tiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:895_0: Yathā vā paneko mahāyodho ekaṃ rājānaṃ ārādhetvā satasahassuṭṭhānakaṃ gāmavaraṃ labheyya,
atk-s0203a0:895_1: puna rājā tassānubhāvaṃ saritvā – “mahānubhāvo yodho, appakaṃ tena laddha”nti – “nāyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:895_2: tāta gāmo tuyhaṃ anucchaviko, aññaṃ catusatasahassuṭṭhānakaṃ gaṇhāhī”ti dadeyya so
atk-s0203a0:895_3: sādhu devāti taṃ vissajjetvā itaraṃ gāmaṃ gaṇheyya. Rājā asampattameva ca naṃ pakkosāpetvā
atk-s0203a0:895_4: – “kiṃ te tena, ahivātarogo ettha uppajjati? Asukasmiṃ pana ṭhāne mahantaṃ nagaraṃ
atk-s0203a0:895_5: atthi, tattha chattaṃ ussāpetvā rajjaṃ kārehī”ti pahiṇeyya, so tathā kareyya.
atk-s0203a0:896_0: Tattha rājā viya sammāsambuddho daṭṭhabbo, mahāyodho viya pukkusāti kulaputto, paṭhamaladdhagāmo
atk-s0203a0:896_1: viya ānāpānacatutthajjhānaṃ, taṃ vissajjetvā itaraṃ gāmaṃ gaṇhāhīti vuttakālo viya
atk-s0203a0:896_2: ānāpānacatutthajjhāne nikantipariyādānaṃ katvā āruppakathanaṃ, taṃ gāmaṃ asampattameva
atk-s0203a0:896_3: pakkosāpetvā “kiṃ te tena, ahivātarogo ettha uppajjati? Asukasmiṃ ṭhāne nagaraṃ atthi,
atk-s0203a0:896_4: tattha chattaṃ ussāpetvā rajjaṃ kārehī”ti vuttakālo viya arūpe saṅkhatametanti ādīnavakathanena
atk-s0203a0:896_5: appattāsuyeva tāsu samāpattīsu patthanaṃ nivatthāpetvā upari arahattanikūṭena desanāgahaṇaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:897_0: Tattha neva abhisaṅkharotīti nāyūhati na rāsiṃ karoti. Na abhisañcetayatīti na kappeti.
atk-s0203a0:897_1: Bhavāya vā vibhavāya vāti vuddhiyā vā parihāniyā vā, sassatucchedavasenapi yojetabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:897_2: Na kiñci loke upādiyatīti loke rūpādīsu kiñci ekadhammampi taṇhāya na gaṇhāti, na
atk-s0203a0:897_3: parāmasati. Nāparaṃ itthattāyāti pajānātīti bhagavā attano buddhavisaye ṭhatvā desanāya
atk-s0203a0:897_4: arahattanikūṭaṃ gaṇhi. Kulaputto pana attano yathopanissayena tīṇi sāmaññaphalāni
atk-s0203a0:897_5: paṭivijjhi. Yathā nāma rājā suvaṇṇabhājanena nānārasabhojanaṃ bhuñjanto attano pamāṇena
atk-s0203a0:897_6: piṇḍaṃ vaṭṭetvā aṅke nisinnena rājakumārena piṇḍamhi ālaye dassite taṃ piṇḍaṃ upanāmeyya,
atk-s0203a0:897_7: kumāro attano mukhappamāṇeneva kabaḷaṃ kareyya, sesaṃ rājā sayaṃ vā bhuñjeyya, pātiyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:897_8: vā pakkhipeyya, evaṃ dhammarājā tathāgato attano pamāṇena arahattanikūṭaṃ gaṇhanto
atk-s0203a0:897_9: desanaṃ desesi, kulaputto attano yathopanissayena tīṇi sāmaññaphalāni paṭivijjhi.
atk-s0203a0:898_0: Ito pubbe panassa khandhā dhātuyo āyatanānīti evarūpaṃ accantasuññataṃ tilakkhaṇāhataṃ
atk-s0203a0:898_1: kathaṃ kathentassa neva kaṅkhā, na vimati, nāpi – “evaṃ kira taṃ, evaṃ me ācariyena
atk-s0203a0:898_2: vutta”nti iti kira na dandhāyitattaṃ na vitthāyitattaṃ atthi. Ekaccesu ca kira ṭhānesu
atk-s0203a0:898_3: buddhā aññātakavesena vicaranti, sammāsambuddho nu kho esoti ahudeva saṃsayo, ahu
atk-s0203a0:898_4: vimati. Yato anena anāgāmiphalaṃ paṭividdhaṃ, atha ayaṃ me satthāti niṭṭhaṃ gato.
atk-s0203a0:898_5: Yadi evaṃ kasmā accayaṃ na desesīti. Okāsābhāvato. Bhagavā hi yathānikkhittāya mātikāya
atk-s0203a0:898_6: acchinnadhāraṃ katvā ākāsagaṅgaṃ otārento viya desanaṃ desesiyeva.
atk-s0203a0:899: 363. Soti arahā. Anajjhositāti gilitvā pariniṭṭhāpetvā gahetuṃ na yutthāti pajānāti. Anabhinanditāti taṇhādiṭṭhivasena abhinandituṃ na yuttāti pajānāti.
atk-s0203a0:900_0: 364. Visaṃyutto naṃ vedetīti sace hissa sukhavedanaṃ ārabbha rāgānusayo, dukkhavedanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:900_1: ārabbha paṭighānusayo, itaraṃ ārabbha avijjānusayo uppajjeyya, saṃyutto vediyeyya
atk-s0203a0:900_2: nāma. Anuppajjanato pana visaṃyutto naṃ vedeti nissaṭo vippamutto. Kāyapariyantikanti
atk-s0203a0:900_3: kāyakoṭikaṃ. Yāva kāyapavattā uppajjitvā tato paraṃ anuppajjanavedananti attho. Dutiyapadepi
atk-s0203a0:900_4: eseva nayo. Anabhinanditāni sītībhavissantīti dvādasasu āyatanesu kilesānaṃ visevanassa
atk-s0203a0:900_5: natthitāya anabhinanditāni hutvā idha dvādasasuyeva āyatanesu nirujjhissanti. Kilesā
atk-s0203a0:900_6: hi nibbānaṃ āgamma niruddhāpi yattha natthi, tattha niruddhāti vuccanti. Svāyamattho
atk-s0203a0:900_7: – “etthesā taṇhā nirujjhamānā nirujjhatī”ti samudayapañhena dīpetabbo. Tasmā bhagavā
atk-s0203a0:900_8: nibbānaṃ āgamma sītibhūtānipi idheva sītībhavissantīti āha. Nanu ca idha vedayitāni
atk-s0203a0:900_9: vuttāni, na kilesāti. Vedayitānipi kilesābhāveneva sītībhavanti. Itarathā nesaṃ sītibhāvo
atk-s0203a0:901_0: 365. Evameva khoti ettha idaṃ opammasaṃsandanaṃ – yathā hi eko puriso telapadīpassa
atk-s0203a0:901_1: jhāyato tele khīṇe telaṃ āsiñcati, vaṭṭiyā khīṇāya vaṭṭiṃ pakkhipati, evaṃ dīpasikhāya
atk-s0203a0:901_2: anupacchedova hoti, evameva puthujjano ekasmiṃ bhave ṭhito kusalākusalaṃ karoti,
atk-s0203a0:901_3: so tena sugatiyañca apāyesu ca nibbattatiyeva, evaṃ vedanānaṃ anupacchedova hoti.
atk-s0203a0:901_4: Yathā paneko dīpasikhāya ukkaṇṭhito – “imaṃ purisaṃ āgamma dīpasikhā na upacchijjatī”ti
atk-s0203a0:901_5: nilīno tassa purisassa sīsaṃ chindeyya, evaṃ vaṭṭiyā ca telassa ca anupahārā dīpasikhā
atk-s0203a0:901_6: anāhārā nibbāyati, evameva vaṭṭe ukkaṇṭhito yogāvacaro arahattamaggena kusalākusalaṃ
atk-s0203a0:901_7: samucchindati, tassa samucchinnattā khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno kāyassa bhedā puna vedayitāni na uppajjantīti.
atk-s0203a0:902_0: Tasmāti yasmā ādimhi samādhivipassanāpaññāhi arahattaphalapaññā uttaritarā, tasmā.
atk-s0203a0:902_1: Evaṃ samannāgatoti iminā uttamena arahattaphalapaññādhiṭṭhānena samannāgato. Sabbadukkhakkhaye
atk-s0203a0:902_2: ñāṇaṃ nāma arahattamagge ñāṇaṃ, imasmiṃ pana sutte arahattaphale ñāṇaṃ adhippetaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:902_3: Tenevāha tassa sā vimutti sacce ṭhitā akuppā hotīti.
atk-s0203a0:903_0: 366. Ettha hi vimuttīti arahattaphalavimutti, saccanti paramatthasaccaṃ nibbānaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:903_1: Iti akuppārammaṇakaraṇena akuppāti vuttā. Musāti vitathaṃ. Mosadhammanti nassanasabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:903_2: Taṃ saccanti taṃ avitathaṃ sabhāvo. Amosadhammanti anassanasabhāvaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:904_0: Tasmāti yasmā ādito samathavipassanāvasena vacīsaccato dukkhasaccasamudayasaccehi
atk-s0203a0:904_1: ca paramatthasaccaṃ nibbānameva uttaritaraṃ, tasmā. Evaṃ samannāgatoti iminā uttamena
atk-s0203a0:905_0: 367. Pubbeti puthujjanakāle. Upadhī hontīti khandhūpadhi kilesūpadhi abhisaṅkhārūpadhi
atk-s0203a0:905_1: pañcakāmaguṇūpadhīti ime upadhayo honti. Samattā samādinnāti paripūrā gahitā paramaṭṭhā.
atk-s0203a0:905_2: Tasmāti yasmā ādito samathavipassanāvasena kilesapariccāgato, sotāpattimaggādīhi
atk-s0203a0:905_3: ca kilesapariccāgato arahattamaggeneva kilesapariccāgo uttaritaro, tasmā. Evaṃ samannāgatoti
atk-s0203a0:906_0: 368. Āghātotiādīsu āghātakaraṇavasena āghāto, byāpajjanavasena byāpādo, sampadussanavasena
atk-s0203a0:906_1: sampadosoti tīhi padehi dosākusalamūlameva vuttaṃ. Tasmāti yasmā ādito samathavipassanāvasena
atk-s0203a0:906_2: kilesavūpasamato, sotāpattimaggādīhi kilesavūpasamato ca arahattamaggeneva kilesavūpasamo
atk-s0203a0:906_3: uttaritaro, tasmā. Evaṃ samannāgatoti iminā uttamena upasamādhiṭṭhānena samannāgato.
atk-s0203a0:907_0: 369. Maññitametanti taṇhāmaññitaṃ mānamaññitaṃ diṭṭhimaññitanti tividhampi vaṭṭati.
atk-s0203a0:907_1: Ayamahamasmīti ettha pana ayamahanti ekaṃ taṇhāmaññitameva vaṭṭati. Rogotiādīsu ābādhaṭṭhena
atk-s0203a0:907_2: rogo, antodosaṭṭhena gaṇḍo, anupaviṭṭhaṭṭhena sallaṃ. Muni santoti vuccatīti khīṇāsavamuni
atk-s0203a0:907_3: santo nibbutoti vuccati. Yattha ṭhitanti yasmiṃ ṭhāne ṭhitaṃ. Saṃkhittenāti buddhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:907_4: kira sabbāpi dhammadesanā saṃkhittāva, vitthāradesanā nāma natthi, samantapaṭṭhānakathāpi
atk-s0203a0:907_5: saṃkhittāyeva. Iti bhagavā desanaṃ yathānusandhiṃ pāpesi. Ugghāṭitaññūtiādīsu pana
atk-s0203a0:907_6: catūsu puggalesu pukkusāti kulaputto vipañcitaññū, iti vipañcitaññuvasena bhagavā
atk-s0203a0:908_0: 370. Na kho me, bhante, paripuṇṇaṃ pattacīvaranti kasmā kulaputtassa iddhimayapattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0203a0:908_1: na nibbattanti. Pubbe aṭṭhannaṃ parikkhārānaṃ adinnattā. Kulaputto hi dinnadāno katābhinīhāro,
atk-s0203a0:908_2: na dinnattāti na vattabbaṃ. Iddhimayapattacīvaraṃ pana pacchimabhavikānaṃyeva nibbattati,
atk-s0203a0:908_3: ayañca punapaṭisandhiko, tasmā na nibbattanti. Atha bhagavā sayaṃ pariyesitvā kasmā
atk-s0203a0:908_4: na upasampādesīti. Okāsābhāvato. Kulaputtassa āyu parikkhīṇaṃ, suddhāvāsiko anāgāmī
atk-s0203a0:908_5: mahābrahmā kumbhakārasālaṃ āgantvā nisinno viya ahosi. Tasmā sayaṃ na pariyesi.
atk-s0203a0:909_0: Pattacīvarapariyesanaṃ pakkāmīti kāya velāya pakkāmi? Uṭṭhite aruṇe. Bhagavato kira
atk-s0203a0:909_1: dhammadesanāpariniṭṭhānañca aruṇuṭṭhānañca rasmivissajjanañca ekakkhaṇe ahosi. Bhagavā
atk-s0203a0:909_2: kira desanaṃ niṭṭhapetvāva chabbaṇṇarasmiyo vissajji, sakalakumbhakāranivesanaṃ ekapajjotaṃ
atk-s0203a0:909_3: ahosi, chabbaṇṇarasmiyo jālajālā puñjapuñjā hutvā vidhāvantiyo sabbadisābhāge suvaṇṇapaṭapariyonaddhe
atk-s0203a0:909_4: viya ca nānāvaṇṇakusumaratanavisarasamujjale viya ca akaṃsu. Bhagavā “nagaravāsino
atk-s0203a0:909_5: maṃ passantū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi. Nagaravāsino bhagavantaṃ disvāva “satthā kira āgato,
atk-s0203a0:909_6: kumbhakārasālāya kira nisinno”ti aññamaññassa ārocetvā rañño ārocesuṃ.
atk-s0203a0:910_0: Rājā āgantvā satthāraṃ vanditvā, “bhante, kāya velāya āgatatthā”ti pucchi. Hiyyo
atk-s0203a0:910_1: sūriyatthaṅgamanavelāya mahārājāti. Kena kammena bhagavāti? Tumhākaṃ sahāyo pukkusāti
atk-s0203a0:910_2: rājā tumhehi pahitaṃ sāsanaṃ sutvā nikkhamitvā pabbajitvā maṃ uddissa āgacchanto
atk-s0203a0:910_3: sāvatthiṃ atikkamma pañcacattālīsa yojanāni āgantvā imaṃ kumbhakārasālaṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0203a0:910_4: nisīdi, ahaṃ tassa saṅgahatthaṃ āgantvā dhammakathaṃ kathesiṃ, kulaputto tīṇi phalāni
atk-s0203a0:910_5: paṭivijjhi mahārājāti. Idāni kahaṃ, bhanteti? Upasampadaṃ yācitvā aparipuṇṇapattacīvaratāya
atk-s0203a0:910_6: pattacīvarapariyesanatthaṃ gato mahārājāti. Rājā kulaputtassa gatadisābhāgena agamāsi.
atk-s0203a0:911_0: Kulaputtopi pattacīvaraṃ pariyesamāno neva bimbisārarañño na takkasīlakānaṃ jaṅghavāṇijānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:911_1: santikaṃ agamāsi. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “na kho me kukkuṭassa viya tattha tattha manāpāmanāpameva
atk-s0203a0:911_2: vicinitvā pattacīvaraṃ pariyesituṃ yuttaṃ, mahantaṃ nagaraṃ vajjitvā udakatitthasusānasaṅkāraṭṭhānaantaravīthīsu
atk-s0203a0:911_3: pariyesissāmī”ti antaravīthiyaṃ saṅkārakūṭesu tāva pilotikaṃ pariyesituṃ āraddho.
atk-s0203a0:912_0: Jīvitā voropesīti etasmiṃ saṅkārakūṭe pilotikaṃ olokentaṃ vibbhantā taruṇavacchā
atk-s0203a0:912_1: gāvī upadhāvitvā siṅgena vijjhitvā ghātesi. Chātakajjhatto kulaputto ākāseyeva āyukkhayaṃ
atk-s0203a0:912_2: patvā patito. Saṅkāraṭṭhāne adhomukhaṭṭhapitā suvaṇṇapaṭimā viya ahosi, kālaṅkato
atk-s0203a0:912_3: ca pana avihābrahmaloke nibbatti, nibbattamattova arahattaṃ pāpuṇi. Avihābrahmaloke
atk-s0203a0:912_4: kira nibbattamattāva satta janā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0203a0:915: Ke ca te ataruṃ paṅkaṃ, maccudheyyaṃ suduttaraṃ;
atk-s0203a0:916: Ke hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ, dibbayogaṃ upaccaguṃ.
atk-s0203a0:917: Upako palagaṇḍo ca, pukkusāti ca te tayo;
atk-s0203a0:918: Bhaddiyo khaṇḍadevo ca, bāhuraggi ca siṅgiyo;
atk-s0203a0:919: Te hitvā mānusaṃ dehaṃ, dibbayogaṃ upaccagu”nti. ;
atk-s0203a0:920_0: Bimbisāropi “mayhaṃ sahāyo mayā pesitasāsanamattaṃ vācetvā hatthagataṃ rajjaṃ pahāya
atk-s0203a0:920_1: ettakaṃ addhānaṃ āgato, dukkaraṃ kataṃ kulaputtena, pabbajitasakkārena taṃ sakkarissāmī”ti
atk-s0203a0:920_2: “pariyesatha me sahāyaka”nti tattha tattha pesesi. Pesitā taṃ addasaṃsu saṅkāraṭṭhāne
atk-s0203a0:920_3: patitaṃ, disvā āgamma rañño ārocesuṃ. Rājā gantvā kulaputtaṃ disvā – “na vata, bho,
atk-s0203a0:920_4: labhimhā sahāyakassa sakkāraṃ kātuṃ, anātho me jāto sahāyako”ti. Paridevitvā kulaputtaṃ
atk-s0203a0:920_5: mañcakena gaṇhāpetvā yuttokāse ṭhapetvā anupasampannassa sakkāraṃ kātuṃ jānanābhāvena
atk-s0203a0:920_6: nhāpakakappakādayo pakkosāpetvā kulaputtaṃ sīsaṃ nhāpetvā suddhavatthāni nivāsāpetvā
atk-s0203a0:920_7: rājavesena alaṅkārāpetvā sovaṇṇasivikaṃ āropetvā sabbatāḷāvacaragandhamālādīhi pūjaṃ
atk-s0203a0:920_8: karonto nagarā nīharitvā bahūhi gandhakaṭṭhehi mahācitakaṃ kāretvā kulaputtassa sarīrakiccaṃ
atk-s0203a0:920_9: katvā dhātuyo ādāya cetiyaṃ patiṭṭhapesi. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:924_0: 371. Evaṃ me sutanti saccavibhaṅgasuttaṃ. Tattha ācikkhanāti idaṃ dukkhaṃ ariyasaccaṃ
atk-s0203a0:924_1: nāma…pe… ayaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ nāmāti. Sesapadesupi eseva
atk-s0203a0:924_2: nayo. Apicettha paññāpanā nāma dukkhasaccādīnaṃ ṭhapanā. Āsanaṃ ṭhapento hi āsanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:924_3: paññapetīti vuccati. Paṭṭhapanāti paññāpanā. Vivaraṇāti vivaṭakaraṇā. Vibhajanāti
atk-s0203a0:925_0: Anuggāhakāti āmisasaṅgahena dhammasaṅgahenāti dvīhipi saṅgahehi anuggāhakā. Janetāti
atk-s0203a0:925_1: janikā mātā. Āpādetāti posetā. Posikamātā viya moggallānoti dīpeti. Janikamātā hi
atk-s0203a0:925_2: nava vā dasa vā māse loṇambilādīni pariharamānā kucchiyā dārakaṃ dhāretvā kucchito
atk-s0203a0:925_3: nikkhantaṃ posikamātaraṃ dhātiṃ paṭicchāpeti. Sā khīranavanītādīhi dārakaṃ posetvā
atk-s0203a0:925_4: vaḍḍheti, so vuddhimāgamma yathāsukhaṃ vicarati. Evameva sāriputto attano vā paresaṃ
atk-s0203a0:925_5: vā santike pabbajite dvīhi saṅgahehi saṅgaṇhanto gilāne paṭijagganto kammaṭṭhāne
atk-s0203a0:925_6: yojetvā sotāpannabhāvaṃ ñatvā apāyabhayehi vuṭṭhitakālato paṭṭhāya – “idāni paccattapurisakārena
atk-s0203a0:925_7: uparimagge nibbattessantī”ti tesu anapekkho hutvā aññe nave nave ovadati. Mahāmoggallānopi
atk-s0203a0:925_8: attano vā paresaṃ vā santike pabbajite tatheva saṅgaṇhitvā kammaṭṭhāne yojetvā heṭṭhā
atk-s0203a0:925_9: tīṇi phalāni pattesupi anapekkhataṃ na āpajjati. Kasmā? Evaṃ kirassa hoti – vuttaṃ
atk-s0203a0:925_10: bhagavatā – “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, appamattakopi gūtho duggandho hoti…pe… appamattakampi
atk-s0203a0:925_11: muttaṃ… kheḷo… pubbo… lohitaṃ duggandhaṃ hoti, evameva kho ahaṃ, bhikkhave, appamattakampi
atk-s0203a0:925_12: bhavaṃ na vaṇṇemi antamaso accharāsaṅghatamattampī”ti. Tasmā yāva arahattaṃ na pāpuṇanti,
atk-s0203a0:925_13: tāva tesu anapekkhataṃ anāpajjitvā arahattaṃ pattesuyeva āpajjatīti. Tenāha bhagavā
atk-s0203a0:925_14: – “seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, janetā evaṃ sāriputto. Seyyathāpi jātassa āpādetā, evaṃ
atk-s0203a0:925_15: moggallāno. Sāriputto, bhikkhave, sotāpattiphale vineti, moggallāno uttamatthe”ti. Pahotīti sakkoti.
atk-s0203a0:926_0: Dukkhe ñāṇanti savanasammasanapaṭivedhañāṇaṃ, tathā dukkhasamudaye. Dukkhanirodhe
atk-s0203a0:926_1: savanapaṭivedhañāṇanti vaṭṭati, tathā dukkhanirodhagāminiyā paṭipadāya. Nekkhammasaṅkappādīsu
atk-s0203a0:926_2: kāmapaccanīkaṭṭhena, kāmato nissaṭabhāvena vā, kāmaṃ sammasantassa uppannoti vā,
atk-s0203a0:926_3: kāmapadaghātaṃ kāmavūpasamaṃ karonto uppannoti vā, kāmavivittante uppannoti vā nekkhammasaṅkappo.
atk-s0203a0:926_4: Sesapadadvayepi eseva nayo. Sabbepi cete pubbabhāge nānācittesu, maggakkhaṇe ekacitte
atk-s0203a0:926_5: labbhanti. Tatra hi micchāsaṅkappacetanāya samugghātako ekova saṅkappo labbhati,
atk-s0203a0:926_6: na nānā labbhati. Sammāvācādayopi pubbabhāge nānācittesu, vuttanayeneva maggakkhaṇe
atk-s0203a0:926_7: ekacitte labbhanti. Ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārena pana saccakathā visuddhimagge
atk-s0203a0:930_0: 376. Evaṃ me sutanti dakkhiṇāvibhaṅgasuttaṃ. Tattha mahāpajāpati gotamīti gotamīti
atk-s0203a0:930_1: gottaṃ. Nāmakaraṇadivase panassā laddhasakkārā brāhmaṇā lakkhaṇasampattiṃ disvā –
atk-s0203a0:930_2: “sace ayaṃ dhītaraṃ labhissati, cakkavattirañño aggamahesī bhavissati. Sace puttaṃ
atk-s0203a0:930_3: labhissati, cakkavattirājā bhavissatīti ubhayathāpi mahatīyevassā pajā bhavissatī”ti
atk-s0203a0:930_4: byākariṃsu. Athassā mahāpajāpatīti nāmaṃ akaṃsu. Idha pana gottena saddhiṃ saṃsanditvā
atk-s0203a0:930_5: mahāpajāpatigotamīti vuttaṃ. Navanti ahataṃ. Sāmaṃ vāyitanti na sahattheneva vāyitaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:930_6: ekadivasaṃ pana dhātigaṇaparivutā sippikānaṃ vāyanaṭṭhānaṃ āgantvā vemakoṭiṃ gahetvā
atk-s0203a0:931_0: Kadā pana gotamiyā bhagavato dussayugaṃ dātuṃ cittaṃ uppannanti. Abhisambodhiṃ patvā
atk-s0203a0:931_1: paṭhamagamanena kapilapuraṃ āgatakāle. Tadā hi piṇḍāya paviṭṭhaṃ satthāraṃ gahetvā
atk-s0203a0:931_2: suddhodanamahārājā sakaṃ nivesanaṃ pavesesi, atha bhagavato rūpasobhaggaṃ disvā mahāpajāpatigotamī
atk-s0203a0:931_3: cintesi – “sobhati vata me puttassa attabhāvo”ti. Athassā balavasomanassaṃ uppajji.
atk-s0203a0:931_4: Tato cintesi – “mama puttassa ekūnatiṃsa vassāni agāramajjhe vasantassa antamaso
atk-s0203a0:931_5: mocaphalamattampi mayā dinnakameva ahosi, idānipissa cīvarasāṭakaṃ dassāmī”ti. “Imasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:931_6: kho pana rājagehe bahūni mahagghāni vatthāni atthi, tāni maṃ na tosenti, sahatthā
atk-s0203a0:931_7: katameva maṃ toseti, sahatthā katvā dassāmī”ti cittaṃ uppādesi.
atk-s0203a0:932_0: Athantarāpaṇā kappāsaṃ āharāpetvā sahattheneva pisitvā pothetvā sukhumasuttaṃ kantitvā
atk-s0203a0:932_1: antovatthusmiṃyeva sālaṃ kārāpetvā sippike pakkosāpetvā sippikānaṃ attano paribhogakhādanīyabhojanīyameva
atk-s0203a0:932_2: datvā vāyāpesi, kālānukālañca dhātigaṇaparivutā gantvā vemakoṭiṃ aggahesi. Niṭṭhitakāle
atk-s0203a0:932_3: sippikānaṃ mahāsakkāraṃ katvā dussayugaṃ gandhasamugge pakkhipitvā vāsaṃ gāhāpetvā
atk-s0203a0:932_4: – “mayhaṃ puttassa cīvarasāṭakaṃ gahetvā gamissāmī”ti rañño ārocesi. Rājā maggaṃ
atk-s0203a0:932_5: paṭiyādāpesi, vīthiyo sammajjitvā puṇṇaghaṭe ṭhapetvā dhajapaṭākā ussāpetvā rājagharadvārato
atk-s0203a0:932_6: paṭṭhāya yāva nigrodhārāmā maggaṃ paṭiyādāpetvā pupphābhikiṇṇaṃ akaṃsu. Mahāpajāpatipi
atk-s0203a0:932_7: sabbālaṅkāraṃ alaṅkaritvā dhātigaṇaparivutā samuggaṃ sīse ṭhapetvā bhagavato santikaṃ
atk-s0203a0:932_8: gantvā idaṃ me, bhante, navaṃ dussayugantiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:933_0: Dutiyampi khoti “saṅghe gotami dehī”ti vutte – “pahomahaṃ, bhante, dussakoṭṭhāgārato
atk-s0203a0:933_2: idaṃ pana me bhagavantaṃ uddissa sāmaṃ kantaṃ sāmaṃ vāyitaṃ, taṃ me, bhante, bhagavā
atk-s0203a0:933_3: paṭiggaṇhātū”ti nimantayamānā āha. Evaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ yāci, bhagavāpi paṭikkhipiyeva.
atk-s0203a0:934_0: Kasmā pana bhagavā attano diyyamānaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa dāpetīti? Mātari anukampāya.
atk-s0203a0:934_1: Evaṃ kirassa ahosi – “imissā maṃ ārabbha pubbacetanā muñcacetanā paracetanāti tisso
atk-s0203a0:934_2: cetanā uppannā, bhikkhusaṅghampissā ārabbha uppajjantu, evamassā cha cetanā ekato
atk-s0203a0:934_3: hutvā dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya pavattissantī”ti. Vitaṇḍavādī panāha – “saṅghe dinnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:934_4: mahapphalanti tasmā evaṃ vutta”nti. So vattabbo – “kiṃ tvaṃ satthu dinnato saṅghe
atk-s0203a0:934_5: dinnaṃ mahapphalataraṃ vadasī”ti āma vadāmīti. Suttaṃ āharāti. Saṅghe gotami dehi,
atk-s0203a0:934_6: saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cāti. Kiṃ panassa suttassa ayameva
atk-s0203a0:934_7: atthoti? Āma ayamevāti. Yadi evaṃ “tena hānanda, vighāsādānaṃ pūvaṃ dehī”ti ca “tena
atk-s0203a0:934_8: hi tva, kaccāna, vighāsādānaṃ guḷaṃ dehī”ti ca vacanato vighāsādānaṃ dinnaṃ mahapphalatarañca
atk-s0203a0:934_9: bhaveyya. Evampi hi “satthā attano diyyamānaṃ dāpetī”ti. Rājarājamahāmattādayopi
atk-s0203a0:934_10: attano āgataṃ paṇṇākāraṃ hatthigopakādīnaṃ dāpenti, te rājādīhi mahantatarā bhaveyyuṃ.
atk-s0203a0:939: Vacanato hi satthārā uttaritaro dakkhiṇeyyo nāma natthi. Evamassā cha cetanā ekato hutvā dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya bhavissantīti sandhāya yāvatatiyaṃ paṭibāhitvā saṅghassa dāpesi.
atk-s0203a0:940_0: Pacchimāya janatāya saṅghe cittīkārajananatthaṃ cāpi evamāha. Evaṃ kirassa ahosi
atk-s0203a0:940_1: – “ahaṃ na ciraṭṭhitiko, mayhaṃ pana sāsanaṃ bhikkhusaṅghe patiṭṭhahissati, pacchimā
atk-s0203a0:940_2: janatā saṅghe cittīkāraṃ janetū”ti yāvatatiyaṃ paṭibāhitvā saṅghassa dāpesi. Evañhi
atk-s0203a0:940_3: sati – “satthā attano diyyamānampi saṅghassa dāpesi, saṅgho nāma dakkhiṇeyyo”ti pacchimā
atk-s0203a0:940_4: janatā saṅghe cittīkāraṃ uppādetvā cattāro paccaye dātabbe maññissati, saṅgho catūhi
atk-s0203a0:940_5: paccayehi akilamanto buddhavacanaṃ uggahetvā samaṇadhammaṃ karissati. Evaṃ mama sāsanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:940_6: pañca vassasahassāni ṭhassatīti. “Paṭiggaṇhātu, bhante, bhagavā”ti vacanatopi cetaṃ
atk-s0203a0:940_7: veditabbaṃ “satthārā uttaritaro dakkhiṇeyyo nāma natthī”ti. Na hi ānandattherassa
atk-s0203a0:940_8: mahāpajāpatiyā āghāto vā veraṃ vā atthi. Na thero – “tassā dakkhiṇā mā mahapphalā
atk-s0203a0:940_9: ahosī”ti icchati. Paṇḍito hi thero bahussuto sekkhapaṭisambhidāpatto, so satthu dinnassa
atk-s0203a0:940_10: mahapphalabhāve sampassamānova paṭiggaṇhātu, bhante, bhagavāti gahaṇatthaṃ yāci.
atk-s0203a0:941_0: Puna vitaṇḍavādī āha – “saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā”ti vacanato
atk-s0203a0:941_1: satthā saṅghapariyāpanno vāti. So vattabbo – “jānāsi pana tvaṃ kati saraṇāni, kati
atk-s0203a0:941_2: aveccappasādā”ti jānanto tīṇīti vakkhati, tato vattabbo – tava laddhiyā satthu saṅghapariyāpannattā
atk-s0203a0:941_3: dveyeva honti. Evaṃ sante ca – “anujānāmi, bhikkhave, imehi tīhi saraṇagamanehi pabbajjaṃ
atk-s0203a0:941_4: upasampada”nti evaṃ anuññātā pabbajjāpi upasampadāpi na ruhati. Tato tvaṃ neva pabbajito
atk-s0203a0:941_5: asi, na gihi. Sammāsambuddhe ca gandhakuṭiyaṃ nisinne bhikkhū uposathampi pavāraṇampi
atk-s0203a0:941_6: saṅghakammānipi karonti, tāni satthu saṅghapariyāpannattā kuppāni bhaveyyuṃ, na ca
atk-s0203a0:942_0: 377. Āpādikāti saṃvaḍḍhikā, tumhākaṃ hatthapādesu hatthapādakiccaṃ asādhentesu hatthe
atk-s0203a0:942_1: ca pāde ca vaḍḍhetvā paṭijaggikāti attho. Posikāti divasassa dve tayo vāre nhāpetvā
atk-s0203a0:942_2: bhojetvā pāyetvā tumhe posesi. Thaññaṃ pāyesīti nandakumāro kira bodhisattato katipāheneva
atk-s0203a0:942_3: daharo, tasmiṃ jāte mahāpajāpati attano puttaṃ dhātīnaṃ datvā sayaṃ bodhisattassa
atk-s0203a0:942_4: dhātikiccaṃ sādhayamānā attano thaññaṃ pāyesi. Taṃ sandhāya thero evamāha. Iti mahāpajāpatiyā
atk-s0203a0:942_5: bahūpakārataṃ kathetvā idāni tathāgatassa bahūpakārataṃ dassento bhagavāpi, bhantetiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:942_6: Tattha bhagavantaṃ, bhante, āgammāti bhagavantaṃ paṭicca nissāya sandhāya.
atk-s0203a0:943_0: 378. Atha bhagavā dvīsu upakāresu atirekataraṃ anumodanto evametantiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0203a0:943_1: yaṃ hānanda, puggalo puggalaṃ āgammāti yaṃ ācariyapuggalaṃ antevāsikapuggalo āgamma.
atk-s0203a0:943_2: Imassānanda, puggalassa iminā puggalenāti imassa ācariyapuggalassa iminā antevāsikapuggalena.
atk-s0203a0:943_3: Na suppaṭikāraṃ vadāmīti paccūpakāraṃ na sukaraṃ vadāmi, abhivādanādīsu ācariyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:943_4: disvā abhivādanakaraṇaṃ abhivādanaṃ nāma. Yasmiṃ vā disābhāge ācariyo vasati, iriyāpathe
atk-s0203a0:943_5: vā kappento tadabhimukho vanditvā gacchati, vanditvā nisīdati, vanditvā nipajjati,
atk-s0203a0:943_6: ācariyaṃ pana dūratova disvā paccuṭṭhāya paccuggamanakaraṇaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ nāma. Ācariyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:943_7: pana disvā añjaliṃ paggayha sīse ṭhapetvā ācariyaṃ namassati, yasmiṃ vā disābhāge
atk-s0203a0:943_8: so vasati, tadabhimukhopi tatheva namassati, gacchantopi ṭhitopi nisinnopi añjaliṃ
atk-s0203a0:943_9: paggayha namassatiyevāti idaṃ añjalikammaṃ nāma. Anucchavikakammassa pana karaṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:943_10: sāmīcikammaṃ nāma. Cīvarādīsu cīvaraṃ dento na yaṃ vā taṃ vā deti, mahagghaṃ satamūlikampi
atk-s0203a0:943_11: pañcasatamūlikampi sahassamūlikampi detiyeva. Piṇḍapātādīsupi eseva nayo. Kiṃ bahunā,
atk-s0203a0:943_12: catūhi paṇītapaccayehi cakkavāḷantaraṃ pūretvā sinerupabbatena kūṭaṃ gahetvā dentopi
atk-s0203a0:943_13: ācariyassa anucchavikaṃ kiriyaṃ kātuṃ na sakkotiyeva.
atk-s0203a0:944_0: 379. Cuddasa kho panimāti kasmā ārabhi? Idaṃ suttaṃ pāṭipuggalikaṃ dakkhiṇaṃ ārabbha
atk-s0203a0:944_2: samādapeti, cuddasasu ca ṭhānesu dinnadānaṃ pāṭipuggalikaṃ nāma hotīti dassetuṃ imaṃ
atk-s0203a0:944_3: desanaṃ ārabhi. Ayaṃ paṭhamāti ayaṃ dakkhiṇā guṇavasenapi paṭhamā jeṭṭhakavasenapi.
atk-s0203a0:944_4: Ayañhi paṭhamā aggā jeṭṭhikā, imissā dakkhiṇāya pamāṇaṃ nāma natthi. Dutiyatatiyāpi
atk-s0203a0:944_5: paramadakkhiṇāyeva, sesā paramadakkhiṇabhāvaṃ na pāpuṇanti. Bāhirake kāmesu vītarāgeti
atk-s0203a0:944_7: nāma gosīladhātuko hoti, asaṭho amāyāvī paraṃ apīḷetvā dhammena samena kasiyā vā
atk-s0203a0:944_8: vaṇijjāya vā jīvikaṃ kappetā. Puthujjanadussīleti puthujjanadussīlā nāma kevaṭṭamacchabandhādayo
atk-s0203a0:945_0: Idāni pāṭipuggalikadakkhiṇāya vipākaṃ paricchindanto tatrānandātiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0203a0:945_1: tiracchānagateti yaṃ guṇavasena upakāravasena posanatthaṃ dinnaṃ, idaṃ na gahitaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:945_2: Yampi ālopaaḍḍhaālopamattaṃ dinnaṃ, tampi na gahitaṃ. Yaṃ pana sunakhasūkarakukkuṭakākādīsu
atk-s0203a0:945_3: yassa kassaci sampattassa phalaṃ paṭikaṅkhitvā yāvadatthaṃ dinnaṃ, idaṃ sandhāya
atk-s0203a0:945_4: vuttaṃ “tiracchānagate dānaṃ datvā”ti. Sataguṇāti satānisaṃsā. Pāṭikaṅkhitabbāti
atk-s0203a0:945_5: icchitabbā. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – ayaṃ dakkhiṇā āyusataṃ vaṇṇasataṃ sukhasataṃ balasataṃ
atk-s0203a0:945_6: paṭibhānasatanti pañca ānisaṃsasatāni deti, attabhāvasate āyuṃ deti, vaṇṇaṃ, sukhaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:945_7: balaṃ, paṭibhānaṃ deti, nipparitasaṃ karoti. Bhavasatepi vutte ayameva attho. Iminā
atk-s0203a0:946_0: Sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanneti ettha heṭṭhimakoṭiyā tisaraṇaṃ gato upāsakopi
atk-s0203a0:946_1: sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno nāma, tasmiṃ dinnadānampi asaṅkhyeyyaṃ appameyyaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:946_2: Pañcasīle patiṭṭhitassa tato uttari mahapphalaṃ, dasasīle patiṭṭhitassa tato uttari,
atk-s0203a0:946_3: tadahupabbajitassa sāmaṇerassa tato uttari, upasampannabhikkhuno tato uttari, upasampannasseva
atk-s0203a0:946_4: vattasampannassa tato uttari, vipassakassa tato uttari, āraddhavipassakassa tato
atk-s0203a0:946_5: uttari, uttamakoṭiyā pana maggasamaṅgī sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya paṭipanno nāma.
atk-s0203a0:947_0: Kiṃ pana maggasamaṅgissa sakkā dānaṃ dātunti? Āma sakkā. Āraddhavipassako hi pattacīvaramādāya
atk-s0203a0:947_1: gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisati, tassa gehadvāre ṭhitassa hatthato pattaṃ gahetvā khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:947_2: pakkhipanti. Tasmiṃ khaṇe bhikkhuno maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, idaṃ dānaṃ maggasamaṅgino
atk-s0203a0:947_3: dinnaṃ nāma hoti. Atha vā panesa āsanasālāya nisinno hoti, manussā gantvā patte khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:947_4: ṭhapenti, tasmiṃ khaṇe tassa maggavuṭṭhānaṃ hoti, idampi dānaṃ maggasamaṅgino dinnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:947_5: nāma. Atha vā panassa vihāre vā āsanasālāya vā nisinnassa upāsakā pattaṃ ādāya attano
atk-s0203a0:947_6: gharaṃ gantvā khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ pakkhipanti, tasmiṃ khaṇe tassa maggavuṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:947_7: hoti, idampi dānaṃ maggasamaṅgino dinnaṃ nāma. Tattha soṇḍiyaṃ udakassa viya sotāpattiphalasacchikiriyāya
atk-s0203a0:947_8: paṭipanne dinnadānassa asaṅkhyeyyatā veditabbā. Tāsu tāsu mahānadīsu mahāsamudde
atk-s0203a0:947_9: ca udakassa viya sotāpannādīsu dinnadānassa uttaritaravasena asaṅkhyeyyatā veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:947_10: Pathaviyā khayamaṇḍalamatte padese paṃsuṃ ādiṃ katvā yāva mahāpathaviyā paṃsuno appameyyatāyapi
atk-s0203a0:948_0: 380. Satta kho panimāti kasmā ārabhi? “Saṅghe gotami dehi, saṅghe te dinne ahañceva
atk-s0203a0:948_1: pūjito bhavissāmi saṅgho cā”ti hi vuttaṃ, tattha sattasu ṭhānesu dinnadānaṃ saṅghe
atk-s0203a0:948_2: dinnaṃ nāma hotīti dassetuṃ imaṃ desanaṃ ārabhi. Tattha buddhappamukhe ubhatosaṅgheti
atk-s0203a0:948_3: ekato bhikkhusaṅgho, ekato bhikkhunisaṅgho, satthā majjhe nisinno hotīti ayaṃ buddhappamukho
atk-s0203a0:948_4: ubhatosaṅgho nāma. Ayaṃ paṭhamāti imāya dakkhiṇāya samappamāṇā dakkhiṇā nāma natthi.
atk-s0203a0:948_5: Dutiyadakkhiṇādayo pana etaṃ paramadakkhiṇaṃ na pāpuṇanti.
atk-s0203a0:949_0: Kiṃ pana tathāgate parinibbute buddhappamukhassa ubhatosaṅghassa dānaṃ dātuṃ sakkāti?
atk-s0203a0:949_1: Sakkā. Kathaṃ? Ubhatosaṅghassa hi pamukhe sadhātukaṃ paṭimaṃ āsane ṭhapetvā ādhārakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:949_2: ṭhapetvā dakkhiṇodakaṃ ādiṃ katvā sabbaṃ satthu paṭhamaṃ datvā ubhatosaṅghassa dātabbaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:949_3: evaṃ buddhappamukhassa ubhatosaṅghassa dānaṃ dinnaṃ nāma hoti. Tattha yaṃ satthu
atk-s0203a0:949_4: dinnaṃ, taṃ kiṃ kātabbanti? Yo satthāraṃ paṭijaggati vattasampanno bhikkhu, tassa
atk-s0203a0:949_5: dātabbaṃ. Pitusantakañhi puttassa pāpuṇāti, bhikkhusaṅghassa dātumpi vaṭṭati, sappitelāni
atk-s0203a0:949_6: pana gahetvā dīpā jalitabbā, sāṭakaṃ gahetvā paṭākā āropetabbāti. Bhikkhusaṅgheti
atk-s0203a0:950_0: Gotrabhunoti gottamattakameva anubhavamānā, nāmamattasamaṇāti attho. Kāsāvakaṇṭhāti
atk-s0203a0:950_1: kāsāvakaṇṭhanāmakā. Te kira ekaṃ kāsāvakhaṇḍaṃ hatthe vā gīvāya vā bandhitvā vicarissanti.
atk-s0203a0:950_2: Gharadvāraṃ pana tesaṃ puttabhariyā kasivaṇijjādikammāni ca pākatikāneva bhavissanti.
atk-s0203a0:950_3: Tesu dussīlesu saṅghaṃ uddissa dānaṃ dassantīti ettha dussīlasaṅghanti na vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:950_4: Saṅgho hi dussīlo nāma natthi. Dussīlā pana upāsakā tesu dussīlesu bhikkhusaṅghaṃ
atk-s0203a0:950_5: uddissa saṅghassa demāti dānaṃ dassanti. Iti bhagavatā buddhappamukhe saṅghe dinnadakkhiṇāpi
atk-s0203a0:950_6: guṇasaṅkhāya asaṅkhyeyyāti vuttaṃ. Kāsāvakaṇṭhasaṅghe dinnadakkhiṇāpi guṇasaṅkhāyeva
atk-s0203a0:950_7: asaṅkhyeyyāti vuttā. Saṅghagatā dakkhiṇā hi saṅghe cittīkāraṃ kātuṃ sakkontassa hoti,
atk-s0203a0:951_0: Yo hi saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dassāmīti deyyadhammaṃ paṭiyādetvā vihāraṃ gantvā, –
atk-s0203a0:951_1: “bhante, saṅghaṃ uddissa ekaṃ theraṃ dethā”ti vadati, atha saṅghato sāmaṇeraṃ labhitvā
atk-s0203a0:951_2: “sāmaṇero me laddho”ti aññathattaṃ āpajjati, tassa dakkhiṇā saṅghagatā na hoti. Mahātheraṃ
atk-s0203a0:951_3: labhitvāpi “mahāthero me laddho”ti somanassaṃ uppādentassāpi na hotiyeva. Yo pana
atk-s0203a0:951_4: sāmaṇeraṃ vā upasampannaṃ vā daharaṃ vā theraṃ vā bālaṃ vā paṇḍitaṃ vā yaṃkiñci saṅghato
atk-s0203a0:951_5: labhitvā nibbematiko hutvā saṅghassa demīti saṅghe cittīkāraṃ kātuṃ sakkoti, tassa
atk-s0203a0:951_6: dakkhiṇā saṅghagatā nāma hoti. Parasamuddavāsino kira evaṃ karonti.
atk-s0203a0:952_0: Tattha hi eko vihārasāmi kuṭumbiko “saṅghagataṃ dakkhiṇaṃ dassāmī”ti saṅghato uddisitvā
atk-s0203a0:952_1: ekaṃ bhikkhuṃ dethāti yāci. So ekaṃ dussīlabhikkhuṃ labhitvā nisinnaṭṭhānaṃ opuñjāpetvā
atk-s0203a0:952_2: āsanaṃ paññāpetvā upari vitānaṃ bandhitvā gandhadhūmapupphehi pūjetvā pāde dhovitvā
atk-s0203a0:952_3: telena makkhetvā buddhassa nipaccakāraṃ karonto viya saṅghe cittīkārena deyyadhammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:952_4: adāsi. So bhikkhu pacchābhattaṃ vihārajagganatthāya kudālakaṃ dethāti gharadvāraṃ
atk-s0203a0:952_5: āgato, upāsako nisinnova kudālaṃ pādena khipitvā “gaṇhā”ti adāsi. Tamenaṃ manussā
atk-s0203a0:952_6: āhaṃsu – “tumhehi pātova etassa katasakkāro vattuṃ na sakkā, idāni upacāramattakampi
atk-s0203a0:952_7: natthi, kiṃ nāmeta”nti. Upāsako – “saṅghassa so ayyā cittīkāro, na etassā”ti āha.
atk-s0203a0:952_8: Kāsāvakaṇṭhasaṅghassa dinnadakkhiṇaṃ pana ko sodhetīti? Sāriputtamoggallānādayo asīti
atk-s0203a0:952_9: mahātherā sodhentīti. Apica therā ciraparinibbutā, there ādiṃ katvā yāvajja dharamānā
atk-s0203a0:953_0: Na tvevāhaṃ, ānanda, kenaci pariyāyena saṅghagatāya dakkhiṇāyāti ettha atthi buddhappamukho
atk-s0203a0:953_1: saṅgho, atthi etarahi saṅgho, atthi anāgate kāsāvakaṇṭhasaṅgho. Buddhappamukho saṅgho
atk-s0203a0:953_2: etarahi saṅghena na upanetabbo, etarahi saṅgho anāgate kāsāvakaṇṭhasaṅghena saddhiṃ
atk-s0203a0:953_3: na upanetabbo. Tena teneva samayena kathetabbaṃ. Saṅghato uddisitvā gahitasamaṇaputhujjano
atk-s0203a0:953_4: hi pāṭipuggaliko sotāpanno, saṅghe cittīkāraṃ kātuṃ sakkontassa puthujjanasamaṇe
atk-s0203a0:953_5: dinnaṃ mahapphalataraṃ. Uddisitvā gahito sotāpanno pāṭipuggaliko sakadāgāmītiādīsupi
atk-s0203a0:953_6: eseva nayo. Saṅghe cittīkāraṃ kātuṃ sakkontassa hi khīṇāsave dinnadānato uddisitvā
atk-s0203a0:953_7: gahite dussīlepi dinnaṃ mahapphalatarameva. Yaṃ pana vuttaṃ “sīlavato kho, mahārāja,
atk-s0203a0:953_8: dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ, no tathā dussīle”ti, taṃ imaṃ nayaṃ pahāya “catasso kho imānanda,
atk-s0203a0:954_0: 381. Dāyakato visujjhatīti mahapphalabhāvena visujjhati, mahapphalā hotīti attho.
atk-s0203a0:954_1: Kalyāṇadhammoti sucidhammo, na pāpadhammo. Dāyakato visujjhatīti cettha vessantaramahārājā
atk-s0203a0:954_2: kathetabbo. So hi jūjakabrāhmaṇassa dārake datvā pathaviṃ kampesi.
atk-s0203a0:955_0: Paṭiggāhakato visujjhatīti ettha kalyāṇīnadīmukhadvāravāsikevaṭṭo kathetabbo. So
atk-s0203a0:955_1: kira dīghasomattherassa tikkhattumpi piṇḍapātaṃ datvā maraṇamañce nipanno “ayyassa
atk-s0203a0:956_0: Neva dāyakatoti ettha vaḍḍhamānavāsiluddako kathetabbo. So kira petadakkhiṇaṃ dento
atk-s0203a0:956_1: ekassa dussīlasseva tayo vāre adāsi, tatiyavāre “amanusso dussīlo maṃ vilumpatī”ti
atk-s0203a0:956_2: viravi, ekassa sīlavantabhikkhuno datvā pāpitakāleyevassa pāpuṇi.
atk-s0203a0:957: Dāyakato ceva visujjhatīti ettha asadisadānaṃ kathetabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:958_0: Sā dakkhiṇā dāyakato visujjhatīti ettha yathā nāma cheko kassako asārampi khettaṃ
atk-s0203a0:958_1: labhitvā samaye kasitvā paṃsuṃ apanetvā sārabījāni patiṭṭhapetvā rattindivaṃ ārakkhe
atk-s0203a0:958_2: pamādaṃ anāpajjanto aññassa sārakhettato adhikataraṃ dhaññaṃ labhati, evaṃ sīlavā
atk-s0203a0:958_3: dussīlassa datvāpi phalaṃ mahantaṃ adhigacchatīti. Iminā upāyena sabbapadesu visujjhanaṃ veditabbaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:959_0: Vītarāgo vītarāgesūti ettha vītarāgo nāma anāgāmī, arahā pana ekantavītarāgova, tasmā
atk-s0203a0:959_1: arahatā arahato dinnadānameva aggaṃ. Kasmā? Bhavālayassa bhavapatthanāya abhāvato.
atk-s0203a0:959_2: Nanu khīṇāsavo dānaphalaṃ na saddahatīti? Dānaphalaṃ saddahantā khīṇāsavasadisā na
atk-s0203a0:959_3: honti. Khīṇāsavena katakammaṃ pana nicchandarāgattā kusalaṃ vā akusalaṃ vā na hoti,
atk-s0203a0:959_4: kiriyaṭṭhāne tiṭṭhati, tenevassa dānaṃ aggaṃ hotīti vadanti.
atk-s0203a0:960_0: Kiṃ pana sammāsambuddhena sāriputtattherassa dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ, udāhu sāriputtattherena
atk-s0203a0:960_1: sammāsambuddhassa dinnanti. Sammāsambuddhena sāriputtattherassa dinnaṃ mahapphalanti
atk-s0203a0:960_2: vadanti. Sammāsambuddhañhi ṭhapetvā añño dānassa vipākaṃ jānituṃ samattho nāma natthi.
atk-s0203a0:960_3: Dānañhi catūhi sampadāhi dātuṃ sakkontassa tasmiṃyeva attabhāve vipākaṃ deti. Tatrimā
atk-s0203a0:960_4: sampadā – deyyadhammassa dhammena samena paraṃ apīḷetvā uppannatā, pubbacetanādivasena
atk-s0203a0:960_5: cetanāya mahattatā, khīṇāsavabhāvena guṇātirekatā, taṃdivasaṃ nirodhato vuṭṭhitabhāvena vatthusampannatāti.
atk-s0203a0:965_0: 383. Evaṃ me sutanti anāthapiṇḍikovādasuttaṃ. Tattha bāḷhagilānoti adhimattagilāno
atk-s0203a0:965_1: maraṇaseyyaṃ upagato. Āmantesīti gahapatissa kira yāva pādā vahiṃsu, tāva divase
atk-s0203a0:965_2: sakiṃ vā dvikkhattuṃ vā tikkhattuṃ vā buddhupaṭṭhānaṃ akhaṇḍaṃ akāsi. Yattakañcassa
atk-s0203a0:965_3: satthu upaṭṭhānaṃ ahosi, tattakaṃyeva mahātherānaṃ. So ajja gamanapādassa pacchinnattā
atk-s0203a0:965_4: anuṭṭhānaseyyaṃ upagato sāsanaṃ pesetukāmo aññataraṃ purisaṃ āmantesi. Tenupasaṅkamīti
atk-s0203a0:966: 384. Paṭikkamantīti osakkanti, tanukā bhavanti. Abhikkamantīti abhivaḍḍhanti ottharanti, balavatiyo honti.
atk-s0203a0:967_0: Abhikkamosānaṃ paññāyati no paṭikkamoti yasmiñhi samaye māraṇantikā vedanā uppajjati,
atk-s0203a0:967_1: uparivāte jalitaggi viya hoti, yāva usmā na pariyādiyati, tāva mahatāpi upakkamena
atk-s0203a0:967_2: na sakkā vūpasametuṃ, usmāya pana pariyādinnāya vūpasammati.
atk-s0203a0:968_0: 385. Athāyasmā sāriputto cintesi – “ayaṃ mahāseṭṭhissa vedanā māraṇantikā, na sakkā
atk-s0203a0:968_1: paṭibāhituṃ, avasesā kathā niratthakā, dhammakathamassa kathessāmī”ti. Atha naṃ taṃ
atk-s0203a0:968_2: kathento tasmātihātiādimāha. Tattha tasmāti yasmā cakkhuṃ tīhi gāhehi gaṇhanto uppannaṃ
atk-s0203a0:968_3: māraṇantikaṃ vedanaṃ paṭibāhituṃ samattho nāma natthi, tasmā. Na cakkhuṃ upādiyissāmīti
atk-s0203a0:968_4: cakkhuṃ tīhi gāhehi na gaṇhissāmi. Na ca me cakkhunissitaṃ viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāpi
atk-s0203a0:968_5: me cakkhunissitaṃ na bhavissati. Na rūpanti heṭṭhā āyatanarūpaṃ kathitaṃ, imasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:969_0: 386. Na idhalokanti vasanaṭṭhānaṃ vā ghāsacchādanaṃ vā na upādiyissāmīti attho. Idañhi
atk-s0203a0:969_1: paccayesu aparitassanatthaṃ kathitaṃ. Na paralokanti ettha pana manussalokaṃ ṭhapetvā
atk-s0203a0:969_2: sesā paralokā nāma. Idaṃ – “asukadevaloke nibbattitvā asukaṭṭhāne bhavissāmi, idaṃ
atk-s0203a0:969_3: nāma khādissāmi bhuñjissāmi nivāsessāmi pārupissāmī”ti evarūpāya paritassanāya pahānatthaṃ
atk-s0203a0:969_4: vuttaṃ. Tampi na upādiyissāmi, na ca me tannissitaṃ viññāṇaṃ bhavissatīti evaṃ tīhi
atk-s0203a0:969_5: gāhehi parimocetvā thero desanaṃ arahattanikūṭena niṭṭhapesi.
atk-s0203a0:970_0: 387. Olīyasīti attano sampattiṃ disvā ārammaṇesu bajjhasi allīyasīti. Iti āyasmā
atk-s0203a0:970_1: ānando – “ayampi nāma gahapati evaṃ saddho pasanno maraṇabhayassa bhāyati, añño ko
atk-s0203a0:970_2: na bhāyissatī”ti maññamāno tassa gāḷhaṃ katvā ovādaṃ dento evamāha. Na ca me evarūpī
atk-s0203a0:970_3: dhammīkathā sutapubbāti ayaṃ upāsako – “satthu santikāpi me evarūpī dhammakathā na
atk-s0203a0:970_4: sutapubbā”ti vadati, kiṃ satthā evarūpi sukhumaṃ gambhīrakathaṃ na kathetīti? No
atk-s0203a0:970_5: na katheti. Evaṃ pana cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni cha bāhirāni cha viññāṇakāye cha
atk-s0203a0:970_6: phassakāye cha vedanākāye cha dhātuyo pañcakkhandhe cattāro arūpe idhalokañca paralokañca
atk-s0203a0:970_7: dassetvā diṭṭhasutamutaviññātavasena arahatte pakkhipitvā kathitakathā etena na sutapubbā, tasmā evaṃ vadati.
atk-s0203a0:971_0: Apicāyaṃ upāsako dānādhimutto dānābhirato buddhānaṃ santikaṃ gacchanto tucchahattho
atk-s0203a0:971_1: na gatapubbo. Purebhattaṃ gacchanto yāgukhajjakādīni gāhāpetvā gacchati, pacchābhattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:971_2: sappimadhuphāṇitādīni. Tasmiṃ asati vālikaṃ gāhāpetvā gandhakuṭipariveṇe okirāpeti,
atk-s0203a0:971_3: dānaṃ datvā sīlaṃ rakkhitvā gehaṃ gato. Bodhisattagatiko kiresa upāsako, tasmā bhagavā
atk-s0203a0:971_4: catuvīsati saṃvaccharāni upāsakassa yebhuyyena dānakathameva kathesi – “upāsaka,
atk-s0203a0:971_5: idaṃ dānaṃ nāma bodhisattānaṃ gatamaggo, mayhampi gatamaggo, mayā satasahassakappādhikāni
atk-s0203a0:971_6: cattāri asaṅkhyeyyāni dānaṃ dinnaṃ, tvaṃ mayā gatamaggameva anugacchasī”ti. Dhammasenāpatiādayo
atk-s0203a0:971_7: mahāsāvakāpi attano attano santikaṃ āgatakāle dānakathamevassa kathenti. Tenevāha
atk-s0203a0:971_8: na kho gahapati gihīnaṃ odātavasanānaṃ evarūpī dhammīkathā paṭibhātīti. Idaṃ vuttaṃ
atk-s0203a0:971_10: ālayo tibbaṃ nikantipariyuṭṭhānaṃ, tesaṃ – “ettha ālayo na kātabbo, nikanti na kātabbā”ti
atk-s0203a0:972_0: Yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamīti kasmā upasaṅkami? Tusitabhavane kirassa nibbattamattasseva
atk-s0203a0:972_1: tigāvutappamāṇaṃ suvaṇṇakkhandhaṃ viya vijjotamānaṃ attabhāvaṃ uyyānavimānādisampattiñca
atk-s0203a0:972_2: disvā – “mahatī ayaṃ mayhaṃ sampatti, kiṃ nu kho me manussapathe kammaṃ kata”nti
atk-s0203a0:972_3: olokento tīsu ratanesu adhikāraṃ disvā cintesi “pamādaṭṭhānamidaṃ devattaṃ nāma,
atk-s0203a0:972_4: imāya hi me sampattiyā modamānassa satisammosopi siyā, handāhaṃ gantvā mama jetavanassa
atk-s0203a0:972_5: ceva bhikkhusaṅghassa ca tathāgatassa ca ariyamaggassa ca sāriputtattherassa ca vaṇṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:972_6: kathetvā tato āgantvā sampattiṃ anubhavissāmī”ti. So tathā akāsi. Taṃ dassetuṃ atha
atk-s0203a0:973_0: Tattha isisaṅghanisevitanti bhikkhusaṅghanisevitaṃ. Evaṃ paṭhamagāthāya jetavanassa
atk-s0203a0:973_1: vaṇṇaṃ kathetvā idāni ariyamaggassa vaṇṇaṃ kathento kammaṃ vijjā cātiādimāha. Tattha
atk-s0203a0:973_2: kammanti maggacetanā. Vijjāti maggapaññā. Dhammoti samādhipakkhiko dhammo. Sīlaṃ
atk-s0203a0:973_3: jīvitamuttamanti sīle patiṭṭhitassa jīvitaṃ uttamanti dasseti. Atha vā vijjāti diṭṭhisaṅkappo.
atk-s0203a0:973_4: Dhammoti vāyāmasatisamādhayo. Sīlanti vācākammantājīvā. Jīvitamuttamanti etasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:973_5: sīle patiṭṭhitassa jīvitaṃ nāma uttamaṃ. Etena maccā sujjhantīti etena aṭṭhaṅgikena
atk-s0203a0:974_0: Tasmāti yasmā maggena sujjhanti, na gottadhanehi, tasmā. Yoniso vicine dhammanti
atk-s0203a0:974_1: upāyena samādhipakkhiyaṃ dhammaṃ vicineyya. Evaṃ tattha visujjhatīti evaṃ tasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:974_2: ariyamagge visujjhati. Atha vā yoniso vicine dhammanti upāyena pañcakkhandhadhammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:974_3: vicineyya. Evaṃ tattha visujjhatīti evaṃ tesu catūsu saccesu visujjhati.
atk-s0203a0:975_0: Idāni sāriputtattherassa vaṇṇaṃ kathento sāriputto vātiādimāha. Tattha sāriputto
atk-s0203a0:975_1: vāti avadhāraṇavacanaṃ. Etehi paññādīhi sāriputtova seyyoti vadati. Upasamenāti kilesaupasamena.
atk-s0203a0:975_2: Pāraṅgatoti nibbānaṃ gato. Yo koci nibbānaṃ patto bhikkhu, so etāvaparamo siyā, na
atk-s0203a0:975_3: therena uttaritaro nāma atthīti vadati. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:979_0: 389. Evaṃ me sutanti channovādasuttaṃ. Tattha channoti evaṃnāmako thero, na abhinikkhamanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:979_2: nāma buddhavaṇṇitaṃ, tasmā evamāha. Satthanti jīvitahārakasatthaṃ. Nāvakaṅkhāmīti icchāmi.
atk-s0203a0:981_0: 391. Etaṃ mamātiādīni taṇhāmānadiṭṭhigāhavasena vuttāni. Nirodhaṃ disvāti khayavayaṃ
atk-s0203a0:981_1: ñatvā. Netaṃ mama nesohamasmi na meso attāti samanupassāmīti aniccaṃ dukkhaṃ anattāti samanupassāmi.
atk-s0203a0:982_0: 393. Tasmāti yasmā māraṇantikavedanaṃ adhivāsetuṃ asakkonto satthaṃ āharāmīti vadati,
atk-s0203a0:982_1: tasmā. Puthujjano āyasmā, tena idampi manasi karohīti dīpeti. Niccakappanti niccakālaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:982_2: Nissitassāti taṇhādiṭṭhīhi nissitassa. Calitanti vipphanditaṃ hoti. Passaddhīti kāyacittapassaddhi,
atk-s0203a0:982_3: kilesapassaddhi nāma hotīti attho. Natīti taṇhānati. Natiyā asatīti bhavatthāya ālayanikantipariyuṭṭhānesu
atk-s0203a0:982_4: asati. Āgatigati na hotīti paṭisandhivasena āgati nāma na hoti, cutivasena gamanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:982_5: nāma na hoti. Cutūpapātoti cavanavasena cuti, upapajjanavasena upapāto. Nevidha na
atk-s0203a0:982_6: huraṃ na ubhayamantarenāti nayidha loke, na paraloke, na ubhayattha hoti. Esevanto
atk-s0203a0:982_7: dukkhassāti vaṭṭadukkhakilesadukkhassa ayameva anto ayaṃ paricchedo parivaṭumabhāvo
atk-s0203a0:982_8: hoti. Ayameva hi ettha attho. Ye pana “na ubhayamantarenā”ti vacanaṃ gahetvā antarābhavaṃ
atk-s0203a0:983_0: 394. Satthaṃ āharesīti jīvitahārakaṃ satthaṃ āhari, kaṇṭhanāḷiṃ chindi. Athassa tasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:983_1: khaṇe maraṇabhayaṃ okkami, gatinimittaṃ upaṭṭhāsi. So attano puthujjanabhāvaṃ ñatvā
atk-s0203a0:983_2: saṃviggo vipassanaṃ paṭṭhapetvā saṅkhāre pariggaṇhanto arahattaṃ patvā samasīsī hutvā
atk-s0203a0:983_3: parinibbāyi. Sammukhāyeva anupavajjatā byākatāti kiñcāpi idaṃ therassa puthujjanakāle
atk-s0203a0:983_4: byākaraṇaṃ hoti, etena pana byākaraṇena anantarāyamassa parinibbānaṃ ahosi. Tasmā
atk-s0203a0:983_5: bhagavā tameva byākaraṇaṃ gahetvā kathesi. Upavajjakulānīti upasaṅkamitabbakulāni.
atk-s0203a0:983_6: Iminā thero, – “bhante, evaṃ upaṭṭhākesu ca upaṭṭhāyikāsu ca vijjamānāsu so bhikkhu
atk-s0203a0:983_7: tumhākaṃ sāsane parinibbāyissatī”ti pucchati. Athassa bhagavā kulesu saṃsaggābhāvaṃ
atk-s0203a0:983_8: dīpento honti hete sāriputtātiādimāha. Imasmiṃ kira ṭhāne therassa kulesu asaṃsaṭṭhabhāvo
atk-s0203a0:987_0: 395. Evaṃ me sutanti puṇṇovādasuttaṃ. Tattha paṭisallānāti ekībhāvā. Taṃ ceti taṃ
atk-s0203a0:987_1: cakkhuñceva rūpañca. Nandīsamudayā dukkhasamudayoti nandiyā taṇhāya samodhānena pañcakkhandhadukkhassa
atk-s0203a0:987_2: samodhānaṃ hoti. Iti chasu dvāresu dukkhaṃ samudayoti dvinnaṃ saccānaṃ vasena vaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0203a0:987_3: matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassesi. Dutiyanaye nirodho maggoti dvinnaṃ saccānaṃ vasena vivaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0203a0:987_4: matthakaṃ pāpetvā dassesi. Iminā ca tvaṃ puṇṇāti pāṭiyekko anusandhi. Evaṃ tāva vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena
atk-s0203a0:987_5: desanaṃ arahatte pakkhipitvā idāni puṇṇattheraṃ sattasu ṭhānesu sīhanādaṃ nadāpetuṃ
atk-s0203a0:988_0: 396. Caṇḍāti duṭṭhā kibbisā. Pharusāti kakkhaḷā. Akkosissantīti dasahi akkosavatthūhi
atk-s0203a0:988_1: akkosissanti. Paribhāsissantīti kiṃ samaṇo nāma tvaṃ, idañca idañca te karissāmāti
atk-s0203a0:988_2: tajjessanti. Evametthāti evaṃ mayhaṃ ettha bhavissati.
atk-s0203a0:989_0: Daṇḍenāti catuhatthena daṇḍena vā ghaṭikamuggarena vā. Satthenāti ekatodhārādinā.
atk-s0203a0:989_1: Satthahārakaṃ pariyesantīti jīvitahārakaṃ satthaṃ pariyesanti. Idaṃ thero tatiyapārājikavatthusmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:989_2: asubhakathaṃ sutvā attabhāvena jigucchantānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ satthahārakapariyesanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:989_3: sandhāyāha. Damūpasamenāti ettha damoti indriyasaṃvarādīnaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ. “Saccena
atk-s0203a0:989_4: danto damasā upeto, vedantagū vusitabrahmacariyo”ti ettha hi indriyasaṃvaro damoti
atk-s0203a0:989_5: vutto. “Yadi saccā damā cāgā, khantyā bhiyyodha vijjatī”ti ettha paññā damoti vutto.
atk-s0203a0:989_6: “Dānena damena saṃyamena saccavajjenā”ti ettha uposathakammaṃ damoti vuttaṃ. Imasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:989_7: pana sutte khanti damoti veditabbā. Upasamoti tasseva vevacanaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:990: 397. Atha kho āyasmā puṇṇoti ko panesa puṇṇo, kasmā panettha gantukāmo ahosīti. Sunāparantavāsiko eva eso, sāvatthiyaṃ pana asappāyavihāraṃ sallakkhetvā tattha gantukāmo ahosi.
atk-s0203a0:991_0: Tatrāyaṃ anupubbikathā – sunāparantaraṭṭhe kira ekasmiṃ vāṇijakagāme ete dve bhātaro.
atk-s0203a0:991_1: Tesu kadāci jeṭṭho pañca sakaṭasatāni gahetvā janapadaṃ gantvā bhaṇḍaṃ āharati, kadāci
atk-s0203a0:991_2: kaniṭṭho. Imasmiṃ pana samaye kaniṭṭhaṃ ghare ṭhapetvā jeṭṭhabhātiko pañca sakaṭasatāni
atk-s0203a0:991_3: gahetvā janapadacārikaṃ caranto anupubbena sāvatthiṃ patvā jetavanassa nātidūre sakaṭasatthaṃ
atk-s0203a0:992_0: Tena ca samayena sāvatthivāsino bhuttapātarāsā uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya suddhuttarāsaṅgā
atk-s0203a0:992_1: gandhapupphādihatthā yena buddho yena dhammo yena saṅgho, tanninnā tappoṇā tappābbhārā
atk-s0203a0:992_2: hutvā dakkhiṇadvārena nikkhamitvā jetavanaṃ gacchanti. So te disvā “kahaṃ ime gacchanti”ti
atk-s0203a0:992_3: ekamanussaṃ pucchi. Kiṃ tvaṃ ayyo na jānāsi, loke buddhadhammasaṅgharatanāni nāma
atk-s0203a0:992_4: uppannāni, iccesa mahājano satthu santike dhammakathaṃ sotuṃ gacchatīti. Tassa buddhoti
atk-s0203a0:992_5: vacanaṃ chavicammādīni chinditvā aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsi. Atha attano parijanaparivuto
atk-s0203a0:992_6: tāya parisāya saddhiṃ vihāraṃ gantvā satthu madhurassarena dhammaṃ desentassa parisapariyante
atk-s0203a0:992_7: ṭhito dhammaṃ sutvā pabbajjāya cittaṃ uppādesi. Atha tathāgatena kālaṃ viditvā parisāya
atk-s0203a0:992_8: uyyojitāya satthāraṃ upasaṅkamitvā vanditvā svātanāya nimantetvā dutiyadivase maṇḍapaṃ
atk-s0203a0:992_9: kāretvā āsanāni paññapetvā buddhappamukhassa saṅghassa mahādānaṃ datvā bhuttapātarāso
atk-s0203a0:992_10: uposathaṅgāni adhiṭṭhāya bhaṇḍāgārikaṃ pakkosāpetvā, ettakaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ vissajjitaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:992_11: ettakaṃ na vissajjitanti sabbaṃ ācikkhitvā – “imaṃ sāpateyyaṃ mayhaṃ kaniṭṭhassa
atk-s0203a0:992_12: dehī”ti sabbaṃ niyyātetvā satthu santike pabbajitvā kammaṭṭhānaparāyaṇo ahosi.
atk-s0203a0:993_0: Athassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ na upaṭṭhāti. Tato cintesi – “ayaṃ
atk-s0203a0:993_1: janapado mayhaṃ asappāyo, yaṃnūnāhaṃ satthu santike kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā sakaṭṭhānameva
atk-s0203a0:993_2: gaccheyya”nti. Atha pubbaṇhasamaye piṇḍāya caritvā sāyanhasamaye paṭisallānā vuṭṭhahitvā
atk-s0203a0:993_3: bhagavantaṃ upasaṅkamitvā kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathāpetvā satta sīhanāde naditvā pakkāmi.
atk-s0203a0:993_4: Tena vuttaṃ – “atha kho āyasmā puṇṇo…pe… viharatī”ti.
atk-s0203a0:994_0: Kattha panāyaṃ vihāsīti? Catūsu ṭhānesu vihāsi, sunāparantaraṭṭhaṃ tāva pavisitvā
atk-s0203a0:994_1: ajjuhatthapabbate nāma pavisitvā vāṇijagāmaṃ piṇḍāya pāvisi. Atha naṃ kaniṭṭhabhātā
atk-s0203a0:994_2: sañjānitvā bhikkhaṃ datvā, “bhante, aññattha agantvā idheva vasathā”ti paṭiññaṃ kāretvā tattheva vasāpesi.
atk-s0203a0:995_0: Tato samuddagirivihāraṃ nāma agamāsi. Tattha ayakantapāsāṇehi paricchinditvā katacaṅkamo
atk-s0203a0:995_1: atthi, taṃ koci caṅkamituṃ samattho nāma natthi. Tattha samuddavīciyo āgantvā ayakantapāsāṇesu
atk-s0203a0:995_2: paharitvā mahāsaddaṃ karonti. Theronaṃ – “kammaṭṭhānaṃ manasikarontānaṃ phāsuvihāro
atk-s0203a0:996_0: Tato mātulagiriṃ nāma agamāsi. Tattha sakuṇasaṅgho ussanno, rattiñca divā ca saddo
atk-s0203a0:996_1: ekābaddhova hoti, thero imaṃ ṭhānaṃ aphāsukanti tato makulakārāmavihāraṃ nāma gato.
atk-s0203a0:996_2: So vāṇijagāmassa nātidūro naccāsanno gamanāgamanasampanno vivitto appasaddo. Thero
atk-s0203a0:996_3: imaṃ ṭhānaṃ phāsukanti tattha rattiṭṭhānadivāṭṭhānacaṅkamanādīni kāretvā vassaṃ upagacchi.
atk-s0203a0:997_0: Athekadivasaṃ tasmiṃyeva antovasse pañca vāṇijasatāni parasamuddaṃ gacchāmāti nāvāya
atk-s0203a0:997_1: bhaṇḍaṃ pakkhipiṃsu. Nāvārohanadivase therassa kaniṭṭhabhātā theraṃ bhojetvā therassa
atk-s0203a0:997_2: santike sikkhāpadāni gahetvā vanditvā gacchanto, – “bhante, mahāsamuddo nāma appameyyo
atk-s0203a0:997_3: anekantarāyo, amhe āvajjeyyāthā”ti vatvā nāvaṃ āruhi. Nāvā uttamajavena gacchamānā
atk-s0203a0:997_4: aññataraṃ dīpakaṃ pāpuṇi. Manussā pātarāsaṃ karissāmāti dīpake otiṇṇā. Tasmiṃ dīpe
atk-s0203a0:998_0: Atheko vāsiyā rukkhaṃ ākoṭetvā lohitacandanabhāvaṃ ñatvā āha – “bho mayaṃ lābhatthāya
atk-s0203a0:998_1: parasamuddaṃ gacchāma, ito ca uttari lābho nāma natthi, caturaṅgulamattā ghaṭikā
atk-s0203a0:998_2: satasahassaṃ agghati, hāretabbakayuttaṃ bhaṇḍaṃ hāretvā candanassa pūremā”ti. Te
atk-s0203a0:998_3: tathā kariṃsu. Candanavane adhivatthā amanussā kujjhitvā – “imehi amhākaṃ candanavanaṃ
atk-s0203a0:998_4: nāsitaṃ, ghātessāma ne”ti cintetvā – “idheva ghātitesu sabbaṃ vanaṃ ekaṃ kuṇapaṃ
atk-s0203a0:998_5: bhavissati, samuddamajjhe nesaṃ nāvaṃ osīdessāmā”ti āhaṃsu. Atha tesaṃ nāvaṃ āruyha
atk-s0203a0:998_6: muhuttaṃ gatakāleyeva uppādikaṃ uṭṭhapetvā sayampi te amanussā bhayānakāni rūpāni
atk-s0203a0:998_7: dassayiṃsu. Bhītā manussā attano attano devatā namassanti. Therassa kaniṭṭho cūḷapuṇṇakuṭumbiko
atk-s0203a0:998_8: – “mayhaṃ bhātā avassayo hotū”ti therassa namassamāno aṭṭhāsi.
atk-s0203a0:999_0: Theropi kira tasmiṃyeva khaṇe āvajjitvā tesaṃ byasanuppattiṃ ñatvā vehāsaṃ uppatitvā
atk-s0203a0:999_1: sammukhe aṭṭhāsi. Amanussā theraṃ disvā “ayyo puṇṇatthero etī”ti pakkamiṃsu, uppādikaṃ
atk-s0203a0:999_2: sannisīdi. Thero mā bhāyathāti te assāsetvā “kahaṃ gantukāmatthā”ti pucchi. Bhante,
atk-s0203a0:999_3: amhākaṃ sakaṭṭhānameva gacchāmāti. Thero nāvaṃ phale akkamitvā “etesaṃ icchitaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:999_4: gacchatū”ti adhiṭṭhāsi. Vāṇijā sakaṭṭhānaṃ gantvā taṃ pavattiṃ puttadārassa ārocetvā
atk-s0203a0:999_5: “etha theraṃ saraṇaṃ gacchāmā”ti pañcasatā attano pañcamātugāmasatehi saddhiṃ tīsu
atk-s0203a0:999_6: saraṇesu patiṭṭhāya upāsakattaṃ paṭivedesuṃ. Tato nāvāya bhaṇḍaṃ otāretvā therassa
atk-s0203a0:999_7: ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ katvā – “ayaṃ, bhante, tumhākaṃ koṭṭhāso”ti āhaṃsu. Thero – “mayhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:999_8: visuṃ koṭṭhāsakiccaṃ natthi, satthā pana tumhehi diṭṭhapubbo”ti. Na diṭṭhapubbo,
atk-s0203a0:999_9: bhanteti. Tena hi iminā satthu maṇḍalamāḷaṃ karotha, evaṃ satthāraṃ passissathāti.
atk-s0203a0:999_10: Te sādhu, bhanteti tena ca koṭṭhāsena attano ca koṭṭhāsehi maṇḍalamāḷaṃ kātuṃ ārabhiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:1000_0: Satthāpi kira āraddhakālato paṭṭhāya paribhogaṃ akāsi. Ārakkhamanussā rattiṃ obhāsaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1000_1: disvā “mahesakkhā devatā atthī”ti saññaṃ kariṃsu. Upāsakā maṇḍalamāḷañca bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0203a0:1000_2: ca senāsanāni niṭṭhapetvā dānasambhāraṃ sajjetvā – “kataṃ, bhante, amhehi attano
atk-s0203a0:1000_3: kiccaṃ, satthāraṃ pakkosathā”ti therassa ārocesuṃ. Thero sāyanhasamaye iddhiyā sāvatthiṃ
atk-s0203a0:1000_4: patvā, “bhante, vāṇijagāmavāsino tumhe daṭṭhukāmā, tesaṃ anukampaṃ karothā”ti bhagavantaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1000_5: yāci. Bhagavā adhivāsesi. Thero bhagavato adhivāsanaṃ viditvā sakaṭṭhānameva paccāgato.
atk-s0203a0:1001_0: Bhagavāpi ānandatheraṃ āmantesi, – “ānanda, sve sunāparante vāṇijagāme piṇḍāya carissāma,
atk-s0203a0:1001_1: tvaṃ ekūnapañcasatānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ salākaṃ dehī”ti. Thero sādhu, bhanteti bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0203a0:1001_2: tamatthaṃ ārocetvā nabhacārikā bhikkhū salākaṃ gaṇhantūti āha. Taṃdivasaṃ kuṇḍadhānatthero
atk-s0203a0:1001_3: paṭhamaṃ salākaṃ aggahesi. Vāṇijagāmavāsinopi “sve kira satthā āgamissatī”ti gāmamajjhe
atk-s0203a0:1001_4: maṇḍapaṃ katvā dānaggaṃ sajjayiṃsu. Bhagavā pātova sarīrapaṭijagganaṃ katvā gandhakuṭiṃ
atk-s0203a0:1001_5: pavisitvā phalasamāpattiṃ appetvā nisīdi. Sakkassa paṇḍukambalasilāsanaṃ uṇhaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0203a0:1001_6: So kiṃ idanti āvajjetvā satthu sunāparantagamanaṃ disvā vissakammaṃ āmantesi – “tāta
atk-s0203a0:1001_7: ajja bhagavā timattāni yojanasatāni piṇḍācāraṃ karissati, pañca kūṭāgārasatāni māpetvā
atk-s0203a0:1001_8: jetavanadvārakoṭṭhamatthake gamanasajjāni katvā ṭhapehī”ti. So tathā akāsi. Bhagavato
atk-s0203a0:1001_9: kūṭāgāraṃ catumukhaṃ ahosi, dvinnaṃ aggasāvakānaṃ dvimukhāni, sesāni ekamukhāni.
atk-s0203a0:1001_10: Satthā gandhakuṭito nikkhamma paṭipāṭiyā ṭhapitakūṭāgāresu dhurakūṭāgāraṃ pāvisi.
atk-s0203a0:1001_11: Dve aggasāvake ādiṃ katvā ekūnapañcabhikkhusatānipi kūṭāgāraṃ gantvā nisinnā ahesuṃ.
atk-s0203a0:1001_12: Ekaṃ tucchakūṭāgāraṃ ahosi, pañcapi kūṭāgārasatāni ākāse uppatiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:1002_0: Satthā saccabandhapabbataṃ nāma patvā kūṭāgāraṃ ākāse ṭhapesi. Tasmiṃ pabbate saccabandho
atk-s0203a0:1002_1: nāma micchādiṭṭhikatāpaso mahājanaṃ micchādiṭṭhiṃ uggaṇhāpento lābhaggayasaggappatto
atk-s0203a0:1002_2: hutvā vasati. Abbhantare cassa antocāṭiyaṃ padīpo viya arahattassa upanissayo jalati.
atk-s0203a0:1002_3: Taṃ disvā dhammamassa kathessāmīti gantvā dhammaṃ desesi. Tāpaso desanāpariyosāne
atk-s0203a0:1002_4: arahattaṃ pāpuṇi, maggenevāssa abhiññā āgatā. Ehibhikkhu hutvā iddhimayapattacīvaradharo
atk-s0203a0:1003_0: Bhagavā kūṭāgāragatehi pañcahi bhikkhusatehi saddhiṃ vāṇijagāmaṃ gantvā kūṭāgārāni
atk-s0203a0:1003_1: adissamānāni katvā vāṇijagāmaṃ pāvisi. Vāṇijā buddhappamukhassa bhikkhusaṅghassa
atk-s0203a0:1003_2: mahādānaṃ datvā satthāraṃ makulakārāmaṃ nayiṃsu. Satthā maṇḍalamāḷaṃ pāvisi. Mahājano
atk-s0203a0:1003_3: yāva satthā bhattadarathaṃ paṭipassambheti, tāva pātarāsaṃ katvā uposathaṅgāni samādāya
atk-s0203a0:1003_4: bahuṃ gandhañca pupphañca ādāya dhammassavanatthāya ārāmaṃ paccāgamāsi. Satthā dhammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1003_5: desesi. Mahājanassa bandhanamokkho jāto, mahantaṃ buddhakolāhalaṃ ahosi.
atk-s0203a0:1004_0: Satthā mahājanassa saṅgahatthaṃ katipāhaṃ tattheva vasi, aruṇaṃ pana mahāgandhakuṭiyaṃyeva
atk-s0203a0:1004_1: uṭṭhapesi. Tattha katipāhaṃ vasitvā vāṇijagāme piṇḍāya caritvā “tvaṃ idheva vasāhī”ti
atk-s0203a0:1004_2: puṇṇattheraṃ nivattetvā antare nammadānadī nāma atthi, tassā tīraṃ agamāsi. Nammadānāgarājā
atk-s0203a0:1004_3: satthu paccuggamanaṃ katvā nāgabhavanaṃ pavesetvā tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ sakkāraṃ akāsi.
atk-s0203a0:1004_4: Satthā tassa dhammaṃ kathetvā nāgabhavanā nikkhami. So – “mayhaṃ, bhante, paricaritabbaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1004_5: dethā”ti yāci, bhagavā nammadānadītīre padacetiyaṃ dassesi. Taṃ vīcīsu āgatāsu pidhīyati,
atk-s0203a0:1004_6: gatāsu vivarīyati, mahāsakkārappattaṃ ahosi. Satthā tato nikkhamma saccabandhapabbataṃ
atk-s0203a0:1004_7: gantvā saccabandhaṃ āha – “tayā mahājano apāyamagge otārito, tvaṃ idheva vasitvā
atk-s0203a0:1004_8: etesaṃ laddhiṃ vissajjāpetvā nibbānamagge patiṭṭhāpehī”ti. Sopi paricaritabbaṃ yāci.
atk-s0203a0:1004_9: Satthā ghanapiṭṭhipāsāṇe allamattikapiṇḍamhi lañchanaṃ viya padacetiyaṃ dassesi,
atk-s0203a0:1004_10: tato jetavanameva gato. Etamatthaṃ sandhāya tenevantaravassenātiādi vuttaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:1005_0: Parinibbāyīti anupādisesāya nibbānadhātuyā parinibbāyi. Mahājano therassa satta divasāni
atk-s0203a0:1005_1: sarīrapūjaṃ katvā bahūni gandhakaṭṭhāni samodhānetvā sarīraṃ jhāpetvā dhātuyo ādāya
atk-s0203a0:1005_2: cetiyaṃ akāsi. Sambahulā bhikkhūti therassa āḷāhane ṭhitabhikkhū. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:1009_0: 398. Evaṃ me sutanti nandakovādasuttaṃ. Tattha tena kho pana samayenāti bhagavā mahāpajāpatiyā
atk-s0203a0:1009_1: yācito bhikkhunisaṅghaṃ uyyojetvā bhikkhusaṅghaṃ sannipātetvā – “therā bhikkhū vārena
atk-s0203a0:1009_2: bhikkhuniyo ovadantū”ti saṅghassa bhāraṃ akāsi. Taṃ sandhāyetaṃ vuttaṃ. Tattha pariyāyenāti
atk-s0203a0:1009_3: vārena. Na icchatīti attano vāre sampatte dūraṃ gāmaṃ vā gantvā sūcikammādīni vā
atk-s0203a0:1009_4: ārabhitvā “ayaṃ nāmassa papañco”ti vadāpesi. Imaṃ pana pariyāyena ovādaṃ bhagavā
atk-s0203a0:1009_5: nandakattherasseva kāraṇā akāsi. Kasmā? Imāsañhi bhikkhunīnaṃ theraṃ disvā cittaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1009_6: ekaggaṃ hoti pasīdati. Tena tā tassa ovādaṃ sampaṭicchitukāmā, dhammakathaṃ sotukāmā.
atk-s0203a0:1009_7: Tasmā bhagavā – “nandako attano vāre sampatte ovādaṃ dassati, dhammakathaṃ kathessatī”ti
atk-s0203a0:1009_8: vārena ovādaṃ akāsi. Thero pana attano vāraṃ na karoti, kasmāti ce? Tā kira bhikkhuniyo
atk-s0203a0:1009_9: pubbe therassa jambudīpe rajjaṃ kārentassa orodhā ahesuṃ. Thero pubbenivāsañāṇena
atk-s0203a0:1009_10: taṃ kāraṇaṃ ñatvā cintesi – “maṃ imassa bhikkhunisaṅghassa majjhe nisinnaṃ upamāyo
atk-s0203a0:1009_11: ca kāraṇāni ca āharitvā dhammaṃ kathayamānaṃ disvā añño pubbenivāsañāṇalābhī bhikkhu
atk-s0203a0:1009_12: imaṃ kāraṇaṃ oloketvā ‘āyasmā nandako yāvajjadivasā orodhe na vissajjeti, sobhatāyamāyasmā
atk-s0203a0:1009_13: orodhaparivuto’ti vattabbaṃ maññeyyā”ti. Etamatthaṃ sampassamāno thero attano vāraṃ
atk-s0203a0:1009_14: na karoti. Imāsañca kira bhikkhunīnaṃ therasseva desanā sappāyā bhavissatīti ñatvā
atk-s0203a0:1009_15: atha kho bhagavā āyasmantaṃ nandakaṃ āmantesi.
atk-s0203a0:1010_0: Tāsaṃ bhikkhunīnaṃ pubbe tassa orodhabhāvajānanatthaṃ idaṃ vatthuṃ – pubbe kira bārāṇasiyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1010_1: pañca dāsasatāni pañca dāsisatāni cāti jaṅghasahassaṃ ekatova kammaṃ katvā ekasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:1010_2: ṭhāne vasi. Ayaṃ nandakatthero tasmiṃ kāle jeṭṭhakadāso hoti, gotamī jeṭṭhakadāsī.
atk-s0203a0:1010_3: Sā jeṭṭhakadāsassa pādaparicārikā ahosi paṇḍitā byattā. Jaṅghasahassampi puññakammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1010_4: karontaṃ ekato karoti. Atha vassūpanāyikasamaye pañca paccekabuddhā nandamūlakapabbhārato
atk-s0203a0:1010_5: isipatane otaritvā nagare piṇḍāya caritvā isipatanameva gantvā – “vassūpanāyikakuṭiyā
atk-s0203a0:1010_6: atthāya hatthakammaṃ yācissāmā”ti cīvaraṃ pārupitvā sāyanhasamaye nagaraṃ pavisitvā
atk-s0203a0:1010_7: seṭṭhissa gharadvāre aṭṭhaṃsu. Jeṭṭhakadāsī kuṭaṃ gahetvā udakatitthaṃ gacchantī
atk-s0203a0:1010_8: paccekabuddhe nagaraṃ pavisante addasa. Seṭṭhi tesaṃ āgatakāraṇaṃ sutvā “amhākaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1011_0: Atha te nagarā nikkhamante jeṭṭhakadāsī kuṭaṃ gahetvā pavisantī disvā kuṭaṃ otāretvā
atk-s0203a0:1011_1: vanditvā onamitvā mukhaṃ pidhāya – “ayyā nagaraṃ paviṭṭhamattāva nikkhantā, kiṃ nu
atk-s0203a0:1011_2: kho”ti pucchi. Vassūpanāyikakuṭiyā hatthakammaṃ yācituṃ āgamimhāti. Laddhaṃ, bhanteti.
atk-s0203a0:1011_3: Na laddhaṃ upāsiketi? Kiṃ panesā kuṭi issareheva kātabbā, duggatehipi sakkā kātunti.
atk-s0203a0:1011_4: Yena kenaci sakkāti? Sādhu, bhante, mayaṃ karissāma. Sve mayhaṃ bhikkhaṃ gaṇhathāti
atk-s0203a0:1011_5: nimantetvā udakaṃ netvā puna kuṭaṃ gahetvā āgamma titthamagge ṭhatvā āgatā avasesadāsiyo
atk-s0203a0:1011_6: “ettheva hothā”ti vatvā sabbāsaṃ āgatakāle āha – “amma kiṃ niccameva parassa dāsakammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1011_7: karissatha, udāhu dāsabhāvato muccituṃ icchathā”ti? Ajjeva muccitumicchāma ayyeti.
atk-s0203a0:1011_8: Yadi evaṃ mayā pañca paccekabuddhā hatthakammaṃ alabhantā svātanāya nimantitā, tumhākaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1011_9: sāmikehi ekadivasaṃ hatthakammaṃ dāpethāti. Tā sādhūti sampaṭicchitvā sāyaṃ aṭavito
atk-s0203a0:1011_10: āgatakāle sāmikānaṃ ārocesuṃ. Te sādhūti jeṭṭhakadāsassa gehadvāre sannipatiṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:1012_0: Atha ne jeṭṭhakadāsī sve tātā paccekabuddhānaṃ hatthakammaṃ dethāti ānisaṃsaṃ ācikkhitvā
atk-s0203a0:1012_1: yepi na kātukāmā, te gāḷhena ovādena tajjetvā paṭicchāpesi. Sā punadivase paccekabuddhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1012_2: bhattaṃ datvā sabbesaṃ dāsaputtānaṃ saññaṃ adāsi. Te tāvadeva araññaṃ pavisitvā dabbasambhāre
atk-s0203a0:1012_3: samodhānetvā sataṃ sataṃ hutvā ekekakuṭiṃ ekekacaṅkamanādiparivāraṃ katvā mañcapīṭhapānīyaparibhojanīyabhājanādīni
atk-s0203a0:1012_4: ṭhapetvā paccekabuddhe temāsaṃ tattha vasanatthāya paṭiññaṃ kāretvā vārabhikkhaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1012_5: paṭṭhapesuṃ. Yo attano vāradivase na sakkoti. Tassa jeṭṭhakadāsī sakagehato āharitvā
atk-s0203a0:1012_6: deti. Evaṃ temāsaṃ jaggitvā jeṭṭhakadāsī ekekaṃ dāsaṃ ekekaṃ sāṭakaṃ vissajjāpesi.
atk-s0203a0:1012_7: Pañca thūlasāṭakasatāni ahesuṃ. Tāni parivattāpetvā pañcannaṃ paccekabuddhānaṃ ticīvarāni
atk-s0203a0:1012_8: katvā adāsi. Paccekabuddhā yathāphāsukaṃ agamaṃsu. Tampi jaṅghasahassaṃ ekato kusalaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1012_9: katvā kāyassa bhedā devaloke nibbatti. Tāni pañca mātugāmasatāni kālena kālaṃ tesaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1012_10: pañcannaṃ purisasatānaṃ gehe honti, kālena kālaṃ sabbāpi jeṭṭhakadāsaputtasseva gehe
atk-s0203a0:1012_11: honti. Atha ekasmiṃ kāle jeṭṭhakadāsaputto devalokato cavitvā rājakule nibbatto.
atk-s0203a0:1012_12: Tāpi pañcasatā devakaññā mahābhogakulesu nibbattitvā tassa rajje ṭhitassa gehaṃ agamaṃsu.
atk-s0203a0:1012_13: Etena niyāmena saṃsarantiyo amhākaṃ bhagavato kāle koliyanagare devadahanagare ca
atk-s0203a0:1013_0: Nandakattheropi pabbajitvā arahattaṃ patto, jeṭṭhakadāsidhītā vayaṃ āgamma suddhodanamahārājassa
atk-s0203a0:1013_1: aggamahesiṭṭhāne ṭhitā, itarāpi tesaṃ tesaṃ rājaputtānaṃyeva gharaṃ gatā. Tāsaṃ sāmikā
atk-s0203a0:1013_2: pañcasatā rājakumārā udakacumbaṭakalahe satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā pabbajitā, rājadhītaro
atk-s0203a0:1013_3: tesaṃ ukkaṇṭhanatthaṃ sāsanaṃ pesesuṃ. Te ukkaṇṭhite bhagavā kuṇāladahaṃ netvā sotāpattiphale
atk-s0203a0:1013_4: patiṭṭhapetvā mahāsamayadivase arahatte patiṭṭhāpesi. Tāpi pañcasatā rājadhītaro
atk-s0203a0:1013_5: nikkhamitvā mahāpajāpatiyā santike pabbajiṃsu. Ayamāyasmā nandako ettāva tā bhikkhuniyoti
atk-s0203a0:1014: Rājakārāmoti pasenadinā kārito nagarassa dakkhiṇadisābhāge thūpārāmasadise ṭhāne vihāro.
atk-s0203a0:1015: 399. Sammappaññāya sudiṭṭhanti hetunā kāraṇena vipassanāpaññāya yāthāvasarasato diṭṭhaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:1016: 401. Tajjaṃ tajjanti taṃsabhāvaṃ taṃsabhāvaṃ, atthato pana taṃ taṃ paccayaṃ paṭicca tā tā vedanā uppajjantīti vuttaṃ hoti.
atk-s0203a0:1017: 402. Pagevassa chāyāti mūlādīni nissāya nibbattā chāyā paṭhamataraṃyeva aniccā.
atk-s0203a0:1018_0: 413. Anupahaccāti anupahanitvā. Tattha maṃsaṃ piṇḍaṃ piṇḍaṃ katvā cammaṃ alliyāpento
atk-s0203a0:1018_1: maṃsakāyaṃ upahanati nāma. Cammaṃ baddhaṃ baddhaṃ katvā maṃse alliyāpento maṃsakāyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1018_2: upahanati nāma. Evaṃ akatvā. Vilimaṃsaṃ nhārubandhananti sabbacamme laggavilīpanamaṃsameva.
atk-s0203a0:1019_0: 414. Satta kho panimeti kasmā āhāti? Yā hi esā paññā kilese chindatīti vuttā, sā
atk-s0203a0:1019_1: na ekikāva attano dhammatāya chindituṃ sakkoti. Yathā pana kuṭhārī na attano dhammatāya
atk-s0203a0:1019_2: chejjaṃ chindati, purisassa tajjaṃ vāyāmaṃ paṭicceva chindati, evaṃ na vinā chahi
atk-s0203a0:1019_3: bojjhaṅgehi paññā kilese chindituṃ sakkoti. Tasmā evamāha. Tena hīti yena kāraṇena
atk-s0203a0:1019_4: tayā cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni, cha bāhirāni, cha viññāṇakāye, dīpopamaṃ, rukkhopamaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:1019_5: gāvūpamañca dassetvā sattahi bojjhaṅgehi āsavakkhayena desanā niṭṭhapitā, tena kāraṇena
atk-s0203a0:1019_6: tvaṃ svepi tā bhikkhuniyo teneva ovādena ovadeyyāsīti.
atk-s0203a0:1020_0: 415. Sā sotāpannāti yā sā guṇehi sabbapacchimikā, sā sotāpannā. Sesā pana sakadāgāmianāgāminiyo
atk-s0203a0:1020_1: ca khīṇāsavā ca. Yadi evaṃ kathaṃ paripuṇṇasaṅkappāti. Ajjhāsayapāripūriyā. Yassā
atk-s0203a0:1020_2: hi bhikkhuniyā evamahosi – “kadā nu kho ahaṃ ayyassa nandakassa dhammadesanaṃ suṇantī
atk-s0203a0:1020_3: tasmiṃyeva āsane sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchikareyya”nti, sā sotāpattiphalaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0203a0:1020_4: Yassā ahosi “sakadāgāmiphalaṃ anāgāmiphalaṃ arahatta”nti, sā arahattaṃ sacchākāsi.
atk-s0203a0:1024_0: 416. Evaṃ me sutanti rāhulovādasuttaṃ. Tattha vimuttiparipācanīyāti vimuttiṃ paripācentīti
atk-s0203a0:1024_1: vimuttiparipācanīyā. Dhammāti pannarasa dhammā. Te saddhindriyādīnaṃ visuddhikāraṇavasena
atk-s0203a0:1025_0: “Assaddhe puggale parivajjayato, saddhe puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato pasādanīye
atk-s0203a0:1025_1: suttante paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi saddhindriyaṃ visujjhati. Kusīte puggale
atk-s0203a0:1025_2: parivajjayato āraddhavīriye puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato sammappadhāne paccavekkhato
atk-s0203a0:1025_3: imehi tīhākārehi vīriyindriyaṃ visujjhati. Muṭṭhassatī puggale parivajjayato upaṭṭhitassatī
atk-s0203a0:1025_4: puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato satipaṭṭhāne paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi satindriyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1025_5: visujjhati. Asamāhite puggale parivajjayato samāhite puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato
atk-s0203a0:1025_6: jhānavimokkhe paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi samādhindriyaṃ visujjhati. Duppaññe
atk-s0203a0:1025_7: puggale parivajjayato paññavante puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato gambhīrañāṇacariyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1025_8: paccavekkhato imehi tīhākārehi paññindriyaṃ visujjhati. Iti ime pañca puggale parivajjayato
atk-s0203a0:1025_9: pañca puggale sevato bhajato payirupāsato pañca suttantakkhandhe paccavekkhato imehi
atk-s0203a0:1026_0: Aparepi pannarasa dhammā vimuttiparipācanīyā – saddhādīni pañcimāni indriyāni, aniccasaññā,
atk-s0203a0:1026_1: anicce dukkhasaññā, dukkhe anattasaññā, pahānasaññā, virāgasaññāti, imā pañca nibbedhabhāgiyā
atk-s0203a0:1026_2: saññā, meghiyattherassa kathitā kalyāṇamittatādayo pañcadhammāti. Kāya pana velāya
atk-s0203a0:1027_0: 419. Anekānaṃ devatāsahassānanti āyasmatā rāhulena padumuttarassa bhagavato pādamūle
atk-s0203a0:1027_1: pālitanāgarājakāle patthanaṃ paṭṭhapentena saddhiṃ patthanaṃ paṭṭhapitadevatāyeva.
atk-s0203a0:1027_2: Tāsu pana kāci bhūmaṭṭhakā devatā, kāci antalikkhakā, kāci cātumahārājikā, kāci devaloke,
atk-s0203a0:1027_3: kāci brahmaloke nibbattā. Imasmiṃ pana divase sabbā ekaṭṭhāne andhavanasmiṃyeva sannipatitā.
atk-s0203a0:1027_4: Dhammacakkhunti upāliovāda- dīghanakhasuttesu paṭhamamaggo dhammacakkhunti vutto,
atk-s0203a0:1027_5: brahmāyusutte tīṇi phalāni, imasmiṃ sutte cattāro maggā, cattāri ca phalāni dhammacakkhunti
atk-s0203a0:1027_6: veditabbāni. Tattha hi kāci devatā sotāpannā ahesuṃ, kāci sakadāgāmī, anāgāmī, khīṇāsavā.
atk-s0203a0:1027_7: Tāsañca pana devatānaṃ ettakāti gaṇanavasena paricchedo natthi. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:1031_0: 420. Evaṃ me sutanti chachakkasuttaṃ. Tattha ādikalyāṇantiādimhi kalyāṇaṃ bhaddakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1031_1: niddosaṃ katvā desessāmi. Majjhapariyosānesupi eseva nayo. Iti bhagavā ariyavaṃsaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1031_2: navahi, mahāsatipaṭṭhānaṃ sattahi, mahāassapuraṃ sattahiyeva padehi thomesi. Idaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1032_0: Veditabbānīti sahavipassanena maggena jānitabbāni. Manāyatanena tebhūmakacittameva
atk-s0203a0:1032_1: kathitaṃ, dhammāyatanena bahiddhā tebhūmakadhammā ca, manoviññāṇena ṭhapetvā dve
atk-s0203a0:1032_2: pañcaviññāṇāni sesaṃ bāvīsatividhaṃ lokiyavipākacittaṃ. Phassavedanā yathāvuttavipākaviññāṇasampayuttāva.
atk-s0203a0:1033_0: 422. Cakkhu attāti pāṭiyekko anusandhi. Heṭṭhā kathitānañhi dvinnaṃ saccānaṃ anattabhāvadassanatthaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1033_1: ayaṃ desanā āraddhā. Tattha na upapajjatīti na yujjati. Vetīti vigacchati nirujjhati.
atk-s0203a0:1034_0: 424. Ayaṃ kho pana, bhikkhaveti ayampi pāṭiyekko anusandhi. Ayañhi desanā tiṇṇaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1034_1: gāhānaṃ vasena vaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ āraddhā. Dukkhaṃ samudayoti dvinnaṃ saccānaṃ vasena
atk-s0203a0:1034_2: vaṭṭaṃ dassetuntipi vadantiyeva. Etaṃ mamātiādīsu taṇhāmānadiṭṭhigāhāva veditabbā.
atk-s0203a0:1035_0: Evaṃ vaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni tiṇṇaṃ gāhānaṃ paṭipakkhavasena, nirodho maggoti imesaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1035_1: vā dvinnaṃ saccānaṃ vasena vivaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ ayaṃ kho panātiādimāha. Netaṃ mamātiādīni
atk-s0203a0:1035_2: taṇhādīnaṃ paṭisedhavacanāni. Samanupassatīti aniccaṃ dukkhamanattāti passati.
atk-s0203a0:1036_0: 425. Evaṃ vivaṭṭaṃ dassetvā idāni tiṇṇaṃ anusayānaṃ vasena puna vaṭṭaṃ dassetuṃ cakkhuñca,
atk-s0203a0:1036_1: bhikkhavetiādimāha. Tattha abhinandatītiādīni taṇhādiṭṭhivaseneva vuttāni. Anusetīti
atk-s0203a0:1037_0: 426. Evaṃ tiṇṇaṃ anusayānaṃ vasena vaṭṭaṃ kathetvā idāni tesaṃ paṭikkhepavasena vivaṭṭaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1037_1: dassento puna cakkhuñcātiādimāha. Avijjaṃ pahāyāti vaṭṭamūlikaṃ avijjaṃ pajahitvā.
atk-s0203a0:1038_0: 427. Ṭhānametaṃ vijjatīti ettakeneva kathāmaggena vaṭṭavivaṭṭavasena desanaṃ matthakaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1038_1: pāpetvā puna tadeva sampiṇḍetvā dassento evaṃ passaṃ, bhikkhavetiādimāha. Saṭṭhimattānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1038_2: bhikkhūnanti ettha anacchariyametaṃ, yaṃ sayameva tathāgate desente saṭṭhi bhikkhū
atk-s0203a0:1038_3: arahattaṃ pattā. Imañhi suttaṃ dhammasenāpatimhi kathentepi saṭṭhi bhikkhū arahattaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1038_4: pattā, mahāmoggallāne kathentepi, asītimahātheresu kathentesupi pattā eva. Etampi
atk-s0203a0:1039_0: Aparabhāge pana tambapaṇṇidīpe māleyyadevatthero nāma heṭṭhā lohapāsāde idaṃ suttaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1039_1: kathesi. Tadāpi saṭṭhi bhikkhū arahattaṃ pattā. Yathā ca lohapāsāde, evaṃ thero mahāmaṇḍapepi
atk-s0203a0:1039_2: idaṃ suttaṃ kathesi. Mahāvihārā nikkhamitvā cetiyapabbataṃ gato, tatthāpi kathesi.
atk-s0203a0:1039_3: Tato sākiyavaṃsavihāre, kūṭālivihāre, antarasobbhe, muttaṅgaṇe, vātakapabbate, pācinagharake,
atk-s0203a0:1039_4: dīghavāpiyaṃ, lokandare, nomaṇḍalatale kathesi. Tesupi ṭhānesu saṭṭhi saṭṭhi bhikkhū
atk-s0203a0:1039_5: arahattaṃ pattā. Tato nikkhamitvā pana thero cittalapabbataṃ gato. Tadā ca cittalapabbatavihāre
atk-s0203a0:1039_6: atirekasaṭṭhivasso mahāthero, pokkharaṇiyaṃ kuruvakatitthaṃ nāma paṭicchannaṭṭhānaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1039_7: atthi, tattha thero nhāyissāmīti otiṇṇo. Devatthero tassa santikaṃ gantvā nhāpemi,
atk-s0203a0:1039_8: bhanteti āha. Thero paṭisanthāreneva – “māleyyadevo nāma atthīti vadanti, so ayaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1039_9: bhavissatī”ti ñatvā tvaṃ devoti āha. Āma, bhanteti. Saṭṭhivassaddhānaṃ me, āvuso,
atk-s0203a0:1039_10: koci sarīraṃ hatthena phusituṃ nāma na labhi, tvaṃ pana nhāpehīti uttaritvā tīre nisīdi.
atk-s0203a0:1040_0: Thero sabbampi hatthapādādiparikammaṃ katvā mahātheraṃ nhāpesi. Taṃ divasañca dhammassavanadivaso
atk-s0203a0:1040_1: hoti. Atha mahāthero – “deva amhākaṃ dhammadānaṃ dātuṃ vaṭṭatī”ti āha. Thero sādhu,
atk-s0203a0:1040_2: bhanteti sampaṭicchi. Atthaṅgate sūriye dhammassavanaṃ ghosesuṃ. Atikkantasaṭṭhivassāva
atk-s0203a0:1040_3: saṭṭhi mahātherā dhammassavanatthaṃ agamaṃsu. Devatthero sarabhāṇāvasāne imaṃ suttaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1040_4: ārabhi, suttantapariyosāne ca saṭṭhi mahātherā arahattaṃ pāpuṇiṃsu. Tato tissamahāvihāraṃ
atk-s0203a0:1040_5: gantvā kathesi, tasmimpi saṭṭhi therā. Tato nāgamahāvihāre kāḷakacchagāme kathesi,
atk-s0203a0:1040_6: tasmimpi saṭṭhi therā. Tato kalyāṇiṃ gantvā tattha cātuddase heṭṭhāpāsāde kathesi,
atk-s0203a0:1040_7: tasmimpi saṭṭhi therā. Uposathadivase uparipāsāde kathesi, tasmimpi saṭṭhi therāti
atk-s0203a0:1040_8: evaṃ devatthereyeva idaṃ suttaṃ kathente saṭṭhiṭṭhānesu saṭṭhi saṭṭhi janā arahattaṃ pattā.
atk-s0203a0:1041_0: Ambilakāḷakavihāre pana tipiṭakacūḷanāgatthere imaṃ suttaṃ kathente manussaparisā
atk-s0203a0:1041_1: gāvutaṃ ahosi, devaparisā yojanikā. Suttapariyosāne sahassabhikkhū arahattaṃ pattā,
