atk-s0203a0:1041_2: devesu pana tato tato ekekova puthujjano ahosīti.
atk-s0203a0:1045: 428. Evaṃ me sutanti mahāsaḷāyatanikasuttaṃ. Tattha mahāsaḷāyatanikanti mahantānaṃ channaṃ āyatanānaṃ jotakaṃ dhammapariyāyaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:1046_0: 429. Ajānanti sahavipassanena maggena ajānanto. Upacayaṃ gacchantīti vuḍḍhiṃ gacchanti,
atk-s0203a0:1046_1: vasibhāvaṃ gacchantīti attho. Kāyikāti pañcadvārikadarathā. Cetasikāti manodvārikadarathā.
atk-s0203a0:1047_0: 430. Kāyasukhanti pañcadvārikasukhaṃ. Cetosukhanti manodvārikasukhaṃ. Ettha ca pañcadvārikajavanena
atk-s0203a0:1047_1: samāpajjanaṃ vā vuṭṭhānaṃ vā natthi, uppannamattakameva hoti. Manodvārikena sabbaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1047_2: hoti. Ayañca maggavuṭṭhānassa paccayabhūtā balavavipassanā, sāpi manodvārikeneva hoti.
atk-s0203a0:1048_1: assa bhikkhuno vācākammantājīvā pubbasuddhikā nāma ādito paṭṭhāya parisuddhāva honti.
atk-s0203a0:1048_3: nāma. Evaṃ lokuttaramaggo aṭṭhaṅgiko vā sattaṅgiko vā hoti.
atk-s0203a0:1049_0: Vitaṇḍavādī pana “yā yathābhūtassa diṭṭhī”ti imameva suttapadesaṃ gahetvā “lokuttaramaggo
atk-s0203a0:1049_1: pañcaṅgiko”ti vadati. So – “evamassāyaṃ ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo bhāvanāpāripūriṃ gacchatī”ti
atk-s0203a0:1049_2: iminā anantaravacaneneva paṭisedhitabbo. Uttari ca evaṃ saññāpetabbo – lokuttaramaggo
atk-s0203a0:1049_3: pañcaṅgiko nāma natthi, imāni pana pañca sabbatthakakārāpakaṅgāni maggakkhaṇe virativasena
atk-s0203a0:1049_4: pūrenti. “Yā catūhi vacīduccaritehi ārati viratī”ti evaṃ vuttaviratīsu hi micchāvācaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1049_5: pajahati, sammāvācaṃ bhāveti, evaṃ sammāvācaṃ bhāventassa imāni pañcaṅgikāni na vinā,
atk-s0203a0:1049_6: saheva viratiyā pūrenti. Sammākammantājīvesupi eseva nayo. Iti vacīkammādīni ādito
atk-s0203a0:1049_7: paṭṭhāya parisuddhāneva vaṭṭanti. Imāni pana pañca sabbatthakakārāpakaṅgāni virativasena
atk-s0203a0:1049_8: paripūrentīti pañcaṅgiko maggo nāma natthi. Subhaddasuttepi cetaṃ vuttaṃ – “yasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:1049_9: kho, subhadda, dhammavinaye ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo”ti. Aññesu ca anekesu suttasatesu
atk-s0203a0:1050_0: 433. Cattāropi satipaṭṭhānāti maggasampayuttāva cattāro satipaṭṭhānā. Sammappadhānādīsupi
atk-s0203a0:1050_1: eseva nayo. Yuganandhāti ekakkhaṇikayuganandhā. Etehi aññasmiṃ khaṇe samāpatti, aññasmiṃ
atk-s0203a0:1050_2: vipassanāti. Evaṃ nānākhaṇikāpi honti, ariyamagge pana ekakkhaṇikā.
atk-s0203a0:1051: Vijjā ca vimutti cāti arahattamaggavijjā ca phalavimutti ca. Sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
atk-s0203a0:1055: 435. Evaṃ me sutanti nagaravindeyyasuttaṃ. Tattha samavisamaṃ carantīti kālena samaṃ caranti, kālena visamaṃ. Samacariyampi hetanti samacariyampi hi etaṃ.
atk-s0203a0:1056_0: 437. Ke ākārāti kāni kāraṇāni? Ke anvayāti kā anubuddhiyo? Natthi kho pana tatthāti
atk-s0203a0:1056_1: kasmā āha, nanu araññe haritatiṇacampakavanādivasena atimanuññā rūpādayo pañca kāmaguṇā
atk-s0203a0:1056_2: atthīti? No natthi. Na panetaṃ vanasaṇḍena kathitaṃ, itthirūpādīni pana sandhāyetaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1056_3: kathitaṃ. Tāni hi purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti. Yathāha – “nāhaṃ, bhikkhave,
atk-s0203a0:1056_4: aññaṃ ekarūpampi samanupassāmi, yaṃ evaṃ purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhati, yathayidaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:1056_5: bhikkhave, itthirūpaṃ. Itthirūpaṃ, bhikkhave, purisassa cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhatī”ti
atk-s0203a0:1060: 438. Evaṃ me sutanti piṇḍapātapārisuddhisuttaṃ. Tattha paṭisallānāti phalasamāpattito.
atk-s0203a0:1061_0: Vippasannānīti okāsavasenetaṃ vuttaṃ. Phalasamāpattito hi vuṭṭhitassa pañcahi pasādehi
atk-s0203a0:1061_1: patiṭṭhitokāso vippasanno hoti, chavivaṇṇo parisuddho. Tasmā evamāha. Suññatavihārenāti
atk-s0203a0:1061_3: mahāpurisānaṃ vihāro. Yena cāhaṃ maggenātiādīsu vihārato paṭṭhāya yāva gāmassa indakhīlā
atk-s0203a0:1061_4: esa paviṭṭhamaggo nāma, antogāmaṃ pavisitvā gehapaṭipāṭiyā caritvā yāva nagaradvārena
atk-s0203a0:1061_5: nikkhamanā esa caritabbapadeso nāma, bahi indakhīlato paṭṭhāya yāva vihārā esa paṭikkantamaggo
atk-s0203a0:1061_6: nāma. Paṭighaṃ vāpi cetasoti citte paṭihaññanakilesajātaṃ kiñci atthi natthīti. Ahorattānusikkhināti
atk-s0203a0:1062_0: 440. Pahīnā nu kho me pañca kāmaguṇātiādīsu ekabhikkhussa paccavekkhaṇā nānā, nānābhikkhūnaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1062_1: paccavekkhaṇā nānāti. Kathaṃ? Eko hi bhikkhu pacchābhattaṃ piṇḍapātapaṭikkanto pattacīvaraṃ
atk-s0203a0:1062_2: paṭisāmetvā vivittokāse nisinno paccavekkhati “pahīnā nu kho me pañcakāmaguṇā”ti.
atk-s0203a0:1062_3: So “appahīnā”ti ñatvā vīriyaṃ paggayha anāgāmimaggena pañcakāmaguṇikarāgaṃ samugghāṭetvā
atk-s0203a0:1062_4: maggānantaraṃ phalaṃ phalānantaraṃ maggaṃ tato vuṭṭhāya paccavekkhanto “pahīnā”ti
atk-s0203a0:1062_5: pajānāti. Nīvaraṇādīsupi eseva nayo. Etesaṃ pana arahattamaggena pahānādīni honti,
atk-s0203a0:1062_6: evaṃ ekabhikkhussa nānāpaccavekkhaṇā hoti. Etāsu pana paccavekkhaṇāsu añño bhikkhu
atk-s0203a0:1062_7: ekaṃ paccavekkhaṇaṃ paccavekkhati, añño ekanti evaṃ nānābhikkhūnaṃ nānāpaccavekkhaṇā
atk-s0203a0:1066_0: 453. Evaṃ me sutanti indriyabhāvanāsuttaṃ. Tattha gajaṅgalāyanti evaṃnāmake nigame.
atk-s0203a0:1066_1: Suveḷuvaneti suveḷu nāma ekā rukkhajāti, tehi sañchanno mahāvanasaṇḍo, tattha viharati.
atk-s0203a0:1066_2: Cakkhunā rūpaṃ na passati, sotena saddaṃ na suṇātīti cakkhunā rūpaṃ na passitabbaṃ,
atk-s0203a0:1066_3: sotena saddo na sotabboti evaṃ desetīti adhippāyena vadati.
atk-s0203a0:1067_0: Aññathā ariyassa vinayeti iminā bhagavā attano sāsane asadisāya indriyabhāvanāya
atk-s0203a0:1067_1: kathanatthaṃ ālayaṃ akāsi. Athāyasmā ānando – “satthā ālayaṃ dasseti, handāhaṃ imissaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1067_2: parisati bhikkhusaṅghassa indriyabhāvanākathaṃ kāremī”ti satthāraṃ yācanto etassa
atk-s0203a0:1067_3: bhagavātiādimāha. Athassa bhagavā indriyabhāvanaṃ kathento tena hānandātiādimāha.
atk-s0203a0:1068_0: 454. Tatha yadidaṃ upekkhāti yā esā vipassanupekkhā nāma, esā santā esā paṇītā, atappikāti
atk-s0203a0:1068_1: attho. Iti ayaṃ bhikkhu cakkhudvāre rūpārammaṇampi iṭṭhe ārammaṇe manāpaṃ, aniṭṭhe
atk-s0203a0:1068_2: amanāpaṃ, majjhatte manāpāmanāpañca cittaṃ, tassa rajjituṃ vā dussituṃ vā muyhituṃ
atk-s0203a0:1068_3: vā adatvāva pariggahetvā vipassanaṃ majjhatte ṭhapeti. Cakkhumāti sampannacakkhuvisuddhanetto.
atk-s0203a0:1068_4: Cakkhābādhikassa hi uddhaṃ ummīlananimmīlanaṃ na hoti, tasmā so na gahito.
atk-s0203a0:1070_0: 461. Paṭikūle appaṭikūlasaññītiādīsu paṭikūle mettāpharaṇena vā dhātuso upasaṃhārena
atk-s0203a0:1070_1: vā appaṭikūlasaññī viharati. Appaṭikūle asubhapharaṇena vā aniccato upasaṃhārena
atk-s0203a0:1070_2: vā paṭikūlasaññī viharati. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvāti majjhatto
atk-s0203a0:1070_3: hutvā viharitukāmo kiṃ karotīti? Iṭṭhāniṭṭhesu āpāthagatesu neva somanassiko na domanassiko hoti. Vuttañhetaṃ –
atk-s0203a0:1071_0: “Kathaṃ paṭikūle appaṭikūlasaññī viharati? Aniṭṭhasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ mettāya vā pharati,
atk-s0203a0:1071_1: dhātuto vā upasaṃharati, evaṃ paṭikūle appaṭikūlasaññī viharati. Kathaṃ appaṭikūle
atk-s0203a0:1071_2: paṭikūlasaññī viharati? Iṭṭhasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ asubhāya vā pharati, aniccato vā upasaṃharati,
atk-s0203a0:1071_3: evaṃ appaṭikūle paṭikūlasaññī viharati. Kathaṃ paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī
atk-s0203a0:1071_4: viharati? Aniṭṭhasmiñca iṭṭhasmiñca vatthusmiṃ mettāya vā pharati, dhātuto vā upasaṃharati.
atk-s0203a0:1071_5: Evaṃ paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca appaṭikūlasaññī viharati. Kathaṃ appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle
atk-s0203a0:1071_6: ca paṭikūlasaññī viharati? Iṭṭhasmiñca aniṭṭhasmiñca vatthusmiṃ asubhāya vā pharati,
atk-s0203a0:1071_7: aniccato vā upasaṃharati, evaṃ appaṭikūle ca paṭikūle ca paṭikūlasaññī viharati.
atk-s0203a0:1071_8: Kathaṃ paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā upekkhako viharati sato
atk-s0203a0:1071_9: sampajāno? Idha bhikkhu cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako
atk-s0203a0:1071_10: viharati sato sampajāno…pe… manasā dhammaṃ viññāya neva sumano hoti na dummano, upekkhako
atk-s0203a0:1071_11: viharati sato sampajāno. Evaṃ paṭikūle ca appaṭikūle ca tadubhayaṃ abhinivajjetvā
atk-s0203a0:1072_0: Imesu ca tīsu nayesu paṭhamanaye manāpaṃ amanāpaṃ manāpāmanāpanti saṃkilesaṃ vaṭṭati,
atk-s0203a0:1072_1: nikkilesaṃ vaṭṭati. Dutiyanaye saṃkilesaṃ, tatiyanaye saṃkilesanikkilesaṃ vaṭṭati.
atk-s0203a0:1072_2: Puna vuttaṃ – “paṭhamaṃ saṃkilesaṃ vaṭṭati, dutiyaṃ saṃkilesampi nikkilesampi, tatiyaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1077_0: Yo cāyaṃ “sabbadhammamūlapariyāyaṃ vo, bhikkhave, desissāmī”ti āraddhattā ādikalyāṇo,
atk-s0203a0:1077_1: majjhe “suttaṃ geyyaṃ veyyākaraṇaṃ gāthā udānaṃ itivuttakaṃ jātakaṃ abbhutadhammaṃ
atk-s0203a0:1077_2: vedalla”nti vacanato majjhekalyāṇo, sanniṭṭhāne “ariyo bhāvitindriyo”ti vacanato
atk-s0203a0:1084: Sā hi mahāaṭṭhakathāya sāramādāya niṭṭhitā esā,
atk-s0203a0:1093: Yaṃ paññamupacitaṃ tena hotu loko sadā sukhitoti.
atk-s0203a0:1094_6: therena katā ayaṃ papañcasūdanī nāma majjhimanikāyaṭṭhakathā –
